
1a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nam mkha' dri ma med pa bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA ma sang+ga'i ti maN+Da la bi d+hi A kA sha ba ma la nA ma/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag
1b2(rgyud 'grel): par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga nam mkha' dri med ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bde gshegs shes rab ngo bo can/ /ma rig mun nang sems can nyam thag la/ /ye shes nyi zer sbyin mdzad thugs
1b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag /'jam dpal de la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgyu 'phrul rgya chen nam mkha' lta bu nas/ /dbugs dbyung drug bsdus
2a1(rgyud 'grel): zab pa yang dag ni/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga dge ba 'di phyogs tsam/ /bsdus la mos pa'i don du bshad par
2a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de la 'dir rdo rje slob dpon sdom pa dang ldan zhing dbang thob pa gzhan la phan pa'i blo can zhig gis/ /nyon mongs pa rags
2a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gang zag la ma smin pa smin par bya ba 'am/ sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams
2a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyes par bya ste/ gza' dang nyi ma dang skar ma bzang po la/ mkho ba'i yo byad ci 'byor pa bsogs la/ nags tshal
2b1(rgyud 'grel): lam/ ri bo 'am/ chu klung ngam/ tshang tshing la sogs pa nyams dga' ba'i gnas su gnas par byas la stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi sgo dag
2b2(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas mos pa'i slob ma ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal por gnas par bya ste/ hUM gi mtshan ma las byung ba'i khro bo'i gshin rje gshed du skad
2b3(rgyud 'grel): cig gis bdag nyid gyur te/ sku mdog mthing nag ha la pa/ zhal brgya ljags 'dril zhing ha ha hi hi'i gad rgyangs phyogs bcur sgrog pa/ spyan mig
2b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rdo rje'i mig can/ lag pa brgya po kun bskyod mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ gom pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa mnan pa/ thod pa dang
2b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul dang stag lpags kyis brgyan pa/ /zhing chen dang glang chen gyi ko rlon gyon pa/ gshin rje gshed po bgegs thams cad kyi rgyal por bskyed la/
3a1(rgyud 'grel): mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil gyi rdo rje sngon po mig 'bras su bsams la/ khro bo'i sdang mig g.yon nas bskor bas
3a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs thams cad skrag par bya'o/ /g.yas nas bskor bas rdo rje ra ba'o/ /'og tu bltas pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'o/ /steng du bltas pas rdo rje'i gur du bya'o/ /
3a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la gnas der phyag dar dang skyang nul bya zhing/ a ka ru nag pos kyang phyogs bcur bdug sa la sa gzhi tsan dan la sogs pa'i dris byugs te/ de'i
3a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su maN+Dal khru gang pa gsum bya ste/ sa de la rin po che brdar zhing 'thas par byas la/ rdo rgyus kyis dkar por bya zhing 'o ma dang tsan dan dang gur kum la
3a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa srog chags la gnod pa ma byas pa las byung ba'i dris byugs la/ yi ge swA las byung ba'i rin po che bkram pa ni/ bla ma'i maN+Dal ri rab gling bzhes
3b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa bkod la/ rang nyid dkon mchog gsum la rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog tshom bu dgod pa dang/ yi dam lha'i maN+Dal gyi dkyil 'khor la grangs dang mnyam pa'i me tog gi
3b2(rgyud 'grel): tshom bu bkod la/ rang nyid yi dam lha'i nga rgyal gyi snying kha nas sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba bkug la maN+Dal la bcug ste/ bzhugs pa'i rten dang/
3b3(rgyud 'grel): mkho ba'i yon du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de'i rjes la mchod pa lnga dang/ yan lag gis mchod pa g.yas dang g.yon du bkram la/ gtsang zhing dag par bshams te/ tshul bzhin
3b4(rgyud 'grel): du byin gyis brlabs la gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas tshogs bsag pa'i yul dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mdun du mngon par sprul te maN+Dal phul la mchod par bya'o/ /'jam
3b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje la sogs pa/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la/ /lus dang ngag yid gus ldan nas/ /kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags dang/ /'jig
3b6(rgyud 'grel): rten dag pa mchog gyur pa'i/ /rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs/ /kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi/ /bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig /kun nas bsags par gang gyur la//
4a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar bshags/ /'gro ba gang gis bsod nams gang/ /dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la/ /de bzhin mthun pa'i lhag sems kyis/ /dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo//  
4a2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs byang chub mchog bskyed nas/ /'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la/ /tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /'gro kun yun du bde ba'i phyir/ /ji srid
4a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba de srid du/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /ji srid 'khor ba gnas bar du/ /bdag gi dge ba de bzhin du/ /kun nas zad par ma gyur bar/ /sems can yongs su smin par shog /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas byang
4a4(rgyud 'grel): chub yid kyis bzung/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas shog /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs
4a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sangs rgyas chos
4a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /ded nas brtsam ste gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /rdo rje slob dpon dam pa dag /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /
4b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug du/ /sbyin pa rnams ni rab tu sbyin/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /sangs rgyas zhal nas gsungs pa yi/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ci nus bzung/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /
4b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i las rnams bya ba dang/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa/ /shin tu dam pa bdag gis gzung/ /de ltar sdom pa ma lus pa/ /dam pa bdag gis gzung bgyis nas/ /byang chub mchog sems bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can ma rig ldongs pa rnams/ /bdag gis
4b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dge la gzung/ /sems can nyon mongs bcings pa yi/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /sdug bsngal chen po'i nang sems can/ /dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing/ /'khor
4b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dag na gnas pa yi/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas/ /byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar/ /'jam mgon 'bangs su bdag 'bul lags/ /thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar mdzod/ /dus ni nas ni bzung nas su/ /bder gshegs khyed kyi
4b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' bzhin du/ /sems can don du bsgrub lags kyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa mang du gsol/ /de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje dang dga' ba dang/ btangs snyoms tshad med pa bzhi rjes su dran nas/ sems bskyed cing sdom
4b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzung nas/ da ni ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa stong pa nyid la slo gtad la/ de bsgrub par byed pa'i tshig brjod de sgra'i don la mos par bya'o/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mdza' ma yi ge med
4b7(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tra dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ zhes brjod pas phyi nang gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad stong zhing bdag med par gyur te ye shes kyis sa sbyangs nas/ chos thams cad nam mkha' i dkyil lta bu rang gi sems kyi snang ba 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): shar ba las A li dang/ kA li'i phreng ba bsams la/ A li las ni pad+ma dkar po'i steng/ kA li las chos kyi 'byung gnas nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam pa/ de'i tha ma 'od zer gyi phreng ba lngas bskor ba'i nang du/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga 'phros
5a2(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dus pa las/ 'od ljang gu las rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa/ 'od dmar po las me'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa/ 'od dkar po las chu'i dkyil 'khor rin po ches mtshan pa/ 'od ser po las gser gyis bzhi 'khor los
5a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa/ 'od sngon po las ri rab rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de yang shar shel/ lho baiDUrya/ nub pad+ma rA ga /byang gser rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du 'od zer gyi phreng ba lnga ba/ ril gyis 'dus pa las/ lha'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa sgo khyud rin po che'i pa Tas
5a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par brgyan pa/ phyi rol na mu tig gi za ra tshags dang dril bu g.yer kha grwa bzhi nas 'phyang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chun 'phyang kyang twa babs kyi ka ba la 'phyang ba/ rta babs kyang twa ra Na la sogs pas brgyan cing/ ri dags dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ 'phan dang rgyal
5a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang/ gdugs dang rin po che 'od du 'bar ba'i tog gis mdzes bar byas te/ gzhal yas khang gi nang du/ seng ge dang glang po che dang/ ? chog dang/ rma bya dang/ nam mkha' lding gi steng du pad+ma dang/ nyi ma'i gdan mdzes par bkram pa dang/ 'khor rnams kyang go rims su
5a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ zla ba'i gdan bkram par bsams la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan thog du rang gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las A li kA li'i phreng ba byung ba las/ de'i spro bsdu'i byin rlabs las zla ba dang nyi ma la de dang des mtshan par gyur/ de'i nang du a las byung ba'i rdo rje
5a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po as mtshan bar gyur/ de rnams spro zhing bsdus nas 'od 'bar ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhal bzhi ba zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa/ gnyis pa lho/ gsum pa nub/ bzhi pa byang ngo/ /phyogs bzhi ga na phyag gnyis gnyis pa/
5b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'i steng na rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa skyes pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de'i thugs kar yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las/ dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas bzhin shes kyi ral gri/ /yon bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i po ti
5b2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ zhal bzhi phyogs dang mthun pa/ dbus dmar ser ro/ /de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa la/ gsang sngags rgyal po drug gis mtshan pa/ de'i dkyil du 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas ral
5b3(rgyud 'grel): gri g.yon po ti 'dzin pa/ de'i steng du zla ba dang/ a bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar na de'i sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin no// /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo drug bskyed par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags kyi
5b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba 'di a las spro bar bya'o/ /a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): s+thi to h+ri di dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM/ bud+d+ho bud+d+ha nAM/ twyAd+d+ha ba ra tI nAM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshed ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+nyA na ka ya ya te na
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ma:/ oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na ma/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya ta na ma(rgyud 'grel): /oM sarba d+harmma b+hA ba/ swa d+ha ba bi shud+d+ha/ tsak+Shu badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): kri ti/ pa ri shud+ha/ sarba d+harmma ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI pa de shud+d+hi hA/ mu pA dA ya hi/ e a A/
5b6(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga? ban/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gA shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmma ga gan/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na sarb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas yi ge'i phreng ba de rnams 'od zer dang bcas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi
5b7(rgyud 'grel): nas phar 'phros pas/ rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i zhing khams su sangs rgyas mchod nas/ slar 'od zer du 'dus te dkyil 'khor gyi sgo na tshur 'dus pa las/ gdan rnams kyi steng du yi ge a 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa de gnas pa las/ de rnams byung ba'i sangs rgyas
6a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma las sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sa gnon gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po g.yas rdo rje thugs
6a2(rgyud 'grel): kar ? pa/ g.yon dril bu dgu la gtad pa'o/ /g.yas ngos su rdo rje rgyal po mdog ser po/ tho ba thogs pa'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa dmar po mda''gengs pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje legs pa ljang gu rdo rje 'dzin pas gol gyi legs par ster ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi gli
6a3(rgyud 'grel): gi nyi ma la/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ mchod sbyin rin po che bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen ser po g.yas rin po che rdo rje dpral bar bstod pa g.yon dril bu bkur brten pa'o/ /g.yas su
6a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyi ma sngon po nyi ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje dbang po dmar po rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje bshad pa dkar po so shing gi phreng ba thogs pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ mnyam
6a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhag gi thog na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje chos dmar po pad+ma'i rdzong bu snying gar kha phye ba 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po sngon po ral gri thogs pa'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu ser po 'khor lo can no/ /g.yon du rdo rje smra ba sngon po
6a6(rgyud 'grel): lce thogs pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi gling gi nyi ma la sangs rgyas don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa skyabs sbyin mdzad cing rgya gram can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje las ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje srung
6a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ser po rdo rje khrab thogs pa'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin na ?? mche ba thogs pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ser po rdo rje thogs pa'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rin chen sems dpa' dang/ pad+ma sems dpa' dang/ las
6b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dpa' dang/ rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' bsgom/ /de'i phyi rol mtshams bzhi ni sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin pa dang/ phreng ba ma ser mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang/ glu ma sngon mo pi bang 'dzin pa dang/ gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin
6b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ de rnams shar lho nas brtsams te bsgom mo/ gru chad bzhi la spos me ma dkar mo spos por thogs pa dang/ me tog ma mthing ga me tog 'dzin pa dang/ mar me ma dmar mo mar me thogs pa dang/ dri chab ma ljang gu dri'i lde gu thogs pa dang/ de rnams
6b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang shar lho mtshams nas rim bzhin no/ /de'i phyi rol gyi khyams rnams su byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan kun 'joms rnams ni mdog dkar po rdo rje thogs pa rnams ni shar du'o/ spos kyi blo gros dang/ dpa' bar
6b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ ye shes rtog dang/ de rnams ni mdog ser po rin po che'i snye ma thogs pa rnams ni lho ru'o/ /'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od dang bzad skyong dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni mdog dmar po pad+ma'i sdong bu thogs
6b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams ni nub du'o/ /rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi zad pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dang/ kun tu bzang po rnams ni mdog ljang gu rgya gram thogs pa byad du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa brgyan thams cad kyis
6b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po lcags kyu thogs pa'o/ /lho'i sgor ni rdo rje zhags pa ser po zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor lcags sgrog dmar po lcags sgrog thogs pa'o/ /byang gi sgor rdo rje'i bebs pa ljang nag dril bu thogs
6b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sgo ba de rnams kyang cung zad khro ba/ zhal mche ba lhag ge brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor drug par kun tu bsgoms pa la mchod pa'i lha mo dang bskal bzang che mthun pa'i 'khor lo dbus kyi rnam snang chen po'i
7a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la rnam snang dang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje zhes pa gnas pa'i tshul lo/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi 'khor gyi lha tshogs bar snang la bsdus pa spyan drang bya ba ste/ oM a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da
7a2(rgyud 'grel): ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmmA/ ga ga na a ma la su ba ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmmA d+ha tu d+hA na garba A(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal/ badzra sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod cing/ sngags mjug badzra dri
7a3(rgyud 'grel): sh+ya zhes bya bas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor legs par blta bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la phyag btsal te/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de/ yid kyis sgo phye la dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing sgo bzhi nas tshul spyan drang la/ bgegs
7a4(rgyud 'grel): bskrad la yid kyis sgo bcad la/ rdo rje'i go chas gsungs la lha so so la bstim la dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi yum bzhin nam mkha' la bsdu bar bya'o/ /ye shes kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur te dbang rtags spyi bor mtshan
7a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni shar du bstan par bsgoms la bdag nyid lus gnyis kyi tshul du gzung ste/ lha snam la gnas te rjes kyis mchod pa lnga phul la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de/
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpas bsdus pas na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa/ /rdo rje las kun mdzad pa'o/ /oM badzra satwa su sa gra ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags dang gar dang glu dang bcas pas dbul/ /byang chub yan
7a7(rgyud 'grel): lag me tog spos/ /mar ma snang ba byug pa dri/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra d+hu pe d+hA/ oM badzra puShpe pu/ oM badzra A lo ke hI(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra gand+he gan zhes pas mchod de/ /gzhan
7b1(rgyud 'grel): yang gsang ba'i yum bzhis mchod de/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ /khro ba chen po dgra che ba/ /mchod pa
7b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po chags pa che/ /chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /satwa badzra hUM/ ratna badzra hUM/ d+harmmA badzra hUM/ zhes mchod la bstod de/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud ces pa nas/
7b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /ces pa'i bar gyis bstod pa'i rgyal po des bstod la/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo la sems gtad pa'i yid kyis gsang sngags rgyal po 'di drug bzlas par bya'o/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da pra dz+nyA dz+nya? na mUrta
7b4(rgyud 'grel): ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar lha bskyed cing gsol ba btab la gnas pa de dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// //da ni de bzhin gshegs
7b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod la 'gro ba'i don du phrin las la sbyar te/ dkyil 'khor chen po drug 'jig rten du spro ste phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs skye nas nyon mongs pa drug sbyangs
7b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba drug khugs phyung dkyil 'khor drug gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar snga ma nyid la bsdu zhing spros nas 'gro ba'i don bya'o/ /de tsam gyis ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba la ting 'dzin to/ /de lta bu'i tshig rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod de lhag pa dang
7b7(rgyud 'grel): ma chad pa bshags nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu shing chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rgyas gdab cing bde ba'i spyod pa bya'o/ /de lta bu'i sbyor bas mtshan ma brtan po byung ba de srid kyi bar du bya ste/ de yang sems rtse gcig tu bsgom zhing zlos pa de la ni
8a1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas chos kyi sgo thams cad ston par mdzad de sku yang ston to zhes gsung pas/ zhal mthong ba 'am rmi lam du lung bstan pa la sogs pa ma
8a2(rgyud 'grel): byung gi bar du bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsnyen pa ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gnang ba thob nas gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ ri dang chu klung dang nags tshal la sogs
8a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas su slob dpon la slob mas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i go skabs phye ste/ dang po sa'i cho gar yang de bzhin du mnyam pa yin na dbus tho byang shar gzhol te dma' ba/ sa gzhi 'jam pa
8a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' ba'i gnas su ngam grog dang bya skyibs dang/ bong bu la sogs pa sde ba 'jam zhing lhun sdug pa der dkyil 'khor brtsigs pa'am bri ba'i don du sa'i bdag po la gnang ba thob par byas la/ sa'i lha mo la gtor ma phul la/ dngos grub rab 'bring thob
8a5(rgyud 'grel): pas brkos nas ltas rtags la mi shis pa yin na bar chad 'byung bas dor bar bya'o/ /shis pa yin na de'i phyogs thams cad byi dor bya ste spos chus chag chag btab la shin tu ba lang gi lci bas byugs la 'thas par bcags te mnyam pa me long
8a6(rgyud 'grel): gi ngos ltar byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas sa la gtugs te/ oM badzra me di ni badzrI b+hi ba mahA badzra hUM/ zhes pas rdo rje'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab po/ /de'i phyogs kun kyang a ka ru nag pos gtul zhing du bas bdug go /de ltar na lhag par gnas pa'i
8a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag sa'i cho ga bstan to/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brtsigs la/ drung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par bsgom ste/ mchod pa rgyas par phul nas bzlas pa bya ste/ mchod pa'am bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod
8b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas mdun du maN+Dal bya ste/ me tog bkram ras sa'i lha mo la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa bshams te gtor ma yang bshams nas dam tshigs gi phyag rgya bstan te/ 'di skad bsgo'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang
8b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par bgyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /ji ltar shAkya seng+ge yis/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor 'bri ces brjod de/ /mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i
8b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma phul la ye shes pa gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la/ slob dpon gyi phur bu bcu gshin rje gshed du bskyed la/ dar gyi cod pan dbang bskur la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ces gzi brjid bskyed la bzhag go /de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bcug la langs te/ rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol la/ 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /hUM ye shes zhi ba'i dang las ma g.yos kyang/ /sku'i cha byad za byed rngam pa'i stabs
8b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis/ /bgegs gsum dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis/ /bgegs kun bsreg par mdzad
8b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings las thugs rje chen por sprul/ /skye med dang las 'jigs byed chen po'i sku bstan te/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir thugs dam mi 'gyur zhing/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM dkyil
8b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon gcig /gnas 'dir bde gshegs dkyil 'khor pho brang 'bri/ /bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin byer bar gyis/ /gal te nga'i bsgo ba las 'das nas/ /ye shes can gyi
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rab 'bar bas/ /mgo bo tshal ba brgyar ni 'gas 'gyur zhing/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /he sa phyogs bgegs gnas che ge mo 'di ru/ /bdag rdo rje slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge mo zhes
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bya bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad bde ba la 'god par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhig 'dri bas/ dus di ring bgegs kyi tshogs su gyur pa lha'i
9a3(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang klu'i gdon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding rgan po dang rgan mo la sogs pa thams cad dengs shig /byed zhig song zhig /gang mi 'gro ba de ni rdo rje ye shes rab tu 'bar ba 'dis/ mgo bo tshal ba brgyar
9a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gas par gyur ta re/ rdo rje hUM ste hUM hUM hUM zhes pa dang/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA nan sarba big+h+nAn uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT ces bgegs bskrad do/ spyod? mig bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang bsreg par bya'o/ /khro bo'i stang stabs goms pa'i
9a5(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyis gar byed pas kyang bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tha ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i sa bzhi dang/ rab dang gur dang/ dra ba rnams byas la phur bus btab la bzhag go /de nas tsandan dang
9a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ lha rnams kyi rten dri'i thig le dang/ me tog gi tshom bu rnams bkod la/ rnam snang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i snying ga nas dkyil 'khor bton la mdun du dgod par bya'o/ /de rnams la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
9a7(rgyud 'grel): la mchod pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir lha mo bzhis bsdus la dbang bskur te/ rgyas btab la mchod pa byas te/ bsgom bzlas brtsam mo/ /de ltar rdzogs pa dang mchod pa dang
9b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa rgyas par byas la/ snyan gsan dbab pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can dag 'di zhes pas/ /nad par dkyil 'khor bzang
9b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i mtshan/ /'di zhes bya ba 'bri lags na/ /rjes su brtse ba nyer dgongs nas/ /kun gyi byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /lha lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas bum pa bzang po nag nog med pa'i tshul dang mthun pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa 'am/ yang na bum pa bdun gu gul gyi
9b3(rgyud 'grel): bdug cing/ bgegs bskrad cing bsangs te/ dri'i thig le dang mtshan ma bkod la/ rin po che lnga dang/ sman lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang/ snying po lnga dang/ spos lnga dang/ ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang/ srog chags med pa'i chus bkad la/ ras kha tshar ma nyams
9b4(rgyud 'grel): pas mgul bcings te/ 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan la bzhag ste/ nang du lha thams cad bskyed pa dang/ las thams cad pang gshin rje gshed po bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod cing dbang bskur la phreng sngags dang gsang
9b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal po drug bzlas la bzhag go /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po'i g.yas ngos su gzhung dang mthun pa'i thab khung byas la/ las dang mthun pa'i shing dang rdzas bsags te/ me lha sngon du mchod la de'i snying gar dkyil 'khor gyi
9b6(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams spyan drangs mched rdzas phul la/ thun mong du mchod nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngar gyi gnas su gshegs te/ brtan par byas la/ sngar me lha la rdzas lhag mas mchod/ 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab nas me lha gshegs su gsol
9b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas ci 'byor ba'i gtor mas chos skyong rnams la tshis par byas la/ 'dod pa'i don la phrin las bcol la slar gnas su gtang ngo/ /gtor ma dang sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas snod du rung ba'i slob mas maN+Dal byas la/ me tog bkram
10a1(rgyud 'grel): nas me tog gis snyim pa bkang nas/ slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo//
10a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig de ci stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal zhes brjod do/ /slob dpon
10a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis de la 'di skad ces bsgo ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin gang du ma byon dang/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs kyis/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams
10a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa tshad med nyid/ /gsang sngags spyod pa bla med de/ /skyob pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu'i blo gros 'di kyis shig ces brjod do//
10a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa kun bya ba dang/ sems bskyed cing sdom pa bsrung du bcug la/ yi dam gang 'dod ltar bskyed la byin gyis brlab ste/ mchod pa lngas mchod la/ so shing dor ba dang/ srung skud bcing ba dang/
10a6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i go cha bskon la/ dbu'i gtsug tor bskyed de/ rmi lam brtag pa'i phyir kun byin la/ zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad la/ /slob dpon gyi las rnams rdzogs par bya'o/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus te/
10a7(rgyud 'grel): go bskon te bsrungs te ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /de nas nang par nyi ma 'char khar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ pa'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs te/ tsan dan gyi lde gu dri dang ldan par byas la/ thig skud sar pa nyis  
10b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur tshad sgo'i nyi shu cha kha dog lnga pa rin po che'i snod du bcug la/ byin gyis rlabs la mchod la/ /sna slob ma'i lag tu gtad la bsgril nas/ 'jig rten khams 'di ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro mgon gyi/ /khyed kyi dus ni 'di/
10b2(rgyud 'grel): lags kyis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i thig gdab gsol zhes brjod la/ bdag dang slob ma g.yas nas skor bas thig gdab par bya'o/ /tshangs thig dang po shar nas nub du gdab/ /gnyis pa byang nas lho ru gdab/ /slob dpon me lhar gnas slob ma dbang
10b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du gnas te/ shar gyi thig dang de bzhin du logs gsum du gdang ba de rjes tshangs thig dang/ zur thig dang thig chen dang/ thig phran gyi bye brag gis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gling dam lngar thig gdab bo/ /de yang steng du
10b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi thig dang/ 'og tu dam tshig gi thig ste/ sa thig rlan gyis spangs la tshul ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pas dpyad la gdab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gser las byas pa'i rin po che lnga'i phye ma ji ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ mchod pa
10b5(rgyud 'grel): phul la stims te/ tshon dgyi ba ni dkar po chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sngon po me long lta bu'i ye shes nyid/ /sor po so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la/ /dmar po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid/ /ljang gu bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/ /ye
10b6(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga ldan dkyil 'khor 'grub ces brjod la/ sngon la slob dpon gyis byang shar mtshams kyi rtsig pa brtsigs la/ phyi nas slob mas skor phyogs ma log pa'i ci bde bar tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /de la dang po gtso bo'i gnas rnams ni/ nyi ma'i
10b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od la zla bas brgyan pa'o/ /gzhan dag ni phyogs kyi kha dog go /'dod yon pad+ma ra ga'i sa gzhi/ rin chen pha gu gsar las byas pa la/ rin po che'i phreng ba dgye ba la/ dra ba dra phyed nam mkha' i mdog can mu tig gi har 'phyang ba de'i phyi rol du nam mkha' i
11a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog la ka ba dang rta babs dang ri dags dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyan rnams ci mdzes par bri bar bya'o/ /de dag gi rgyab tu rdo rje dang/ me 'od kyi phreng ba bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor lnga'i bar bar ni/ gser
11a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis gzhi la rin po che gcal du bkram par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol gru bzhir byas la grwa bzhi la dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ bum pa bzang po mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bris zin nas/ lhag pa dang chad pa bskang ba'i phyir dril bu dkrol
11a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing yi ge brgya ba bzlas la/ tha ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas dpal dang 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par byas la/ mchod pa'i bye brag me tog gi snod dang/ spos phor dang dri'i snod dang mar me'i phreng ba dang/ zhal zas kyi snod stong dam
11a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya'am bcu la sogs pa ci 'byor ba dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa ci 'byor pa bsags nas/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi shar du stan pa de la gnas te/ cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad bsogs te/
11a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lhag par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor snying ga nas sprul nas/ rdul tshon gyis dkyil 'khor dang bsres nas tshogs bsags pa sngon du 'gro bas srung ba'i 'khor
11a6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i skabs su phur pa dang/ mda' dang ral gril sogs pa'i ra bas bskor te/ sngon du gsungs pa'i tshul du rgyas dang bsgams nas mchod de/ bum pa yang bkod la dbang bskur zhing brgyas btab la/ rdzas kyi mchod pa lnga dang/ phyi nang gi mchod
11a7(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga dang/ gsang ba'i yum bzhis kyang legs par mchod la/ gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rol ma'i bye brag thams cad kyang dbul bar bya ste/ dbugs 'byin chen por gang ston che/ /dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /bkur sti rim gro phun
11b1(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs/ /mchog du dga' ba grags pa'i dpal/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phreng sngags dang/ oM dang hUM bzlas pa 'am/ lha re re zhing re re dbul bar bya'o/ /bsam
11b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gnas/ shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho 'di/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul/ /bdug pa'i snod du ma dang/ me tog gi snod du ma dang/ byug pa'i
11b3(rgyud 'grel): snod du ma dang/ mar me'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas so so'i sngags dang/ gar dang bcas pa dbul lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po dang/ /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa dang/ /bum pa bzang po che
11b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul lo/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM dang hUM bzlas te/ so so'i ming spel te/ oM dang sna ye hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas rin po che dang nor bu'i bye brag mang po dang/ dpag
11b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyi shing la sogs pa mang po dang/ bum pa bzang po 'bras bu can gyi shing gis rgyan pa la sogs pa rin po che'i bye brag thams cad kyang lha re re zhing dbul lo/ /sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing/ /nad do cig gi dgra che ba/ /
11b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gzigs pa yi/ /zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /oM hUM zhes zlos shing 'bras bu gsum dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ ga bur dang/ dzrA ti la sogs
11b7(rgyud 'grel): pa srog? chags las ma byung ba'i sman ji snyed yod pa de rnams lha re re zhing so so'i ming dang spel la dbul bar bya'o/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mdza' thug pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa dang/ /khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/ /sangs rgyas kun
12a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi gzi brjid 'di/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /zhes brjod cing/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang/ 'phan dang gdugs la sogs pa ras sam 'phan gyi lnga ldi bsam gyis mi
12a2(rgyud 'grel): khyab par lha re re zhing dbul lo/ /lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing/ /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /
12a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing/ gar gyi rnam pa glog ltar bsgyur cing gzugs brgya stong du ma snyed du sprul la/ gar byed cing dkyil 'khor la dbul lo/ /de'i rjes la sbyin sreg gi cho gas mchod zhing/ mchod pas kyang lha tshogs mnyes par bya bar gsungs so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
12a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ sngar sdom pa blangs pa'i slob ma des slob dpon la gsol ba btab nas/ de nas slob ma de la bgegs bskrad nas/ a ka ru nag pos gdugs la/ /oM badzra rak+Sha hUM/ zhes
12a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don bzlas pa'i stong g.yogs dang/ oM badzra lak+Sha hUM zhes bzlas pas gdong ba bkad la/ sgo bzhi'i phyogs nas rigs lnga la phyag 'tshal du gzhug go /de'i rjes la lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas rgyun bshags
12a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de nas slob dpon la gsol ba 'di skad gdab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog /'jam dpal dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /slob dpon bdag ni
12a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pas/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal
12b1(rgyud 'grel): lo zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de la slob dpon gyis rigs lnga'i sdom pa rig pa'i dbang lnga'i rten du rung bar bya ba'i phyir phog la/ gzhan yang mi dge ba bcu dang/ nye ba'i las kyang spang ba'i sdom pa sbyin no/ /des kyang slob dpon gyis sdom pa gsungs pa
12b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ kho bo yang bsrung zhing sdom par bgyid do zhes khas blangs long cig /de dang mthun par sngar gsungs pa ltar khas blang bar bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i gsol ba slob mas gdab pa ni rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la
12b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas ni/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi rtog 'khor lo sbyin par ldan/ /thar ba chen po'i grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor chen po bzhugs nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
12b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'dab/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /slob dpon gyis
12b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing/ /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas lha la gnang ba
12b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa dang/ snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM sarba yo ga b+ho d+hi tsit+ta utpa da yA mi/ su ra ta sa ma yastwaM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM zhes snying khar zla ba rdo rje bsams la/ lag pa nas khrid de/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba bsgo bzhi nas gzhug go / //
12b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas shar gyi sgor phyogs par bzhag la/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ des khyod la ye shes gang yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): du yang 'grub pa thob nas dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ /de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma ma 'ong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ha re zhes
13a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod de/ de nas slob ma'i snying khang rdo rje bzhag la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag gzhug par mdzad/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra da ka Tha hUM/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam
13a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'grub/ /oM a mri ta hUM badzra a ga d+ha h+ri tha hUM/ de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgrags te/ deng nas brtsams te/ khyod kyi rdo rje slob dpon pa yin gyi//
13a4(rgyud 'grel): nga yis 'di byos shig ces sgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis ngal brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' 'dab par bya ste/ 'di skad brjod du gzhug go /
13a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bdag la 'bab bar gyur cig ces smros shig pa'o/ /rdo rje dris sgos ba snying khar bzhag la/ 'dir rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ 'jam dpal rdo rje yin par
13a6(rgyud 'grel): grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /deng 'dir khyod la 'bab par shog /o many+dzu sh+rI badzra A be sha ya a a a a zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod do/ /rdo rje dmar po mtshon gung ba char ltar du 'bebs par bsam mo/ /gal te 'bab par ma
13a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur na sdig pa byang ba'i cho ga byas dbab par bya'o/ /de nas babs ba dang yi ge brgyas pas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas me tog phreng ba dor te/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes pas dkyil 'khor la gtor la gang du babs pa'i lha de yi dam du dbog go/ oM prita grih+Na twaM
13b1(rgyud 'grel): i maM satwa mahA ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol te mig lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dbye zhing sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM 'jam dpal rdo rje de khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed
13b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /de ring nyid du 'byed par shog /he badzra pa sh+ya hUM zhes brjod la/ mig g.yogs kyang bkrol te 'di skad brjod do/ /legs par ltos shig sems dpa' che/ /thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /me tog gang lo phag pa
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'di de khyod kyi rigs su lha/ /rang gi lha ru shes par gyis/ /zhes brjod la rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i bar du dkyil 'khor drug bstan par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos su maN+Dal la
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris la/ /yi dam lha'i gzugs su bsams la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ de yang dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur bar bya ste/ ji ltar ltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu/ /
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yig ni sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta gA gA ta badzra a bi re la ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba
13b6(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta ? ? badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi/ /zhe sdang chen po mi bskyod pa'o/ /dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA gA ta thA gA ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur te/
13b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ? ? bsgom pa dang/ /yon tan gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir/ /nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan gyis/ /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta u mu kuTa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang/ dpal dan rin chen cod pan dbang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms
14a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dir bdag byin gyis brlabs nas/ /? ? ?/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna swa ? Any+tsa ko ho/ chod pa'i phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan gyi/ /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskor/ /de nas
14a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de rang khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyi 'od/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hi dziny+tsa mi tirtha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ chos kyi gsung rab dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas//
14a3(rgyud 'grel): ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ? badzra swa b+ha ? ?/ 'du shes phun po rnam dag pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /'dod chags snang mdza' yas kyi/ /rdo rje yi ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te/ 'di de sangs
14a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i mchog tu bshad/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya d+hi ba tis twAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha sa ma ya sti/ dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las su mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo b+ha badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i khyab nan tan ye shes kyis /phrag dog don yod grub pa yi/ /dril bu yi ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ /rid pa'i bar gang shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal
14a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bsal ba'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /rnam par snang mdzad rtag tu bskyed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ che ge mo mA ma a b+hi She ga ta hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje me phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /ded
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /rdo rje? sku ni mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gA ya badzra swA ? At+ma ko haM/ gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /gti mug rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /dpal ldan
14b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod dbang bskur ro/ /de dang ldan na de lnga ni rig pa'i dbang lnga te/ phung po lnga dag nas nyon mongs pa lnga spangs nas/ ye shes lnga dang ldan te/ ma rig pa rig las na rig pa'i dbang lnga zhes bya'o/ /de nas brtul shugs kyi dbang zhes bya ba
14b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /'jam dpal rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta many+dzu sh+rI tsit+ta badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha a d+hi Sha ka ha ya mi hUM ha ha ha hi hi hi/ de nas
14b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba sbyin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mi byed pa'i/ /gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/ /snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /skyobs pa sngags kyi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ yon bdag gis yan phyi ma chag phul la gsol
14b4(rgyud 'grel): ba btab la/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod stsol bgyis pa ltar/ /bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba bskyab pa'i gzi brjid can/ /ji ltar yon tan 'phyang gnas
14b5(rgyud 'grel): stsol slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i / /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /de ltar gsol ba btab rjes la sdom pa sbyin te/ ji bzhin don ldan dam tshig ni//
14b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun/ /phas pham par ni rab tu grags/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya/ /srog gcod rku dang 'phrog pa dang/ /rdzu dang chang ni cung zad spang/ /mi dge ba ni bcu po dag khyod kyi nam yang ma spyod cig /theg pa dman pa mas pa
14b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sems can 'khor ba mi spang zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la ma zhugs shing/ /lha dang lha min mnyam mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /'gom par bya ba ma yin te/ /dam tshig 'di dag nyams pa na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar 'gyod par byed/ /de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis//
15a1(rgyud 'grel): des kyang slob dpon gyi bka' bzhin bgyid bar 'tshal lo zhes/ khas blang ngo/ /de nas slob ma dam pa de'i lus la lho bkod la/ rnam rgyal bum pa thogs te/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba
15a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi gnas las byung/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a pa ya/ bar ti ga a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ de nas gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i mig zur thogs la/
15a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mi mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tra a pa ha ra pa Ta li hI zhes nyon mongs pa spong ba'i dbang ngo/ /de nas me long bstan la
15a4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgya dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byas/ /don
15a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /de nas mda' gzhu blangs la mi'i drung du 'phen du btsug la/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med de/ /skal ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston/ /bdud kyi rigs rnams pham byed pa'i/ /ye shes kyi
15a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mnga' 'phongs shig ho zhes mda''jig rten gyi khams drug du 'phen du gzhug go /sku'i dbang ngo/ /de nas dril bu blangs la dkrol ta/ chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /mkha' dang mnyam par sbyor
15a7(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /sku mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsol/ /A(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs gi dbang ngo/ /me long blangs la 'jam dbyangs rdo rje me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni snying la zhugs so/
15b1(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI tsit+ta a/ thugs kyi dbang ngo/ /de nas rkang pa'i bar du ches kyi 'khor lo bzhag /lag par dung dang lce gtad/ mgo lag ? ? ? dang nA brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig /de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /chos
15b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas/ /kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyi su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi ma chag /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de
15b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang/ /kun tu khyod la srung bar byed ces brjod do/ /yang 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul
15b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod do/ /de nas thams cad gzengs bstod de/ /kun bdag sangs rgyas bsgom pa po/ /rdo re'i ming dbang bskur bas kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs par lud bstan nyid/ /oM? 'di de ngas khyod lung
15b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan yin/ /'jam dpal rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun tu sgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhes bya ba/ sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hurb+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): de nas gnang ba sbyin pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis
15b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dus 'gyur bde lta de ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang mas sems can don bya'o/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /di ring phan chad khyed zhugs kyis/ /sdig
15b7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun las ngas grol bar/ /khyed rnams des ni legs par gnas/ /bde chen thob pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi smod pa/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /
16a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par 'thob/ /de nas bdag nyid thar bsams la/ /chos gos bzung ste/ oM 'dir ni ngas khyod lung bstan par
16a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin cig tu ni rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni lung bstan mdzad/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag po sten pa yan/ /de?  ngan? 'dud las
16a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par 'thob/ /de ltar gzengs bstod pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang/ /lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas slob ma de la mchod pa lnga
16a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ khyed rnams kyis kyang dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod cig par bka' bsgo'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis yo byad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha mchod
16a5(rgyud 'grel): la ? ga mas der tshogs tshim par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod de/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa yis mchod la bstod do/ /de nas slob dpon la yon gyis mnyes par byas la/ /'dod pa'i don gsol ba gdab bo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba
16a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ba/ dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas la lha gshegs su gsol te/ dam tshig bsdus la ci bde ba'i spyod lam bya'o/ /slob ma rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chog byas pa la/ /dge ba bsags pa gang gyur pa/ /thams
16a7(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nam mkha' dri ma med pa zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
16b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+ha dra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam dpa' i
16b2(rgyud 'grel): mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thugs su chud/ /smra ba'i skye mchog smra ba'i rgyal/ /smra ba'i seng+ge tshugs pa med/ /rnam kun mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyod dang ldan pa shes pa'o/ /'jam pa'i mgon la dga' ba dang/ /de yi don
16b3(rgyud 'grel): du sgrubs pa'i thabs/ /mdo ru bsdus te bshad par bya/ /rnam par smin pa'i lus dag la/ /lha yi nga rgyal dran byas te/ /mdun du 'jam mgon bsams nas su/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang/ /bshags dang rjes su yi rang ba/ /bsngo
16b4(rgyud 'grel): dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /sems bskyed de ni yid kyis bya/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ brjod pas chos kun dmigs med par/ /stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /sems nyid a ru gyur nas su/ /zla dkyil d+hI(rgyud 'grel): ru bsgom par
16b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de las 'phro 'dus mtshan mar gyur/ /man ma 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku/ /sku gser me tog zur phud can/ /shes rab ral gri po tis mtshan/ /zhi ba'i tshul 'chang gzhon nu bsgom/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings nas su//
16b6(rgyud 'grel): e hya hi many+dzu sh+rI ku mA ra/ A ka ra Sha A be sha ya a a/ spyan dran mdun du bsam par bya/ /de nas mchod pa dbul byas te/ /many+dzu sh+rI gand+he pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu sh+rI puShpe pU dza swAhA/ oM many+dzu sh+rI d+hU pe pU dza swAhA/ oM many+dzu sh+rI A
16b7(rgyud 'grel): lo ka pU dzi swA hA/ e many+dzu sh+rI nai bi dyA pU dza swA hA/ oM many+dzu sh+rI gand+he swAhA/ /de nas bstod pa'i tshig 'di brjod/ /shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis/ /chos kun khong du chud par mkhyen/ /mi shes ga yul de thams cad sel/ /sems
17a1(rgyud 'grel): can kun la byams thugs ldan/ /'jam mgon byams thugs ldan la 'dud/ /mi shes g.yul sel ral gri dang/ /shes rab po ti thugs rtags can/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa po/ /skye mched dbyings
17a2(rgyud 'grel): ston zug rngu spangs/ /'jam mgon chos sku nyid la bstod/ /yang na 'dod yon lnga sogs kyis/ /mngon par mchod nas bstod pa bya/ /yang na mtshan nyid bstod par bya/ /yon tan mtshan gyi bstod ce'o/ /de nas lus la
17a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus byas nas/ /bzlas pa dag ni bya bar bshad/ /gnyis su med pa'i thugs ka ru/ /rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de yi snying du ting 'dzin sems/ /nyi ma'i maN+Dal steng du ni/ /ral gri d+hI(rgyud 'grel): yis mtshan par bsam/ /
17a4(rgyud 'grel): de la zlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/ /dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /mi bskyod pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa bye/ /skyo ba dag ni byung ba na/ /'dzin pa med pa
17a5(rgyud 'grel): sgom par bya/ /thun bzhi dag tu nyams su blang/ /mang na nyin mtshan re re'o/ /tha mar gshegs su gsol ba bya/ /rang nyid lha'i nga rgyal gnas/ /'jam mgon sgrubs thabs legs sbyar bas/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa//
17a6(rgyud 'grel): des ni khams gsum sems can kun/ /'jam mgon go 'phang thob par shog/ //slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par
17a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam
17b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bag chags skyon gyis dri ma'i tha ba la/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs mdzad pa'i/ /a ra pa tsa na la gus btud de/ /byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /de la 'dir du gsum
17b2(rgyud 'grel): cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ bla ma gsang sngags la mkhas pa/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas/ slob ma de skad cig smra ba de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la
17b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dgon pa'i gnas su maN+Dal byas te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas mchod pa bshams nas/ bdag nyid drag po chen po drag shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed par bsams la/ rdzu 'phrul
17b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bskrad de/ srid pa'i ri bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la
17b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ nam mkha' i khams su yi ge'i phrang ba snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas la/ mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang/ /de'i
17b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs kyis don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal mchog dang de rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar
17b7(rgyud 'grel): lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i cho ga dang/ slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams bkram ste/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag
18a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu can/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' / g.yas su rdo rje rin chen/ nub du rdo rje chos/ /byang du rdo rje las rnams bris/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang khyams su bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub
18a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa gzhag go /dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu
18a3(rgyud 'grel): de la yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil
18a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi/ /dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' thob par shog /byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis
18a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal
18a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nur sku sprul me tog thod/ /sku mdog gser can shes rab ye shes lha/ /mi shes rgyud gcod ral gri 'dzin/ /shes drug ye shes phyag 'tshal te/ /'jam dpal rang bzhin chos sku
18a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa la/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor drug /bde gshegs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad/ /de la 'dir sems can gyi gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen por bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
18b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa yin te/ de yang gza' skar bzang po la bsnyen pa'i khang pa bkra shis par 'jug par bya ste/ dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas la/ sgrub pa'i gnas de yang byi dor legs par byas te spos
18b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po yang phyogs bzhir gtul nas maN+Dal la tshul dang mthun pa'i me tog bkod de mchod pa bkram nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams kyang bkram la stan 'bol ba'i steng du sems can la phan pa'i blos 'dug ste/ ma
18b3(rgyud 'grel): rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed pa ni skad cig gis rdzogs par byas la/ khro bo gdong drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ mnga' dang/ dgra sta dang/ lcags kyu dang/ g.yas pa'i phyag na
18b4(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'o/ /thod pa dang/ sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu dang/ kha TwAM ga dang/ dbyug to rnams g.yon du thogs pa'o/ /spyan dmar ba bco brgyad sdang mig dgrad ba/ ljags drug glog ltar 'gyur pa'i zhal nas hUM hUM hUM sgrogs pa/
18b5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs drug gis 'gro ba rigs drug brdzis pa/ cha re sprin gyi mdog lta bur bsams la bgegs thams cad bskrad la ji ltar 'dod pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o/ /de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas la
18b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o/ /gzhi'i sangs rgyas a las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya/ de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu
18b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa as mtshan pa/ de'i steng du a las bcom ldan 'das shes rab/ ye shes dkar po g.yon 'khor lo g.yas ral gri/ thugs kar a las zla ba'i steng na a/ sangs rgyas de'i thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha
19a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams spro bar bzhed pas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na murti/ bA gI shwa ra mahA pa tsa sarba d+harma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA du
19a2(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas/ de 'phros shing 'dus pa las lha rnams kyi gnas su yi ge a sha stag du gyur to/ /a de las rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskyed pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go /de'i rjes la mtshan brjod
19a3(rgyud 'grel): cing bstod de sprul ba'i sku dpag tu med pas gti mug gi gnas sbyangs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa ni las rgyal mchog go /de lta bu'i bsnyen pa byas nas dkyil 'khor brtsams nas lags par bris nas dgod pa ni dbus su
19a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ shar du sems ma rdo rje/ lho ru rin chen sems ma/ nub du pad+ma sems ma/ byang du las kyi sems ma'o/ /gru chad la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /khyams kyi grur ni
19a5(rgyud 'grel): bdug ba ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /de nyid du bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshul dang mthun pa dgong ngo/ /sgo bzhir ni sgo ma bzhi bzhag go /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa bris te/ sems can skal pa
19a6(rgyud 'grel): can dag kyang der zhugs par byas la dbang bskur ba thob pa rang slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha la yang ci 'byor pa'i yon phul la slob dpon gyis kyang dbugs dbyung ba dang/ gzengs bstod de lung bstan par bya'o/ /
19a7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs mchog dam pa ni/ /gti mug rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa yi/ /shes pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub shog /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/
19b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal che bas gdungs pa'i sems can la/ thugs rjes zla ltar bsil mdzad 'jam dbyangs mgon/ /rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'i sangs
19b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ni/ /de la btud de mi bskyod dkyil 'khor bshad/ /de la 'dir zhe sdang gi gnyen por mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ dbang bskur thob cing sdom pa dang ldan pas/ yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas
19b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ dus bzang po la dgon pa 'am nags 'dab du bde bar gshegs pa bsnyen par bya ste/ sa phyogs der maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa bshams la/ sgo dag pa sngon du 'gro bas gshin rje gshed por bskyed la bgegs
19b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tshar bcad la/ srung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa spyan drang zhing mnyes par byas la/ de'i mdun du sdig pa'i dri ma bkru ba la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa cher bskyed do/ /de nas
19b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa ma lus pa bzung ba stong zhing bdag med pa la mos shing khang pa yang gzhal zhing brjod du med pa las ye shes kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa las grub pa'i nang du gzhi'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): snying khar rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba dang po dang rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' thams cad dang/ a las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor du bltas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa rnams dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba dang
20a1(rgyud 'grel): de dang mthun pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs kyis de'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gsum po kun bkad ste/ rang gi las la sbyar bas las rgyal mchog bsgom pa ni
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor bris te lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa/ de dang rigs mthun pa sems dpa' bzhi ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas bskor bar bkod nas/ de'i phyi rol
20a3(rgyud 'grel): du sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang/ khyams su byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa rnams bri'o/ /sgo bzhir ni sgo srungs dang tshul dang mthun
20a4(rgyud 'grel): par gzhag go /de ltar legs par bris la mchod pa'i bye brag gis yang dag par mchod nas skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma gzhug cing dbang yang sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i slar yang nges par mchod nas rigs de nyid kyi mtshan nas brjod pas
20a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par bstod la/ dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas nas lha rnams la bzod par gsol te dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o/ /mi bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /zhe sdang gnyen por gyur nas kyang/ /'di la gnas pa'i 'gro ba
20a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /mngon dga' i zhing du skye bar shog /mi bskyod pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI
20a7(rgyud 'grel): ti bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma chags spyan mnga' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas
20b1(rgyud 'grel): chags med don rtogs 'dod chags gnas nas dag /'jam dpal rnon po de la gus btud de/ /'dod chags pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad/ /de la 'dod chags kyi gnyen por sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas kyi dkyil 'khor
20b2(rgyud 'grel): byed par 'dod pas/ snying rje chen po blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer la sogs pa'i gnas su nyam nga ba spangs nas the tshom dang dogs pa thams cad spangs nas stan
20b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la 'dug ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams nas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la chos thams cad nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor ltar bltas te/ sems kyi snang ba A li dad kA li'i phreng ba skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i
20b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lnga yang glog bzhin 'byung ba las 'byung ba chen po bzhis bteg pa'i khang pa'i nang na rang gi gdan yang rma bya las grub pa'i steng du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas nges par h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i sbyor ba ye shes sems
20b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i bar du rdzogs pa dang/ de'i byin brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang 'dod chags can gyis 'dul ba'i dor gang la sangs rgyas kyi sku phra mo mang po yang mtshan brjod pa'i
20b6(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs las byung ba'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar gyur nas 'dod chags can gyi sems can rnams dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang rtsig pa 'am rdul tshon las bris
20b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas de la rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' bzhi dgod/ gzhan yang sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyang mdzes par 'gram mo/ /khyams su yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgram mo/ /
21a1(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi bzhag go /de ltar legs par bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snang ba thob pa dang/ skal ba dang mthun pa'i me tog gis snying po bkang ba'i slob ma der bcug la lha rnams bstan cing dbang bskur nas/ de nas yon gyi mchog
21a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs te dkyil 'khor la phul la lhag ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis longs spyad par bya'o/ /'dod chags snang ba mdza' yas kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa la/ dge ba bsags par gyur pa des/ /snang ba mdza' yas nyid du shog /snang ba mdza' 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): yas dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang
21a4(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba'i 'gro ba la/ /zug rngu 'byin mdzad sman pa'i rgyal po mchog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de btud nas/ /rin chen
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /de la 'dir ser sna'i gnyen por sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i skyes bu dbang bskur ba thob pas ri bo 'am chu klung du 'byor pa dang ldan par byas te/ dus
21a6(rgyud 'grel): tshod bzang po la bsnyen pa'i khang par zhugs la shes rab dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i blos bskyed de/ gdan 'bol ba la 'dug cing 'dun pa'i bya ba byas nas de ma thag tu ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po dran par byas la bar mchod bsal te/ nam mkha' i dbyings su
21a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ de'i mdun du lus ngag gi dri ma bsal la sems bskyed cing sdom pa blangs nas stong pa nyid dran pa'i dbyings su skar ma lta bu'i yi ge'i phreng ba bltas te/ de las byung ba'i khang pa dang/ gzhi'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan
21b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dang/ sbyor ba dang po dang/ de dang mthun pa'i sems dpa' i bsgom pa ni a las nges par byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ de rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku spro ba'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o/ /de
21b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar dkyil 'khor la nye bar gyur nas gzhan don du thugs rje shar te/ dkyil 'khor bar chad med pa'i gnas su byas la/ rdul tshon ye shes kyi rang bzhin du mos la/ lha dgod pa ni gzhi'i sangs rgyas gtso bo rin chen 'byung ldan las dang/ de dang cha mthun pa'i
21b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bzhi dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis bskor ba bkod la/ khyams su ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod/ sgo ma bzhi sgo bzhir bris te/ legs par zin pa dang mchod pa yang rgyas par phul te/ bstod nas buM
21b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhug cing lha rnams dbang bskur bas bdag nyid bsgrubs la/ gzhan gyi don du slob ma me tog thogs pas sdom pa 'dzin par nus pa la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ de nas dbang bskur nas slar yang dkyil 'khor la mchod de/ bzod par gsol
21b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing bshags pa bya ba dang/ lha rnams bsdu zhing spyod lam ci bder bya'o/ /ser sna rnam dag rin chen 'byung/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las/ /dge ba bsags par gang gyur pas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan nyid thob shog /slob dpon chen po 'jam
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal
21b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug gsum zhen pa'i 'khor ba'i gcod rnying la/ /'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal po las kyi mchog /ye shes sku can 'jam dpal de btud nas/ /las
22a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /de la spyir phrag dog gi gnyen por sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed pa la ?pas/ ji ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis srid pa'i grong khyer las brgal ba'i dgon
22a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas su rdzas dang mkho ba'i yo byad las/ stan bde ba la byams pa'i go bgos la 'dug ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams nas snying rje'i yan lag bsgoms te/ bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa bsal nas bdud kyi dpung rnams pham par byas nas/ rdzogs pa'i
22a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'gro don du spyan drangs la/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ lus 'dul ba dang/ bstod pa byas la rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgyu ba thams cad snang ba med par mos pa las/ nam mkha' i khams su yi ge spro zhing 'dus pa las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs
22a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nang du/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za ba grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang/ rdzogs par byung ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang/ de dang cha mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ mtshan gyi byin rlabs las byung ba'i phyogs
22a5(rgyud 'grel): bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ rtsig pa 'am bris te/ lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'o de la sems dpa' rigs dang mthun pa bzhis bskor ba/
22a6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang/ bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sgo ba rnams mdzes par bris la/ de rnams la yang dag par mchod de/ lha'i snang ba thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma skal pa dang ldan pa bcug
22a7(rgyud 'grel): ste dbang bskur te/ yon gyi mchog blangs nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gnang ba sbyin te/ dkyil 'khor lha la yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol te/ dkyil 'khor bsdu'o/ /phrag dog don yod grub pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bris pa las/ bsags  
22b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dge des 'gro ba kun/ /don yod grub pa nyid 'grub shog /don yod grub pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi
22b2(rgyud 'grel): lo tsa pa chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga ni dang por bum pa pruM las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la/ de'i nang du paM las 'os can gyi rgya
22b3(rgyud 'grel): mtsho bsams te/ de'i steng du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma dang bcas par bsams la de'i steng du muM bsam/ de 'od du gyur pa las utpa la dkar po cig bsam/ de zhu ba las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sku mdog ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar pa/
22b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na utpa la sngon po ral gris mtshan pa/ g.yon na utpa la sngon po po tis mtshan pa bsgom/ de'i snying khar zla ba las muM bsam/ de'i 'od zer gyis de dang 'dra ba spyan drangs la bstim/ sngags 'di brjod pas ye shes kyi chur zhu bar bsam/ oM sarba
22b5(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA a b+hA ba swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi chus khrus byas pas rang gi sgo gsum dag par bya'o/ /'dud kyis bstod do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal
22b6(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i chu sbyin bya bar 'dod pas/ khrus chu'i lhag ma de la rang gi snying kha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dag par byas te/ mos pa bsgyur la ye shes sems
22b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i sku'i phreng sngags brjod la/ de'i rjes la 'di skad du chu sbyin no/ /oM dza la mi haM sarba pre ta b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes yi dags rnams la sbyin pas 'thungs te/ nyon mongs pa byang bar gyur cig ces brjod do/ /dge ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya'o/ /mtshan yang
23a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjod pa'i chu sbyin slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas ci za ba'i tshe zas kyi
23a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'di ltar bya'o/ /gang yang zas kyi dngos po stong par bsams te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM a dya nud pan na twA ta swAhA/ zhes pas dag par bsams la/ A yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsi dkar po dri ma med pa dang/ oM yongs su gyur pa las ma'i? nang
23a3(rgyud 'grel): spal ba dang/ hUM gi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs te/ lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs te/ snying khar lha tshogs gsal btab la dang por lha dkon mchog mchod/ de nas lha tshogs ci rigs par mchod la/ rang gi lus kyi lha tshogs tshim par byas la/ lhag
23a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'byung po kun la sbyin no/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i zas kyi rnal 'byor slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'byung po'i gtor ma sbyin pa ni gtor ma'i dngos po dpag bsam gyi shing chen por mos pa byas la/ de las 'byung po thams cad ? ci 'dod pa'i kho bo'i yo byad dang/ zhal zas de dang de 'byung bar bsams te/ dga' ston chen po byed par byas te/ 'jam dpal
23a6(rgyud 'grel): sku'i phreng sngags brjod do/ /sngags? 'dis sbyin no/ /i daM to ha d+hA ma shaM san+ti ta pre ta sarba ga ti ma ga ha de sha ma ni ne na he tu ma ni sha sa d+hu mAM b+ha d+hA swAhA zhes lan gsum brjod pas/ /'byung po thams cad ngoms shing tshim par gyur pas sdug bsngal las dbugs
23a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byin dga' ston chen por gyur pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog ste/ 'byung po'i 'tshe ba las shin tu grol lar gyur zhing sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'byung po'i gtor ma slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi
23b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga'i rim pa/ sa 'jam po la rin po che sna lnga ?bsngar te/ tsandan gyi chus spus pa la srog chags bsal te 'thas par chags la khru chen
23b2(rgyud 'grel): po gang gi tshad du brkos la dngul lam rdo rgyus la sogs pas byugs te/ dbyibs me long gi gsal ngos ltar byas la/ sro ratna maN+Da la ye shes me tog gi tshom bu yang tshul dang mthun par mdzes par bkram ste/ dri dang ldan par byas nas gang mkho? ba'i yo byad dang/
23b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi tshom bu dang/ pad+ma'i gdan la sogs par byin gyis brlabs te/ gdan dang bcas par dbul bar bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal
23b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa po dang pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas skor bar byed par 'dod pas/ bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sa phyogs de skyar? ? byas te dri zhim pos chag chag btab la/ sku gzugs la sogs pa mig gi
23b5(rgyud 'grel): ?? mngon par bzhag ste/ sa phyogs de nyid du yi ge h+ri las nges par byung ba'i pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma sna tshogs pa yal ga dang bcas pa bsams la/ dbus su seng+ge'i khri la zla ba'i steng du sprul pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad shAkya thub pa chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can gser
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi kha dog can mtshan dad dpe byad kyis brgyan par bltas la/ de'i g.yas na 'jam dpal kha dog kha pa? la gur kum gtor blta bu mchog sbyin pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa/ g.yon na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs la nyi ma shar blta bu/ ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyid ba'i tshul du gnas te sems
23b7(rgyud 'grel): can la bdud rtsi sbyin par mdzad pa dang/ mdun du phyag na rdo rje bai DUrya rim dog can g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstod de/ g.yon bzhi pa'i phyag rgya can/ de'i phyi rol na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis bskor ba/ de'i phyi rol na byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhis ma tshad bas bskor ba/ de la phyi rim
24a1(rgyud 'grel): na 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyis bskor ba bltas te/ de la dad pa bskyed cing phyag 'tshal nas bskor ba bya ba ni mtshan gdon pa 'am ye shes sems dpa' i sku'i phreng sngags brjod par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bskor ba ji srid nus pa de srid du byas te/
24a2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du 'dug la/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran par byas la/ snying ga nas sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod de/ 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod la/ sdig pa bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs
24a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed do/ /de nas de rnams kyi thugs ka nas 'od byung nas bdag la g.yas su bskor te/ bdag gi snying gar thim par bsams pa'i byin rlabs kyis las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag nas lus kyang chu zla lta bur bsam mo/ /de ltar dge ba byas pa'i bsod
24a4(rgyud 'grel): nams rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen por bsngos la de rnams kyang mi snang bar bsgom mo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bskor ba bya ba'i thabs slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan
24a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs bsags pa'i thabs la/ 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid gsum gus ldan pas/ /kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rab bsngags dang/ /'jig rten
24a6(rgyud 'grel): dag na mchog gyur pa/ /rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs/ /kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi/ /bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig /kun nas bsags par gang gyur pa/ /rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar bshags/ /mgon po rnams kyi bsod nams
24a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la/ /de bzhin mthun par lhag sems kyis/ /dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bde gshegs byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la/ /tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed?
24b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /'gro ba yun du bde ba'i phyir/ /ji srid 'khor ba de srid du/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /ji srid 'khor bar gnas par du/ /bdag gi dge ba'ang de bzhin du/ /kun nas zad par mi 'gyur bar/ /sems can yongs su smin par shog /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas
24b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /mgon po'i 'bangs su 'bul lags kyis/ /thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar mdzod/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su/ /bde gshegs byed kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sems can kun don sgrub lags kyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /rgyal
24b3(rgyud 'grel): ba mnyes phyir bzlas pa rin po che/ /dad pas spyan sngar rtag tu mchod bgyid pas/ /lus ngag dub dang bsam pa g.yengs pa yis/ /cung zad bde bar gnas 'tshal bzod par bzhes/ /dad pas bskyed pa bsod nams phra mo yis/ /'ga' yang chud zos mi 'gyur don gyi
