24b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ gsang sngags rin chen rnam grangs ci tsam zhig /mgon po bdag nyid la ni gdams par bgyi/ /nad dang sdug bsngal la sogs dgra bgegs dang/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa sna tshogs dag /'di dang pha rol gnyi gar rtag tu 'byung/ /gsang sngags rin chen 'bras
24b5(rgyud 'grel): du mchis par mdzod/ /'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i yan lag bdun pas tshogs bsag pa'i thabs/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags
24b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ni/ dang po bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas thob par bya'o zhes bsam/ de nas a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas stong pa'i rang bzhin las rang gi sems kyi snang ba A li kA lir bsams
24b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od zer gyis rten gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su seng+ge'i khri nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsam pa ni/ s+thi to h+ri di dz+nyA na murti ra haM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha nAM/ tyad+hA bartI nAM zhes brjod pas rnam snang chen po kun tu zhal bsam mo/ /de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgoms te/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+NA ya te na ma/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe dA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM pra dz+nyA na mUrta ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+nyA na ? ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na ma/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na mA(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas
25a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs drug bsgom/ de'i steng du ye shes sems pa bzla ba dang a bsgom par bya'o/ /a'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor drug bdag la zhugs par bsam mo/ /de la mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /de la dang por byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
25a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan brjod par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu bzhi brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa' i yi ge a las mtshan don byung ste/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das byang sems
25a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su gyur te/ spros nas 'gro ba'i sems kyi don byas nas slar 'dus te/ rnam snang chen po'i phyi rim du gnas bar bsam mo/ /de nas sangs gyis rnam par snang mdzad che zhes ba nas tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar rkang ba gcig gis ma
25a5(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba brjod bas/ thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' i a las mtshan don gyi yi ge brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'phros te/ de dag kyang rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su gyur te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po la bskor bar bsam
25a6(rgyud 'grel): mo/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa nas/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcur rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i a las mtshan gyi yi ge rnams spros pas 'jig rten gyi gdug
25a7(rgyud 'grel): pa can rnams btul nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su 'khor bar bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid nas ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal zhes pa'i bar tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa' i
25b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i yi ge a las mtshan gyi don yi ge nyis brgya sum bcu rtsa lnga byung ste spros pas/ sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bas 'gro don byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub phyogs su bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste
25b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas nor bu chen po rin chen tog ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs su bad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i a las mtshan don yi ge brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi spro ste/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor kyang sprul pas 'gro ba'i
25b3(rgyud 'grel): don byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho phyogs su bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya zhes pa nas 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i a las
25b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan don dgu bcu rtsa dgu spros te/ sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprul pas sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su grub par byas nas slar 'dus te dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang phyogs su bzhugs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po drug po de las 'di ltar
25b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa la sogs pas bstod cing mchod par bsams la gdon to/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po la 'dir 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod do/ /de nas 'dod pa'i don gsol ba gdab ste
25b6(rgyud 'grel): dge ba rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngos te/ oM swA b+hA ba'i sngags kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing spros pa dang bral bar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ngo bo nam mkha' ltar dri ma med par yongs su dag par bsgoms te spyod lam gyi bya ba gzhan bya'o//
25b7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rigs bsdus pa'i dbang du byas nas mtshan brjod cing bsdus pa la tshigs bcad nyis brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bstan to/ /de'i yon tan gyi gzhung tshigs bcad brgya lnga bcu'o/ /de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod pa yon tan dang bcas pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyi
26a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gdon pa'i man ngag slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang mkhas pas rang gi
26a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ba dang/ mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba'o/ /de la mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba ni mi dmigs pa gsum rtsis zin pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsngo ba'o/ /mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsngo ba ltar bdag gis
26a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang bsngo ba'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas mi rtag pa la
26a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsgom pa ste/ kye ma 'di ltar snang ba'i phyir snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba chen po bzhis 'dus byas pa 'di rdul phra mo 'dus pa las grub pas/ rdul phra mo de yang rang bzhin med pa mi rtag pa/ ther thug pa dang/ glo bur dang/ yid brtan du mi rung ba dang/ yang dag pa'i
26a5(rgyud 'grel): don byed mi nus pas brtags na dben pa slu ba'i chos can/ 'gyur ba'i rnam pa'o/ /nges pa med pa bdag gi ba med pa/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ sgyu ma lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu/ chu zla lta bu/ gzugs brnyan lta bu/ na bun lta bu/ 'ja' tshon lta
26a6(rgyud 'grel): bu sdug bsngal ba bdag med pa/ stong pa'o/ /de ltar na phyi bzung ba'i yul la bdag med pa'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mi rtag pa bsgom pa/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag
26a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ 'khor ba las yid dbyung ba ni de bzhin du nang bcud kyi sems can dang/ bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po yang spyi bo nas rkang pa'i mthil yan chad du brtags pas mi gtsang ba'i ngo bo yin te/ chu ser dang/ bad kan dang/ blad? pa dang/ bshang gci dang/ rnag khrag dang/ snabs
26b1(rgyud 'grel): lud dang/ keng rus la sogs pas yongs su gang ba/ de yang 'gyur ba'i chos can/ de yang yid brtan du mi rung ba/ sdug bsngal dang/ mi rtag pa bdag med pa/ stong pa'o/ /de lta bur shes par byas nas gzung 'dzin gnyis las log ste/ sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang gdugs med pa/ kha
26b2(rgyud 'grel): dog med pa ngo bo med pa/ rnam pa med pa bltar med pa/ gzung du med pa rtog pa med pa/ spros pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang rig pa rang gsal ba tsam du yang ma grub pa yin te/ de ltar na 'khor ba na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags pa ni slu ba'i chos can yin no
26b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba las yid dbyung ba 'di yang rang bzo ma yin te/ lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /lus kyi mdza' ni rtogs pa po zhes pa dang/ 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa/ /bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/ /zhes pa'i bka' rgyud la brten nas byas so/ /mtshan yang dag bar brjod
26b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mi rtag pa 'khor ba las yid dbyung ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal gshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas shes pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag
26b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de yang rigs byang chub kyi sems 'od gsal stong pa gnyis med de ma rig ste ma shes pa'o/ /sems can sangs rgyas kyi snying po can yin pa la sangs rgyas kyi rgyu bor te ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa ni gti mug go /de ltar khams gsum gyi sems can 'khor ba sdug bsngal yin
26b6(rgyud 'grel): par ma shes pas/ sdug bsngal de la mngon par sred cing chags pa ni 'dod chags so/ /de ltar chags pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi nyid srog nying gis gcad de nyid sha nying gis zos nas gnod pa byas pa ni zhe sdang ngo/ /de ltar rgyu dug gsum las 'bras bu ngan song gsum du smin no/ /de'i
26b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i chu bo bzhi 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bab pa ni 'di lta ste/ rtog ba'i chu bo dang/ las kyi chu bo dang/ 'khor ba'i chu bo dang/ sdug bsngal gyi chu bo'o/ /de la rtog pa'i chu bo gang zhe na/ rtog pa'i chu bo snga ma la brten nas phyi ma 'brang mi chad pa'o/ /las kyi chu bo gang zhe na/ rtog
27a1(rgyud 'grel): pa snga ma de'i dbang gis las dge sdig yod pa sdig pa spyad pa'i dbang gis las kyi rnam smin gyi 'bras bu zad pa med par 'byung ngo/ /khor ba'i chu bo gang zhe na/ las de ma zad pa'i bar du sred pa yang rgyun ma chad par 'byung bas so/ /sdug
27a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gyi chu bo gang zhe na/ da ltar srid pa gsum du 'khor bas 'bras bu sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyun mi chad par nyams su myong ba'o/ /de bas na de ltar smin pa dpyed pa'i rgyu dug gsum las bzlog na chu bo bzhi yang rang log ru 'gyur ro/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i zhes
27a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la skyabs su 'gro ba ni maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams la/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
27a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la sogs pa rang gi mdun du dmigs la 'di skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas ba na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ dam pa'i
27a5(rgyud 'grel): chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ yon chab dang/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ bshos gtsang dang/ sil snyan la sogs pa dngos su 'byor ba dang/ yid kyis
27a6(rgyud 'grel): sprul te dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub ma thob kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ thugs
27a7(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ gzigs pa skyes bu'i khyu mchod sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa'i sku mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos 'dod chags dang bral ba la skyabs su mchi ste/ bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' gzhi ba chos kyi sku so sor yang dag par rig
27b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gtso bo la skabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun sa chen por chud pa'i phyir mi ldog pa rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal
27b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar skyabs 'gro khyad par can byas ni sems bskyed pa ni/ thal mo sbyar la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa'i las byas la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad brjod do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs bla na med pa'i mchog tu rin po cher bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas byang mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i sbyin ba rin po cher gzung du gsol zhes
27b4(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs su gos la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba thog ma dang/ skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa las byung ba dang/ tshul khrims las
27b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis ba dang/ bgyid du stsal ba dang/ bgyid ba la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub
27b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog rin po cher sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang sems can ma smin pa rnams smin par bya ba dang/ ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi ba dang/ dbugs ma byung ba rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i
27b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i phyir/ dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas 'di skad brjod de/ bsod
28a1(rgyud 'grel): nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes pa'i 'gro rnams pham byas te/ rga nang 'chi ba'i rba klor 'khrugs pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog /dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te/ /bsod
28a2(rgyud 'grel): nams ye shes las byung ba'i/ /dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog /sa'am chu 'am me 'am rlung/ /dgon pa shing gi sman lta bur/ /bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /nad do cog gi gsos su shog /mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang/ /dran pa dang ni rig pas kyang/ /bdag ni sems can
28a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /gru dang zam ba lta bur shog /byang chub sems dpa' su dag gang bzhugs pa'i/ /de dag kun gyi smon lam grub gyur nas/ /sems can thams cad gtan du bde ba dang/ /ngan song rnams ni rtag tu stongs par shog /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/ /
28a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag gi zas sbyin sogs bgyi ba 'di dag gi /'gro ba phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo'o/ /sems skyed pa'i cho ga slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
28a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshon pa bdag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni rang gi yid ma gang yin par bsams la/ de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jam klas bshig bsgom/ de'i lte ba la a dkar po zhig bsams
28a6(rgyud 'grel): la de la dmigs pa ? spros bral du ? mo/ /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bras bu ye
28a7(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni gong gi snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i a de las 'jig rten gyi khams yengs par byed pa'i 'od zer kha dog dkar po byung ba des sems can thams cad la reg pa dang sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang dan pa dang/ bde ba la yun ring bar gnas
28b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don du yun ring du bsgom mo/ /'od zer de'i phung po smar snying khar thim par bya'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i/ /man ngag rdzogs so// //'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dus gsum gyi sangs
28b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la blta ba ni/ snying kha'i zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu nam mkha' i mthar thug pa thams cad snang bas khyab pas gsal bar byas la blta ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mang la rgya che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med
28b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ de lam langs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas bskor ba dang/ 'khor rnam bzhis bskor ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod
28b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la sems gtad la blta bar bya'o/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la blta ba rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po tha mas rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun
28b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ /de yang 'di lta ste/ de rnams kyi yon tan dran pa'i sgo nas gus pa bskyed cing bdag gis kyang de'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
28b6(rgyud 'grel): par ?? su ldan pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rtogs shing dran pa nyid ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /chos rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs
28b7(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs pa yang dag bar mthong ba/ dus tshod mkhyen pa/ da ni mthong ba la nye bar gtod pa/ mkhas pa so sor yang dag par rig pa/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge rba/ tha mar dge ba/ ma 'dres pa yongs su gsal ba'o/ /de lta bu la dmigs ? yon tan dran
29a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa/ kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ sbyor ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing bla
29a2(rgyud 'grel): na med pa'o/ /de'i yon tan rjes su dran par bya'o/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni kye ma skyes bu ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa nang nas ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos sbyin 'khor mor byed pa/ lag skyong ba rnams gtong ba la dga' ba/ 'di ni bdag gis legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /de
29a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar rjes su dran par bya'o/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa ma gos pa/ rang gtsang yod pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ ting nge 'dzin shes pa'o/ /zhes de lta bur dran
29a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /lha rjes su dran pa ni lha rnams ni che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ lhar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ bdag nyid dang/ lha'i yon tan mtshungs par byas nas lha'i yon tan dang sbyar nas rjes su dran pa'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal
29a5(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po 'bring gis brten 'brel bcu gnyis bsgom pa ni/
29a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rten 'brel bcu gnyis gsungs te/ phyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sa bon skya bo nad med pas 'bras bu'i bar du yan lag brgyad kyi tshul du 'byung ba 'bras bu ljang bu la gzigs nas/ nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma rig pa
29a7(rgyud 'grel): nas rga shi'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs te/ nang gi chos rnams ji ltar skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams bstan pa'o/ /de la ma rig pa ni shes pa las byung ste/ de kho na nyid la gti mug pa dang/ las rgyu dang 'bras bu la gti mug pa'o/ de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa 'byung ste/
29b1(rgyud 'grel): ??? phyir ma rig pa zhes bya zhe na/ mun pa chen po'i phyir na ma rig pa ste/ dper na mun pas bsgribs nas rdzas kyi dngos po mi mthong ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pas kyang las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa dang/ bden pa dang dkon mchog yon tan can dang/ chos kyi chos
29b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid stong pa nyid du mthong bar bya ba bsgribs te ma mthong bas mun pa zhes bya ste/ kha cig gis dge sdig ngo ma shes/ kha cig gis dge sdig yod par yid ches kyang don la rmongs pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung ste/ bsod nams dang/ bsod nams ma yin pa dang
29b3(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba gsum gyis 'du byed pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste/ la su ma bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'du byed do/ /des byas pas kun gzhi la bag chags sogs te/ rgyu des rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo/ /des khams gsum du las dge ba dang
29b4(rgyud 'grel): mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i las kyi 'du byed do/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed gnyis ni tshe snga ma dang sbyar ro/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhen/ phyi nang gi chos gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs pa yul tha dad pa rnams la
29b5(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas so sor rig cing shes pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste/ kun gzhi la bag chags bzhag pa'i bag chags kyi rgyud des 'phangs nas pha rol tu skad cig ma'i tshul gyis ma'i mngal du chags pa las ming dang gzugs su gyur pa'o/ /rnam par
29b6(rgyud 'grel): shes pa mchod da lta'i tshe ste/ de yan chad gsum ni 'phen pa'i yan lag go /de'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs de ci'i phyir na/ brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste/ dper na shing gsum rtse sbrang nas dud khyim du rung ba dang 'dra bar ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po
29b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gcig la gcig rten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste/ rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'ong nas ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi rung po mer mer po dang/ nur nur po dang/ gor gor po dang/ yan lag tu gyur/ 'phrad 'gyur la sogs pa mngal gyi chos drug dang ldan no/ /de'i
30a1(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung ste/ sems la? sems la 'byung ba rnams pa 'am 'byung ba'i sgo byed pas sgo zhes bya ste/ dngos su na ming rnams zhugs? mer mer po la sogs pa rtas nas de'i rkyen gyis rang gi dbang po drug dod pa las yul drug pa rnam shes
30a2(rgyud 'grel): skya shing mched pas so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ste/ yul dang? dbang po dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pas yul yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba dang/ gnyi ga ma yin pa dang gang dang gang la reg pa'i rgyu tshor ba zhes bya ste/ reg pa 'byung ba'i rgyu tsher ba ste nyams su
30a3(rgyud 'grel): myong ba'o/ /'di man chad bzhi ni 'phangs pa'i lam gyi yan lag go /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir na sgom pa'i phyir na sred pa zhes bya ste/ sgom gyis gdungs pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang phrad par 'dod pas sred pa'o/ /bde ba tshor
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'chang 'thung ste/ yang dang yang du 'dod pa'i phyir sred pa'o/ /'di kun gyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa las byung ba'o/ /srid pa sred pa len pa gsum da ltar gyi tshe dang sbyar ro/ /sred pa'i rkyen gyi len pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ste/  
30a5(rgyud 'grel): len pa la bzhi ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang/ lta ba'i len pa ngang tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i len pa dang/ bdag du smra ba'i len pa'o/ /srid pa'i rgyu yang dang yang du len par byed de/ 'di yang rtsa ba ma rig pa'o/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/
30a6(rgyud 'grel): srid par skye ba'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ste/ khams gsum du skye ba'i phyir ro/ /der skye ba'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags rtas nas tshe phyi mar skye ba ni srid pa zhes bya ste/ len pa'i rgyu las dge ba dang/ mi dge ba bsags pas tshe phyi ma len pas srid pa'o/ /'di man chad gsum
30a7(rgyud 'grel): ni grub pa'i yan lag go /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ste/ lam rgyud lnga nyid du lha dang mi la sogs pa'i lus kyi phung po sngon med pa gdod 'byung bas na skye ba'o/ /de yang srid par skye ba'i las byas pa'i rgyus skye ba'o/ /skye ba'i rkyen gyis
30b1(rgyud 'grel): rga shi 'byung ste ci'i phyir rgas pa zhe na/ phung po smin pa'i phyir rgas pa zhes bya ste/ dper na shing tog smin pa de rgas pa dang 'dra bar skra dkar dang gnyer ma can du gyur te/ lus ni gshog khung bzhin song/ kha brag phug stong pa dang 'dra/ skra sgra ba'i me tog dang 'dra/ /dpral bgras stan  ring ba dang 'dra bar song ba ni rgas pa'o/ /rgas pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba zhes bya ste/ lus kyi phung po gnas pa'i dus zad de drod dang rnam par shes pas btang ba'i phyir shi ba'o/ /skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung ngo/ /skye ba dang rga shi gnyis te gsum ni tshe
30b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma dang sbyar ro/ /rgas pa dang shi ba gnyis ni nyes dmigs kyi yan lag go /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dum bu lngas 'chad de/ tshe snga ma'i rgyu'i sgo nas gzhag go /de ltar ci'i phyir bstan ce na/ de yang tshe snga ma'i rgyus 'di bskyed/ 'di'i rgyus phyi ma bskyed pa'o/ /de ltar yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su
30b3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba ni 'jug rga shi 'byung/ da nas khang gyis gcig gi rkyen gyis gcig bskyed de/ mjug ma rig pa la rtsa ba thug pa dang/ ma rig pa de yang med par 'gags pa ma yin te/ ma yin pa 'am mi dmigs par 'gags pas 'du byed nas rga shi'i bar du 'gag ste/ lugs las bzlog par shes
30b4(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bdag gis 'di byas pa rang bzo lta bu ma yin te/ yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/ /dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chad/ /zhes gsungs pa la brten nas byas pa'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas
30b5(rgyud 'grel): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni/ ltar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas/ rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig /zhes 'dod thams cad dang bral ba'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i shes pa de kho na la gnas pa ni chos kyi sku'o/ /shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang bral
31a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o/ /rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste/ spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku/ sa bcu'i byang chub
31a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba la snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin/ 'bras bu sku gsum thob pa'o/ /dbang po rab kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad ba rdzogs so// //
31a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti bo d+hi mahA sha rI ra bi d+hi na ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i byang chub chen po'i sku gdung gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//  
31a4(rgyud 'grel): dad pa can gang zhig gis mchod rten byed par 'dod pas sa cho ga tshul dang mthun par bya/ srog chags med pa'i ma legs par blangs te/ rin po che'i phye ma legs par btab ste/ dri zhim po'i chus bran te/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas 'jim pa'i gong bu de 'di kyi phung por
31a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ 'od phung po de nyid d+hI(rgyud 'grel): ser po'i? sa dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga phyag brgyad par bsams te ye shes sems dpa' i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags la rdo rje bsdu ba dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa bsdus te/ byon pa thams cad dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal
31a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga po de nyid du thams cad thim par byas te/ de la thugs ka nas sprul pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la/ 'od kha dog lnga'i phung po 'ja' tshon lta bur mos pa byas la/ de la bi bi bya zhing/ skor bor chos kyi 'byung gnas su bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub par byed
31a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes sems dpa' i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags 'di zlos shing gdab po/ /oM a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ra mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes bzlas shing skor por nas gdon pa dang/ phyi
31b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang du rdzogs pa la nang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rigs thams cad la bsdus pa la lha drug cu rtsa gsum grub par byas la bzhugs par bsams te/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis de dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te bcug la yang dag par mchod de/ lhag pa dang ma
31b2(rgyud 'grel): che? la kha bskang ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya'o sngags 'dis rab tu gnas par byas te/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA na ta thA ga te? hya ba rad+he? ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha e bam bA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na ye swAhA/ /de yang bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM ru ru spu nu dzwa la tiSh+Tha
31b3(rgyud 'grel): ?? Shtha sid+d+hi lo tsa na ye swAhA zhes bzlas so/ /sngags 'dis sa dkar byug par bya'o/ /oM a ra dze bi ra dza swAhA zhes brjod do/ /oM arya ye swAhA/ zhes pas bre gzugs so/ /oM tsakra ba rtan ye swAhA/ zhes pas 'khor lo gzugs so/ /oM ts+tsha tra ne ra ye swAhA zhes pas gdugs dbul lo/ /oM kuM bi ra d+h+ra
31b4(rgyud 'grel): dza ye swAhA zhes pas rgyal mtshan nam tog gzhag go /oM pa ta ka dza ye swAhA zhes pas ba dan phyir ro/ /oM pa Tu dA ma ye swAhA/ zhes pas dar dpyangs gdags so/ /oM buShpa mA la ye swAhA/ zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba gdags so/ /de ltar rdzogs par byas nas slar yang mchod pas
31b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod do/ /bkra shis brjod la brtan par bzhugs su gsol lo/ /dad can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /tsha tsha'i cho ga 'di byas pas/ /de las byung ba'i dge ba des/ /'gro ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ mtshan yang
31b6(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjod pa'i chsa tsha'i cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI hi ha ma bi d+hi saM gra ha ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang po bsngags? pa na rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson/ /rnyed dang bkur sti la ma chags/ /sems can don du sbyin sreg bya/ /dang po sa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga byas la/ yid du 'ong ba'i sa'i char thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thar?/
32a1(rgyud 'grel): khung khru gang ba/ zabs su de'i phyed la/ kha khyer sor bzhi phyir dor ba de'i steng du sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ nang du pad+ma dang rdo rjes mtshan pa/ byug pa dri zhim po dang/ me tog dkar pos brgyan pa/ mtshams su rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ kha
32a2(rgyud 'grel): khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o/ /shin tu sar ba'i ras kyis g.yog par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang/ yaM shing dang bud shing dang/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rnams bshams te/ mchod rdzas ni g.yon du gzhag /sreg rdzas ni g.yas su gzhag pa/ /de nas
32a3(rgyud 'grel): khrus dang byug pa byas la stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang/ rgyan thams cad gon te/ srod la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyi kha shar du bltas te blos bsgrub par bya ba de dmigs te/ las rnams brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas lce lag pa byin gyis brlab ste/ skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis  hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas ra ba dang dra ba dang bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang badzra tsakra bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum lta bur dmigs te/ phyag rgya bzhi byas la rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te thun
32a4(rgyud 'grel): mong gi mchod pa lnga dang/ khyad par sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang/ mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod de/ sgom pa gzung ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags/ oM badzra yak+Sha
32a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya bas bgegs bsal bar bya'o/ /badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta zhes bya bas rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis bdag dang thab dang rdzas dang mchod pa rnams bsang bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed de/ snying kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba
32a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa byas te/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gnyis su med par byas te phyag rgya chen po bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba yang blang ngo/ /de nas snying kha'i 'od zer gyis thab khung mi dmigs par byas la muM las dkar ba dang 'tsher ba dang
32b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i shin tu che ba'i thab bskyed do/ /de yang phyi rol gzhal yas khang rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du chud pa'o/ de yang 'o ma can gyi shing gi bud shing ngam/ dgon pa'i ba lang gi lcibs thab pas cung zad sga? sa tsam gyi bung shing brtsigs la rgyun
32b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag gi me 'am/ yon bdag dka' thub la dka' ba'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me yam shing gis sbar te/ rlung yab kyis g.yab cing/ badzra dzwa la ram zhes me'i snying po yang brjod do/ /de nas me'i spra brtag ste/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la rang gi chos kyi yi ge raM bkod
32b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ oM bA gI shwa ri muM zhes snying po bzlas te/ shin tu dga' ba'i mar gyis dgang gzar blugs? sreg? blug sbyin no/ /de nas brtags bzang po mthong ba dang/ de nas me thab tu raM stwaM? mdo ris mtshan can paM las pad+ma'i gdan/ de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ a las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/
32b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du raM dkar po las me lta zhi ba dung dang ku mu ta ltar dkar ba/ mig gnyis pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa skyabs sbyin dang/ dbyug to dang bgrang phreng dang/ guN+De rnams g.yas dang g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/ /mchod sbyin gyi rgyan dang thod thams cad kyis
32b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po ches dbu brgyan pa/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzin cing shin tu zhi ba'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong dang/ sbrul ba'i me bde bar byas te/ lag pa g.yas skyabs sbyin du gzhag la/ the bong srin lag gi rtsar g.yab
32b6(rgyud 'grel): cing/ e dye he? b+ha gA bAn agni b+ha ba aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): snying kha'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs la phyag btsal ba dang/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ snying kha'i 'od zer gyis gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste/ rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya dang/ badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya
32b7(rgyud 'grel): bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rdzas thams cad bsangs nas snying ga'i 'od zer dang ye shes kyi bdud rtsis rdzas thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs te/ byams pa'i sems kyis agna ye b+ha ga che ge mo'i sdig pa sarba pA pi da ha na badzra ya shAn+tiM ku ru
33a1(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA zhes pas yaM shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /mar me la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo/ /de nas til dang 'bras chan la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /dri dang byug pa ni thugs ka'o/ /ku sha dang
33a2(rgyud 'grel): dur ba dang myu gu ni 'od kyi dkyil du'o/ /mchod yon ni mdun du'o/ /zhal bsil ni phyag tu'o/ /de nas sdig pa sbyang bar 'dod na lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du til nag po la sdig gzugs su bya ste/ 'od zer gyis sdig pa bsdus te/ bskul tshig dang bcas pas ji srid bde ba
33a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong gi bar du bsreg par bya'o/ /nad zhi bar byed ba rnams kyis ni snying ga'i po nag po la 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor bas nad bsdus te bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsreg pa ni zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na snying kha'i 'od zer gyis bsreg bya legs par bskul te/ de'i 'od zer gyis nad pa
33a4(rgyud 'grel): la bdud rtsi'i chus bkrus te bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsreg go /tshe spel ba la sogs pa yang tshul 'di nyid kyis 'grub par bya'o/ /de nas zhal bsil la bstod de/ las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phrin las bcol la/ mo rang gi gzugs kyis de nyid du bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas
33a5(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad ba'i sngags kyis thab dang rdzas bsangs te/ me tog thab tu bor la de lta bu'i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed la/ de'i steng du mum dam skya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba du dang bcas pa/ de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal
33a6(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog zla ba nya ba lta bu rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ /g.yon po ti dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
33a7(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs rnams 'dus shing 'phro ba ste/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang/ dpral ba dang/ spyi bo rnams su bkod pa'i yum bzhi'i phyag rgya byin gyis brlab bo/ /many+dzu sh+rI sa ma yastwaM haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun gyi nam
33b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i phyogs su h+ri dang a las zla ba'i gdan bskyed de/ snying kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba'i don du bya'o/ de nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas te/ phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ snying kha'i 'od zer gyis thab kyi gzugs
33b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis su med par bsre/ de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nas oM bA gI shwa ri muM many+dzu sh+rI hUM/ sarba pA pa daM ha ha na badzra ya che ge mo'i shAn+tiM ku ru ye swAhA zhes bya bas yaM shing dang mar la
33b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thams cad dang cho ga gong mas dbul lo/ /sdig pa sbyang ba dang nad sbyang ba yang cho ga gong mas so/ /de nas gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin par bya'o/ /tshul des brgya rtsa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas zhal bsil te/ yang dag par mchod pa
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dud nyi shus bstod do/ /de nas dge ba bsngo ste/ las dang rjes su mthun pa'i smon lam btab ste/ oM byed kyis sems can don kun mdzad ces pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu'o/ /de nas rdzas thams cad bsangs
33b5(rgyud 'grel): te me rang gi gzugs kyi bsam par byas te/ cho ga gong ma nyid kyis sreg blugs lhag ma sbyin no/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang/ bsngo ba dang/ smon lam bya ste/ oM e hye hi zhes gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig pa bdag la bsdu'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs
33b6(rgyud 'grel): pas sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma bsdus te/ 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no/ /cho ga nyams pa dang ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i phyir yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg las rnams gsal bsdus pas/ /bdag gis dge ba gang thob des/ /ma lus sdug bsngal grol gyur te/ /'gro
33b7(rgyud 'grel): kun 'jam dpal thob par shog /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzod dang/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa bsdus pa las/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis
34a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ rdzogs so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor las/ nam gyi cha smad rang gi rgyud la rtag pa ni rang nyid lha'i phyag rgya chen
34a2(rgyud 'grel): por gsal bar byas la snang ba thams cad dkyil 'khor la bsdus te/ dkyil 'khor yang rim gyis 'khor lo la yang gtso bo bsdus te/ gtso bo yang dang po'i sangs rgyas la bsdu/ de yang ye shes 'khor lo la bsdu/ de yang ye shes sems dpa' la bsdu/ de yang
34a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la de yang a la bsdu/ a las nam mkha' i khams su 'phel te/ a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): de rnams su gyur te/ skar ma lta bur gsal ba dang/ de rnams kyang gcig la gcig thim ste/ stong pa chen po yi ge lngar gnas pa dang/ de'i rang la stong pa chen po
34a4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya blangs pa de'i ngang las yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug tu gyur te gnas/ de'i ngang las brgyad du gnas/ de'i ngang las yi ge bzhir gyur te gnas pa las/ bdag gi lus sgyu ma lta bur langs te 'khor lo bzhi dran par byas la/ spyi bor oM dkar po kha thur du 'phyang ba dang mgrin par h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar
34a5(rgyud 'grel): po kha gyen du gdengs pa dang snying khar hUM sngon po mgo thur du 'dzag pa dang/ lte bar a dkar po thig le dmar po 'od zer gyen du 'phro ba la bltas la/ a dkar po de las 'od zer rno la myur ba drag la grims pa/ ring gcig langs pas khrag gis thig le la 'od zer phog
34a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ thig le las 'od zer phra la ring ba/ rno la myur ba dmar la dang ba/ grang la gsal ba/ zhig spyi bo'i oM gyi thig le dkar po la reg par gsal ba dang/ oM de las yi ge brgya pa'i tshul du byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i rang bzhin thig le dkar po'i tshul du khu 'phang
34a7(rgyud 'grel): lta bur dkar tsha ngar 'bab par bsams la rang gi khrag gi thig le la phog pa dang lus thams cad bde bas rgyas te shin tu bde bas gang bar gyur pa dang/ de la sems gtad pa ni bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ bcu drug byed byed thig le can zhes bya'o/ /de yang stong pa nyid du shes
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas bde stong dbyer med du bsgom mo/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das zhes pa dang/ thig le stong pa yi ge brgya zhes bya ste/ de lta bu'i ngang las stong pa 'od gsal chos kyi skur thim pa ni mnyam bzhag gi tshe rnam rtog gi rba rlabs kyis kyang bskyod pa med par nam mkha' la sprin
34b2(rgyud 'grel): dengs pa 'am/ mar me la rlung gis ma bskyod pa 'am/ rgya mtsho dang pa la rlung gis ma bskyod pa bzhin du zhe 'dod thams cad dang bral ba/ stong pa'i rgyas thabs pa/ 'od gsal chos kyi sku la tsen ne yer re wa re khyug ge lte me mer de ha re phyal le/ yid la mi byed thom me/ yor ra
34b3(rgyud 'grel): sim me ting nge/ mugs se thibs se/ yid la mi byed spros bral mi rtog pa gang yin pa de 'di'o snyam pa med pa lta bu mi 'gyur ba so ma rang thag lhug pa lta bu yin la/ sems gsal la rtog pa med pa 'di'o snyam pa dang bral ba'o/ /gnyis 'dzin dang gnyis ma yin pa'i shes pa gang
34b4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang bral ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa mdza' dag 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par zhugs par 'gyur ta/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /rjes thob kyi
34b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa la ni stong pa chen po yi ge lngar gyur pa dang/ de'i ngang las stong pa chen po yi ge brgyar langs pa dang/ de'i ngang las yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug du 'gyur te gnas pa las ni bar snang gi khams su A li kA li'i phreng bar bltas la/ nga la sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha
34b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sprul par bya'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs
34b7(rgyud 'grel): so// //'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal la/ /skye ba mi lus thob pa rnams/ /mi lus thob pa shin tu dka' / /de bas dam chos rnyed par dka' / /des na sgrub la brtson par bya/ /sang tsam 'chi 'am sus shes na/ /da lta nyid du bsnun te bya/ /yid dga' ba'i
35a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis lha ru dmigs/ /snying kha'i muM las 'od zer 'phros/ /bla ma dang ni yi dam lha/ /mdun du bsam par byas pa las/ /dngos po kun gyis phyag byas pas/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod
35a2(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshags dang rjes yi rang/ /skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed bya/ /dge ba la sngo dang gshegs su gsol/ /de dag yid kyi bya bar bshad/ /de nas tshad med bzhi bsgoms la/ stong pa nyid la goms par bya/ /oM mahA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzri swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ stong nyid
35a3(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya ba'o/ /de nas muM dang utpal las/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /sku mdog gser mdog ldem me bag can/ /rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang/ /snyan cha gdu bu dpung rgyan dang/ /'og bag dang ni zhabs gdub dang/ /rin chen rnams kyi mdzes par brgyan
35a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skyil krung bzhin du bzhugs/ /g.yas na utpal sngon po bsnams/ /g.yon ni chos 'chad phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol ba la/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya/ /gnyis su med par bdag la bstim/ /mi phyed sa ru rgyas par bsgom/ /de nas bzlas
35a5(rgyud 'grel): ba bya ba ni/ /rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de nas ting 'dzin sems dpa' ste/ /pad+ma'i gdan la rab bzhugs pa/ /yi ge drug gis bskor ba ste/ /oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ dmigs pa gtad la bzlas pa bya/ /skyo zhing gtong bar 'dod pa na/ /spyan drangs gshegs
35a6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol ba dang/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /rnam pa kun dang dus kun du/ /lha ru gsal bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya/ /dkar nag dmar dang ser dang ljang/ /gsal ba dag tu dmigs pa las/ /thugs kar yi ge lnga
35a7(rgyud 'grel): bkod de/ /'od zer 'phros pas dgug par bya/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod/ /mtshan gyi bstod pa dag bya'o/ /yang na mdun du dmigs par bya/ /bstod pa rang bzhin med par bsam/ /bstod pa zin nas gshegs su gsol/ /de nas mtshan med bsgom pa la/ /tha ma
35b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bsdu dang por bsdu/ /bdag bsdu ye shes sems dpa' la/ /ye shes sems dpa' a la bsdu/ /de yang rang bzhin dmigs med de/ /de la gtan pa thob pa ni/ /tshes sku skye med thob ces bya/ /tshigs bcad bcu drug ldan pa ni/ /ye shes zhal mthong gnyis med rtogs
35b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam mgon sgrubs thabs 'di brtsams te/ /mkhas rnams gus par blang bar bgyis/ /bdag gis sgrubs thabs 'di byas bas/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ /snod bcud sgrib pa byang nas su/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrubs thabs/
35b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti bi b+hi sU tra bi tri tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
35b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes lus can gtsug gi nor bus mtshan/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas gzugs gnas kun la khyab/ /lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te/ /mtshan brjod bdud rtsi gsang spyod rtog ma dka' ba/ /bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang/ /dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu can/ /lung dang man ngag dag la brten nas bshad/ /theg mchog rnams kyi gzhir gyur
35b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni/ /slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis/ /theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /dpag bsam shing chen phyogs 'di brtsam/ /ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pu sgrub/ /mdo dang
35b7(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa'i cho ga'i rim pa ste/ /de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yon tan las/ /gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin zhes pas mtshan nyid dang dbang thob pa ston to/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags rigs sngags 'chang ba'i
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs zhes pa dang/ bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed ces pas sgrub pa po snod du rung bar ston to/ /yon tan las/ ri dang chu klung nags tshal tshang tshing nang na 'dug kyang rung zhes pas gnas rigs dang mthun pa'i
36a2(rgyud 'grel): yid dga' ba ston to/ /bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa/ zhes pas/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa ston to/ /dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa zhes pas sgrub pa po'i rdzas don rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ maN+Dal gsum dang/ me tog
36a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dri dang byug pa dang/ mchod pa'i khyad par mang po dang/ glod gdan dang/ yo byad kyi tshogs bya ba'i rim pa ston to/ /yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang/ gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa hUM gis mtshan
36a4(rgyud 'grel): pa las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbyug to dang sdig mdzub byed pa/ sprul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn ta ka hUM phaT ces pas mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyis rdo rje'i ra ba dang dra ba bya bar bstan
36a5(rgyud 'grel): to/ snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /ces pa dang phan 'dogs sems can mnyen gshin pa/ /zhes pas sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa bstan to/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par stan zhes pa dang/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi
36a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces pas thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'am snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya ba bstan to/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog ces pa dang/ mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu ri mor
36a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i 'os/ /bcur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab ces pas bde ston to/ /bdag gi snying khar a 'am hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum dang/ rje btsun 'jam dpal dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
36b1(rgyud 'grel): la spyan drangs nas bdag gis bltas te/ lus kyi bkod pas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag bya ba bstan te/ bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog ces pa dang/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /zhes pas mtshon pa'i khyad par nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgrubs la snying
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin zhes pas 'di ston to/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas bdag gi snying ga nas lha mo
36b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi spros te/ gnas rnams su mchod par bya'o/ /de bas na/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs zhes pas bstan to/ /bsam gtan chen po ting nge 'dzin gnas/ /zhes pa nas/ smon lam ye shes rgya
36b4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ste/ zhes pa'i bar dang byang chub yan lag me tog spos/ /zhes bya bas phyi'i lha mo bzhi dang/ snying kha nas gong gi tshul du sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che zhes
36b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyis gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis mchod par bstan to/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi blu blangs pa/ /rdo rje las kun byed par shog /ces bya ba 'di rkang pa dang gsang ba'i dus su sgeg mo la sogs pa dang rim pa ji lta
36b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du dang ba bzhi glur blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang/ chags pa la sogs pa la dbul te rgyas par ma phye'o/ /zhes bstan to/ /de nas 'dud nyi shu bstod de/ /yang na ni thams cad kyis bstod par shes par bya'o/ /de
36b7(rgyud 'grel): nas sdom pa bzung ba'i bar de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ste zhes so/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ /chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid//
37a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mdza' ste yi ge med/ /ces pa'i don bsgom pa ni rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod de/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes bstan to/ /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ /zhes pas pad+ma'i
37a2(rgyud 'grel): steng na chos kyi 'byung gnas/ de'i mdza' 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du muM dmar skya'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng ba de gyur pa las/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/
37a3(rgyud 'grel): sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /cod pan bzang ba mthon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog mthen ka chen po pa/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thong/ /sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /shes rab ral gri mda'
37a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhu thogs/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /nyon mongs yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs su bstan pa yin no/ /phyag rgya bzhi'i don ston
37a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin rlabs bstan pa yin no/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro zhes pa'o/ /de nas mdun du pad+ma dang
37a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bskur ba mchod pa dang/ bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye shes sems dpa' de la bltas la/ dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /sangs
37a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can zhes bas snying kha'i 'od kyis bskul te bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags dang bcas bas dkyil
37b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas sprul lo zhes bstan to/ /de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/ /bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pas thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshan sngags bzlas shing mtshan
37b2(rgyud 'grel): bklag par bya'o/ /de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams
37b3(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang/ yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji ltar bzhin du ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung
37b4(rgyud 'grel): ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang/ rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang yon tan las/ nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du mnyam par 'don nam/ glegs bam du byas
37b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' i gzugs la dmigs te/ gzugs dang gnyis mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir ring po mi thogs pas de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyis lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes
37b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don 'di yin te/ mtshan gyi cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ many+dzu sh+rI d+hAM oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ maN+Dal tsakra hUM/ zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la/ phyag sngon
37b7(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag cag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod pa yon tan rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam bas
38a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dam pas brgyud pas bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thungs/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di/ /sman
38a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad/ /'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan gyur nas/ /mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong
38a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u yi sgrubs thabs mdo dang bsres ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA
38a4(rgyud 'grel): ma saM gI ti tsak+Shu bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal dka' nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i skam sar byon/ /sangs rgyas
38a5(rgyud 'grel): sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan la phan pa'i blo mchog gis/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni/ /bzang zhing dge ba bshad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon blo gros dang ldan pas/ /gtsug lag
38a6(rgyud 'grel): khang ngam sku gzugs la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni glegs bam dang mchod rten la sogs pa rab tu gnas par bya bar 'dod pas/ ri bo 'am nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa rgyas par byas la/ 'bad pa thams cad
38a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgom bzlas bya'o/ /de la 'dir gang rab tu gnas pa bya bar 'dod pa de rnams sta gon du bya ste/ bdag tu bzung ba'i bgegs thams cad bskrad do/ /gu gul gyis bdug cing bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga shas cher bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'di skad ces snyan
38b1(rgyud 'grel): gsan dbab par bya ste/ ji ltar dga' ldan gnas mchog na/ /bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa de/ /sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i lhums zhugs ltar/ /der nub bde gshegs thams cad ni/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'di la ni/ /'jug pa shin tu mdzad du gsol/ /'di la sangs rgyas
38b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bzhugs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /yon bdag rnams kyi don bya'i phyir/ /bdag gi sbyor ba 'di bgyis na/ /ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs pa bzhes su gsol/ /bdag dang yon bdag bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs bcas nas/ /
38b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi 'di dang byin rlob cing/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ zhes brjod la/ sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa gang byed pa de gshin rje gshed kyis bsrung zhing/ A(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a zhes bya bas rgyas btab la bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems
38b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i dkyil 'khor rigs bsdus pa zhes bya bas bris la/ /der bum pa thams cad bcug la/ dkyil 'khor de'i byang ngos su khrus kyi khang pa shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba/ gser gyi ka ba bzhi dang me tog gi chun 'phyad 'phyad ba/ dri zhim po can la sogs pa srog chags las ma byung ba'i
38b5(rgyud 'grel): dris chag chag btab la/ rin po ches spras shing gcal du bkram pa byas la/ khrus kyi khad pa gang yin pa de nyid rab tu gnas par 'dod pa'i lha rnams gang yin pa spyan drangs la tshul dang mthun par gzhag la sku khrus gsol ba ni tshigs su bcad pa dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas khrus byas te/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu/ /dag pa yi ni sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ lugs ma yin na dngos su khrus bya/ de las gzhan pa gang yin
38b7(rgyud 'grel): na yang me long gi ngos la sran phye dang/ bag phye dang/ 'bras yos? dang/ yungs kar dang til mar dang/ 'o ma dang tsan dan dang ga bur btab la me tog dang bcas te ku sha'i bir gyis bkru bar bya'o/ /de yang 'di skad du/ ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas lha mdzes
39a1(rgyud 'grel): lhums zhugs bltams la khrus gsol ltar/ sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par byas/ /sprul sku yid 'ong rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /phyogs bcu bdud rtsi dam pa'i char 'bebs pa/ /rgyal ba dam chos rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta
39a2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta purna du pa kro d+ha ye swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ de nas sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa lha'i chus bkang la slob dpon gyis bzung nas me long la dri'i thig le lnga dang/ me tog gi tsham bu lnga dang bcas pa la 'di skad brjod de sku khrus gsol ba ni/ gzugs kyi phung po
39a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pa/ /gti mug dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan sku'i sku khrus gsol/ /tshor ba'i phung po'i rnam dag pa'i/ /nga rgyal dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan yon tan sku khrus gsol/ /'du shes phung po rnam
39a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i/ /'dod chags dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan gsung gi sku khrus gsol/ /'du byed phung po rnam bdag pa'i/ /phrag dog dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan phrin las sku khrus gsol/ /rnam shes
39a5(rgyud 'grel): phung ba rnam dag pa'i/ /zhe sdang dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha badzra ratna pad+ma karmma a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ de'i rjes la ras gtsang ma bris bskus bas sku phyis te/ rgyal ba'i
39a6(rgyud 'grel): sku ni mkha' la zla bzhin gsal/ /sangs rgyas sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang/ /'gro ba'i bag chags ma lus bsal ba'i phyir/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis sku phyis bas/ /sems can bag chags ma lus byang gyur cig /nir ma kA ya shud+d+honyahaM zhes pas sku phyis la/
39a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang mthun pa'i na bza' rnams kyang dbul zhing bkra shis kyang brjod do/ /oM dwi ban pa ye swAhA/ dris bsgo'o/ /oM gand+ha ya swAhA zhes pas na gza' dbul/ oM a b+ha ra Ni bi b+hu na ShA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyan dbul te/ 'gro
39b1(rgyud 'grel): kun yun du bskyang ba'i phyir/ /lha yi na bza' dam pa ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /zhes pa dang/ byang chub yan lag rgyan gyur cing/ /'gro bas bsod nams thob bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sras la rgyan mchog dbul/ /ci bde
39b2(rgyud 'grel): bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /zhes pas rgyan gdags so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sgrub ste/ bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha shin tu gsal bar byas te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang la bsdus te/
39b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstims te dbang bskur rgyas btab la/ mchod pa shin tu rgyas par dbul ba ni dngos su 'byed pa'i mchod pa lnga dang/ yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang sgra dang rol mo'i bye brag
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pas kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar legs par mchod cing sbyin sreg gi las kyang brtsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma rgya chen po yang bshams la gzhag go /de ltar ye shes sems dpa' bcug la nad par nyi ma shar kar spyan
39b5(rgyud 'grel): dbye bar bya ste/ bdag nyid rnam snang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas des gser la byas pa'i thur ma thogs la/ rgyal ba mkha' la byon pa'i thugs rje can/ sangs rgyas spyan la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags spyad slad du/ /bder gshegs
39b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi spyan ni dbye bar gyis/ /sems can ldongs pa thams cad gsal gyur cig /oM nir ma kA ya badzra tsak+Shu pra b+he sha bi sho d+ha na swAhA/ gser gyi snyan brud pa thogs la/ /rgyal ba'i snyan la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang/ /sems can thos pas yongs su phongs gyur te/ /rgyal
39b7(rgyud 'grel): ba chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar/ /de bzhin sems can kun don phyir/ /bde gshegs snyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /chos kyi sgra rnams thos gyur cig /oM nir ma kA ya ri bya karna ye swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ gser gyi tsher gzungs thogs la/ /rgyal ba'i shangs la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang/ /'gro ba'i
40a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can don gyi phyir/ /zag bcas phung po'i dri ma spangs nas ni/ /rnam par dag pa dri med skyed byed ltar/ /rgyal ba'i shangs ni bdag gis dbye bar bgyi/ /zag med dri med dam pa tshor gyur cig /oM nir ma kA ya d+ha bya? nA sa ye swAhA/ rin po che'i thur
40a2(rgyud 'grel): mar mnga' gsol la/ 'gro ba chos kyis phongs pa la/ /dam chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi ro ldan dag pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar/ /ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas rnams/ /dbul phyir zhal ni dbye bar bgyi/ /oM nir ma kA ya id ni bya mu
40a3(rgyud 'grel): kha ye swAhA/ /de nas rab byung gi gzugs yin na spu gri thogs la/ /ji ltar rang byung mchod rten du/ /ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar/ /'gro ba'i sems can don gyi phyir/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bgyi/ /rnam sbyar dang bla gos gsol nas/ ji ltar sman pa'i
40a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ /rgyal ba'i sku la na bza' gsol ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la sman pa'i phyir/ /ngo tsha khrel yod gos mchog gsol bar bgyi/ /oM nir ma kA ya to phyol tra pra na ye swAhA/ zhes par bya zhing dbul lo/ /oM u pa su kA sa pa ri sa bar NaM ye
40a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pas chu tshogs dang lhung bzed la sogs pa dbul lo/ /de nas thugs kar rdo rje dris bsgos pa bzung la/ /mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bskyed de/ /dung dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil pa 'di/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gi rnam brgyan pa/ /rgyal ba'i thugs
40a6(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par rgyal gyur cig /oM nir ma kA ya h+ri da shang mahA pu ru Sha lak+Sha ag shod+d+ha a nu byany+dza na(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad yin na de ltar ma yin te/ dung dang so mangs dang ral gri la sogs pa dbul lo/ /dpal
40a7(rgyud 'grel): be'u la sogs pas brgyan pa ni shes par bya'o/ /glegs bam la rab tu gnas pa byed pa yin no/ rdo rje chos kyi ngo bo sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' yas nges par a las bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste dbang bskur rgyas btab nas glegs bam du bya'o/ /de la
40b1(rgyud 'grel): na bza' dbul ba ni/ /byang chub yan lag rnam dag pa'i/ /dam chos gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /na bza' dri ma med pa 'di/ /dam pa'i chos la ?dbul? gyi/ /oM d+harma b+he b+hya pra ta swAhA/ /zhes bya bas dbul/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje theg pa gang yin pa des bsdams te/ mtshal
40b2(rgyud 'grel): lam sin d+hu ra'i rgya mtsho rim pa bdun du btab la/ oM badzra mu dra band+ha ya a d+hi ti tiSh+Tha swAhA/ zhes brjod do/ /rab tu gnas pa de mchod rten yin na bde bar gshegs pa? gis lnga'i sangs rgyas su rdzogs par byas la ye shes sems dpa' yang nges par bcug nas dbang
40b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur rgyas btab nas mchod de bkra shis brjod la de rnams 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchod rten du dmigs la/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swAhA/ zhes bas sa dkar byug /oM a ra ma ye swAhA/ zhes pas bre gzugs/ oM tsakra bar ta na ye swAhA/ zhes
40b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'khor lo gzugs so/ /oM ts+tsha tra ye swAhA/ zhes bas gdugs dbul lo/ /oM kuM bi ra d+hwa dza ye swAhA/ zhes pas rgyal mtshan gzugs/ /oM pra ta ka ye swAhA/ zhes pas ba dan gdags/ oM pa Tu pA ma laM pa ye swAhA/ zhes pas dar dbyangs gdags/ oM puShpa mA la ye swA
40b5(rgyud 'grel): hA/ zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba gdags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin na khab dang bsnyung gu dang so mangs dbul/ /'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la bslab bya zhes/ /ji ltar thugs dam rgya chen bzhes pa bzhin/ /mkho ba'i yo
40b6(rgyud 'grel): byad rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /oM o sa su ka la sa pa ri ka ri ye swAhA/ de nas thams cad thun mong du yang mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod la/ gdugs gser gyi yu ba can la sogs bas mchod de/ 'byor ba dang ldan na sbyin sreg kyang rgyas par bya'o/ /ma 'byor na
40b7(rgyud 'grel): tsA? ru dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol te/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs rnams kun/ /rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas/ /gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba/ /de dag bzod par mdzad du gsol
41a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa yi/ /yon dag tshe la zab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du sol/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gis/ /ji srid bskal pa 'jig pa ru/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gzugs
41a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de srid bcom ldan bsrung bar mdzad/ /thugs bzang yid las byung ba yi/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa la/ /bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas/ /rab gnas dge ba gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bcug nas rab gnas
41a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ye shes sems dpa' brten par bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ slob dpon dang yon bdag gnyis kas gdan khri la 'jus la me tog gi phreng ba dbul te/ de srid me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi bskal bas 'jig pa ru/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bcom ldan khyod?
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhugs par mdzod ces brjod la/ phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa dbul zhing/ sprul sku bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ de nas chos skyong gi srung ma phyogs skyong ngam/ mahA kA la 'am/ yang na gang yang rung ba la gtor ma rgya chen po dbul zhing/ sems can
41a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sku gzugs bsrung ba'i las bcol bar bya'o/ /'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs bgyid par/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /sprul sku gzugs brnyan mthong bar mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /gzhan yang
41a6(rgyud 'grel): yul phyogs de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin pho mo la yang gtor ma gtags ched ched gtad do/ /gnas brtan dang khyim pa'i gtso bo rnams la yang snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sprul pa'i sku 'di yin gyis/ /khyod kyi mnyams par srungs shig ces brjod la/ sku 'am glegs
41a7(rgyud 'grel): bam mchod rten gang yin pa de na bza' gsol te 'gro ba rnams la bstan to/ /mthong ba tsam gyis bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sgrib pa ma lus par 'byad par 'gyur ro/ /yon bdag gang yin pa des glu gar bya zhing bkra shis brjod la sngags kyi btab pa'i zhal zas
41b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams la longs spyod do/ /rab gnas bzang po 'di byas pas/ /byas pa gang des 'gro ba kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis sdig byang nas/ /sprul pa'i sku'i zhal mthob shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i tshig gi
41b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM bI ti tsakra ma ra mA ra ya man+t+ra/ bod skad du/
41b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags byang kyi 'khor los gsang pa/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug po/ /bco brgyad sbyin dmar gnyis kyis
41b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal te/ /'jam dpal mgon gyis mi 'dul tshe/ /ngan sngags byang kyi 'khor la brtsam/ /de la dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs par/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i blo mchog gis/ dpal ldan 'byor ba drug rdzas gsog /srid pa'i ri'o? pham
41b5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sems can ngan song rnam par sbyangs/ /don? yod 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /gtso bo dkon mchog lhur blang zhing/ /bla ma phyag byar 'os pa la/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni 'bad de bsags/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags rnam spangs te/ /stong pa nyid dga' stong pa'i blos/ /yang dag pa dang
41b6(rgyud 'grel): med de bzhin nyid/ /yang rab mdza' de yi ge bral/ /shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis chos kun ngo bo nyid med bya/ /'on kyang snang ba ma bkag pas/ /chos kun nam mkha' i mtshan nyid la/ /ye shes skar ma lam me ba/ /rang sems nyams su myong ba de/ /bdag tub tub pham yin pas/ /rang rig
41b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi cho 'phrul du/ /yi ge'i phreng ba nye bar mdzes/ /'od kyi phung po'i 'gro 'du yis/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/ /rim pa bzhi yi dkyil 'khor brtsig /'byung ba 'dus pa'i 'bras bu la/ /mthun 'jug spyod yul bya ba'i phyir ro/ /ri rab gzhal yas khang pa mdzes/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs
42a1(rgyud 'grel): drug 'bar ba'i lte/ /dbus su blang rgod? bsnol pa'i khri/ /nyi zla pad+mas mdangs bskyed de/ /rang rig sems kyi cho 'phrul 'dus/ /sgyu 'phrul 'dra bas mngon byang chub/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs? bcom ldan 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgya yi mchog /dang po'i sangs?
42a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhal lnga pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis spras pa ni/ /dung dang kun nga'i 'od 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i snying po gser gyi mdog? /phyag bzhi pa la? bzhi pa'i sku/ shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu bsnams/ /de'i thugs kar 'khor lo dang/ /'jam dpal ye shes 'jam dpal bsgom/ zla
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng gi a'i 'phro 'du yis/ /'og min gnas mchog dam pa nas/ /rnam snang chen po la sogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor chen po drug byon te/ /thugs ka'i zla steng bzhugs pa la/ /bkur sti rim gro mnyes par bya/ /shes rab 'khor lo la rlo gtod/ /ye shes phreng ??
42a4(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam ye shes lnga yi sgo nas bstod/ /gal te zhi bas ma 'dul phyir/ /de rnams gzhi dang bcas pa kun/ /chos nyid dbyings su thim gyur te/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med phyir/ /ye shes mig cig dri ma ?/ /chos kyi dbyings la drag por gshengs/ /yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgras/
42a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/ /rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrog/ /nam mkha' mdza' las? sgra bsgrags pa/ /hUM las drag por skyes pa ni/ /gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ /spyan dmar bco brgyad phyag bcu gnyis/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa drug du
42a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrad/ rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje dang/ /pad+ma rin chen rgya gram bsnams/ /g.yas kyi phyag na legs par bsnams/ /mtshon du rdo rje'i mnga' thogs pa/ /g.yon gyi phyag rgya dang po na'o/ /rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod/ /g.yon pa'i 'og ma pha rol bsdigs/ /lhag pa'i phyag rgya gzhan
42a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /ha la ha la'i dug ltar gnang/ keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /ral pa gyen brdzes thod 'phreng la/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /sprul dang thod rlon phreng bas klubs/ /dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /'jam dpal
42b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed po ni/ /rnam pa chen por bdag nyid gyur/ /thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas dang/ /?? 'jam dpal gyi/ /?? nyi ma'i steng na hUM/ de'i byin rlabs ya mtshan ni/ /oM a ra pa tsa na ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na murt+ta ye ya man+ta ka hUM/
42b2(rgyud 'grel): oM du khats+tshe da ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM bA gI shwa ra ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya man+ta ka hUM/ oM hUM hUM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ma oM dI h+ri b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na murti bA gI shwa ra mahA bA tsa sarba d+harmma ga ga nA a ma la su pa ro shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+ha tu dz+nyA na gargA?
42b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ khro bo rgyal po hUM las byung/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs drug la/ /rim par 'di ltar 'phros par gnas/ /gnang sems gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed po ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo'i?
42b4(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma 'dzin/ /nga rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen 'dzin/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed po ni/ /
42b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgya gram 'dzin/ /g.yon pa kun kyang 'khor lo bskor/ /sprul dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dus mdza' i me dpung nang na bzhugs/ /brgyad bskum zhabs kyi gshin rje brdzis/ /re? re'i sku la khro bo'i tshogs/ /khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs//
42b6(rgyud 'grel): grangs med mdza' yas pa yis bskor/ /lag na rdo rje mdza' yas pa/ /de ltar gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ye shes khro bo nye bar bsdu/ hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM badzra kro d+has paM?  ri bA re badzra sa man+ta e hye hi sha dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen
42b7(rgyud 'grel): po rnams/ /khro bor gyur nas nya bar byon/ /rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes bas ta/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par bzhugs/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos gzi mdangs bskyed/ /'jam dpal mtshan ni khros pas brjod/ /gsang sngags rgyal po khros pas bzlas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khro
43a1(rgyud 'grel): bo'i sku/ /bye ba dpag med bskyed pa yis/ /khams gsum khro bos bkang byas te/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dmag tshogs kyis/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams tham byas te/ /gsang cing mnan?  kho nar zad/ /sprul pa nye bar bsdu bya ste/ rdo rje 'jigs byed sogs
43a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstod/ /de ltar bstan pa stobs su 'gyur/ /gal te ting 'dzin mi gsal na/ /dmigs pa rtse gcig cho ga bya/ /dus mdza' i dgra bo bsang pa ni/ /ma rung pa 'dul ba'i sems kyis su/ /dur khrod thod pa mi bsrun gshegs/ /nang du gshin rje'i rgyal po bri/ /kha gdangs
43a3(rgyud 'grel): par ni shin tu gsal/ /'og ma gshin rje'i khang par bcas/ /ya gnag bcu bdun mun? pa'i sma?/ /sga? med sgo ra lta bu'i nang/ /yid kyi gzugs brnyan rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dgra bo'i rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ /srog dang 'grogs te chud gyur na/ /slar ni thon pa'i skal med do/ /
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rjes zin pas mi 'chor ro/ /gang dmigs sgrub bya'i snying gi dkyil/ /srog pa rtsa yi rang bzhin las/ /ngan sngags byang gi 'khor lo bca' / /rtsibs drug la sogs gsang sngags bcas/ /kun la 'chi rkyen spel te bri'o/ /oM a ra pa tsa sha trUM che ge mo mA ra ya/ oM
43a5(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mu to ya/ sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tsha da sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM badzra tIk+ShA sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM bA gI shwa ra sha trUM ma ra ya oM dz+nyA na kA ya sha trUM ma ra ya/ oM hUM hUM hUM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na murti bA hI shwa ra mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmma ga ga
43a6(rgyud 'grel): na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmmma d+ha tu dz+nyA na garb+ha hUM/ sha trUM mA ra ya hUM phaT ces/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dran pas/ /gang dmigs gdug pa nye bar 'jig /rang rgyud gnas nas gshin rje bkug /thod pa rang byung de la bstim/ /gdug pa'i gnas nas dgra bo dgug
43a7(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan de la bstim/ /bdag nyid snying ga'i sngags 'od kyis/ /dgra bo'i snying ga'i 'khor lo bskor/ /lte ba 'khor bring? rtsibs kyi gcod/ /gang dmigs sgrub bya'i cho srog 'brel/ /lung stong me mar me ltar 'gyur/ /gzugs de 'khor los dum bur gtub/
43b1(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i gtor ming bzhugs byas te/ /thod nang gshin rje de la sbyin/ /chos skyong srung ma'i bsgo bya ste/ /rang gi gnas su ci bder btang/ /gtor ma dag kyang lho phyogs bskyal/ /de nas rang nyid brtan byas te/ cho ga ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /spyi dang khyad par rim pa yis
43b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus rgyas bye brag shes par bya/ /tha ma'i rgyud drag dang thud tshe/ /'gro ba log lte 'khrul byung nas/ /sangs rgyas sgrub la bar gcod cing/ /byang chub tshe srog 'phrog byed la/ /'khor lo 'di yis gcod gyur cig /de yi nus pa bskyed nas ni/ /bdud dgra thams cad tham byas nas?
43b3(rgyud 'grel): phas kyi rgol ba nye bar bzhi bar shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags kyi byang kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyi
43b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A rya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha na bi d+hi maN+Dal nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam
43b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i dra ba rnam bcom nas/ /rang rig sgo nga'i spubs 'byed de/ /sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jam dbyangs de la gus btud nas/ /ma rig 'khrul ba'i sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i/ /phan pa'i
43b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzang po zhig /gzhan gyi don tu bri bar bya/ /de la sems can rnams ni gti mug gi mun khung du ye shes kyi snang ba ma shar ba'i dbang gis nying sha nying gis za zhing nying srog nying gis gcod pa las de'i rnam par smin pa tshe 'pho ba lta bu yang nas yang du 'byung ste/ nyon mongs
43b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu ngan song rnams su smin pa rnams la re zhig phan pa'i sems kyis ma rig pa'i rgya dral te/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa las dkrol nas yang dag pa'i thar pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bstan te/ tshe 'phos pa lta bu de yang de yi gzugs sam rus sam ming ngam/
44a1(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs la sogs pa sta gon byas la/ /dang po kho nad zhe sdang gi gnyen po mi bskyod pa'i bsnyen pa byas la/ rang mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje dang phreng sngags kyis 'od zer gyi byin
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rlabs la/ rang mi bskyod pa rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyi mtshon brjod pa'i byin rlabs las sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku bye ba dpag tu med pa sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su skye na/ sems can dmyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis kyang skad cig gis chos thams cad
44a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog par rtogs nas/ sems can dmyal ba de dag gi las kyi khams zad par byas nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho de las thon te/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa gtan spangs nas/ sems can de'i yid kyi yul dang sangs
44a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi thugs rig pa'i lam mtshon pa'i a dkar po thung du lta bur byas te sems can de'i gzugs kyi phung po la yid gnas par byas nas/ de dag gi sngar gyis gzugs de'i sems dang mthun par bcug la de la bdag nyid gtso bo dang lha rnams kyi thugs ka'i sngags
44a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od zer gyi de'i bag chags dag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bum pa'i chus kyang dri ma bkru ba'i phyir ye shes sems dpa' i phreng sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ sarba na ra dang/ sarba pA paM/ sarba karmma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne bi sho d+ha ne swAhA zhes pas bkru'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs
44a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ sems can dmyal ba las grol bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de na yang de dang rjes su mthun par rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo skal ba dang ldan pa de byol song gi gnas nas thar par bya ba'i phyir gti
