65a1(rgyud 'grel): dzing dam rang dga' i gnas dag gam/ /lha khang mchod rten la sogs par/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /grogs bzang btsal nas snyen pa brtsam/ /bdag dang sa gzhi yongs bsrung phyir/ /dra bar ba mtshams bcad dang/ /phyogs
65a2(rgyud 'grel): dang steng 'og bcing sogs pa/ /rab tu 'bad bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas shin tu brtsar? ldan pas/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rab 'bad de/ /dgyes pa bskyed cing 'khor lo ni/ /nam mkhar bsgom par bya ba ni/ /mkha' 'dus pa'i 'khor
65a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /lag pa'i 'du byed bsgom cing bya/ /'bru ldang ldan pa'i sor mo la/ /mdzub mo chung du mdud byas pa/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ste/ /thabs 'du pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lnga dang gcig dang drug dang gsum/ /'khor lo'i gsang sngags las bskyed pa
65a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang mnyam sbyong bsdus pas/ /mnyam pa shin tu bstod par bya/ /e ma'o yan lag 'dus pa yi/ /sbyor ba 'di ni gsum las byung/ /de ltar mkha' la gsal bkod de/ /dbang po'i mngon sum 'dra mthong nas/ /dga' ba mchod pa glu yis bstod/ /dang por
65a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing rjes yi rang/ /bshags dang gsol gdab phyag 'tshal sogs/ /bcu'i yan lag kun 'dus pa/ /bdag nyid rung bar gyur ba na/ /tshigs bcad glu'i bstod pa bya/ /dgyes nas bdag gi lha rnams kyis/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod par bsam/ /drin gyi
65a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis slar bstod pa/ /byang chub sems ni rang byung ba'i/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /don chen yi ge dam pa yin/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de/ /gti mug glo ste gti mug sel/ /mgon
65a7(rgyud 'grel): po sa bcu'i dbang phyug sta/ /rdo rje chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jig par byed/ /gdong drug lag drug lag drug po/ /mche gtsigs gdod brgya kun 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu
65b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /'dod pa'i don grub ngan song sbyong/ /mgon po nyon mongs dra ba 'joms/ /sa gzhi chos nas rkang pas gnon/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya/ /thig
65b2(rgyud 'grel): le chen po yi ge med/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ /sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni
65b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba 'gog pa ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam spangs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /so sor kun rtog ngo bo nyid/ /a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /chos kyi rdo rje 'dzum khyod 'dud/ /bya ba nan tan ngo bo nyid/ /a ni rig 'byung gsal ba
65b4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ tshig kun gsal bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje dra ba las khyod 'dud/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin 'dod chags che/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyi nyid ma grub bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gnyi ga med pas dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas chags
65b5(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod la 'dud/ /bstod pa'i don ldan mgu ba che/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /gzugs chen lus dang che ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /kha dog che la gzi byin ldan/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ming che mtshan bzangs rgya che ba
65b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yongs khyab ba/ /sangs rgyas bzhad ba khyod la 'dud/ /chos kyi shes rab mtshan 'chang ba/ /sangs rgyas gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas 'byung ba
65b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud/ /grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /mkhas shing sprul 'chang rdo rje las/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po go cha sra/ /sangs rgyas
66a1(rgyud 'grel): rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid gnod sbyin gtso/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul khu tshur bstan zhing sdud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /rdo rje sgeg mo khyod
66a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /rdo rje dpal phreng khyod la 'dud/ /bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyangs mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi/ /rdo rje gar mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /bsam gtan chen po ting
66a3(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin/ /rdo rje me tog khyod la 'dud/ /shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/ /rdo rje bdug pa khyod la 'dud/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /rdo rje mar me gsal la 'dud/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che
66a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'dren byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal nags/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag
66a5(rgyud 'grel): tu med/ /snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /ye shes cha grub sems dpa' i tshogs/ /stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa/ /bag la nyal ba byang sems ldan/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud/ /rdzu
66a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan/ /shugs chen ? pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /stobs bcu rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i/ /goms shugs ye shes bzhir grags pa/ /stobs po che la bdud dbang
66a7(rgyud 'grel): 'joms/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud/ /srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/ /mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'joms/ /drag po chen po mun pa 'joms/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul/ /mi shes ri 'joms
66b1(rgyud 'grel): sra ba po/ /mya ngan kun sel drag po ste/ /che bas che ba khyod la 'dud/ /mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/ /? gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog /theg
66b2(rgyud 'grel): pa tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu grub byed pa'i/ /pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud/ /de ltar ston par byed pa de/ /'khor lo 'dus pa'i gtso mchog grub/ /de dag mchog gi rgyal po'i sbyor ba'i 'khor lo dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to// //
66b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rim pa 'dir ldan pas/ /thams cad nam mkha' i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /ma lus mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /phyag lngas tshom bu lnga mnyes bya/ /de ltar mnyes byas 'og tu ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' mngon 'dod pas/ /sems can yongs bsgral bsam
66b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ byang chub dam par smon par bya/ /de nas 'di dag tshig tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ji tsam dus nas bzung nas su/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /nam zhig byang chub snying po la/ /yongs su gnas kyi bar dag du/ /bdag gis
66b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi sems/ /ma lus par ni bskyed par bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i/ /dam pa dag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab
66b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gi brtan par bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /
66b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yis/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong pa la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin
67a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /spom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar
67a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung/ /ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral pa ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs
67a3(rgyud 'grel): ma phyin pa dbugs phyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgong// //de ltar sdom pa 'dzin byed pa/ /kun rdzob rim par dbang bskur nas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par/ /spyi gtsug don dam lta bsnyen bya/ /de nas nam mkha' i 'khor
67a4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i tshogs/ /ma lus bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /bdag gi snying ga'i dkyil nyid du/ /thim pas ye shes me 'bar te/ /rnam smin phung po sreg byas nas/ /slar sos ye shes lus su bya/ /de nas byang chub lnga bsgom pa/ /ji ltar yongs su dag pa yi/ /me long
67a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yul dang dngos po'i rigs rnams kun/ /ma lus so sor snang ba bzhin/ /thams cad yongs su dag pa yin/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la/ /'dris par de la blta bar bya/ /de nas snying rje bskyed bya ba/ /sems can rnams ni mgon
67a6(rgyud 'grel): skyabs bral/ /dpung gnyen med cing sdug bsngal ba/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don dag tu/ /thams cad sdug bsngal las bsgral bsam/ /ji ltar chos rnams stong pa dang/ /mnyam pa nyid du rab sbyor bas/ /bdag kyang stong pa
67a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag med cing/ /sems can rnams kyang de 'dra bar/ /chos rnams kun kyang rab tu shes/ /chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje yang/ /bdag med rang bzhin rig pa las/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed par bya/ /de nas sngags 'di ched du brjod/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM
67b1(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+hArmmA NAM/ A dyA nut ban+na trat sngags 'di tshig tu brjod byas nas/ /sngags pas sngags don bsgoms nas su/ /lhan cig dmigs pa med pa dang/ /gnyis med chos la rab gzung phyir/ /de nyid yul du bya ba'i phyir/ /chos bdag med pa bsgom par
67b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ dmigs med snying rjes so sor brtag /de nas snying rje'i rjes 'gro ba/ /gzung 'dzin kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba'i/ /yan lag kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa yis/ /chos dbyings rgyu 'thun dngos bral don
67b3(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid ngang la de gnas nas/ /chos dbyings ye shes bsgom par bya/ /de ltar sems can thams cad kyi/ /don byed bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang thob cing/ /sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang sgyur pas/ /sems can don ni rab rdzogs phyir//
67b4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'byung gnas khyad par gyis/ /don dam kun rdzob mya ngan 'das/ /nan tan ye shes mngon gsal bya/ /de ltar rnam lnga'i ngo bo yis/ /snying rje nam mkha' i rang bzhin gyis/ /thams cad rang bzhin med shes nas/ /'gro ba'i don la 'jug brtson bya/
67b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de la dngos 'byung gzugs/ /'phrul ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' las/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba'i/ /skar ma'i tshogs ni rab bsgoms te/ /de las byung ba'i khro phreng tshogs/ /sngon po'i mdog can
67b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer ni/ /brgya phrag stong gis yongs bskor ba'i/ /hUM zhes grags pa bsgom par bya/ /de las 'od zer rab byung bas/ /'od kyi rtse lnga sangs rgyas sogs/ /rdul snyed grangs ni rab sprul nas/ /sprul pa de dag thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rab
67b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te/ /sems can khams rnams dag byas shing/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskyed dang/ /sdom pa bzung dang rjes yi rang/ /gsol btab bskul ba sogs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rab bstan te/ /phyir la hUM der 'dus byas nas/ /hUM
68a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la zhugs par bsam/ /de las yongs 'gyur kha dog ni/ /sngon po la sogs drug ldan zhing/ /de yi 'od kyi zhing khams drug /khyab par byas nas 'bar ba yis/ /bdud 'jigs mi thub zhal drug pa/ /ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga
68a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ ye shes rdo rje bum nang du/ /dkar po'i yi ge bruM bsams te/ /de las gyur pas rin po che'i/ /stong gsum tsam gyi mchod rten bsgom/ /de nang h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yi yi ge las/ /gru gsum chos 'byung bsam par bya/ /de nang yi ge rdzogs pa las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje
68a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /de las yang ni bruM las ni/ /rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas rnam par bsgom/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra rnam bzhis rnam brgyan cing/ /dril bu da ra dang phan la sogs/ /me tog phreng dang rnga yang klubs/ /grwa rnams dang ni thams cad dang/ /sgo rnams
68a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni khyams su yang/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams dang ni/ /zla gam chun 'phyang rnams kyis brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed bkod pa la/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa'o/ /rdul tshon kha dog rnam lnga yis/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de dang 'dra bar ru/ /zhugs
68a5(rgyud 'grel): nas nang gi gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo'i tshogs zhes rab bstan cing/ /phreng ba bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod pa ni/ /de nas phyi rol dgod par bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba/ /ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /rdul tshon lnga po nyid kyis ni//
68a6(rgyud 'grel): dra ba dra phyed nyid kyis klubs/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rtags thams cad/ /khyad par du ni mdor gsungs nas/ /de yi de yis thams cad bya/ /sgo yi mtshams dang twa ra na/ /shin tu gcig nyid mi bya'o/ /de phyir de yi sgo rnams ni/ /twa
68a7(rgyud 'grel): de na rnams ga da gas pa yin/ /go rims bzhin du lha rnams kyis/ /gdan ni phyi nas dgod par bya/ /de nas dbus su dgod pa nyid/ /gtso bo yi ni gdan yin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun tu/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gdan/ /rang gi sa bon gyis
68b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa/ /de ni sbyar bas rig bar bya/ /gdan gyi ngo bo bsam pa ni/ /dbus su saM las seng+ge'o/ /hi las shar du glang po che/ /lha durta ni i las so/ /rma bya nub du yaM bsam mo/ /khaM las mkha' lding byang du bsgom/ /de steng paM las pad+ma dang/ /dar gyi glod stan
68b2(rgyud 'grel): dag dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje 'babs pa'i thar thug par/ /gdan ni maM las bskyed pa yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /steng na sems dpa' i stabs su bzhugs/ /de ltar bsgom pa'i bya ba ni/ /yid kyi yul te goms par
68b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rkyan gyis slong ba ni/ /de dbus 'khor lo'i bdag po ste/ /pad+ma seng+ge'i zla steng du/ /a las bskyed pa'i brtag pa ni/ /gtso bo rnams par snang mad che/ /rnam thar bzhir ldan kun tu zhal/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i dbu rgyan can
68b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyar ldan/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis mi bzhugs shing/ /'khor lo bskyed pa'i rgyu bsgom mo/ /rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgoms pa ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni mchod tu'o/ /de nas snang mdzad chen po yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dkyil
68b5(rgyud 'grel): du yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): dkar las/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga ba/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing/ /rin chen sna tshogs na bza' can/ /phyag brgyad mnga' ba'i phyag mtshan ni/ /g.yas pa bzhi ni go rims bzhin/ /shes rab kyi ni ral gri bsnams/ /de
68b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi na/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /po ti re re bsams pa'o/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// //dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /shes rab 'khor lo nam bsgom pa/ /sa mchog bcu
68b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo lte ba'i rtsibs dang ldan/ /rtsibs rnams lte ba yi gnas pa/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung sbyor bas/ /bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin/ /'khor lo 'dir ni gyur pa'o/ /de yang 'khor lo bsgom bya ba/ /yi ge a las yongs 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o/ /lce drug kha dog drug dang ldan/ /mu khyud bzhi yis bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo de yi dbus nyid du/ /yi ge a dkar bsam bya ste/ /de nyid phros pas phyogs bcu yi/ /don byas slar 'dus gzhi la thim/ /thim pa'i
69a2(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs bsams yas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs 'khor lo yi/ /mu khyud bzhi la gsal bar bsgom/ /dang po'i mu khyud la bsam pa/ /oM sarba d+harmma a b+ha ba swA b+hA ba/ /bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a:/ de'i
69a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi rim mu khyud ni/ /gnyis pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /sa mchog bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su/ /sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod pa ni/ /a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lce la bsams pa ni/ /dang po lce nas bsams byas te/ /sngags ni ji
69a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam bkod pa ni/ /rigs kyi mdog dang sbyar bar bya/ /dang po lce la bsam bya ba/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la ni dgod bya ba/ /oM du:/ khats+tshe da ya te na ma:/ gsum la nges par dgod pa ni/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrt+ta ya te na ma:/ bzhi pa rtag tu rig bya
69a5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa la ni nges bsgom pa/ /oM bA gI shwa ra ya te na ma:/ drug la mdza' ste bsam pa ni/ /oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma:/ /'khor lo mu khyud gsum pa la/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes sems dpa'  
69a6(rgyud 'grel): sku yi sngags/ /phreng ba dgod pa 'di dag go /a A sarbba ta thA ga ta h+rI da ya /ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti khA gI shwa ra mahA ba tsa sarbba d+harmA gan? ? la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha A:/ /phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /yi ge ka sogs ha yi mthar
69a7(rgyud 'grel): thug pa'i yi ge rnam dgod ba/ /'khor lo sngags kyi rim pa'o/ /'khor lo de dag thams cad kyang/ /pri 'am bsam pa byas na ni/ /nyes par mi 'gyur legs pa 'thob/ /de ni shes rab 'khor lo'o/ /shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to// //
69b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'khor lo'i de dbus su/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa/ /ston ka'i zla ba ltar gsal zhing/ /in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud can/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras bskor/ /zhi ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan zhing/ /g.yas
69b2(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /utpal dmar po g.yas pa ni/ /g.yon pa na ni sngon po nyid/ /utpal de gnyis stang nyid na/ /shes rab po ti mdzes pa'o/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba bsam/ /de dbus thams cad kun ngo bo/ /yi ge a ni gsal bkod de/ /de
69b3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khor lo la gnas sngags/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i kha dog dang/ /de bzhin ldan par rnam bsam ste/ /mi shes ri 'joms 'od dang ldan/ /'od des rang gi lus nyid la/ /snang ba byed pa bsgom par bya/ /snang bar gyur ma thag tu ni/ /zhal bzhi'i sgo nas
69b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bya ste/ /'jig rten khams kun snang bar byas/ /de nas rdo rje sgo drug nas/ /kha dog drug ldan 'od 'byung ste/ /nam mkha' i khams kun khyab byas nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams gsal bar 'gyur/ /las gnyis byas nas slar 'dus pas/ /ye shes rdo rje
69b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la/ /lan gsum bskor nas bar zhugs te/ /shes rab ye shes de bkug nas/ /bdag med ma la rab bcug nas/ /snying kha'i zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /sngags dang gcig tu 'dres 'gyur nas/ /de nyid brtan par bdag gis bsgom/ /de ltar spyod
69b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /ye shes sku yi rnam pa dang/ /zla ba'i go nas gzugs bsam pa/ /a'i rnam pas gzugs bsgom pa/ /gsum gyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku/ /ring por mi thags 'dul dbang gis/ /nye bar bzung nas mngon snang ngo/ /de
69b7(rgyud 'grel): dag gi ni byang chub pa'i/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ //de nas rigs kyi 'khor lo drug /rim pa bzhin du bshad byas te/ /gtso bo'i gnas su h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las ni/ /mdza' yas dmar po'i mdog ldan pa/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /
70a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying khar dang po yi/ /sangs rgyas gong dang mthun par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /lce brgyad mu khyud bzhir ldan pa/ /sngags dang ldan par bsgom par bya/ /brgyad dang ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+na ya
70a2(rgyud 'grel): te na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags dgod byas nas/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las yongs gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje rnon po mdog dmar po/ /gtsug phud lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /gzhon pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi/ /sna tshogs dar gyi gos dang
70a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan ? g.yas na shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon na pad+ma 'dzin/ /de yi snying kha zla stengs na/ /yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam bsgoms te/ /spro ba bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor de dbus su/ /hUM gi yi ge las bskyed pa'i/ /mi bskyod sa gnon
70a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya can/ /sngon po mdog can de bzhin bsgom/ /de yi snying khar dang po yi/ /sangs rgyas bsgom pa sngon bzhin bya/ /de'i snying gar sngon bzhin du/ /lce brgyad pa yi 'khor lo bsgom/ /sngon bzhin de bzhin sngags dgod bya/ /rim pa bzhin du lce la bsgom
70a5(rgyud 'grel): oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya ste/ /lte ba'i dbus su dgod bya ba/ /yi ge hUM las bskyed bya ba/ /rdo rje ral gri zhes kyang bya/ /sngon po gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /zur phung lnga la cod pan can/ /g.yas g.yon rdo rje ral gri
70a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ de yi snying kha zla steng na/ /yi ge hUM bsgom sngon bzhin du/ /spro la bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ldan pas/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i dbus nyid du/ /a las bskyed pa'i rnam snang mdzad/ /dkar po'i mdog can phyag rgya ni/ /byang chub
70a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang rab ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo bsgoms te de snying gar/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom bya ste/ /snying gar lce bcur ldan spar bsam/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya te/ /de yi lte ba la bsgom pa/ /yi ge a la
70b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs gyur pa'i/ /bcom ldan shes rab ye shes can/ /mdog dkar sngon gyi cha lugs can/ /g.yon na 'khor lo rab 'dzin cing/ /g.yas na ral gri de bzhin no/ /de yi snying gar zla dkyil bsgom/ /de stengs yi ge a bsgoms te/ /spro dang
70b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /yi ge a las rab byung ba/ /mdog ljang don grub mi 'jigs pa/ /phyag rgyar ldan pa bsgom byas te/ /de yi snying gar dang po yi/ /sangs rgyas bsgom pa sngon bzhin te/ /de yi thugs dkar
70b3(rgyud 'grel): lce brgyad pa'i/ /'khor lo bsgom pa sngon bzhin bsgom/ /de yi thugs gar dgod bya yis/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag go /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): /zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya ste/ /'khor lo lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /a las gyur pa'i bcom
70b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das/ /ye shes sku can mdog ljang ba/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can zur phud ni/ /lnga pas rab brgyan dar gyis klubs/ /g.yon gyi sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas kyis shes rab ral gri 'dzin/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor
70b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi dbus su ni/ /yi ge a ni rnam bsgoms te/ /sngon bzhin spro ba bsdu pa bya/ /de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su oM las byung ba'i/ /rin chen 'byung ldan mdog ser po/ /mchod sbyin phyag rgya ldan par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar dang po
70b6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /sngags rgyas de bzhin bsgom byas te/ /sngon bzhin lce brgyad rnams la ni/ /sngags dang ldan par rnam bsgom pa/ /oM bA gI shwa ra ya te na ma:/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams dgong byas te/ /'khor lo de yi lte ba la/ /oM las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan
70b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ dag gi dbang phyug ces bya ba/ /sku mdog ser po rgyan dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga pa sna tshogs kyis/ /na bza' rnams kyis rab klubs pa/ /g.yon gyi phyag na rin po che/ /g.yas na shes rab ral gri 'dzin/ /de bzhin de yi thugs ka ru/ /zla ba'i steng na yi
71a1(rgyud 'grel): ge oM/ zhes ni bya ba bsgom byas te/ /'jo sgeg ldan par rab mdzes pa/ /yi ge 'bru dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin spro dang ba spu ba'o/ /de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus nas yi ge las gyur pa/ /skye med ma byung a bsgoms
71a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ de las gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /byang sems rdo rje zhes grags pa/ /sku mdog dkar po gzhon tshul can/ /rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dag dang ldan/ /rgyan ni ku dang rab ldan zhing/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'dzin/
71a3(rgyud 'grel): de yi snying gar bcom ldan 'das/ /dang po sangs rgyas bsgom byas te/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /lce brgyad pa ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags dgu gcig la gnyis dgod bya/ /oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te nA ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya te/ /de yi lte
71a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbus nyid du/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /a ra pa tsa zhes bya ba/ /mdog dkar byis pa'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /zur phud lnga dang rab ldan zhing/ /sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' brgyan/ /g.yas dang g.yon na bsnams pa ni/ /po ti dang ni
71a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri bsnams/ /de yi snying khar bsam bya ba/ /zla ba'i steng na yi ge a/ /sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas te/ /gnas su brtan par red 'gyur nas/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa gtad bar bya/ /rigs phye ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de dag ni
71a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no/ /de nas da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha dag gi ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste/ dang po'i sangs rgyas bstan pa yi/ /bdag nyid gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /ye
71a7(rgyud 'grel): shes zla steng a gnas las/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag las/ /gsang sngags 'di ni ched brjod bya /a A sarbba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ra mahA pa tsa/ sarbba d+harmA/ ga gan/ a ma la/ su pa ri shud+d+ha
71b1(rgyud 'grel): d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gadb+ha? A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i gsang sngags brjod byas pas/ /so so'i sku rnams bsal bar bsgom/ /gsang sngags de yi gong nyid du/ /a yi 'phro 'dug nas skabs su/ /bcu gnyis mdzad pa rdzogs byas te/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs nas su/ /slar log
71b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge'i mtshan ma kun/ /rang gi mdog ltar gsal 'gyur te/ /so so'i gnas su bkod pa las/ /zla ba la gnas cho ga gsum/ /sku rdzogs shar la sogs pa ru/ /go rims bzhin du bzhugs par bsgom/ /de dag ni lha bsgom zhing 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
71b3(rgyud 'grel): nas lha rnams so so yi/ /mtshan ma'i bye brag bstan par bya/ /dang po shar gyis 'khor lo yi/ /lce la zla gnas de nyid du/ /yi ge hUM las gyur pa yi/ /mi bskyod pa ni bsgom par bya/ /rab tu dkar ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jigs med bdud gnon skyil krung bzhugs//
71b4(rgyud 'grel): lho ru oM las yongs bskyed pa'i/ /rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /shin tu ser ba markata 'dra/ /cod pan dang ldan mchod sbyin mdzad/ /nub du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa yi/ /bskyed pa bde gshegs snang mdza' yas/ /rA ga'i mdog 'dra ting 'dzin rgya/ /dbu
71b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang ldan ye shes ldan/ /byang du mtshan rdzogs don yod grub/ /nI la'i mdog 'dra skyabs dang ldan/ /dbu rgyan mnyam pa'i stobs kyis bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang/ /spyi dang khyad par rgyan rnams kun/ /'khor lo'i skabs las shes par
71b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /shar lho zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /sems ma rdo rje zhes pa dkar/ /a las byung ste rdo rje'o/ /lho nub zla stengs bsam bya ba/ /a las bskyed pa'i rin chen ma/ /sngo bsangs mdzes ma'i thabs tshul can/ /rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin/ /nub byang zla dkyil steng
71b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa/ /mos pa mi las byung ba ste/ /dmar po'i mdog ldan pad+ma 'dzin/ /brjid pa'i tshul can bsgom par bya/ /byang shar zla stang bsgom bya ba/ /las mchog ma ste mdog ljang mo/ /gsal ba'i bdag nyid chen po ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /sems ma rdo rje la
72a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyang/ /rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma yis/ /dbu rgyan sku la sna tshogs pa'i/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /de yi phyi rim 'khor lo ni/ /lce steng zla ba bsgom bya ba/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bye brag las/ /so so'i sems
72a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bcu drug bskyed/ /dang po'i 'khor lo nas brtsams te/ /de la thug pa'i zla stengs su/ /rigs kyi sems dpa' chen po ni/ /rigs las skyes te rims bzhin brtag /dang po'i 'dod pa sems dpa' che/ /gnyis pa rgyal po bde ba che/ /gsum pa chags
72a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dga' ba che/ /bzhi pa legs la mgu ba che/ /yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las de dag bskyed/ /a A i a'i/ /stong bzhi bdag nyid chen pos 'joms/ /rim bzhin rdo rje mda' gzhu dang/ /lcags kyu tog par ldan pa ste/ /'gying dang ldan zhing rigs kyis brgyan
72a4(rgyud 'grel): shar stengs zla ba la gnas bsgom/ /lho yi 'khor lo'i steng bsam pa/ /gzugs che lus che rin chen dpal/ /kha dog che gsal nyi ma'i dpal/ /ming yang che ba tog gi dpal/ /dkyil yangs rdo rje bzhad pa'i dpal/ /gsal de don ldan 'di las
72a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes/ u a'u/ e i/ de ltar stong ldan dpal mchog rnams/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan chems/ /rims bzhin thogs gnas gtso la blta/ /nub kyi 'khor lo'i stong nyid du/ /sems dpa' rims bzhin bsam bya ba/ /shes rab mtshon can ma
72a6(rgyud 'grel): chags chos/ /nyon mongs che ba sems dpa' gcod/ /drags ldan sems dpa' kun gyi rgyu/ /snang gsal sems pa gsal bar smra/ /'dod ldan tshogs ba de dag kyang/ /chags pa 'joms rnams 'di las skyes/ /o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de dag
72a7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i dpal/ /'dzin tshul pad+ma ral gri dang/ /'khor lo lce dag so so yi/ /chag char 'dzin pa zur la blta/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i steng bsgom pa/ /sgyu ma mkhas pa rdo rje las/ /don grub ba ni sems dpa' bsrung/ /dga' ba la dga' gnod
72b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin te/ /mig 'phrul kun ldan sdud pa po/ /rims bzhin gsang sngags 'di las skyes/ /a A e i/ 'di las rim bzhin bskyed pa ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gi cha dang/ /mche ba khu tshur rnam bzung nas/ /las dag yin te gtso la 'dud/ /de dag ma
72b2(rgyud 'grel): lus sems dpa' yang/ /ji ltar gsung rab las byung ba/ /a las byung ste mtshon gyi sngags/ /tshig dang yan lag kun ldan nas/ /'khor lo de yi phyi nyid du/ /mchod pa'i tshogs dag bsgom bya ba/ /sbyin pa tshim byed rdo rje 'gying/ /sdom pa bsrung ba
72b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims phreng/ /bzod pa 'dzin pa spyad len ma/ /dge ba la brtson gar mdzad ma/ /lha mo'i tshul ni 'di bzhi yang/ /ming gi yi ge dang bas bskyed/ /lA mA gI dang ni las te/ /'gying dang phreng thogs 'dzin pa dang/ /dbyangs dang gar dag byed pa yi/ /
72b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang ldan te byis pa'i tshul/ /de 'og phyi yi lha mo bzhi/ /rim pa 'thon te gzhung tshig ldan/ /shes rab lus can bdug pa ma/ /bsam gtan dang can me tog 'dzin/ /smon lam ldan pa gsal ba me/ /thabs ldan lha mo dkar ba'i chu/ /ye shes
72b5(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan pa yi/ dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin ldan/ /'di yang ming las bskyed par bya/ /spos dang me tog gzhor ba dang/ gsal byad dag pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i/ /tshul ldan 'gying mdzes bsgom par bya/ de yi phyi rim bsgom bya ba/ /byams pa 'jam
72b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal spos glang po/ /ye shes tog zhes grags ba bzhi/ /byams pa dpag med snying rje che/ /shes rang che zhing thabs che ba/ /so so'i rigs las skyes pa ste/ /rim bzhin yi ge a las skyes/ /phyi lnga nang de lta sems dpa' i stabs/ /de nas de 'og bsgom
72b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ bzang spyod blo yi rgya mtsho dang/ /blo gros mi zad spobs ba rtsegs/ /rim pa 'di bzhin bsgom par bya/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs dang shugs dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon/ /'di dag kyang ni a las te/ /rim pas brgyan yod
73a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i gzhung/ /de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba/ /mthu chen skye ba dang ngan song 'dren/ /mya ngan 'joms pa dra ba'i 'od/ /rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /phung po 'joms shing nyon mongs 'dren/ /khro bo'i tshul ston drag shul
73a2(rgyud 'grel): che/ /lha chen 'jigs byed la sogs pa'o/ /a las de dag rim bzhin bskyed/ /? sgeg khro tshul ldan pa'o/ /de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba/ /zla 'od gzhon nu 'od dpag med/ /nam mkha' i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel/ /rim bzhin ya las bskyed par bya/ /
73a3(rgyud 'grel): de dag bye brag rigs kyi mdog /sngags chen theg pa'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa kun gyi nang na mchog /lha byed la sogs ldan pa'i mchog /rim gyi rta babs khyams nang du/ /mkhas pas rtags par rim bzhin bsgom/ /sgo nas sngags pas dgod bya
73a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /'gugs dang 'dren pa 'ching ba dang/ /mnyes pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /rim bzhin thogs nas tshad med ldan/ /a lus skyed de sgo bzhir gnas/ /de dag ni rgyal ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi
73a5(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin no// //de nas las kyi khyad par yang/ /bskyed pa'i zhar la byung bas te/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ru bdag gi ma bshad do/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas spos kyi chu dag la/ /sngags
73a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas ba yis bsang byas te/ /phung po bsdus pa'i mchod pa lngas/ /rim bzhin byin rlabs mthun gzhan nas/ /'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis/ /se gol rim par ldan byas pas/ /rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas te/
73a7(rgyud 'grel): mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ /sa mA dza zhes brjod bya zhing/ /'khor lo'i tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod pa bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la/ /dri sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing/ /a haM zhes dang ldan pa ni//
73b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yis rgyas btab don mchog 'grub/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ /gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /de dag na sngon du bya ba'i cho ga'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rang dga' i
73b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas nyid du/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri ba bya/ /sa dge gzhung bzhin sbyong ba dang/ /gzhung dang ldan par gzhung bzhin du/ /bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o// //de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams/ /sngon du bstan pa bzhin byas te//
73b3(rgyud 'grel): spro ba'i sems ni rab bskyed de/ /tshig ldan phyag byas spos thogs la/ /tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags ldan pas/ /bstod de langs la 'gying bcas pas/ /bgegs la don du rab tu bsgor/ /de nas phur bus gdab par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi bkug la/ /mchod
73b4(rgyud 'grel): de sbyin sreg ming rus la/ /bzlas te bya ba bstan pa yin/ /de la gzugs brnyan bshad pa ni/ /'khor lo rim gsum ldan pa la/ /snam bu mu khyud rnams kyis brgyan/ /rta babs dang ni twa ra na/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bdag gdugs dang
73b5(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab brgyan/ /dril bu ras 'phan rgyal mtshan tshogs/ /de la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni/ /shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/ /zhes pa la sogs rgyan mchog ni/ /'di yi skabs su rim pas bstan/ /de dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi ting nge 'dzin to// //
73b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na/ /las bshad de dag gzhan du med/ /bdag gi las dang gzhan dag ste/ /gshin dang gson pa'i las su bstan/ /de la bdag gis las bstan pa/ /shin tu dge ba'i shing bu ni/ /tsandan shug pa la sogs te/ /dri zhim dang
73b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan mdzes pa'i shing/ /khru gang khru do zhi ba la/ /rgyas dang dbang du dbug pa dang/ /drag shul spyod pa la sogs kyi/ /shing ni rim pas shes par bya/ /zlum pa'i dbus su brtsigs byas la/ /dan po'i sangs rgyas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs
74a1(rgyud 'grel): ku ru/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gtso/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /thugs la gnas te zla stengs bsam/ /de yi thugs kyi zla ba la/ /a las byung ba'i 'od 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa btul byas te/ /slar
74a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus bdag nyid bsregs byas la/ /zhu ba de las bskyed pa ni/ /thabs shes rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs/ /kha dog las dang mthun pa la/ /shin tu ? 'bras rus can/ /dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan/ /de yi thugs khar zla stengs/ /a las
74a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i yi ge bruM/ /shin tu legs pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /gong du bstan dang mthun pa la/ /shin tu legs pa sgo bzhir/ /shar phyogs 'greng ba sgo yin te/ /de dbus gsum las lha rnams bskyed/ /de la ma yis byin rlabs te/ /sku gsum
74a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang ldan par bstan/ /de la sreg blugs dbul ba ni/ /mar dang til dang yam shing dang/ /mngar gsum lde bu dkar gsum ni/ /zhi ba'i rjes la bshad pa'o/ /rgyas dang dbang dang drag dang shug /'di las gsum pa'i ? khams ni/ /'di las
74a5(rgyud 'grel): ma gsungs gzhan dag la/ /rgyas par bstan te der shes bya/ /de nas gang dpa' i 'dod la/ /spyi bor zla stengs ma bsgoms te/ /de nyid zhu? bar gyur pa la/ /bya ba de nyid zhu 'gyur la/ /slar sos gzhon nu'i gzugs byas la/ /de la lhag par gnas
74a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de ni bdag gi don bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan don bya bar rim pa yang/ /na dang shi ba gnyis yin te/ /de las na ba'i las bya na/ /gang dag yid ni mi dran pa'i/ /bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod pa na/ /ting 'dzin 'di dag dran par
74a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag bsgoms te/ /de yi snying la zla ba bsam/ /da stengs a dang muM dang raM/ /de las gyur te rab 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i bdug pa kun btul te/ /mdzad pa'i las ni dran par byas/ /slar log bzhi yis gnas su thim//
74b1(rgyud 'grel): thim pas ye shes me 'bar te/ /gnod pa'i bgegs ni dran pa las/ /yungs kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg /des kyang sos par ma gyur na/ /srin bus zas ba'i shing bu la/ /'bar ba'i me ni bus byas te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mar las ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum mam/
74b2(rgyud 'grel): stong du bya/ /des ni nad las thar par 'gyur/ na ba las thar pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas shi la phan gdags na/ /dang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal nas/ /rol phan pa'i chog ni/ /a yig kun khyab spyi stengs bsam/ /lha gyur lha ni sngon bzhin
74b3(rgyud 'grel): pas ma/ a las ye shes lnga yi gang/ /phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus btab pas/ /dang por bkru ba'i las yin no/ /de nas a yi 'phro 'du bya/ /de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas gnas pa'i cho ga bshad/ /shi ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste/ /zhag gsum
74b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon myur gnas la/ /bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni/ /'khor los lha rnams mdun bsams te/ /phyag btsal spro bskyed la sogs bya/ /de nas tshig 'di ched brjod bya/ /tshe 'di dang po 'bras bu ni/ /bdag gi gson 'di 'bras bur gcig /dam
74b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig lha dang mnyam pa ni/ /bdag nyid gyur par som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig par/ /phyi mi ldog par bdag 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs su'i rigs su ni/ /de dag skye bar the tshom med/ /'di ni bdag nyid dam pa ste/ /mchod sbyin 'di ni
74b6(rgyud 'grel): bla na med/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pas/ /deng 'di bdag 'dus mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag byas s[os thegs la/ /spyan drang tshig 'di brjod par byas /kye dbang ni nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa las sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus
74b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni rtsal du gsol// //de nas spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ /rgyal mchog la sogs bsgom
75a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /sgo dbye la sogs gnas 'dir bshad/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di brjod bya/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ra mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmmA/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa
75a2(rgyud 'grel): ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a:/ zhes brjod pa'i sngags bzlas so/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang/ /ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bstod par ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la bstod bya ba/ /rang la bstod de nges pa'i
75a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog /'bras bu 'byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /shi la phan bdag don ched du/ /mchog sbyin rdo re mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la
75a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyad la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal bdud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs
75a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul da ba khyod la
75a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dud dang sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /de nas gsol ba btab yas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /de nas gang shi de
75a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid la/ dmigs la a A zhes bkod de/ /de la phyogs bcu rgyal ba dang/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar 'dir gshegs pa/ /deng 'dir 'dus par bde gshegs te/ /de bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas
75b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pas bkrus te bgegs bskrad la/ /de nas de la bsrung bar bya/ /de nas til gyi nges pa ni/ /skor te sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /shi ba lta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rnams ni spyad par bya//
75b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i cho ga rim pas nas/ /'khor lo'i rim pa 'di gsungs te/ /phyi rol byung ste gor ma sbyin/ /de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do/ /de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas/ /sngags pas chas gos ldan pa yis/ /shin tu 'gying bas brgyan byas
75b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ zhag bdun nang bar sbyin sreg bya/ /mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te/ /shi la phan pa'i dkyil khor ldan/ /gzhal yas hang pa de 'dra ba/ /'dis las gsungs te gzhan du min/ /'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga ni/ /bdag gis rang bzor byas min te/ /'jam dpal sgyu
75b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dra ba dang/ /chog 'dus pa'i rgyud las te/ /de nas 'dir ni 'os pa yin/ /'di ni shi ba'i cho ga'o/ /shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de la lam bstan bya/ /tshogs bsag dge ba'i don la sbyor/ /de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang/ /de nyid mnyam shes
75b5(rgyud 'grel): ci mi tshugs/ /de la rtag gnas de ldan te/ /rim pas a'i dad nyid do/ /de yang bdag lus as khyab ste/ /de nyid a yis byin brlabs pas/ /a nyid dbyings kyi dang nyid du/ /thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/ /rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas 'khor lo bstan par bya
75b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug byed phyed thig le can/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can/ /zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na/ /lus la 'khor lo zhi gnas te/ /lte bar shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la/ /ya a/ /a a:
75b7(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin dgong/ /dbus na yi ge a mchog go /snying gar shes rab 'khor lo te/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan/ /de la sngags rnams dgod pa ni/ /a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'di dag rim bzhin du/ /'khor lo'i lce la dgod
76a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /mgrin par shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis ldan pa'i rtsibs mtshan la/ /oM a ra pa tsa na/ b+hA gI shwa ra pradz+nyA na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rnams/ /rim bzhin yang dag dgod par bya/ /de nas 'tshogs mar bsam pa ni//
76a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis ldan pa'i lce can la/ /sku yi sngags kyi phreng ba dgod/ /a A sarba thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrta pA gI shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ra la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyi
76a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba 'di/ /shes rab 'khor lo grags pa yin/ /'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa/ /gzhan nu gzugs can bde ba thob/ /grags 'dzin lus dang bde ldan lus/ /de dag spangs nas gzhan don du/ /rab dga' lus su bskyed par nges/ /de ni bcu gnyis
76a4(rgyud 'grel): sa rdzags te/ /kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po/ /de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni gnyis pa lce/ /shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra/ /nam mkha' i 'od ni gsum pa ste/ /nam mkha' i gzhi bzhin so sor gsal/ /rdo rje 'od zer zhi ba ste/ /sa de nyid ni bzhi
76a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ bsam pa nang gi brtan sbyor bas/ /rdo rje zhes ni yongs su brtag /lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pas/ /dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas/ /pad+ma'i 'od ni drug pa ste/ /pad+ma bzhin du rab tu skye/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid phyir/ /dri ma med pas yongs su
76a6(rgyud 'grel): bzung/ bdun pa las kyi 'od ces pas/ /sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod/ /brgyad pa dpe med byed pa ni/ /de la dpe ni yod ma yin/ /dpe ldan zhes pa dgu pa ste/ /thams cad dpe ni so sor gcig /bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bas/ /sangs
76a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba/ /bcu gnyis so so rang rig pa/ /rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu rdzogs/ /zhes pa 'di ni rang rig pa'o/ /'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi 'khor
76b1(rgyud 'grel): lo bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas 'dir dbang rim? pa gsungs/ /dbang bskur med na 'grub pa med/ /yon tan stan pa'i sngags pa yis /de la dbang byin yon tan grub/ /dang por khrus gsol brgyan pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang
76b2(rgyud 'grel): bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pas/ /slob dpon bla mar gyur pa la/ /dbang rnams nod pa rab tu gsungs/ /dang por sdig pa sreg byas nas/ /de la dbang dang dral bar bya/ /de dag kun gyi rim pa yang/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /'dir yang dag
76b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin/ /mchod pa'i las dang sbyin pa dang/ /rim par ldan pas dbang bskur te/ /de nas de la chu dbang bskur/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni/ /cod pan dar dbyangs rdo rje dang/ /bdag po'i ming la sogs pa dang/ /dbang rnams rdzogs par sbyin pa
76b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gsang ba'i dbang dang nges pa'i dbang/ /rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskur/ /de nas bra shis gdon bya zhing/ /rgyal po bzhin du 'gying bcas pa/ /g.yog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la/ /lan gsum bskor ba tshigs bcad kyis/ /bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya/ /skye
76b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni rim pas dbugs phyung ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la dgod/ /sa la nges pa'i dbang bskur te/ /shin tu gzi ldan bkra shis mchog /ces ni brjod la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas rang yang khyim du 'gro /khyim du phyin nas 'khor dag la/ /slob dpon 'dis
76b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dam tshig pas/ /bdag kyang dam tshig mchog dang ldan/ /'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /rta dang glang po nor dang 'bru/ /rin po che dang ci bzhed pa/ /khyed kyis nga la ma 'dri bar/ /slob dpon 'di la de phyir dbul/ /sangs rgyas kun dang thabs cig pa'i/ /phyag na rdo
76b7(rgyud 'grel): rje btul zhugs brtan/ /shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas la/ /rim pas gsungs pa'i bka' lung ni/ /mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab 'di/ /shin tu rtogs dka' mngon sum min/ /rang rgyud tsam gyi rim pa dang/ /theg pa chen po mngon rtogs pa'i/ /kun la thugs rje mar
77a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /brtse bar ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yongs med gus pa'i sems kyis bris/ /'jam mgon dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa' i gnas/ /thugs rje ldan pa sku gsung thugs ldan po/ /bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud
77a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa ni/ /mi dpya dang gtsug sems dang ldan par shog /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
77a3(rgyud 'grel): po smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir/ /bzhi yi sangs rgyas skye ba bzhes/ /mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /smra ba'i seng+ge skye ba bzhes/ /thugs rjes gnas
77a4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dren mdzad pas/ /don yod pa yi skye ba bzhes/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer spro ba'i phyir/ /'od dpag med pa'i skye ba bzhes/ /skye rgas chu las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skye ba bzhes/ /gang gis gong du mchod pas/ /
77a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po sangs rgyas skye ba bzhes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i skye ba bzhes/ /shes rab gang la thogs med pas/ /'jam dpal rnon po'i skye ba bzhes/ /zhi ba'i ded la legs gnas pas/ /a
77a6(rgyud 'grel): ra pa tsa'i skye ba bzhes// (//mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag pa'i sgom kho na bzhugs so//) //'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgom pa 'di ni slob dpon gyi man ngag tu byas pa yin te/
77a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dang por 'jug pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/ /de la zhugs te 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' mngon sum du byas nas kyang/ sems can skyabs dang dpung gnyen
77b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa srid par lhung zhing ma grol ba rnams kyi don bya bar bsam mo/ /de ltar sems can gyi don du bya ba'i thabs kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhes byas te/ de ni mdo sde'o/ /de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms te/ phyag btsal ba dang/
77b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ lam bsten pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang bcu bsgom mo// //de la phyag btsal ba ni rang gi snying khar zla
77b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a dkar po bsgom/ /a de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas phyogs bcu nas sngon lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad spyan
77b4(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la/ /rang gi rdo rje slob dpon gang yin yang de dag dang lhan cig tu zhugs par bsams la/ de dag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar la phyag btsal bas bya'o/ /de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa phul te/ rnal 'byor pa dag gi thugs
77b5(rgyud 'grel): kar/ yi ge a bsgoms la de las kyang 'od zer spros te/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga me tog gi gdugs dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyan dang phreng ba la sogs pa dang/ spos dang rang bzhin gyis dri zhim po sbyar ba'i dri dang/ gyur pa'i dri dang spos rgya dang/ mar me'i phreng ba dang/ dri chab dang lha
77b6(rgyud 'grel): bshos dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa nam mkha' i sprin phung tsam rgya mtsho ltar gtibs pas mchod par bsgom/ de nas sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags te/ dus gsum du bdag gi sdig pa byas pa/ gzhan byed du stsal ba dang/ byed pa la
77b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar sbyor ba dang/ dngos po gzhi dang 'jug pa dang/ bcas pa thams cad bshags te/ dran pa ni khas blangs ma dran pa ni bsdus te/ 'gyod pa skyes nas phyis mi bya bar sdom pa blangs nas bshags pa'o/ /de yang bshags pa'i gnas 'phags pa dang/
78a1(rgyud 'grel): bshags bya dang/ bshags pa po rnams mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ rnal 'byor ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod chags dang
78a2(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum gyis ma 'dres pa la/ phrag dog med pa'i dga' ba dang/ spro ba ni rjes su yi rang bar bsgom pa'o/ /de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis sems can thams cad bla na med
78a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig par bsngos la bsgom mo/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bsgoms te/ sangs rgyas ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsnyen rten la skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo/ /chos ni chos bsgom pa dag med pa'i chos la brten cing
78a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /dge 'dun yang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mi 'gro ste/ sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brten cing bsgoms te skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo// /de la lam bsten pa ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas
78a5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i lam rdo rje theg pa'i don 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom zhing mtshan brjod pa ni lam bsten pa'o/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa ni bdag gi sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i don du sangs rgyas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi
78a6(rgyud 'grel): don bya'o bar bsgom par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang/ ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o bar bsgom
78a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes bya'o/ /de nas dam bca' bar bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas bla na med pa'i byang chub sems
78b1(rgyud 'grel): de ring phyin chad skyed par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon rnams kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa bzhin/ /de bzhin bla med byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni bsdud pa dang//
78b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don gyi tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por so sor bzung/ /de nas rigs lnga'i sdom pa bzung ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sdom pa sangs rgyas
78b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bskyed pa/ /'di ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs kyi sdom pa bzung/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gsum/ /bdag gis mi gtang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin po che'i sdom pa bzung/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi dus drug tu/ /brtan po nyid du sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma
78b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi sdom pa bzung/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /dam chos so sor bzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa bzung/ /gong du ma byung ba'i lhag ma kun 'di sems can don bya ba dang/ mi dge ba bcu spang ba dang/ 'khor ba mi spang ba dang/ mya
78b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan las 'das pa dang du mi len pa dang/ theg pa chung ba dang 'jigs pa'i sa spangs pa dang/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ gdon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mi smad pa dang/ de ring phan chad bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes dam bca' o/ /
78b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang/ /dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang/ /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' o/ /zhes sems bskyed do/ /
78b7(rgyud 'grel): de yan chod bsod nams kyi tshogs bsgom pa'o/ /don dam pa byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom pa ni/ dang por mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa yin la/ /de ni ye shes lnga bsgom pa yin te/ dang po chos thams cad mi dmigs la mi rtog pa/ rang
79a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba tha snyad tsam du yod la/ don dam par rang bzhin med pa de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom/ de nas me long lta bu'i ye shes bsgom ste/ dper na me long g.ya' dag pa'i
79a2(rgyud 'grel): nang du/ gzugs brnyan snang zhing gsal ba ltar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ de las chos kyi dbyings rgyu dang mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa'i ye shes de las/ 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi gang zag /phung po dang chos thams cad ji ltar
79a3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i chos nyid kyis dang de la phyin ci ma log par snang ba dang/ sems rnam par dag pa log rtog glo bur gyi dri ma dang/ 'dra bas bsgribs pa tsam yin la/ sems can gyi sems chos kyi rang bzhin du gsal bar bsgom mo/ /sems can gyis de ltar ma rtogs
79a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'gro ba las mi thar pa la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ 'gro ba las thar par bya'o zhes bsgom mo/ /de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom ste/ chos ni phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched la bya/ mu stegs pas brtags pa'i
79a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zag tu lta ba med pa nyan thos pa'i chos rdul tsam du yod par lta ba'i bdag med par lta ba dang/ sems tsam pa'i sems yod par lta ba de yang bdag med/ chos thams cad la bdag med par bsgom/ de yang bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa dang/ gzhan med
79a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bdag gzhan med pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med par mnyam pa'o/ /mdor na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du bsgom/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmmA NAM A dya nu tya pa na na twAta/ ces pas byin gyis brlab po/ /de la a ni a a nu ta pan twAta/
79a7(rgyud 'grel): ces pas ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ bdag gzhan stong pa nyid du mnyam par bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og tu so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom ste/ de ni bdag dang gzhan du phye ste/ gang zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag pa'i mi rtog
79b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang las bdag dang gzhan du yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tsam du phye ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid du bdag don bya ba'i gnas sems can gzhan mtshan ma med pa'i sgo nas/ so sor phye zhing brtag par byas nas bsgoms nas/ spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam par mtshan ma med
79b2(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /de'i dang las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsgom ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las 'das pa gcig dang du ma dang shin tu bral ba rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes stong pa
79b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin nam/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de'i ngang las smon lam dang thugs rje'i dbang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye
79b4(rgyud 'grel): shes bsgom ste/ dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i rgyu bdag dang mtshan ma med bzhin du so sor dmigs nas/ mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos don bya bar dran te/ sprul pa sna tshogs pas sprul cing spros nas sems can srid pa las bsgral
79b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'od zer gyis ngan song gsum la khyab nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byas nas/ sems can rnam par grol nas lha dang mi la bkod de/ de nas so so'i dbang po rim pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ theg pa gsum gyi chos kyis grol bar byas nas/
79b6(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba dang/ nyan thos rnams sems can gyi don la bcug nas/ theg pa chen po la bkod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams srid pa la chags pa la stong pa nyid kyi don bstan nas sangs rgyas par bya'o bar bsgo ba ni bya
79b7(rgyud 'grel): ba nan tan gyi ye shes bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems dang/ smon pa byang chub kyi sems kun rdzob ste/ des ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ don dam byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs rnam gnyis bsgom pa bstan nas// //
80a1(rgyud 'grel): da ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te/ bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las/ khro bo'i sa bon hUM sngo nag sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa tsam zhig bsgom mo/ /de'i phro
80a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab nas sems can gyi don byas te/ slar hUM la thim pa las khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa ste/ de ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten pa de 'dul ba'i don du bum pa la khro bo zhal drug ste/ shar gyi dbu
80a3(rgyud 'grel): sngo/ g.yas g.yon dkar/ lho ser nub dmar byang ljang gu'o/ /rtse mo lnga yar lta ba ye shes lnga/ mar lta ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje'i dra ba'i spubs su gyur par stong par bsgom mo/ /de'i nang du bruM dkar po las
80a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i mchod rten kha dog bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad stod gsum gyi 'jig rten khyab pa zhig bsgom mo/ /de'i bum pa'i nang du yi ge h+ri las chos kyi 'byung gnas dbyibs zur gsum du bsgom mo/ /de'i nang du yi ge a las kha dog sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram bsgom mo
80a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su yi ge bruM dkar po las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa twa ra Na dang bcas par bsgom mo/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can chos nyid du mnyam pas gru bzhi'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis shar gyi sgo'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i
80a6(rgyud 'grel): don gyis lho'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i don gyis nub kyi sgo'o/ /dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis byang gi sgo'o/ /stobs lnga'i rang bzhin gyis sgo srungs bzhi'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis dra ba dang dra ba dra phyed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam
80a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag brgyad gdugs dang me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /me tog lta bu'i ra ba ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis me long dang rin po che'o/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyis sems can la chos ston pas/ 'dul bas 'dul ba'i rang bzhin dril bu dang dar gyi cod pan no
80b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bsams pa gsum rtseg tu gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi 'dud rtsi'i gtsug tor tu gyur pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyis twa ra Na'o/ /ting nge 'dzin mu ma chad pa bsgoms pas mu khyud ma chad
80b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i brtags rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyis 'od lnga'i kha dog gis brgyan pa'o/ /de'i nang du re mig dgu snam bu dang ldan pa la dbus su seng+ge'i khri mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin no/ /stobs bcu dang
80b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rtags su shar du glang po che'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis lhor rta'o/ /dbang bdu'i? rang bzhin gyi nub tu rma bya'o/ /phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang du nam mkha' lding gi khri'o/ /de dag gi steng du rin
80b4(rgyud 'grel): po che'i khri dang pad+ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan rtsegs pa'o/ /de dag gi phyogs bzhi thams cad dang/ mtshams kyi re mig dang snam bu dang gru chad pa la zla ba'i gdan bsgom mo/ /de la pad+ma ni thabs sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ /zla ba ni
80b5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi myu gu bskyed pa'o// //de nas dbus su seng+ge dang zla ba'i gdan la bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin dag pa'i ye shes de nyid yi ge a dkar po cig tu bsgoms la/ de'i 'phro 'du las rnam par snang mdzad chen po byang chub 
80b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang rang bzhin gcig pa/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa zhal phyogs bzhir gzigs pa/ rgyan mi mnga' ba zhi ba'i rang bzhin dbu la ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang dbyer med pa'i don sku mdog dkar po chos nyid la nyon mongs
80b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags/ phyag brgyad thugs kan byang chub kyi mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa la snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar yi ge h+ri las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa
81a1(rgyud 'grel): dbu lnga la gtsug gi rta mgo dkar po ste/ khams gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'am dbang du sdud pa'i rang bzhin no/ /zhal shar phyogs su gzigs ba sde/ lho ser nub dmar/ byang ljang ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /phyag g.yas
81a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa duM pa re re bsnams pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i ral gri dam pa'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas po ti bsnams pa/ chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin pas
81a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas/ sna tshogs kyi na bzas brgyan pa/ phung bu lnga dang ldan par bsgom/ de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom/ rtsibs drug la shan gyi rtsi bas ni sngo/ g.yas g.yon ni dkar/ lho ser nub dmar/ byang ljang/
81a4(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud bzhi yang dkar/ rigs drug gi rang bzhin yin pas rtsi bas drug go /rten cing 'brel ba'i rang bzhin yin pas 'khor lo mu khyud dang po la/ oM sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): a b+ha ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa bsgom mo/ /gnyis pa las sangs rgyas kyi sa
81a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis kyi sa bon/ a A i a'i u a'u a o/ o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis dgong/ rtsibs drug la shar gyi rtsibs la/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe dA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): lho'i rtsi bas la/ oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi rtsibs la/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): byang
81a6(rgyud 'grel): gi rtsibs la/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): shar bstod kyi rtsibs la/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye na ma(rgyud 'grel): shar smad du/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyi rol rtsibs mtshan gyi mu khyud la sngags kyi phreng ba/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya zhes pa dgong/ mu
81a7(rgyud 'grel): khyud phyi ma la ka kha sum cu rtsa gnyis dgod des mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sa bon yin no/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge a las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal drug pa/ phyag gnyis pa/
81b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa phyag gnyis ni utpa la bsnams pas te/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i don to/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi
81b2(rgyud 'grel): ge a dkar po bsgoms te/ thams cad mkhyen pa lam mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ gsum gyi rang bzhin can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyes/ de bzhin gshegs
81b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rang bzhin bsgom pa'o/ /a de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ dang por bskyed pa'i rim pa las phyir 'phros pa'i mchod rten gyi bum pa'i nang nas phyir 'phros pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can nyon
81b4(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa lnga dang/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa dag par byas te/ sangs rgyas par byas nas/ de las kyang phyir 'phros nas rdo rje khro bo'i zhal nas byung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du khyab nas sems can gyi don bya ste slar 'dus pas rim par yi ge
81b5(rgyud 'grel): a la thim par byas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi lha rnams su sprul la/ sangs rgyas mchod pa dang/ sems can gyi don byas nas yang slar 'dus pas sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi ni dbus kyi gtso bo la bskor/ rigs lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni
81b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo la thim par bya'o/ /rigs bzhi ni glang po che'i khri la mi bskyod pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba/ rta'i khri la rin chen 'byung ldan la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba/ rma bya'i khri la snang ba mdza' yas la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba/ nam
81b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' ? gi khri la don yod grub pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor bar bsgom mo/ /mtshams kyi re mig bzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /snam bu la mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go /sgo bzhi'i gnas su sgo ba bzhis
82a1(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bsgoms la// //de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa yan chad pa klag par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi yig 'bru 'od zer dkar po spros te
82a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi sems can gyi nyon mongs pa gti mug la sogs pa dag par byas nas yang dag pa'i don dang ldan par byas te/ slar 'dus pas mtshan gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa drug yod pa rigs lngar phye te phyogs bzhi nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o
82a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen por mi snang bar bya ste/ dbus kyi gdan la yi ge a las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po la/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbu la ral pa gyen du 'khyil pa rgyan mi mnga' ba phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyar
82a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar la phyag mtshan gong dang mthun pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la mu khyud bzhi lte ba dang bcas par bsgom mo//
82a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs dkar po bcu la/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrtA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rim par dgod do/ /gzhan ma gong ma dang mthun no/ /dbus kyi lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi ge a las 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ye shes spyi gzugs shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
82a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs kyi 'jam dpal dkar po phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na 'khor lo bsnams pa zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a dkar po bsgom/ de la 'od 'phros pas
82a7(rgyud 'grel): gong ma'i rim pa dang 'dra ba rnam par snang mdzad 'phros pas sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i gti mug dag par byas te/ slar rim par 'dus pas yi ge a la thim ste/ mtshan gyi sngags ni sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ zhes pa nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu
82b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa che zhes pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o/ /de nas sngags brjod tsam na sngags las 'od zer dkar po rnam par snang mdzad med pos spros pas/ sems can kun de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su sangs rgyas par bya ste/ slar 'dus las mtshan
82b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa gcig yod pa rigs lngar phye ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la thim/ rigs bzhi'i sku phyag rgya sum cu rtsa drug thim par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad bsdus te shar du bkod nas/ dbus kyi yi ge
82b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM las mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan mi mnga' ba ral pa'i dbu rgyan can phyag g.yas pas sa gnon pa bdud dang bgegs kyi mi bskyod pa'i brtags/ phyag g.yon thugs kar ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs
82b4(rgyud 'grel): kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las dang pa'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan gong ma dang mthun/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo de'i rtsibs brgyad la kha dog sngon po mu khyud ni dkar po rtsibs brgyad la/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe dA ya te na ma:
82b5(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru re re dgod/ phyi ma gong ma dang mthun par bya/ dbus kyi lte ba'i yi ge hUM las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' sdug bsngal gcod pa zhes bya ba sku mdog sngon po rgyan gong dang 'dra ba/ phyag g.yas ral gri/ g.yon rdo rje bsnams
82b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thugs kar zla ba la hUM sngon po bsgom mo/ /de las 'od zer rim par phyir 'phros pas mi bskyod pa khro bo'i rigs kyi 'od 'phros te/ sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang dag par byas te/ slar 'dus pa las yi ge hUM las thim par byas la mtshan gyi
82b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ ces pa nas sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ces pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o/ /'od zer sngon po khro bor spros nas sems can gyi don byas nas/ slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags bdun cu rtsa gnyis
83a1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa rigs lngar bsgoms la/ phyogs bzhi nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o/ /de nas mi bskyod pa slar bsdus te/ rang gi gdan la bkod nas rnam par snang mdzad nub kyi gdan la bkod de/ dbus kyi gtso bo
83a2(rgyud 'grel): la h+ri las snang ba mdza' yas bskyed/ sku mdog dmar ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin las mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom/ de'i thugs kar shes
83a3(rgyud 'grel): rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog dmar po/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+NA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru brgyad dgod/ gzhan 'dra/ dbus su zla ba'i gdan la yi ge h+ri las 'jam dpal rdo rje rnon po sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na ral gri 'phyar ba/ g.yon na
83a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma thugs kar bsnams pa/ thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ de las 'od zer snang ba mdza' yas spro/ sems can gyi 'dod chags zhi bar byas te/ slar 'dus pas yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): la thim par byas/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid ces pa
83a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal yan chod brjod/ 'od zer dmar po spro bar bya'o/ /slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags ni nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar bgos te/ dkyil 'khor la thim par byas te/ de nas snang ba mdza' yas rang gi gnas la
83a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs nas/ rnam snang lhor bkod de/ dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge a las bskyed pa rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin mdzad par bsgom/ de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
83a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ oM bA gI shA rwa ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'bru brgyad dgod/ gzhan gong ma dang mthun/ de'i lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi ge oM las 'jam dpal dag gi dbang phyug sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon rin po che'i thugs kar bsnams pa/ g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar
83b1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge oM/ de las rin chen 'byung ldan spro/ slar 'dus yi ge oM la thim/ mtshan gyi sngags 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ zhes pa nas/ nor bu chen po rin chen zhes pa'i bar gyi sngags brjod nas/ 'od
83b2(rgyud 'grel): zer ser po 'phros te sems can gyi don byas/ slar 'dud pas mtshan gyi sngags brgya rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o/ /de nas rin chen 'byung ldan rang gi gnas su bkod nas/ rnam par snang mdzad byang gi gdan la bkod de/ dbus su
83b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yi ge a las bskyed pa/ don yod grub pa sku mdog sna tshogs te ljang gu /phyag gnyis skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo/ /ljang gu rtsibs brgyad pa/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA
83b4(rgyud 'grel): ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'bru brgyad dgod do/ /gzhan gong dang mthun/ de'i dbus su zla ba'i steng du gdan la yi ge a las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes kyi spyi gtsug ces bya ba/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon pa na rgya gram thugs kar g.yas ral gri thugs
83b5(rgyud 'grel): kar 'phyar ba/ de'i thugs ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge a de las don yod grub pa kho nas sems can gyi don gyi don byas/ slar rim pa 'dus pas yi ge a la thim par bya/ de nas mtshan gyi sngags sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba zhes pa nas/ 'jam dpal
83b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa yan chad bklag go /yig 'bru las 'od ljang gu 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags dgu bcu rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te/ dkyil 'khor la thim par bya'o/ /de nas don yod grub pa rang gi
83b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su dgod de/ rnam par snang mdzad mi snang bar gyur nas/ dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge a las byang chub sems rdo rje bskyed de/ sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can bsgom/ de'i thugs kar gong ma bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes
84a1(rgyud 'grel): rab 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'bru re re dgod do/ /mu khyud bzhi gong ma dang mthun no/ /lte ba'i zla ba'i gdan la yi ge a las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba/ sku mdog
84a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po g.yon pas glegs bam bsnams nas thugs kar bzhag pa g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar ba/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge a bsgoms nas/ de las rdo rje sems dpa' spro bar bya/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bya
84a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ slar 'dus pas thugs ka'i a la thim par byas nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor tshigs gcad brjod pa yin ta/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam par snang mdzad chen po dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni spyi'i rnal 'byor yin pas 'di ltar brjod par bya'o
84a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs drug lha re rang gi yi dam byed pa'i tshe bsgoms nas brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i sgom khog /slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma
84a5(rgyud 'grel): saM gI ti na ma ho ma kra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas shing dri med gzi brjid ldan
84a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin tshul mchog dam pa bzhir ldan rnal 'byor pa/ rim gnyis tshul gyis sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /da ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sngags kyis dbang gis 'dir gsungs pa na pa'i don du zhi ba'i las bya'o/ /'byor ba'i don du rgyas pa'i las
84a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dbang ni dgug pa'o/ /drag po ni tshar gcad pa'o/ /de'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ snying rje dang dga' bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba gsungs te/ dbang bskur ba'i
84b1(rgyud 'grel): thog mar zhi ba'o/ /de nas rgyas pa'o/ /de nas dbang dang drag po'o/ /tha mar las thams cad pa'o/ /thab dang phyag rgya dgod pa dang/ /dus dang kha lta mchod rdzas dang/ /gzhag thabs dang ni 'dug stangs dang/ /yam shing bud shing gzar bu dang//
84b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ting 'dzin rim pa dang/ /ku sha me dang sreg rdzas dang/ /spyan drangs de la mchod pa dang/ /rdzas dbul bstod de phyag bya ba/ /lha bsgom spyan drangs bzhugs gsol dang/ /rgyas 'debs bzhi yis rgyas gdab cing/ /mchod bstod dgang gzar
84b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis dbul bya/ /phyi ma rim gyis gong ltar dbul/ /de nas bstod la phyag bya dang/ /tha mar gshegs su gsol ba dang/ /de nas me lha de dang ni/ /gong ma'i rim pa ji bzhin pas/ /lhag ma'i rdzas kyis mchod bya ste/ /tha mar gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /de nas
84b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te rjes su ni/ /yi rang dbul zhing rdzas dag gis/ /rim bzhin rnal 'byor gang ldan pas/ /tshul bzhin du ni dbul bar bya/ /de las dang po thab kyi rim pa bstan te/ /zhi ba'i thab kyi dbyibs kyang gnyis te zlum por bya ba dang/ pad+ma lta bur bya'o/ /de
84b5(rgyud 'grel): yang kha khyer ni sor bzhi pa'o/ /zheng dang dpangs su yang de nyid do/ /thur du khru gang ngo/ /srid du yang khru gang ngo/ /de'i phyi rol du sor bzhi por la pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ /kha khyer la ni rdo rje phreng ba gtad par bya'o/ /de yang phyi ni gru bzhi la dbus su 'jim pa la 'bur du
84b6(rgyud 'grel): brkos la/ gtso bo'i phyag mtshan shar du rdo rje/ lhor 'khor lo'o/ /nub du pad+ma'o/ /byang du sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /kha dog dkar pos dkar gyi chus bsku bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i thab kyang de dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i thab kyi rim pa'o/ /rgyas pa'i thob
84b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyibs gru bzhi la rgya gru bzhir gtang ngo/ /dpangs su yang khru gang la/ gting du yed khru gang brko bar bya'o/ /sor bzhi ni phyir dgyed par bya'o/ /kha khyer yang zhi ba dang mthun par sor bzhi'o/ /de'i phyi rim dag tu ni pad+ma'i phreng ba btang bar bya'o/ /kha khyer la
85a1(rgyud 'grel): yang gong du smos pa ltar rdo rje phreng ba gtang bar bya'o/ /de'i nang du yang gtso bo'i mtshan ma 'jim pa la dkyus su sor brgyad/ dpangs su sor gcig go /rgyas pa'i thab kyi rim pa'o// //dbang gis thab ni rgyas khru gsum
85a2(rgyud 'grel): la dbyibs zla gam dang gzhu lta bu'o/ /rgya la ni sor bzhi bcu'o/ /drag po la ni sor nyi shu tham pa btang ngo/ /gting thabs ni sor bcu'o/ /kha khyer la ni sor byed dang gsum mo/ /zhing rab dbangs mnyam par shes par bya'o/ /kha khyer la ni rdo rje
85a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu me ri 'bar ba'i 'od gtang bar bya'o/ /kha dog ni tsan dan nam btsag yug sman gyis bskul bar bya'o/ /dbus su ni gtso bo'i phyag mtshan pad+ma la bzhugs mtshan ma gong ma ltar 'bud du brkos la bzhag go /phyi ma ni zhi ba'i
85a4(rgyud 'grel): thab kyi skabs dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /dbang gi thab kyi rim pa'o// //drag po'i thab kyi rim pa ni/ thab khung dbyibs gru gsum pa 'am/ dgra bsad pa lta bu la rgyar ni sor nyi shu'o/ /zabs su ni bcu'o/ /kha khyer ni sor gsum pa zheng
85a5(rgyud 'grel): du yang de nyid do/ /phyi rol tu gtang ba yang sor gsum mo/ /phyag rgya ni kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu ni ral gri la sogs pa drag po'i mtshan ma sna tshogs pa'o/ /dbus su yang gtso bo'i mtshan ma ral gris mtshan pa 'jim pa la 'bur du
85a6(rgyud 'grel): brkos pa gong du bstan pa dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /drag po'i thab dang mtshan ma'i rim pa'o// //de'i 'og tu dus ji tsam na bya ba'i zhi ba la snga dro'o/ /rgyas pa la nyi ma phyed na'o/ /dbang la nyi ma bsnyur na'o/ /drag po la ni nam phyed na
85a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ zhi ba la nam langs na'o/ /rgyas pa la ni tho rangs bya'o/ /dbang la ni rgongs ka ste srod la bya'o/ /drag po la nam phyed na bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni dbyar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni ston gyi dus su bya'o/ /dbang ni dpyid kyi dus su bya'o/ /drag po ni dgun gyi dus su ste dus
85b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa'o/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor pa sngags pa'i g.yon du ni dri chab kyi chu me tog nang du blugs pa'i dung phor ram dngul phor ro/ /yon chad ni gser la sogs pas bkang ba'i chu ngag gzhag go /rnal 'byor pa'i g.yas su ni zengs gzhi
85b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i nang dris bkad la ku sha yang der bcug la/ /bshad gtor gyi snod bzhag go /las kyi bum pa yang g.yon du bzhag go /mchod pa'i rim pa'o// //rdzas kyi rim pa yang zhi ba la til lo/ /rgyas pa la zho'o/ /dpa' la ni utpa la'o/ /drag po
85b3(rgyud 'grel): la tsher ma can nam mkha' rtse gsum pa ste/ 'di ni khyad par gyi rdzas so/ /de yang thun mong gi rdzas ni mar gyi snying po dang dur ba dang cho ga pa med pa'i 'bras dang zho zan ku sha dang 'bras thug dang mngar gsum dang/ dkar gsum dang 'bras so ba dang/ nas dang sran mam sha dang/  
85b4(rgyud 'grel): gro dang u dum ba ra dang/ a shot+tha dang pa la sha dang/ n+ya gro d+ha dang a mra dang/ de yang thams cad du mi lcogs na/ mar dang til ni zhi ba'i dus su bya'o/ mar dang zho ni rgyas pa'i dus bya'o/ /mar dang utpal ni rang gi dus bya'o/ /mar dang mi ? kyi phye ma 'am tsher ma can gyi shing ni drag po'i dus
85b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de yang thams cad du ni til zhes gsungs so/ /rdzas kyi rim pa'o// //bzhag pa'i rim pa sngags pa'i mdun ni mar ro/ /til dang zho dang utpa la dang/ mi rus kyi phye ma ni g.yas su gzhag go /dur ba la sogs pa thun mong gi rdzas thams cad
85b6(rgyud 'grel): ni g.yon du'o/ /'bras so ba dang nas dang sran ma sha dang/ gro dang u dum ba ra dang/ a shot+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha dang/ a mra rnams g.yas su'o/ /dgang gzar dang blugs bzar ni mdun du'o/ /rdzas bzhag pa'i rim pa'o// //rnal 'byor pa'i 'dug stangs zhi
85b7(rgyud 'grel): ba la ni mnyam pa'i skyil krung du stan ras bal gyi steng du'o/ /rgyas pa la ni g.yas brkyang gis te sems dpa' i 'dug stangs so/ /dbang la ni pad+ma'i 'dug stangs te rkang pa'i mthil sprad la 'dug go /drag po la ni g.yas brkyang dang/ g.yon brkyang gis stan med par mig
86a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog ste gnas par bya'o/ /'dug stangs kyi rim pa'o// //gzar bu'i rim pa ni/ zhi ba la ni dngul lam rgya shug gis shing la srid du khru gang? sboms su yu ba la mthe bo'i tshad do/ /sor bzhi ni zheng ngo/ /sor gnyis dbang su'o
86a2(rgyud 'grel): khu ba 'dzag pa'i bu ga sor gcig yod pa rtsom la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa/ dkyil du ni las dang mthun pa'i thab kyi skabs su smos pa'i phyag rgya brko ba 'am/ /'bur du byas la kha la yaM raM bkod de/ yu ba la rdo dang rin po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzar gyi chod
86a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rim pa'o// //blugs gzar yang yu ba ni gong dang mthun la dbyibs ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba la sor gcig /gting du brko ba byas pa sor gnyis zheng du btsal ba'i blugs gzar te khyim ni dgang gzar dang mthun no/ /rgyas pa la ni gser ram a sho ka'i shing la byas te/
86a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma ni gong ma dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /dbang ni zangs ma dang tsandan la bya'o/ /drag po ni lcags sam tsher ma can gyi shing la drag po'i las la shis pa rnams la bya'o/ /tshad dang dbyibs ni so so'i bye brag dang mthun pa la zhi ba la yang shes par bya zhing/ de la ltos
