158b2(rgyud 'grel): du dar tshon sna tshogs pa bkram pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la aM yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la/ me tog la sogs pas mchod pas mchod la sgra sna tshogs pas bsgrags so/ /bkra shis kyi glu len cing phyi nang gi gang sna tshogs pa yang
158b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bum pa la sogs pa thams cad gcig tu sdoms? te byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs shing/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis rang bkang ba/ /rnam par dag pa'i bum pa 'dis/ /bu khyod la ni dbang
158b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod do/ /slob ma rnams kyi spyi bor gzhag pas me long lta bu'i ye shes la mi bskyod pa'i ngo bor gyur to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bstan te/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po thams
158b5(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag /rdo rje sems? tshul bdag po'i bdag ces bya ba 'di ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas chos bstan te/ srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag
158b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa'i mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrags par bya ste/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i
158b7(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha ni sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus
159a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /sems can don ni bstan par byad/ /yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags
159a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gi lus kun bstan pas na/ /des na phyag rgya yin par grags zhes bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar/ /khyed kyis kyang ni ma byed cig ces bya'o/
159a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /theg pa chen po rtogs pa yi/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ ces bya'o/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab
159a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bskor zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor zhes brjod do/ /de nas dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs su bcas pa byin gyis brlabs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan/ /sangs rgyas
159a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang/ /dar dpyangs dag gis dbang bskur ro/ /oM ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes brjod pas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las/ rdo rje rin po cher gyur to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bstan te/ nyi ma 'di ni mchog yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs
159a6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad mthong/ /nam mkha' i snying po bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o zhes brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ /bsam pa thams cad rab grub pas/ /don 'di bsam 'grub bla na med/ /de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir/ /
159a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod dang thar pa'i bde chen po zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrags te/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang/ sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams grogs kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ /'dod
159b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bde ba thams cad dang/ /mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing/ /bdag nyid kyang ni pha rol gyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis/ /de nas rig chen khyed la gsol ba ni/ /nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol/ /rang gi rigs kyi bskyed par mdzod ces brjod/
159b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ci ste sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal par gyur cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i
159b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs la/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang/ /di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab grub phyir/ /bu khyod la ni bskur bar bya/ /badzra a d+hi pa ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod
159b4(rgyud 'grel): pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las rdo rje chos kyi sems dpar gyur to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /'dul ba thabs kyis mdzad pa ni/ /dag pa'i rol mo rab tu 'jug
159b5(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas ma gos ltar/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa 'dis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan te/ cho ga 'di dag gang gang gis/ /
159b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams ni 'dul 'gyur pa/ /pad+ma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag /de dag der ni sbyor bar bya zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags 'bra ba'i bde ba med/ rgyal ba rnams la de phul la/ /sems can don du sbyin med mchog /bsten na bsod nams
159b7(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dom pa 'di/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan
160a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur pa'i/ /'khor lo rab bskor? zhes brjod la/ /rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /pad+ma rigs kyi bdag po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas dril bu
160a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te/ /'di ni shes rab nyid kyi dngos/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba'i/ /di ring khyod la 'dir dbang bskur/ /oM pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA d+harmA a zhes/ brjod bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las sna tshogs rdo rje can du gyur par bsams la
160a3(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid bstan te/ rtag tu 'dod chags las byung 'gro /rdo rje me'i phung po'i gzugs/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni kun tu 'bar zhes brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de
160a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /'di kun myur du 'dzin par 'gyur zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan te/ thams cad nam mkha' sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya rgyas
160a5(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ /khams gsum yod? ni za bar bya/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni/ /sems can thams cad bsad na yang/ /de ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /mgon
160a6(rgyud 'grel): po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing/ /sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs
160a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /las kyi rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag pa de rnams kyi spyi bor bzhag la/ /khyod ni
160b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dngos yin te/ /rab tu gsang ba gsang ba'i ming/ /rdo rje che ge mo zhes pa/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor gyur te/ de la de kho na
160b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid bstan te/ de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das 'di ston par mdzod/ /sna tshogs 'dul bar brtson pa yi/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can/ /srid pa shin tu gnas
160b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu/ /go cha la sogs nges par gon/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs/ /dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs/ /srid pa shin tu legs par bsgrub/ /sna tshogs mkhyen dpal byed mchog ces brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ /thams cad
160b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten bzhin du/
160b5(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum yang mchod par bgyi/ /rang nyid dang ni bsten par bya'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ ji ltar ji ltar sems can rnams/ /'dul 'gyur de lta de lta bur/ /chags la sogs pa yun rings su/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams
160b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhes brjod do/ /de nas mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//
160b7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes brjod/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod de tha ma de rnams ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje 
161a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse lnga pa byin gyis brlabs te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis bya ba ni rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha stwaM
161a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra ya mi/ badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs zhes brjod la dril sbyin no/ /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis
161a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du gzhag la/ dung lag pa g.yas par sbyin te/ 'di skad brjod do/ /ding nas brtsams te dbang bskur ba tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /chos kyi dud bus shig /'jig rten kun la zab mo chos kyi sgra sgrogs shig /de nas gzengs bstod//
161a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos po kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs par khyod gyur to/ /de nas lung bstan te/ de yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs
161a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin gyis/ /som nyid yi gnyis ma za zhig /de nas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /mthong ba 'am ni zhugs pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /khyod ni ding nyid gnas yin te/ /bde  
161a6(rgyud 'grel): chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /khyod ni mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis mchod pas mchod /bkra shis brjod do/ /slob ma'i cho gas rnams dang sgra'i
161a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa mang pos sna drangs la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i spyi bo nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor la phul te/ 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang
161b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la
161b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang/ /sems can kun la mi phan pa/ /nyam pa chen por gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas slob ma re re'i lag pa g.yon pas g.yas pa'i mthe chung nas bzung nas zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o
161b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gzod par gsol ba bya ste/ ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa'i mtshan tsho bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la/ rdul tshon phyags te chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas de yang dri sna
161b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis chus legs par byug par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma dam pa des/ /ci bzhed yon rnams phul nas su/ /gsang dbang nod phyir 'di skad zhu/ /bla ma dam pa bde gshegs gtso/ /khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid kyis bdag phyag
161b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /gsang gsum dam pa'i dbang mchog 'di/ /di ring bdag la gnang bar stsol zhes brjod do/ /de nas bla ma dam pa des/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtsam bya ste/ /shin tu bden pa'i gnas rnams su/ /maN+Dal dri zhim bdud rtsis byugs/ /me tog dkram ste stan
161b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ?? rjes slob mas shes rab ma/ /mchog dang rab dang 'bring dang mdza' / /bla ma la phul 'di skad gsol/ /khyod ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis bde ba mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /yang dag don mchog rnam
161b7(rgyud 'grel): dag par ji ltar ji bzhin bdud rtsi yis/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yis/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog /ma rig nges par rab rib rnams/ /gang zhig byang chub bla med pa/ /di ring bdag
162a1(rgyud 'grel): gis thob bar mdzod ces brjod do/ /de nas bla mas shes rab ma/ /mdangs ldan ma ni rab bskyed la/ /chog thams cad rdzogs par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab byin rlobs la/ /thugs las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas bsdu/ /dgug  
162a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bcing dang bstim par bya/ /chags pa bskyed phyir sngags 'di brjod/ /oM many+dzu sh+rI sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma konyahaM zhes brjod de/ /bsrub pa dang/ bsrub pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pas bde bar gshegs pa 'od du zhu ste/ byang chub kyis ?
162a3(rgyud 'grel): phab pas nor bu'i nang du bde ? ba thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo bkag ste/ slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad brjod de/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'di/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal rnam bcom ste/ /gsang ba'i gnas dang dam par bcas/ /di ring khyod
162a4(rgyud 'grel): la dbab par bya'o/ /zhes brjod de slob ma ???/ /slob ma des kyang tshul rnam pa bzhis bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /des ni dag gnyis pa dang rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pas na gsung gi dbang zhes bya'o/ ?? bstan par bya ste/ bla mas chos gos gyon pa
162a5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi mdza' ma chag par bcug ste/ g.yas pa ni 'degs pa'i phyag rgya bcos te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gsal bar byas la/ sngon 'jam pa'i rdo rje lung bstan pa bzhin du mgrin gcig tu lung ston par bsams la
162a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos grub mchog tu sgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams la bton/ /many+dzu sh+rI nA ma sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod do/ /dus gsum gyi
162a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis lung bstan par mdzad do/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa dang/ bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa ste/ 'di nyid
162b1(rgyud 'grel): las thob par gyur cig /the tshom dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed cig /gzhan bla ma dam pas dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod do/ /de ni slob ma gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba
162b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dbang rnams rdzogs pas rim par sbyin/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang zhes gsungs pa la de skad ces bshad de/ /de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir/ des pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya zhes gsungs pa'i don
162b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di yin te/ de ltar gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i slob ma des yang bla ma la 'di skad du ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /ji ltar mkhyen cing thugs chud pa/ /de ltar rjes su bdag dad na/ /di ring bdag la dbang bskur gsol zhes brjod do/
162b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bla ma des shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba brtsams te/ de yang dang la shes rab kyi dbang ni bu mo rigs ldan mtshan rtags can/ /bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad nyi shu bla ma la ? sam gtan gyi don drug dang ldan par bya ste
162b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma des shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang/ /shes rab 'di la brten par grub/ /rigs kyi bu mchog khyod kyis kyang/ /shes rab spang du mi rung ste/ /ye shes skye ba'i thabs yin pas/ /
162b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi 'dod chags ma spang zhig ces brjod do/ /de nas bla mas dri ba 'di yang gsung ngo/ /khu tshur shog cig rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chung nus sam/ /rak+ta ga pur za nus sam/ /gud med dad pas brten nus sam/ /pad+mar 'o byed mi rtog gam/ /snod ldan
162b7(rgyud 'grel): ? shig ngang tshul can/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /shes rab dad pas bdag bsten to/ /dri chen dri chu la sogs bdud rtsi lnga/ /rtag tu dad pas bsten par bgyid/ /pad+mar bdag ni 'o bgyid do/ /de nas bla ma dam pa des/ /shes rab ma gtsang
163a1(rgyud 'grel): zur phyud la/ /lus dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la/ me tog gi phreng bas mgo bcings la/ 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /ston pa'i rang bzhin snying rje'i bdag /khyod kyis sems can don rnams kyis/ /mkha' klong pad+ma bstan par gyis/ /
163a2(rgyud 'grel): bu 'di bde ba bskyed bar gyis/ /zhes bskul lo/ /de nas shes rab dam pa des lag pa gnyis dril bu bzung nas pad+ma kha phye ste 'di skad brjod do/ /rmad 'byung nga yis pad+ma la/ /bde ba thams cad 'di la rnyed/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun/ /rtag tu
163a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang mi 'bral lo/ /pad+ma 'di ni chos dbyings yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung/ /sems can thams cad 'di ru grol/ /nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /pad+ma zhes su rab tu gsungs/ /pad+ma'i nang gi nam mkha' la/ /'byung ba lnga po rang bzhin gnas/ /lta  
163a4(rgyud 'grel): ba la ni ge sar te/ /pad+ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ze 'bru'i dbus nas 'byung ba yin/ /de nyid bdud rtsi dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bla mas slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa dang/ shes rab ma'i g.yon pa'i 'og tu gzhag
163a5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'di skad brjod do/ /shes rab dam pa 'di yin te/ /khyed kyi ye shes skyed bar byed/ /'di dang khyed nyid ma bral bar/ /dang bas rtag tu rol mo gyis/ /ces brjod la shes rab ma'i lus la dkyil 'khor bkod la slab ma la sbyin no/ /slob ma yol pa
163a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du shes rab ma dang 'dug nas ye shes kyi dbang nod par bya'o/ /de nas shes rab ma dang slob mas blo g.yas pa phab la nyal lo/ /dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs bya'o/ /gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdab/ /g.yon pa glang po sna rtse yis/ /pad+ma bye mgo 'dra ba la/ /tshod
163a7(rgyud 'grel): zin bya ste brud par bya/ /lce yis kyang ni rol mo bya'o/ /des dang rgyas par 'gyur te/ gzod nyi ma dang zla ba mnyam par bya ste/ dal nas dal nas bskyod pa las/ /'byung ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis bde ba chen po'i dbus nas byang chub sems gnas pa las ye shes kyi mes
163b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhu nas 'khor lo bzhi nas rim pa 'bab ste/ bo la'i rtsa bar phyin pa ni dga' ba'o/ /dbus su phyin pa ni mchog dga' o/ /nor bu'i rtse mor sleb pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /de ji tsam gnas kyi bar du bsgoms pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes
163b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ste/ dper na rus sbal lta bu'o/ /gal te bsdams pas mthem na 'jig rten pa'i gnas su gshegs te bral ba'i dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /don dang bral ba ni bral ba'o/ /gong ma mtshon pas dga' ba'o/ /byang sems de'i rang bzhin ni/ 'jam pa'i
163b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi rang bzhin pas/ /dung dang nya phyis dag gis min/ /lag pas kyang ni mi blang ngo/ /bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya'o/ /de zos ye shes dbang mchog thob/ /de yi don la rgyun goms pas/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /skad cig gcig
163b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnyis med pa'o/ /brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral/ /nam mkha' i lam la rab gnas pa'i/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /mthar phyin gdams ngag ces kyang bya/ /de nas dam par gyur ba de la ni/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhir bsgrags par bya'o/ /de nas
163b5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gdon pa'i don ni 'jam dpal gyi sku gzugs spyi thog tu bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dbang bskur/ rgyal mchog sras
163b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyod kyi dbang skur mchog la bkra shis gsungs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing/ /srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas/ /bde byed rab mchog
163b7(rgyud 'grel): legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ shin tu zhi ba'i bkra shis mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtag mdzad bcom ldan dbang bskur la/ /dpag med lha yi mchog gis
164a1(rgyud 'grel): legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog rgyal por dbang bskur bas//
164a2(rgyud 'grel): lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo yis/ /rdzogs pas rin chen bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam dag
164a3(rgyud 'grel): legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /mkha' snying nor chen 'byor pas nyams dga' zhing/ /don rnams kun grub med sbyin dbang bskur chen po la/ /dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs
164a4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyis dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'khor lo gyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs pas/ /bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa/ /des na kun gson 'byor pa'i dbang bskur chen po la//
164a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal grags pas 'jig rten rnam par legs gyur cig ces brjod do/ /de nas spyod lam bya ba dang/ bla ma bzengs bstod pa dang/ bkra shis kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang/ bla ma la yon dbul ba rnams ni dkyus nyid gsal
164a6(rgyud 'grel): lo/ bla ma dam pa surya sid+d+hi shAn+ting+ga rgya ni/ dam pa chos kyi mdzad du gyur pa la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi spyan snga ru/ /don dam zab mo dbang bskur zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yi/ /blo gros bzang po dran pa'i ye shes kyis/ /skye bo blo ngan mun
164a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /drug stong pa sogs rgyud kyi don bsdus nas/ /nor bu gling ba'i sgrub thabs don dang sbyar te bris ba yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams rgyus pas thob bsdus pas/ /gang des 'gro kun sdig las rgyal 'gyur zhing/ /'jam dpal chos
164b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku nyid thob par sho/ //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrubs thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i 'grel pa ye shes gsal zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad cing/ de nyid
164b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //thig gdab pa'i rim pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i thig skud kyis/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi la/ tshangs thig zur thig logs
164b3(rgyud 'grel): thig rnams/ /gzhan dang mthun par gdab byas nas/ /phyi dang nang du dbye bar bya/ /phyi la drug drug bcu gnyis te/ /nang du brgyad brgyad bcu drug gdab/ /cha chen nyi shu brgyad du 'gyur/ /so so'i cha ni dbye bar bya/ /nang gi brgyad po gnyis pa yang/ /re re'ang bzhi
164b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bgo bya zhing/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig la ni/ /dang po khyams su gzhag par bya/ /gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa dang/ /lnga pa rnams ni bzhi bzhir bgo /drug pa la ni gnyis su bya/ /drug po gzhan yang de bzhi bgo /'di la phreng ba de dang re'u mig ni/ /??
164b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis las/ /gsum pa de bzhin lnga pa dang/ /bcu bdun pa dang nyi shu pa/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/ /cha lngar nang du bgo byas nas/ /phyi yi gsum pa lnga pa rnams/ /de bzhin du ni bgo bar bya/ /gnyis pa lnga la
164b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa rnams/ /cha chud lnga lngar gdab par bya/ /phyi sgo sum chas che bar dbyi/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ru/ /ya phubs bcas pa dbus su bgyi/ /rta babs pha yul sa dag las ni/ /cha gcig de re ba'i tsha chen tshad/ /sgo yi mtshams dang twa ra Na/ /shin
164b7(rgyud 'grel): tu gcig nyid mi bya'o/ /de stengs 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/ /tshangs nas cha chung brgyad la ni/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig du gdab/ /lte ba cha gsum mu khyud gcig /de nas rtsibs brgyad cha phran bzhi/ /man ngag thig la tshod kyis bskor/ /de rgyab cha
165a1(rgyud 'grel): chung gcig la ni/ /nang gi mu khyud legs par bya/ /cha chung gcig la lte ba bya/ /de brten cha chung lnga la ni/ /rtsibs ni bcu drug 'khor lo bya/ /de rgyab cha chung mu khyud 'gyur/ /de rgyab nang sgo cha chen bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol

166a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mgon/ /de yi sgrub la dga' ba la/ /gtso bo dad pas bshad par bya/ /dbang thob dam tshig gnas pa dang/ /gtong la dga' zhing 'dzin pa med/ /srog phyir rnal 'byor dang du byed/ /gsod por smra zhing rtse dang

168a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa thob/ /'bras bu chos su thob pa'o/ /de nas skyo ba byung ba na/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM muM(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /thams cad bsdus nas lha nyid gnas/ /ngag tu bzlas ba nus tshad bzlas/ /zhi la gnas shing snying rje bskyed/ /sems can gzhan?
168b1(rgyud 'grel): la dge ba sems bskyed/ /gtor ma rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /stan ni gcig pu 'dug nas su/ /lam lnga nyams su myong bar bya/ /tshogs lam bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /sbyor lam bzlas pa byed pa dang/ /mthong lam mtshan nyid brjod pa ste/ /bsgom lam 'gro
168b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du dag la gnas/ /mthar phyin stong nyid sems pa'o/ /dge bas brtsams pa'i sgrub thabs la/ /'gal 'khrul mchis na mkhas bzod mdzod/ /brtsams pa'i dge rtsa yod srid na/ /sems can mos dang phrad par shog /dge bsnyen ma snyan
168b3(rgyud 'grel): grags dge mas mdzad pa/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi/ sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// // */ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ Arya
168b4(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI ratna no mi ka /bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga /rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa dad ldan 'dzin bral ba/ /'jam pa yang dag kun mkhyen pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngang gnas pa/ /? pa'i seng+ge'i phyag 'tshal lo/ /
168b5(rgyud 'grel): de la gus pas 'dud pa yi/ /dus ni rtag tu bsgom pa dang/ /mos pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi don du bshad par bya/ /stong pa la dga' dbang thob pa/ /dam tshig ldan zhing bsgom pa dga' / /rnal 'byor srog stong dad pa che/ /sems can don byed byas
168b6(rgyud 'grel): la drin/ /rtag tu mtshan brjod bzlas la brtson/ /de ltar yon tan bcu ldan pas/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i sten la gnas par bya/ /tha mal yi dam dran pa la/ /snying gar yi ge muM ser dgod/ /kha dog lnga yi 'od 'phros nas/ /phyogs
168b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i rgyal sras bla ma ni/ /spyan drangs mdun du bsams pa la/ phyag 'tshal mchod pa sdig pa sbyang/ /yi rang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la/ /dge bsngo 'dud la sogs pas bstod/ /de nas stong nyid bsam pa ni/ /oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmma NAM A dya nutpan
169a1(rgyud 'grel): na twAt swAhA/ /sngags don dngos po med pa la/ /yun rings dang la blo gnas pas/ /de nyid la ni gnas par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' stong pa la/ /dngos po thams cad paM du gnas/ /de steng yi ge saM dkar las/ /byang chub sems
169a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' seng+ges gsal/ /de steng a las zla bar gsal/ /gdan steng yi ge muM ser las/ /utpal sngon po mdzes par bsgom/ /de las 'phro 'du bya ba ste/ /smra ba'i seng+ge bsgom par bya/ /ser po gser gtso 'dra ba la/ /g.yas na utpal po ti sa mtshan/ /
169a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa gzhan la sbyin pa stong/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dzum dang ldan/ /thugs rje che bas nyon mongs spong/ /rin chen rnams kyis lus la brgyan/ /dbu la thor tshugs rnams kyis mdzes/ /dbu skra gtsug phud 'khyil pa dang/ /stod g.yogs ser
169a4(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyis mdzes/ /smad g.yogs dang dbyangs sbyangs pa'o/ /rmugs pa'i rnam pa ma yin pas/ /gsal ba rtag tu bsgom pa'o/ /de nas spyan drangs mchod pa'o/ /oM bA gI shwa ra dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis mchod yon dbul/ /oM badzra puShpe A:
169a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra dI pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai bi dya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ba lin ta kha kha/ khA hi khA hi A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mdza' gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud//  
169a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas
169a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud
169b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas bstod do/ /gnyis med bdag la bsdu ba'o/ /snying khar pad+ma'i zla ba las/ /steng ni ye shes
169b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ste/ /mtshon gang dang 'dra gsal bar bsgom/ /yi ge a mchog zla ba la/ /thugs kar bsam par bya ba'o/ /ye shes sngags phreng bskor bar bya/ /oM sarba d+harmma a b+ha ba/ swa b+hA ba/ pi shud+d+ha/ badzra tsak+Shu/ a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti/ pra ri shud+d+ha
169b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmma ya du ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI/ pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pA bA ya ti a A sarba ta thA ga ta/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ra mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmma/ ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na
169b4(rgyud 'grel): garb+ha A:/ /gsal bar phreng ba sngags la gtad/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /de nas mtshan rnams brjod pa la/ /ye shes sems dpa' dag la ni/ /dmigs pa brtan pa gtad nas su/ /yon tan dag tu brjod pa'o/ /de yang gal te ma brtan na/
169b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng bar gyur na nus pa chung/ /de la brtan par gyur pa na/ /ye shes gnyis med skye yang srid/ /yon tan dag tu brjod pa yang/ /theg pa mdza' chos ston mdzad pas/ /thams cad ngo bo yin shes las/ /thams cad de dang ldan par ston//
169b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar zlas shing bstod gyur na/ /chos sku mdza' dag thob par 'gyur/ /bsam pa ci 'dod de las 'byung/ /lha srin sde brgyad dga' 'gyur nas/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba'o/ /de nas 'bad pas mtshan brjod gdon/ /skyo bar mi 'gyur gus
169b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /skyo ba dag ni byung ba na/ /rnal 'byor gnyis su med par bya/ /a las stong pa tsam pa las/ /gsal bar rtog med bsgom par bya/ /de nas a ni zhu ba las/ /thig le dkar po je?  chung las/ /ye shes stong pa nyid gsal ba/ /bying rgod med
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gsal ba'o/ /yang dang yang du gtad la bsgom/ /snang ba rang bzhin med mthong 'gyur/ /yang na shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /yan lag med pa'i
170a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsis las 'das/ /zhes gsungs pa las/ bzhi ni gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo yi/ /lte ba ye shes 'khor lo ste/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs can 'khor lo la/ /sngags kyis rnam par bkod pa ni/ /a A a A rim par dgod/ /de nas yang dang yang
170a3(rgyud 'grel): du dgod/ /dbus su a mchog bsam par bya/ /de nas snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis g.yas nas bskor nas bkod par bya/ /lte ba la ni a mchog gnas/ /mgrin par
170a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs mtshan gnas pa la/ /lte ba a bsgom rtsibs rnams la/ /a rba tsa na/ bA gI shwa ra/ pra dz+nyA na mar rim pas dgod par bya'o/ /de nas spyi bo'i 'khor lo la/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs la dgod par bya ba
170a5(rgyud 'grel): ri/ sku'i phreng sngags te las sngags so/ /dbus su a dkar chen po gnas/ /'og nas haM dkar bzlog nas bsam/ /dbus na yi ge yod pa ste/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i rtse mo de la bya/ /'khor lo nang stong 'od ltar 'dug /stong pa'i nang yi ge rdul
170a6(rgyud 'grel): thig gang yang bsam/ /dbus kyi thig le'i rang bzhin yin/ /dga' ba du ma yod pas blta/ /'khor lo bzhi la shes rab ste/ /thig le a ba d+hU tI thabs/ /nor bu'i rtse nas hUM la thug /dkar po 'od du 'dug pa'o/ /de nas byang chub rgyu ba'o/ /nor gnas 
170a7(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da li gnas pas/ /de la gtad de bsam pa'o/ /'khor lo de ltar gnas pa ni/ /yan lag bya ba de yin no/ /med pa rtsis las 'das pa ste/ /tshad med bsam gtan byed pa'o/ /de yang tsaN+Da li la gtad pas so/ /me 'bar drong las brten nas byung/
170b1(rgyud 'grel): a ba d+hU tI lam zhugs nas/ /lte bar me 'bar thams cad bsregs/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhi ga yi/ /spyi bo'i bde ba ngang gis zhu/ /'o ma ltar dkar thams cad gang/ /nor bu phebs nas lte gnas 'dren/ /rlung dang bstun nas yang yang 'dren//
170b2(rgyud 'grel): de stengs lus gso bde ba 'byung/ /snang ba dga' ba skye ba'o/ /bcu drug log po lta bu 'byung/ /tha mal zag med ye shes skye/ /skyo 'am bsam gtan gtod 'dod na/ /spyi bor bsdu bar 'dod pa yi/ /dga' bral song yang nyes mi 'gyur/ /tha mal thabs
170b3(rgyud 'grel): las ma byung bas/ /nyes pa chen po 'ong mi 'gyur/ /de yang rlung gi gtan thob pa/ /bya bar rung gi gzhan nas min/ /tha mal zag med thob pa la/ /med pa'i tshig 'das de yin no/ /tha mal gshegs su gsol ba dang/ /lha yi nga rgyal gnas par bya/ /spyod
170b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dge ba gang mos byas/ /dad yod khro med sbyin par bya/ /lus ngag yid kyis bya ba kun/ /bde ba che la dang gnas bya/ /ma brjed pa yi bsam gtan bsten/ /de ltar byas na bla med 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i sku 'chang thob par 'gyur/ /tsho 'di dag la  
170b5(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsags pa'i cho ga yis/ /'gal ba ma mchis lha la bshags/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yid 'ong kun/ /thams cad 'jam dpal thob par shog/ //'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub

170b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don thams cad sgrub pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i don gyi dgongs pa spas pa phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag las brgyud
171a1(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod par bya ste/ de nas yang dag bshad bgyi ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhi ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan
171a2(rgyud 'grel): grwa yis phyogs ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya/ /ka ba brgyad
171a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzes bgyis par/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang legs su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /dag pa thams cad rab tu gnas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus
171a4(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil 'khor 'dra/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra mchog chen po mthon ka'i rtse/ /sangs rgyas rin chen cod
171a5(rgyud 'grel): pan ldan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag bsnams/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag spud/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /dpe byad brgyad cus yang dag brgyan/ /chos kyi
171a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ches/ /phyag gnyis dag ni rnam par brgyan/ /ral gri mda' dang rdo rje yis/ /g.yas pa'i phyag mchog rnam par mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dang gzhu/ /rdo rje dril mchog g.yon pa na/ /dri med dpe bral bsam mi khyab
171a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes dri ma med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /dkyil 'khor mdun gyi gtso gyur pa/ /rdzogs sangs rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni nges par dgod/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma thams cad la/ /seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng
171b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing/ /thams cad rin chen bdun bskor bar/ /'khor lo can ni brgyad po bri/ /gtsug tor chen po yi ge bdag /shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bri/ /gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dag /nub kyi 'dab mar dgod par bya/ /gzi brjid phung
171b2(rgyud 'grel): po lho phyogs su/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal byang phyogs su/ /rnam par 'thor ba dbang ldan phyogs/ /me yi phyogs su gyen 'byung dgod/ /gyen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs/ /rgyal ba rlung gi phyogs su bri/ /sngags rnams kun la'ang sgrub pa pos/ /'khor
171b3(rgyud 'grel): lo can ni de dag bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis seng nas su/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po dag tu ni/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang pa/ /dbang ldan
171b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /de nyid kyi ni mtshams kyi char/ /spyan dang de bzhin mA ma kI/ gos dkar de bzhin sgrol ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /sgo rnams su yang sgo srungs ni/ /rang gi mtshan mas phyag rgyan pa//

172a1(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /de'i yang phyi rol bri bar bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi gnas/ /zlum zhing kun tu bzang ba dang/ /sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par yang/ /der ni tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /chung ma la sogs tshogs kyis brgyan
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang rang gi mtshan mar ldan/ /kun tu rim bzhin legs par bri/ /phyi sgo'i shar gyi cha la ni/ /gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya che/ /thams cad bsrung la rab brtson pa/ /rnam pa kun tu legs par bzhag /g.yon brkyang bas ni legs bzhugs
