172a4(rgyud 'grel): byed spyan gyi ni/ /phyag rgya chen po byang phyogs su/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni thams cad dgod/ /de'i phyi rol khor yug dang/ /khor yug chen po de bzhin bri/ /blo ldan yang dag kun rdzogs par/ /sngags shes pas ni legs par bri//
172a5(rgyud 'grel): da ni sku mdog la sogs pa'i nges pa bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni zla ba nya ba'i mdangs can gyi sku la/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i cod pan gyi steng du/ sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po
172a6(rgyud 'grel): che'i rtse bran can du byas te/ lhag ma ni gsal bas go bar zed do/ /'khor los sgyur ba brgyad ni kun kyang gser gyi mdog can/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo bstod de bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon
172a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis gdan la gnyis pas rten par mdzad pa'o/ /zhe sdang chen po bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ni/ utpa la sngon po'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis glang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/
172b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa/ zhal g.yas pa gdangs shing drag po/ /zhal g.yon pa tshems kyi spros gnon pa/ zhal rgyab ma mchog tu gdug pa thams cad skrag par mdzad pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ mda' dang/ lcags
172b2(rgyud 'grel): kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang/ dril bu dang/ gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i dbu rgyan mda' ba/ zhal ser po dang/
172b3(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ldan pa phyag brgyad pa rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
172b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa ni sku mdog dmar po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs
172b5(rgyud 'grel): par zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/ mda' dang/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na pad+ma dang/ gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ dril
172b6(rgyud 'grel): bu bsnams pa'o/ /khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa ni sku mdog nag po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis nam mkha' lding gi khri la bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha
172b7(rgyud 'grel): dog nag po g.yas pa zhi ba/ kha dog dkar po rgyab sgeg pa/ kha dog dmar po/ g.yon pa zhi ba'i tshul can mdog dkar po/ /phyag g.yas pa rnams na ral gri dang rdo rje dang/ mda' dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na dril bu dang/
173a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang/ sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ rang gi gdan gyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems
173a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la sogs pa 'ang sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /zhes bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
173a3(rgyud 'grel): la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas kyis rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/ g.yon bsnyems pas dril bu bsnams pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
173a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' i gdan dang/ skyil mo krung dang/ dbu rgyan gyi nges pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa dang/ thun mong yin la khyad par rnams ni bri bar bya ste/ rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chags pa sku
173a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar po dang/ mda' dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje legs pa mnad kyi mdog can phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba bstsol ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi dbang
173a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i gnas su phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po/ phyag gnyis kyis rang gi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo
173a7(rgyud 'grel): bsangs/ phyag gnyis yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ni sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba/ so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa bsnams pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor
173b1(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon pa bsnyems pas pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma'i 'dab ma ba 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rnon po ni 'dir sku mdog gur gum lta bu phyag g.yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba/ phyag g.yon pas thugs su
173b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyu sku mdog ser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje smra ba ku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas na lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yon pa dur bsnams pa'o/
173b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams zhes spyi bor 'jog cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i don du gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje srung
173b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis kyis mche ba gnyis rang gi zhal du 'dzin cing gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar
173b5(rgyud 'grel): po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bsdams nas bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su spyan ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra'o/ /mA ma kI ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o/ /gos dkar mo ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra'o/ /sgrol ma ni don yod par grub pa dang 'dra'o/ /sems ma
173b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug ni kun tu bzang mo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang/ dga' la chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje rigs kyi'o/ /rin po che'i gtso bo dang/ rat na'i sgrol ma dang/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan dang/ bkod pa dang ldan pa dang/ bzhi ni
173b7(rgyud 'grel): rat na'i rigs kyi'o/ /rdo rjes rmo dang kun tu 'khor lo ma rlan 'dzin ma dang/ steng du zlos ma bzhi ? rigs kyi'o/ /dngos grub kyi rtse mo dang/ thams cad srung ma dang/ mdangs slar 'grog ma dang/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya rnams dang bzhi ni las kyi rigs kyi'o/
174a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog phyag mtshan sems dpa' bcu drug rang mthun no/ /'di yi zhugs kyi spyan ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor/ mA ma kI la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor/ gzhan gnyis po yang rigs
174a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun pas bskor ba'o/ /'dir rdo rje thig gi nang logs su ri mo zur bzhi pa byas pa'i brgyad cha ni sgo ste rta babs med pa'o/ /lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yas
174a3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /lho'i sgor rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje zhags pas bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsnams pa sa ga'i 'dug
174a4(rgyud 'grel): stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgog rdo rje 'bebs ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams pas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya ste/ nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gnyis pa
174a5(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur te/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gnyis pa der yang shar phyogs su sa bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste/ kun kyang sna tshogs pad+ma la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje
174a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa'o/ /de la mos pas spyod pa'i sa ni sku mdog pad+ma ltar dmar ba phyag g.yon na pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin
174a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /dri ma med pa'i sa ni nor bu tshen shel gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis thams cad dag par so sor rtog pa'i pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /'od byed pa'i sa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis sna tshogs
174b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /'od 'phro ba'i sa ni marga ta lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon na utpal bsnams pa'o/ /shin tu sbyang dka' ba'i sa ni sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon pa bang bar bkan nas bzhag pas nor bu ?  bsnams
174b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa ni gser gtso ma lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyi pad+ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /ring du song ba'i si na nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yon gyi sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams
174b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba'i sa ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yon pas bsnyems pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa mdog dmar po ste/ pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin pa'o/ /legs pa'i blo gros kyi sa ni sku mdog dmar skya phyag
174b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis utpa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyi sa ni gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon gyis chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od ni
174b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma glung gi mdog can phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
174b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa zhal gyi pad+ma sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pas spras ba'i gser gyi gdu bus lag dang bkang ba/ rin po che'i rgyan
174b7(rgyud 'grel): dang rtse bran mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas bas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa/ rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la rin po che'i
175a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pad+ma dmar po ltar sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon pas 'bru dang rin po che
175a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ba'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon pas a sh+ra ka'i me tog gi mgo lcogs 'dab ma dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag
175a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /brtson grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ? kyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas utpal bsnams pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o
175a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri yang ku ltar sku mdog
175a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po'i steng du rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa utpal sngon po'i lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis utpa la'i steng du ral bri bsnams pa'o/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdog can
175a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga
175a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs su dbang bcu pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan dang na bza' 
175b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa mnga' ba gzhan zhing dar la bab ba/ sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ zhal gyi pad+ma cung zad ? pa/ /spyan utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/ 'od mdza' yas pa'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa/ g.yon
175b2(rgyud 'grel): na bsnyems pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la tshe la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'dab ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i
175b3(rgyud 'grel): sku bsnams pa'o/ /sems la dbang ba zla ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis me tog ban du kaM ltar dmar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/ /yo byad la dbang ba sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o
175b4(rgyud 'grel): las la dbang ba marga ta lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /skye ba la dbang ba sku mdog sna tshogs pa/ phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa dzA ti'i ? bsnams pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul ?? sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon
175b5(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /mos pa la dbang ba pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yon na me tog bri yang ku'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /smon lam la dbang ba gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon na utpal sngon po bsnams
175b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ye shes la bang ba mthan ba chen po'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na utpal sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /chos la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du bum pa bzang po bsnams pa'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i tshon
175b7(rgyud 'grel): shel gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gser btsom lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas na pad+ma ser po'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ phyag
176a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /'di gnyis kyi gdan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i dbang rnams dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su ni gzungs bcu gnyis
176a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi rtse bran can/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dkur brten pas
176a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la nor ldan gyi gzugs mi gser gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor
176a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs ni ? mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yon na nor bu chu shel gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /'od zer can gyi gzungs mi sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na khab dang skud pa bsnams
176a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /ri khrod kyi lo ma can gyi gzungs ni sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na lo ma sbams pa/ bsnams pa'o/ /dug sel ma'i gzungs ni sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yon na dug gi me tog gi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /sgo mdza' yas pa'i gzungs ni sku
176a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog bri yang ku ltar ljang ser/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dmar po'i steng du mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /skul byed ma'i gzugs ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na phreng ba 'phyang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /shes rab
176a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba'i gzungs ji ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon na utpal sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam bar spyod pa'i gzungs ni nor bu marga ta lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon pa na rdo rje rtsa gsum pas
176b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i pad+ma dmar skya bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes mi za ma tog gi gzungs ni sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon na rin po che'i za ma tog bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mchod dang ldan pa'i gzungs ni gser btsom
176b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog can phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sgom du bsnams pa'o/ /gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor/ chos so sor yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ba/ rin po che'i cod pan can phyag na rdo
176b3(rgyud 'grel): rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor so sor yang dag par rig pa sku mdog mar ka ta lta bu phyag na rin po che'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems dpa' i skyil
176b4(rgyud 'grel): mo krung gser zhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na mdza' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa/ gdan dang rgyan la sogs ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor spobs pa
176b5(rgyud 'grel): so sor gang dag par rig pa sku mdog marga ta ltar ljang ba/ phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu bsnams pa ste lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar lho'i mtshams su lha ma sgeg mo gsar gyi mdog can rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba
176b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis ka rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul can 'chang ba'o/ /lho nub mtshams su phreng ba ma sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ bzhugs tshul la sogs ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o/ nub byang mtshams su glu ma sku
176b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar po pi wang ? pa la brtson pa ste/ lhag ma ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /byang shar mtshams su gang ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gis mchog gi rtsed mo dang gar mdzad ba ste/ lhag ma ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bsrungs rnams ni tshangs
177a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor bar ma ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srungs rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin no/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar phyogs su kun tu
177a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can phyag g.yas kyis mchog stsol ba/ phyag g.yon gyis utpa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis
177a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyis chos ston pa'i tshul gyis pad+ma bsnams pa ste/ rgyan dang bzhugs tshul la sogs pa ni kun tu bzang po dang 'dra'o/ /sa'i snying po gser btso ma'i
177a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog can phyag g.yas kyis sa gnon/ phyag g.yon pad+ma'i steng na dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa'o/ /nam mkha' i snying po sku mdog marka ta ltar ser phyag g.yas kyis rin po che'i thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
177a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa'o/ /phyag na rin po che sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yas pa
177a6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sbyin pa la brtson pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma'i steng du byang chub kyi zla ba bsnams pa'o/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na dung bsnams pa /phyag g.yon na ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po sku mdog utpal sngon po lta bu
177a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na sa bcu ston pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan phyag g.yas kyis dam pa sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o
177b1(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen po thob pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i 'od pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje'i 'khor lo bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gyis pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams
177b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams
177b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du buM pa bsnams pa'o/ /spobs pa rtsegs pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis se gol rdebs par brtson pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo
177b4(rgyud 'grel): gros gur gum gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na 'od 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na mdung 'thung bsnams pa'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas na
177b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dan bsnams pa bri bar bya ste/ de dag thams cad kyi bzhugs tshul dang rgyan dang/ na bza' dang/ dbu rgyan rnams ni kun tu bzang po dang 'dra bar shes par bya la/ spyan ras gzigs
177b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can te/ khyad par ni de yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gnas de nyid kyi byang shar mtshams su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po
177b7(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i sgeg pa ste/ dmar ba g.yas pa drag po/ /g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba/ rgyab dpa' ba' i zhal dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa ste/ de gnyis kyi thugs kar hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang/ lcags kyu
178a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang bar bzhugs pa'i zhabs g.yon pas dbang phyug chen po'i spyi bor gnon pa/ zhabs g.yas pas u ma'i
178a2(rgyud 'grel): nu ma rgyas pa mnan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog gi phreng ba brgyus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang/ na bza' sna tshogs mda' ba/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir nges par bzhag par bya'o/ /shar lho mtshams su khro bo rdo rje me ltar rab tu
178a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar bas kun tu 'khrug pa/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang/
178a4(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ 'khor lo bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na dril bu dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu dang/ kha TwAM ga btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs pa bsnams pa/ me ser skya 'bar ba'i sgra'i tshogs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ sprul chen po'i
178a5(rgyud 'grel): gdu bu dang dbu rgyan dang sku rags dang/ zhabs gdub dang/ mgur chu dang/ rna rgyan dang/ cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo'i dgod pa la mkhas pa las/ g.yon brkyang bas khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa gnon pa bri bar
178a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /lho nub mtshams su khro bo chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung sku mdog mthing shun ltar sngo ba/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po drag po zhal g.yas pa rab tu rmongs pa rnams rmongs par byed pa/ zhal g.yon pa sgeg pa dang ldan pa/ zhal rgyab ma
178a7(rgyud 'grel): za bar byed pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba bsnams ba/ phyag g.yon na dril bu dang/ ba dan dang bcas pa'i kha TwaM ga bsnams pa dang/ gar mdzad pa yang gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa rlon pa rlung gis gos 'dzin pa'i
178b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyi gzung nas bsnams pa/ yang gnyis na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas na mahA rak+tas yongs su bkang ba'i ka pA la'i thod tshal tse sha ka bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yon na snying gi pad+ma'i nang na mahA mAM sas bkad ba'i ka pA la bsnams
178b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ sangs rgyas lngas mtshan ba'i thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu can gyi cod pan mnga' ba/ 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin mnga' ba 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar
178b3(rgyud 'grel): po mnga' ba/ g.yon brgyad bas tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o/ /byang chub mtshams su rta mchog sku mdog ljang gu zhal bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum
178b4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhal g.yas drag po/ zhal g.yon tshangs pa'i gdong dang ldan pa/ spyi bo'i zhal ljang gu mchu dang spyi bo bcu nas gyen du 'degs pa/ phyag g.yas kyis ba dan gsum pa lta bus sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pas 'degs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa/ phyag
178b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na kha TwAM gas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa lta bus gyen du slong ba'i tshul du mdzad pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gnyis pa na mdung thung bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas kyi gnyis na ral gri dang mda'
178b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na dbyug pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa'i gcig gis dbang po dang/ dbang mo mnan pa/ gnyis pas dga' ba mo dang/ mgu ba mo mnan pa/ g.yon gyi dang pos brgya
178b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi? dang khyab 'jug mnan pa/ gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang/ 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o/ /de nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed char sprin gyi mdog can/ zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa/ zhal drug po sgeg
179a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dpa' ba dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ drag po dang/ rngam pa ste/ nyams rnam pa sna tshogs pas yongs su khyab cing rgyas pa phyag g.yas na lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar ?
179a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub bsgreng ba dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can sprul gyis brgyan pa stag gis pags pa mnabs pas
179a3(rgyud 'grel): ma he'i steng du rol ba'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs la bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor shes rab mdza' byed ge sar ser bo lta bu'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad ba/ zhal dang po sgeg pa zhal g.yas pa gdangs shing 'jigs su rung ba/ zhal g.yon
179a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhi ba zhal rgyab ma shin tu drag cing gtum pa phyag g.yas na gzhug par byed pa'i zhags pa bsnams ba/ de las gzhan pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs ka'i phyogs su lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub
179a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng ba la brtson pa de las gzhan par dril bu dang/ ? thub dang gzhu bsnams ba/ sprul gyis brgyan pa/ mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can/ rol pa'i stang stabs kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma mthar byed sku mdog
179a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po dang/ g.yas pa dang/ g.yon pa dang/ rgyab ma sta bzhi po grangs ji lta ba bzhin du sgeg pa dang drag po dang/ zhi ba dang/ rgod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags
179a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrog bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ klu'i rgyal pos brgyan cing/ stag gis pags pa bsnams pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
179b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub la brtan par chags shing 'ching ba dang/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor khro bo bgegs mthar byed sprin sngon po'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad ba zhal sgeg pa la sogs
179b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis rdo rje bcing bas dril bu bsnams ba/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams ba/ phyag g.yon rnams na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang/ gzhu dang dril bu
179b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa sku la sprul gyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi cod pan can g.yon brkyang bas chogs kyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su ri mo bris la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dgod par bya ste/ me'i phyogs su
179b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog ma sku mdog ser ba phyag gnyis me tog gis bkang ba'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su bdug pa ma sku mdog sngo ba/ phyag na spos khang bsnams pa'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su mar mo ma sku mdog dmar ba/ phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs
179b5(rgyud 'grel): su byug pa ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dung chos bsnams pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje gzugs ma sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas na me long bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje sgra nam mkha' ltar sngo sangs/ phyag na rdo rje pi bang
179b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa 'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje dri sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dri'i snod bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje ro sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na ro'i snod bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis byung la phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil
179b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ yongs su bskor bar che bas ba la sogs pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan mdog dkar po ral ba dang cod pan yod pa/ kha TwAM ga rtsa gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa/
180a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar nas mgor gzhag pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lha mo u ma dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bri'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad
180a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mos yang dang yang du 'dud par byed pa la mchog tu gzhol ba/ dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par bri'o/ /de la 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad ni phyogs dang mtshams rnams su bri bar bya ste/ shar du brgya byin mdog ser po rdo rje thogs
180a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ glang po che dkar po la zhon ba chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /shar lhor me lha mdog dmar po lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas gnyis na blugs gzar dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis phreng ba dang guN+De thogs pa/ ras skyes la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas
180a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni thams cad kyi thun mong yin pas so sor ma smras so/ /lhor gshin rje mdog nag po dbyug pa dang mdung thung thogs pa/ mahe la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho nub du srin po'i bdag po mdog sngon po lag na
180a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang phub thogs ba/ ming la zhon ba chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po g.yas dang g.yon gnyis na sprul gyi zhags pa thogs pa/ chu srin la zhon pa gdengs kha bdun pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub byang du rlung lha nam mkha' i mdog
180a6(rgyud 'grel): can lag pa gnyis na ba dan thogs pa ri dags la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas par bri'o/ /byang du lus ngan po gser gyi mdog can g.yas na lcags kyu thogs pa/ g.yon na dbyug pa thogs pa mi la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas par bri'o/ /'di dag gi chung ma rnams kyi
180a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog la sogs pa ni de rang rang gi khyo dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /dbang ldan dang nye bar tshangs pa mdog ser po gdong bzhi pa lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gnyis na pad+ma dang phreng ba thogs nas/ phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te/ 'jog pa de las gzhan pa gnyis
180b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbyug pa dang/ spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ ngang pa la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu khyab mjug mdog nag mo lag pa bzhi pa g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang mdung thogs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar
180b2(rgyud 'grel): te 'jog pa/ de nas gzhan pa gnyis kyis sha ra'i gzhu dang/ dbyug pa 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o/ /dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar pa lag pa gnyis thod pa dang/ rtse gsum thogs te thal mo
180b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba zla ba'i rtse bran thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas bas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /gzhon nu kAr ti ka mdog dmar po byis pa'i gzugs can gdong drug pa/ lag pa drug pa lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ yang
180b4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa/ yang gnyis na khyim bya dang/ dril bu thogs pa rma bya la zhon par bri'o/ /nag po chen po mdog nag po mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ thod pa thogs pa'o/ /dga' byed dbang phyug ni mdog nag po rdza rnga brdung ba la
180b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa rdza rnga la zhon pa'o/ /nyi ma ni mdog dmar po lag pa gnyis na pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /zla ba ni mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa ngang
180b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la zhon pa'o/ /mig dmar ni mdog dmar po la lag pa g.yas pa na chu gri thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na mi mgo za bar byed pa glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /gza' lhag ni mdog ser po lag na mda' gzhu thogs pa pad+ma la 'dug pa'o/ /phur bu
180b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po lag na phreng ba dang/ spyi blugs thogs pa pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /bab sangs mdog dkar po phrang ba dang/ guN+De thogs pa bum pa 'dug pa'o/ /spen pa mdog nag po dbyug pa thogs pa ru sbal la zhon pa'o/ /sgra gcan mdog dmar nag lag na
181a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla thogs pa'o/ /mjug rings mdog nag po ral gri dang sprul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /stobs bzang mdog nag po ral gri dang gshol thogs pa glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal bar byed pa mdog ljang gu me tog gi phreng
181a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ mda' dang gzhu dang khaM phor thogs pa/ ko ki la'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa mdog dkar po lag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor thogs pa ne tso'i khri la zhon pa'o/ /dbying kyi lha mdog dkar po lag
181a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang gzhu dang/ khi phor dang ral gri thogs pa sprin la zhon pa'o/ /mdza' yis dang nor rgyas dang/ 'dog po dang/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang/ rigs ldan te klu'i rgyal po brgyad ni gdings ka bdun bdun dang ldan
181a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas par bya'o/ /de la mdza' yas dang/ rigs ldan gnyis ni bram ze'i rigs te mdog dmar po me lha'i bu'o/ /nor rgyas dang dung skyong gnyis ni rgyal rigs te/ mdog ser po brgya byin gyi bu'o/ /'jig po dang pad+ma chen po gnyis ni
181a5(rgyud 'grel): dmangs rigs te mdog nag po rlung lha'i bu'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang/ pad+ma gnyis ni rje'u rigs te/ mdog dkar po chu lha'i bu'o/ /de dag kyang 'khor dang bcas par bri'o/ /thag bzangs rigs dang stobs ldan dang/ ra ba dga' dang rnam par snang byed la sogs
181a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni mdog nag po ral gri dang phub la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa lag na thogs pa go cha gon chas pa 'khor dang bcas par bri'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams ni gshog rgyangs ring ba kha dog sna tshogs pa
181a7(rgyud 'grel): bus mo'i lha ba'i bar du khab ltar dkar ba/ de'i steng du lte ba'i khung bu la thug gi bar du gser gyi mdog can de nas lkog ma'i bar du nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can/ de nas glad pa'i steng gi mthar thug par ma lus par an dzA na bcag pa lta bu'i mdog
181b1(rgyud 'grel): can/ nam mkha' lding du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni mdog dmar skya/ lag na pi bang thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa ni gsung?
181b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dri za'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /rigs pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa ni gser btsom? lta bu'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal
181b3(rgyud 'grel): po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyang lag na bi dzi pU ra dang/ ne'u le thogs pa'o/ /de la gang ba bzang po ni mdog sngon po/ nang du bzang po ni mdog ser po/ nor sbyin mdog dmar po/ rnam thos sras ni mdog ser po pi tsi kutNa ??
181b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po kyi li mi li mdog ljang gu sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po/ spyod pa'i dbang po mdog ser po/ 'phrog ma gser gyi mdog can de la bu dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o/ /tha skar sku mdog dkar po khro nya mdog
181b5(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu pa smin drug mdog ljang ser/ snang ma mdog dmar sku/ mgo mdog nag po/ lag mdog dkar po/ na bas so mdog dkar po/ rgyal mdog ljang gu/ skag mdog dkar po/ mchu mdog dkar po/ bre mdog kri yang ku ltar ljang ser/ dbo mdog ljang gu /me
181b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mdog dkar po/ nag pa mdog ljang gu /sa ri mdog dkar po/ sa ga mdog nag po/ lha mtshams mdog ljang gu /snron mdog dkar po/ snrubs mdog dkar po/ chu stod mdog nag po/ chu smad mdog skya'o/ /gro bzhin mdog dkar skya/ byi bzhin
181b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu /mon kru mdog nag po/ mon gre mdog sar po/ khrums stod ljang gu/ khrums smad mdog ser po/ nam gru mdog ser skya sta/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyang rgyan dang ldan zhing gos gyon pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ bud med kyi
182a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su bri'o/ /tshangs pa ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar bri'o/ /drag po ma ni drag po lta bu'o/ /khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug lta bu'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni kArti ka lta bu'o/ /dbang po ma ni brgya byin lta bu'o/ /phag mo ni mdog nag
182a2(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ yi dags la zhon pa/ nya rlon pa dang/ thog pa lag na thogs pa'o/ /dga' byed ma ni mdog dmar po yi dags la zhon pa/ kA tir dang thod pa lag na thogs pa'o/ /de dang nye ba nyid du b+h+ring gi ri ti bre ste/ ma mo bdun b+h+ring gi ri ti dang bcas bar bri ?
182a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa/ glang po che'i gdong pa can lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa na la du dang la phug thogs pa/ de las gzhan pa gnyis na mdud rtse gsum dang dag sta thogs pa/ sprul se ral khar thogs pa byi ?
182a4(rgyud 'grel): zhon pa/ tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ /lha gzhan dag kyang gzhal yas khang na gnas par bri'o/ /'dir yang sgo srungs rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa de dag nyid yin no/ /de ltar nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag
182a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ma lus shing/ ma tshang ba med par bsgrub pa la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa
182a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su
182a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di ltar yid la bya
182b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ ngas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bsdu bas sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya'o/ /'di la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bya'o zhes bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma de la che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod de bzhin
182b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te bdag 'tshal lo zhes zer na/ des kyang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad tshogs sam/ 'on te ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te cung zad
182b3(rgyud 'grel): ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma tshogs zer na/ da nas de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrigs pa'i yi ge hUM bsam pa dang/ snying gar yang las kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge kaM nag por bsams la yi
182b4(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM gi 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gyen du 'byin par byed cing sna bug g.yas pa nas nges par 'byung ba ni gcer bu'i gzugs mi sdug par mchin pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa gyur ba dang/ yi ge hUM yang snying gar phyin pa dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
182b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sna khung de nyid nas byung nas gsang sngags 'dis de za bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+ShA khA da ya khA da ya/ sarba pA paM A sya hUM phaT/ yang na hUM las byung ba'i ro stod khro bo'i gzugs la re smad rdo rje rtsi gcig pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa'i
182b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus gsang sngags 'di dang de nyid du phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /oM badzra kI la kI la ya/ sarba big+h+na na baM d+ha baM d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas slob ma de yi ge saM las byung ba'i kun tu bzang po'i gzugs su bsams pa/ de'i spyi bor haM las byung ba'i sna tshogs
182b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya ste/ de ltar byas na nang gi bdag nyid can gyi bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yo byad ma tshogs pa rnams kyang bde blag tu tshang bar 'gyur ro/ /slob ma yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad
183a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ skra dang phub ma la sogs pa las rang rang gi phyogs skyong gi gzugs brnyan bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs byed pa rnams sngags 'dis bkug la bcug ste/ ?
183a2(rgyud 'grel): la phur bus legs par btab ste/ hUM bzhi pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnan la bzhag par bya'o/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar ba byas la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog lta bur mdud de/ mdzub mo g.yas pa lcags kyur
183a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste sngags la/ oM badzra aM ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A karSha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dang mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbrad nas zhags pa dang 'dra bar gzhag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM
183a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA sha ma tE kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM hUM/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar mdud pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badzra spho Ta mahA kro d+ha barbd+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM baM/ de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing
183a5(rgyud 'grel): la de rnams kyi mgo la yi ge hUM bkod de/ snga ma bzhin du rdo rje phur bu bskyed la/ brkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du phur bus gdab par bsams te/ bka' sgo pa'i tshul gyis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+na band+ha
183a6(rgyud 'grel): band+ha hUM phaT/ de nas badzra kI li kI la ruT maT/ ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar yi ge hUM 'bar ba/ lta bus brdeg par bya ste/ cho ga 'di ni ji srid dkyil 'khor zhag gi bar du nyin re zhing nyi ma gung la bya'o/ /pha rol gyi bgegs gzhom
183a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su spos chu la sogs pas nye bar byugs shing me tog sil ma gtor la bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug pa dang/ ci snyed pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa dag tu stan nang tshangs can
183b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ sngags 'di dag gis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM sarba pA pi ka pi ka pi ka ba tsi ka man so bg+hu ta mA rA gad+he sha me hA ma da mA na a biShthe na yatkri tam tre kA li kaM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM
183b2(rgyud 'grel): spho Ta ya mi swAhA/ oM sarba pA paM pra ti de sha mi swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta naM/ A da ma d+ha ra na ni ryA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta pra ti grih+nan tu? maM swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha raM a nu mo de yA mi swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra mahA badzra sa ma
183b3(rgyud 'grel): ya mahA bo d+hi tsi to ?da mud pa ta ya ma swAhA/ de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sha?na si ta sarba sa d+ha naM/ sarba sid+d+ha ya saM ban dyan+taM sarba ta thA ga ta shtsa a b+hiSh+ya? shA tAM/ swa b+hA pa shud+d+ha na sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA pa shud+d+ho nyahaM/ zhes bya bas phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad
183b4(rgyud 'grel): gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' i ngos kyi dbus su chud pa 'od kyi dra ba chen po dang ldan pa'i
183b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa la de'i steng du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi yi ge mu kha dog dmar skya/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal zla ba lta bu'i sku dang
183b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam dang gzhu bsnams pa nyid de/ shes rab ral gri mda'
183b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhu thogs zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod/ na mda' ba/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ khro bo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rig pa'i lha mo thams cad spro dang/ sdud pa'i bdag nyid can du bdag nyid
184a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsams la/ snying ga dang smin mtshams dang/ lkog ma dang/ spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag la rdo rje sems ma dang/ rin chen sems ma dang/ chos kyi sems ma dang/ las kyi sems
184a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ngo bo nyid de/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la/ sa ma ya sa stwaM haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun du yi ge h+ri las pad+ma a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
184a3(rgyud 'grel): pas bkug cing bcug la bcings te/ dbang du byas nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ lta ba nyid du byas nas de bzhin du mchod cing dbang bskur la rang
184a4(rgyud 'grel): gi lus la gzhug par bya ste/ ye shes sems dpa' de bltas nas rang gi lus la rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas gcig tu gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang pos
184a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgrub par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bar bdag nyid shes nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings
184a6(rgyud 'grel): la dag na rgyal du khar bzhag ste/ thams cad bskor la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /oM badzra tsakra hUM phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
184a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa mngon sum bzhin du yang dag par bltas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis legs par mchod de/ rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa thun bzhi'i rin gyis ji srid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bzla
184b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba'am/ mtshan ma byung ba 'am/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rmi lam mthong gi bar du/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am/ gsang sngags gzhan dag bzla ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan ba spro ba dang bsdu pa'i bdag nyid
184b2(rgyud 'grel): can skad cig ma'i ye shes las byung ba'i rje btsun 'jam dpal du bdag nyid bsams la/ dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid sems tsam gyi sprul bar khong du chud pas sems kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par bltas la/ ji srid
184b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu nyin re 'am zla ba re 'am/ lo re nyid du ji lta bar mngon par dga' bar bsgrub cing zla ba yang gyi rol cho ga
184b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am/ khru lnga bcu'o/ /blon po 'am blon po chen po rnams kyis ni khru lnga bcu 'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /ded dpon nam/ tshong dpon chen po rnams kyis ni nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ de'i
184b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir de? bsgrub? pa bo rnams kyis ni khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru drug pa 'am/ ci nus par bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor
184b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bgegs mngon par bsal la/ bdag dang slob ma la sogs pa zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /de nas sa sbyar bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam mam khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la dri zhim po'i chus gtong ba'i sas slar bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags
184b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spos? chus chag chag gtab ste/ kun tu brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa khang brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba la tha me rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu
185a1(rgyud 'grel): btags ba'i rgyal mtshan bzang pos gzugs pa dang/ bla re dam pa bre ba dang/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa pa'i lte ba ste yang dag par sbyangs shing dris/ nye bar byug ba dang/
185a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams ba zhir spos khang gzhag pa dang/ me tog dang/ gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la/ lag pa sa la bzhag ste/ hUM bzhi ba dang yi ge brgya ba lan bdun yongs su bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas shin dris byugs la gos dmar
185a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i stong g.yogs dang/ ze'u ga bcings la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang/ rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid logs par brgyan te/ zla ba rta ba nas brtsams nas/ phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil
185a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi las bya ba 'am yar gyi ngo la chos gcig nas brtsams pa 'am/ de bzhin du tshes brgyad dang/ tshes dgu dang/ tshes bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams la brtsams nas nya'i bar du 'am/ snga dro'i dus su brtsams nas bya'o/ /de la dang
185a5(rgyud 'grel): por dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ de nyid kyis na rdo rje gzung/ chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs mas snying po
185a6(rgyud 'grel): bzla?/ /de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga'i bya ba bya ste/ rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa ni/ /dam
185a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig chen po gsum zhes bya/ /rgya 'di gsang sngags bsgrub pa'o/ /dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /de yang dang po sa'i lha mo yi ge baM las byung ba lag na phul
185b1(rgyud 'grel): ba thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la/ 'dod pa'i rgyal bos dkug ste/ mi tog la sogs pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de la phyag rgya dang sngags 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la mdzub mo dang/
185b2(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung gnyis mdung ba bya ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyal por phyag rgya ste/ sngags la Tik+ka hUM dze/ de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyis khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang
185b3(rgyud 'grel): du gyur/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /de ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyis/ /bcom par byas te dkyil 'khor gi/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams la/ de'i steng du rdo rje bcing ba
185b4(rgyud 'grel): kha thur du bstan te bcings la bzhag ste/ oM badzri b+ha ba hUM zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje bcings las byung ba'i hUM tha bar ba'i tshigs kyi sa gzhi btam pa la thug gi bar du rdo rje gyur par rnam par bsams la 'di skad do/ /dri Dha badzra tiSh+Tha/ de
185b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgya la mchog dang las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshor ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs su
185b6(rgyud 'grel): 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang na gnas nas mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du byed cing/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs par 'jom ba 'dis bsam par bya ste/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ phyin ci ma log
185b7(rgyud 'grel): bar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub ba zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying bor bzhugs
186a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gang na bder gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du bya ba rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bsten nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
186a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs par dka' ba spyad pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam zhes gsung zhing gan du byon te/ badzrod tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i sngags
186a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ se go la brdabs pas slong bar mdzad bar bsam mo/ /de nas langs nas mchog tu dad pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA? ya pA? ? sarba pra Na man badzra? na dA ne da ka ro mi zhes brjod la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol lo bcom ldan 'das
186a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis ma 'tshal na de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /de ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal? dugs? pa/ de nas rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so? sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i
186a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas shing bsgrub par gyis shig /ces gsungs shing sems so sor rtogs pa'i man ngag de stsol bar bsam par bya ba ni/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bya d+haM ka ro ni zhes bya ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang/ gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa la
186a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang gal? ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtog pa de'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang/ sems kyi rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
186a7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba
186b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis rtogs so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na ji lta bur sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te/ dper na ras? dkar po la tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ slar yang byang chub sems kyi man ngag
186b2(rgyud 'grel): stan par mdzad par bsam pa ni/ oM ba d+hi tsit+ta utgA da ya mi zhes bya'o/ /de nas shin tu 'od gsal ba'i sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las/ rim gyis nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs
186b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur to/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags ba don zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong zhes bya ba ste/ shin tu rnam par dag cing nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba me long lta bur rnam par gnas / /oM dz+nyA na
186b4(rgyud 'grel): ra shpre? pri si dza hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par spyos? te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khro gang ba las 'od zer rnam pa sna sogs bar gang zhig byung ste/ byung ba de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas/ bar du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang
186b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo? bo'i rtse mo bcom ste/ rtogs par byas nas rdo rje chen po'i gzugs gcig tu gyur nas byung ste/ rtse lnga pa spyi bo nas thugs kar bzhugs te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin
186b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyad kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis de legs par bsgrubs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'dis rang gi
186b7(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ yang sngags 'dis spro bar bya'o/ /oM spha ra badzra/ oM saM ha ra badzra/ oM oM dz+nyA na badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra hUM hUM/ de nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
187a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra At+ma konyhaM/ de nas
187a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems dpa' i rdo
187a3(rgyud 'grel): rje der zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong ngo/ /sems dpa' chen po de lta bas
187a4(rgyud 'grel): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' i rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur? bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig/ om ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ste thA a haM/ de nas
187a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag la byin gyis rlobs la mngon par
187a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byang chub la 'di brtan par mdzod cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' i rdo rje der zhugs so/ /de nas skad cig de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
187a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsad ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur bas mnyam pa
187b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas reng bzhin gyis dag go /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od
187b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'gyur gnas su gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/ /de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang rang rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar 'byung?
187b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam par bya ste/ rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa' i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi nyam?
187b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed de/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nang du rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur /kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu gzhag nas/ dkyil
187b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas yongs su bskor te/ lhan cig yang dag par gnas so/ /de nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba yin pas byams pa dang snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas
187b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang? mi shes pa las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis bsrugs par shes nas bdag 'dir babs la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs ? skul? pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes yid langs par byas te/ rim pa
187b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dis snod kyi 'jig rten bskyan par bya'o/ /hUM yaM hUM/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /hUM ba hUM/ chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /hUM raM hUM/ me'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas nam mkha' las yi ge/ ba las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /de'i
188a1(rgyud 'grel): sku'i yan lag thams cad las chu'i rgyun sbom po byung bas snod thams cad yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgoms la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du thim par gyur par rnam par bsams nas /me dang chu'i bar du hUM la
188a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya bas rnam par bkod la/ de bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba las sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa las gser gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom/ de'i steng du hUM suM hUM zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal bo ri rab bsam mo/ /de'i steng du khaM las khang
188a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsams la/ /de'i dbus su sa bon 'di rnams las pad+ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i grangs snyed kyi gdan rnam pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ge h+ri las thams cad du pad+ma bsam/ a siM a zhes bya ba 'dis
188a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su 'khor lo can gyis seng+ge'i gdan shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ hUM gaM hUM tra baM tra/ h+ri maM h+ri/ aM ga a/ 'di dag las gangs ji lta ba bzhin du glang po che dang/ rta dang rma bya dang/ nam mkha' ldang gi gdan rnams bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas
188a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig babs te/ seng+ge'i gdan la legs par 'dug ste/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi glang po che'i gdan la sogs pa nye bar gnas par bsams la/ bdag nyid zhal bzhi ba byang chub mchog gi phyag
188a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gnas par bsgom zhing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bya ste/ 'di ni dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// //rje btsun 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gis mngon par sangs rgyas
188a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni mtshan tsam gyis gzhan du gyur pa yin pas na log par khong du chud par mi bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang rang gi gnas rnams su 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni
188b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra sa ma ya dza dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor
188b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rnams byon pa dang/ zhabs la phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas chad du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod ma thag tu bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi la zhugs par bsam mo/ /de la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ ched du brjod pa ni
188b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA ta banda nang go ri mi e ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzes zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas nus pa ma
188b4(rgyud 'grel): lus pa'i/ /shugs kyis byin gyis brlobs te byung nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs khang zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing/ chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'bres par gyur pas gnas
188b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo/ /de la ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya chen gdod nas skye ba yin/ rdul phran thams cad grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni cig tu gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams
188b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi las la yang dag par sbyar nas/ de rnams kyi thugs kha'i bla ma la sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bsams la/ lan bdun nam brgyad kyis bzlas brjod byas nas/ de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par gyur par bsams pa'am?/ de ltar de bzhin
188b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes mchog tu yang nga rgyal bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thal mo sbyar nas cung zad btud de/ mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad
189a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'dis brtag par bya'o/ /mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis/ /theg
189a2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po rtog pa yis/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi/ /cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas sngags pas yang dag par byin gyis
189a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa rang gi snying pos mchod yon phul la/ lha rnams kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhes rgyas btab par bya ste/ spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ snying rje chen po yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyi dkyil 'khor
189a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor bas gnas la/ 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /der ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur par bdag ni suM nyi med/ byang chub sems dang sems gcig
189a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no//
189a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor
189a7(rgyud 'grel): bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la rang gi dam tshig phyag rgyas bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo steng du nam mkha' la gzhag
189b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor bas rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la/ rkang mthil nas yongs su bzung ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te/ ri'i rgyal bo ri rab kyi steng gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos la/ dbang
189b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams to/ bskor la sna tshogs rdo rje de dag nyid sa la 'bri zhing bgegs thams cad skrod pa la brtson pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /'dir bshad pa/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni/ /badzra satwa zhes brjod nas
189b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sgyings? pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/ /sngags pas rdo rje sems bzlos shing/ /rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi tshar/ /nyes ldan pa yang dag par 'byung/ zhes gsungs pas/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ rdo rje
189b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM mdzod kyis phyag rgyas snying ga dang/ dpral ba dang/ lkog ma dang/ spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la/ g.yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje chen po gsor zhing/ g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu gsil nas khro bas 'dar ba'i lus dang skor ba lan gsum byas la 'di skad ces
189b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma cho ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir nam mkha' ltar
189b6(rgyud 'grel): bris med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ba 'bri yis lha dang lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang/ yi dags dang sha za dang 'byung ba dang rjes byed dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gnon po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags dang
189b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ? po? dang/ rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /deng 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag pa'i ye shes kyis rdo rjes mgo bo tshal ba brgyar rnam
190a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha la sogs pa de rnams sa de spangs nas song bar bsams la/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas mthe'u chud dang mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa ltar byas la/
190a2(rgyud 'grel): kha'i steng du kha spub ste bzhag la/ mthun pa'i rkang stabs la sogs pas chongs la/ hUM badzra baM hUM zhes brjod la byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du bdag po lnga'i gnas su yongs su bskor/ de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid bsams la/ bdag po'i gnas su
190a3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ shar phyogs su bltas nas snying ga sa la reg par byas la/ de bzhin du gnas nas lag pa gnyis thad kar brkyang ste/ bdag nyid sna tshogs rdo rje chen po zhig a zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po
190a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o/ /oM badzra dzwa la a na lArka hUM zhes brjod la g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas/ g.yas pas rdo rje gsor te bgegs rnams gzhom par bya'o/ /yang rdo rje
190a5(rgyud 'grel): me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste/ oM badzra dzwa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma thA b+ha ny+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas pa'i sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas la/ mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba 'di
190a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra ne tri band+ha di d+ha? ni zhes bya bas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis brgyad ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bas la bzhag nas 'og
190a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra dri Dha me b+hi ba rak+Sha sarbaM swAhA/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis brkyang la/ mdzub mo gnyis mche bar byas pa 'di ni
190b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /yang na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o/ /oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la 'gal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te/ mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bzhag pa
190b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje dang ldan pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM druM band+ha hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chud gnyis lcags sgrog ltar mdud de/ mdzub mo gnyis rtsa sprad la yongs su bzlog ste
190b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi bar gzhag go /yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra pA sha h+ri?/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mkhrig ma mdud bya ba ni zhags pa'o/ /rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra pA taM ke pA taM gi ni ra Ta/ rdo rje bsdams pa las
190b4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du bya/ mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar srin lag phye la mthe'u chung ba dan no/ /rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bsrung bar bya ste/ h+ri badzra kA li ru Ta ma tra/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag la
190b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan par byas pas ni rdo rje nag mo'o/ /rdo rje ? zhes lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcings la ra ba bya'o/ /hUM badzra
190b6(rgyud 'grel): karma/ yang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi ra ba bya ste/ hUM rdo rje bcing bas rdo rje ra ba bya'o/ /sngags ni badzra band+ha zhes bya ba'o/ /ya hUM a nu rA ga ya mi hUM zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis bya ste de la phyag
190b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bas/ bskor ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/ /bar bskor ba ni mtshams bcing ba'o/ /snying la 'bar ltar zhugs gyur cing/ /phyogs kun rdo rje me 'bar bas/ /nga yi yang
191a1(rgyud 'grel): khra ba chen po yi/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /oM mahA badzra tsakra a d+he tiShtha sid+d+hya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pa yang byin gyis brlab bo/ /rdo rje khu tshur
191a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis 'khor lo skor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra maN+Da la hUM dzdza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor bkug la/ phur bu gdab po/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis dang/ mthe bo rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje
191a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'o/ /'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs gi bsgrub par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la phur bu ni 'di yin te sor brgyad pa'i tshad tsam gyis seng ldeng gi phur bu tsan dan dmar pos byugs la srad bu
191a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ me tog dmar pos bcings pa/ stod khro bo'i gzugs la/ sang? rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa hUM las bskyed do/ /oM badzra kI li kI li ya sarba big+h+naM band+ha band+ha hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu
191a5(rgyud 'grel): tshur gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pas rdo rje tho ba bzung nas/ des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir brdung bar bya'o/ /oM ha na ha na/ da ma da ma/ san tsu ra NA la san tsu ra NA ya/ badzra badzra mu da gar hUM phaT zhes bya ba rdo rje tho ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
191a6(rgyud 'grel): te me tog dmar po dang/ srad bu dmar pos bcings la/ tsan dan dmar pos byugs la/ de dang kun tu brdung bar bya'o/ /yang bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba thams cad la/ /rdo rje go chas go cha bya/ de nas
191a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra shi kha ra ru Ta ma Ta/ zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor nye bar? byugs la gur kum dang/ a ka ru dang tsan dan dang/ ga pur dang/ gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri dang dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis btab la lha rnams kyi grangs
191b1(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags te/ dkyil 'khor de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad chen po yongs su gyur pas rje btsun 'jam dpal du gyur pa la sogs pa
191b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying pos bzhag la/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngags kyis mngon par gdab bo/ /de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ baM las rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa rtsa ba nag
191b3(rgyud 'grel): zhog med pa/ lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba/ /ba dgye ba bskyed la/ de'i dbus su h+ri las byung ba'i pad+ma de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tshig gis gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la/ de
191b4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chus yongs su gang bar bsams nas/ sman lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang/ rin po che lnga dang ldan pa me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje snying po can ma gul ba gos gtsang mas dkris la/ a mra'i lo
191b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bzla zhing/ oM badzro da ka hUM hUM zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ spos pa sogs pas mchod nas dkyil 'khor bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rje btsun
191b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi nyin mo dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas brjod bya ste/ de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sang gri bya kri kri ka rni ka has de ba ste/ sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la/ lnga
191b7(rgyud 'grel): po 'di dag shes bya ste/ 'bras kyi so ba/ mon sran bre'u/ nas dang/ gro dang/ til dang lnga/ 'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni/ las rnams kun la 'di dag gsungs/ /byu ru gser na se la sbram/ /dung dang mu tig nor bu ste/ rin chen kun zhes bya ba
192a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas las thams cad pa'i bum pa la mngon par bsngags la/ de bzhin du me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
192a2(rgyud 'grel): de/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gzhag par bya'o/ /de la sngags dang phyag? rgyan 'di yin te/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+Na pa ya grih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ha b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ khro ba'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /mthe'u chung rtse mo
192a3(rgyud 'grel): mdud byas la/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng ba dag /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya 'di'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya'o/ /gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya ste/ ji srid dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa de srid du 'dir gdug pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis
192a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par bzlog du gsal/ zhes bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste/ dang cing gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ /slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing/ gos gtsang ma gan la
192a5(rgyud 'grel): lag na me thogs pas slob dpon la phyag bya ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon pa chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid
192a6(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying
192a7(rgyud 'grel): gar hUM las rdo rje bskyed pa/ khu tshur g.yas pas bzhud nas/ rdo rje snying gar snying pos gzhag ste/ su ra? te sa ma ya stwaM h+ro badzra sid+d+ha ya thA su khaM/ de nas de bzhin du de'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag la rdo rje las kyi snying po brjod nas/ sna tshogs rdo rje
192b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas hi badzra rak+Sha zhes bya ba las go cha bskyed la/ rkang pa'i ? thug gi bar du go cha bskon par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dris las par dri sbyin/ me tog gis me tog gtor zhing/ /bdug pas bdug la gtul te/ mar mnye bar bstan
192b2(rgyud 'grel): la re re zhing 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur pas nye bar gnas par gyis shing/ de nas slob ma'i gtso bo la bos te/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis khu tshur theg pa chen po
192b3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /de ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dang/ /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags
192b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /cho ga mchog bzang? 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin du mi bzang pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis btsam//?
192b5(rgyud 'grel): de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /du yi blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon/ /brjed pas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob//
192b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas cho ga 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad
192b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje
193a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs su gyur pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang rigs sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med pa'i so sor bshags

193a4(rgyud 'grel): tan lhur mdzad pa de rnams la sems can gyi khams ji srid gnas pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de skad lan gnyis lan gsum brjod de/ /de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma slob dpon du 'os pa
193a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzung la/ khas len par bya ba'i phyir bzhin bzangs smros shig /ces brjod par bya'o/ /slob mas kyang 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /slob dpon bdag la stsal du gsol/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang//

193a7(rgyud 'grel): la stsol/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /slob dpon dag ni bdag bgyid do/ /rin chen rigs mchog yid 'ong ba'i/ /dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa dang/ /de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi

193b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas shing mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang rin chen mchog

193b4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i? chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems can

193b7(rgyud 'grel): po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las

194b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pak+Sha? zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa te no? pa tiShtha/? dri d+ho me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mmai ba yats+tsha/

195a1(rgyud 'grel): thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smros shig ces brjod la slar btang ngo/ /de nad par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dag mthong ba dri bar bya'o/ /dri
