217b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog la bkra shis shog /dpal ldan rdo rje sems tshogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing/ /srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas/ /bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la
217b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis shog /shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtogs mdzad bcom ldan dbang bskur la/ /dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog
217b3(rgyud 'grel): la bkra shis shog /dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por rgyal mchog dbang bskur ba/ lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la
217b4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo yis/ /rdzogs sangs rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam legs pa yi bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /nam mkha' i
217b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' zhing/ /don rnams kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la/ /dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'khor lo sgyur
217b6(rgyud 'grel): drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs las/ /bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa/ /des ni kun son 'byor pa'i dbang bskur chen po la/ /'jam dpal grags bcas 'jig rten rnam par dag gyur cig /de nas gos la sogs pas brgyan te
217b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi cod pan dang dar dbyangs la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba
218a1(rgyud 'grel): che/ kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag /rdo rje'i snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag ces bya ba ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de/ ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas hi zhes brjod la de
218a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bdag po nyid du dbang bskur ro/ /a k+Sha ro mu khaM sarba d+harmma NAM/ A tyA nut pan na twAt ces brjod la dril bu byin te/ chos bstan par bya'o/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin
218a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dam pa'i dngos po byed par 'gyur/ /de nas yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): brjod la/ ming gi dbang phyug bskur ba sbyin par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gzhag la/ dam tshig bsgrags par bya'o/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung
218a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal mang po zhi bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du/ /yang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya
218a5(rgyud 'grel): ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun
218a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang phyug grub/ /sems can don ni bstan par byed/ /ces bya ba dang/ yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin par sgrags/ /gang gis lus kun brtan pas na/ /phyag rgya yin par rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas
218a7(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI brjod par bya'o/ /de nas spos? la sogs pas ?? mchod nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /rjes su
218b1(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba'i sbyin rtson pas/ /slob ma rdzogs par shes nas ni/ /go 'phang 'di ni thob par bya/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid/ /rdo rje slob mas gsol bya ste/ /de nyid la ni yon gyi mchog /dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab/ /'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
218b2(rgyud 'grel): can/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba 'tshal/ /slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang bskur nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa/ /skal pa chen pos bdag
218b3(rgyud 'grel): la stsol/ /gang gis sems can thams cad kyi/ /rnyog med don ni bdag bgyid cing/ /brtul zhugs bzang khyod drin gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun don mdzad pa'ang bgyid/ /slob dpon phan par 'dod pa yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun gyis
218b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag rgyas shing/ khams gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha' i khams/ /yongs su bde bar rnam par bsgom/ /phyi rol
218b5(rgyud 'grel): dri sogs dam tshig gi /sprin ltar zhugs can gyi ??/ /yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom/ /dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang/ /'dzin par mkhas bas bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba
218b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /rang nyid la ? bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): mahA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi She ka stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sarba? badzra a
218b7(rgyud 'grel): d+hi pa ti tAM dri Dho me b+ha ba sid+d+hya na ma(rgyud 'grel): te b+ha? ga ? na mahA badzra/ ha ra su ra ta stwaM/ mahA badzra swAhA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa:/ zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ sngags brjod par bya'o/ /me tog
219a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la/ deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhed pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan lag brtsams kyis/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe
219a2(rgyud 'grel): byad rnams kyis brgyan pa byas pa'i skur mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
219a3(rgyud 'grel): cad khyed la 'jug par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang dag par 'bar bas/
219a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
219a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di skad ces
219a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod de/ deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad du 'dod pas mchod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang rangs pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro
219a7(rgyud 'grel): bas rol par gyis shig /de nas lha mo phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyi phreng ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa 'di dge thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod
219b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la skyo ba med par gyis shig /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no/ /de nas lha mo glu ma'i gzugs can dang/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra
219b2(rgyud 'grel): hat/ ces bya ba la sogs pa dang/ glu blangs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shig /khyed ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par sdud pa
219b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gar gyi rjes su
219b4(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par gyis shig/ de nas rin po che 'am gsar gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib gsal pa ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams
219b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsal/ de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long blangs nas/ chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /ngo bo nyid med
219b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas med par/ /de ltar chos rnams shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do/ /phyogs bzhir mda'
219b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'phen du 'jug cing steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go /de nas sha d+ha ban dzdza ka byin la 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing/ gzhan dag la yang byin cig /de nas rgyal mtshan byin la
220a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang/ 'bab pa las nye bar rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje snyems pa'i phyag rgya byin la/ 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do/ /gzhan yang a badzra
220a2(rgyud 'grel): satwa zhes bya bas me long stangs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin nyid/ /dag cing gal la dri ma med/ /bu khyod kyis ni snying la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin/ /zhes bya ba dang/ 'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste/ gang de bzhin
220a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin par rtogs shig /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su gzhag cing/ dung yang lag pa g.yas par byin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra pa gnyis
220a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod de/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig/ di ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas/ /kun
220a5(rgyud 'grel): du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyis mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa
220a6(rgyud 'grel): de kun kyang/ /kun tu khyod la bsrung bar byed/ /rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cing
220a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bsgrags nas thal mo dang bcas pas dang por 'di skad brjod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje mgon po rab bsgrubs mdzad/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/ /dpal kun
220b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni rgyal po mchog /spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las dang rdung ba che/ /gnod sbyin gtum po gdon chen po/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas
220b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don kun gyi ni de nyid don/ /sems can don chen kun rig pa/ /kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de/ /kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje
220b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag rab rdo rje mchog /rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang/ /dam tshig chen po'i de nyid don/ /sems can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/ /rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po/ /rdo rje 'od dang 'od chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal
220b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog rdo rje gu/ /rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog /rdo rje dam pa mchog chen po/ /rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba rang gsang 'chang/ /rdo rje phreng ba bsam gtan che/ /rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
220b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mchog gsang rdo rje mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchog pa/ /thabs chen dang ni dngos
220b6(rgyud 'grel): grub che/ /rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta thA ga ta'i glu chen po/ /ta thA ga ta'i gsung dbyangs te/ /ta thA ga ta sems chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal khyod/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ /sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes/ /rnam par snang
220b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad che dang khyab/ /zhi khro ston pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta thA ga ta de nyid che/ /yang dag mdza' dang che ba'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin pa'i kun mkhyen pa/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ /kun gyi
221a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas hUM te hUM zhes pa/ /rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba po/ /phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag rgya brjod cing brjod pa dang/ /rim gror ta thA ga tas
221a2(rgyud 'grel): khyab/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ /'byung po dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /ta thA ga ta khyod kyis bsgrubs/ /bstod pa'i rgyal
221a3(rgyud 'grel): po 'di yis ni/ /glu blangs gang zhig bstod byed cing/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can don kun mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /mgon
221a4(rgyud 'grel): po khyod la bstod bgyis pas/ /theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ /de nas 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje 'khor lo
221a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar gyis zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje rin chen du bsgoms nas/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin du chus dbang
221a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur la/ rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rin po che'i rdo rje khu tshur mnyam par bcings la mthe bo dang mdzub mo rtse sbyar ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che byin la/ /de kho na
221a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bstan par bya ste/ nyi ma 'di ni mchog yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong/ /nam mkha' i snying po bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o/ /h+ri de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur te/ de bzhin du a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmma
221b1(rgyud 'grel): NAM zhes bya bas dril bu byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ bsam pa thams cad grub pas na/ /don gyi bsam grub bla na med/ /de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir/ /'dod dang thar pa'i bde chen po/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la/ de bzhin
221b2(rgyud 'grel): du gzhag nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod dang bde ba thams cad dang/ /mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing/ /bdag nyid dang ni pha rol gyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis/ /sh+rI de nas de bzhin du/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): mahA su kha badzra ratna
221b3(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi She ka stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sarba ratna a d+hi pa ti stwaM dri Dho me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma ste/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ratna sa ma ya stAM/ a haM badzra ratna/ oM b+hurb+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis kyis rin po che byin la/ de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/
221b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang nye bar bstan nas/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang/ /sangs rgyas don la sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phyogs kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur zhes//
221b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba brjod nas de bzhin du/ /rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/ /nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog /mngar na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs
221b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje chos su rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis
221b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas/ de bzhin du chus dbang bskur la dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dar dpyangs cod pan gyis dbang gis dbang bskur te pad+ma byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de nyid sangs
222a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /gdul ba'i thabs kyi mdzad pa ni/ /dga' ba'i rol mor rab tu 'jug /h+ri/ de nas bdag po'i dbang bskur ba/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM AdyA nut pan na
222a2(rgyud 'grel): twat/ ces bya bas dril bu byin nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/ /tshon gyi nye bar mi gos ltar/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): de nas ming gi dbang gis dbang
222a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba byin la/ de bzhin gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ cho ga dag ni gang dag gis/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'dul 'gyur ba/ pad+ma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag /de dang des ni sbyar bar bya/ /sh+rI/ de nas de bzhin du oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): mahA
222a4(rgyud 'grel): su kha pad+ma mahA a b+hi She ka stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba pad+ma ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya ra ha me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma ste b+ha ga bAn mahA pad+ma su ra ta stwaM/ a haM badzra pad+ma oM b+hurb+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): /zhes bya bas lag pa gnyis kyis pad+ma byin la/ de bzhin du yang dag par
222a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba rnams la de phul la/ /sems can don phyir gzhan chung ma/ /bsten na bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes
222a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba brjod la/ de nas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du sems
222a7(rgyud 'grel): can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag po yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig /ces brjod do/ /de nas
222b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje can du rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la de bzhin du chus dbang bskur te/ la thams cad kyis 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang
222b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur nas/ sna tshogs rdo rje byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ rtag pa'i 'dod chags las byung khro/ /rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni kun tu 'bar/ h+ri/ de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur
222b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmma NAM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas dril bu byin nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /'di kun
222b4(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'dzin par 'gyur/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): /de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la/ de bzhin du gzhag nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas brgyas btab la/ /
222b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya/ /sh+rI/ de nas de bzhin du oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): mahA su kha badzra karmma a b+hi She ka ta stwaM/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma ste b+hA ga bAn mahA badzra bi shwa/ su ra ta stwaM/ a haM/ badzra karmma oM b+hurb+ha ba swa:/ zhes bya ba 'dis
222b6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis kyis las kyi rdo rje byin la de bzhin du mchod nas rang gi ming brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni/ /sems can thams
222b7(rgyud 'grel): cad bsad na yang/ /de yis sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsang ba brjod la de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing/ /sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni
223a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par mdzod/ /de nas mdor? na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul? ba sna tshogs pa'o/ /las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar
223a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor pas/ /slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin du chus dbang
223a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas dbang bskur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin nas de
223a4(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das 'di ston par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'dul bar ston pa ni/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can/ /srid
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ba shin tu gnas mchog pa'i/ /cho ga la sogs des par dged?/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs/ /dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs/ /srid pa shin tu legs par grub/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpa' byed mchog /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur
223a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pas dril bu byin te/ chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid do/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal
223a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hI(rgyud 'grel): de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar byas la/ de bzhin du gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod pa'i longs spod thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /dkon mchog gsum mchod pa ni/ /bgyi'o zhes
223b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu bsam/ /sh+rI/ de nas de bzhin du/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hO(rgyud 'grel): mahA su kha badzra d+hA tu a b+hi She ka ta staM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pa ti dri b+ha me b+ha ba sid+d+ha na ma ste b+ha ga bAn/ mahA bai ro tsa na su ra ta stwaM a haM/ badzra b+hA hu oM b+hurb+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): zhes
223b2(rgyud 'grel): bya bas lag pa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin la/ de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams/ /'dul 'gyur de lta de lta bur//
223b3(rgyud 'grel): chags la sogs pas yun ring du/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis zhes gsang ba brjod la/ de nas mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod
223b4(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjed la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
223b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni rje su gnang zhing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la/ de bzhin bzhag ste/ gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
223b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/ /oM ba yis 'di ltar khyed lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ dngos po mchog tu 'grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams pas bton/ /kye rdo rje che ge
223b7(rgyud 'grel): mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ /sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hurb+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): de la gzengs? brjod pa ni 'di yin te/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar gzhag la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bya ste/ 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga lung bstan
224a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag
224a2(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'di nyid kyis gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog grub pa'i byin brlabs dang/ gsang ba 'di'i stobs la dad par bya'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas
224a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed pa de dag
224a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su mnyes par drangs te/ 'dir zhugs nas dbang du byas te/ sgrub pa dang rjes su sgrub pas/ rdo rje dbyings thams cad kyi brtan pas brtan par gyur cig /chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam par byung la nam mkha' i
224a5(rgyud 'grel): khams thams cad ltar yangs pa chen po 'dir gnas shing dang du gnas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon la rag lus shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus su dmigs la/ de bzhin
224a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rang gi slob dpon nyid kyis nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do/ /zhes byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis mnyam par mgrin gcig tu dbugs 'byin
224a7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad do/ /zhes dad par gyis shig /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis/ /srid pa kun las rnam grol bar/ /khyod ni deng nyid gnas pa yin/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyed 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa
224b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu
224b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o/ /gang 'di skyes pa tsam gyis su/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med/ /dam pa'i chos
224b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mi smad cing/ /nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis/ /tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub can gyis ma gdung shig /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs
224b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi gtang zhing/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod ba/ /de ni sangs rgyas snang bas na/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal
224b5(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso ba dang/ /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems dmyal lhung bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu
224b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sbyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la mi gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang/ /rang
224b7(rgyud 'grel): srog gis rtag bsten bya na/ /longs spyod g.yo bas smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir bskal pa bye ba ni/ /grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la bsten par byed/ /rtag tu khyod kyi dam tshig srungs/ /rtag tu de bzhin 
225a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis/ /dngos grub mchog
225a2(rgyud 'grel): ni thob par 'gyur/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te/ /gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam/ /rang byung du yang der skyes so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams
225a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /deng ni bdug las rnam rgyal te/ grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /a/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog
225a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba phul du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ dpal rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma mchog rnams la/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas nyid du gyur
225a5(rgyud 'grel): cig /mchog tu rtag pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o/ /de la gtan tshigs ci yod ce na/ gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyis mthu nyid kyis/ phyir
225a6(rgyud 'grel): mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin la/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na/ /nges pa'i phung po la gnas te/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la/ dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na/ da ltar
225a7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor zhing/ /thams cad
225b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor dang rjes sbyor ldan/ /sangs rgyas nyid du shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dam pa rtag pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyis bdag nyid thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba ni
225b2(rgyud 'grel): don yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mngon par rtogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal pa'i dam tshig rjes su sgrub
225b3(rgyud 'grel): pas mchog tu grub pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du shes par bya'o/ /de bas na dus thams cad dang/ gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba rnams kyi mdza' mi len pas khyed rnams kyis rtag pa nyid du
225b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su bsrung bar bya zhing zhig par mi bya'o/ /ji snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod de thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla ma med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig sbyar bas legs par mchod la bde bar gzung
225b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya zhing yang dag par gsol bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rig par sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang gis na khyod pha rol mu stegs kyi gzhung gis log pa'i lta ba can du mi 'gyur zhing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad
225b6(rgyud 'grel): du ltung ba la sogs pa dang lus 'di shin tu yang mi smra ba nyid dang/ sems shin tu yang 'gog par mi 'gyur bar gang gis sku gsung thugs rdo rje thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang sung dang thugs rdo rje dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig
225b7(rgyud 'grel): gis bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'gyur ba yang gyis shig /yang smras pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /ces kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bcom
226a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchog tu gsang ba 'di bka' 
226a2(rgyud 'grel): stsal ba yin no/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rdo rje yi/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde la brten/ /'gro ba'i bde ba chung la sangs rgyas ni/ /kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod gyur to/ /slob mas gus par bla ma yi/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste/
226a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun/ /rjes su bsgrub par khas blang ngo/ /de ltar dam bca' byas nas ni/ /chos 'di yis rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni/ /blangs nas kyang ni de la sbyin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i
226a4(rgyud 'grel): lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha stwaM/ d+ha ra a mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod de/ /de nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
226a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no/ /de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas
226a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /mchod phyir gdub bu bcas par bya/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su/ /spyi bor 'dud de phyag
226a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba legs/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag pas legs par blangs nas su/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /de ni
226b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis bkud? bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin
226b2(rgyud 'grel): nan tan bskyed de bri bar bgyis/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang/ /sems can rnams lam phan pa/ /nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas slob ma re re yi/ /lag pa g.yon pas g.yas
226b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /mtho bo nas ni bzung nas su/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ /slob ma gus dang ldan pa dang/ /rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas nas bdag bsrung ste/ /sngags
226b4(rgyud 'grel): pas slob ma las yon blang/ /slob ma yis kyang de nyid ni/ /ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar bya/ /de nas slob mas 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /zhes ming du byas la skor ba lan gsum bya ste/ /phyag byas nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya zhing/
226b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang/ /khyad par can ni de dang de/ de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /de dang de ni bla ma sbyin/ /de ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /yang na de ni dgar 'gyur
226b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /de ltar yang dag spyad par bya/ /de ltar yang dag dbang bskur ba/ /slob dpon zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod de/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ oM
226b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra ratna ma? nut+ta raM/ oM badzra d+harmma ga ya ne/ oM badzra karmma ka rohha ba/ zhes bya ba rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis phyi dang nang gi mchod pa byas la/ thams cad ci nus pa dang/ ci 'byor pa dang/ rjes su mthun par mchod pa rnams dang/ slob ma rnams
227a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa phyir du gzhug go /de'i 'og tu bza' ba dang/ /glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan dga' bar mchod cing ci 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa rnams bya'o/ /de nas thams cad su
227a2(rgyud 'grel): la yang ma smra zhig /ces mna'i snying po byin la ji lta bzhugs pa rnams gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing bzod pa gsol
227a3(rgyud 'grel): la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gyen du dkrol te/ snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM kra ta ba sarba satwa artha/ sid+d+hi a dang twa hA ya nu ga ta gats+tsha d+ha bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ pu na ra ga ma na ya tu badzra satwa pu mi bskyod pa la sogs
227a4(rgyud 'grel): pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams ni/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas rang gi lus la nyi bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas snying ga nas 'byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi
227a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba bcing ba dang/ go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu dra mo dra?  Dha ku ru pa ra ka ba tsa na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba dkrol la thal mo sbyar te bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dbyes pa'i snying po 'di bya'o/ /oM
227a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra tuSh+ya ho/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod la rdo rje dga' bas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyed legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyed legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /theg pa chen po bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs
227a7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi gsang/ /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /oM badzra kI li kI li a? ?  big+h+nan/ badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ?/ hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT ces bya bas phur bu gten? la 'o mas bkru'o/ /a kA re mu khaM sarba d+harmma NI A byA
227b1(rgyud 'grel): nut pan na twat/ ces bya ba 'dis tshon rtsi rnams bsdus? la 'ba? ?? chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas kyang ba lang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya/ /khyi dang bya rog la
227b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin na/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni/ /bdag rang nyid kyi spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar
227b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad 'gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ /dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na/ /de yi che ga'i rim 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs/ /sangs rgyas
227b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la dbul bar bya/ /ba dan bdug spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad snong la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag las ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bkur ro/ /dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin
227b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid ma 'dod na/ /bsnyen bkur dag la sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi phyi de nyin/ /nyes byas lhag ma zhi ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /slob mas dag zhi bya'i phyir/ /spyan
227b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang/ /thams cad kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po 'ang bsgom par bya/ /nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /de nas zhi ba chen po bya'o/ /dad med dman la 'jug la min/ /'dod la chags dang kho ba'i dbang
227b7(rgyud 'grel): bskur dang/ /slob ma bu min blo gros dman rnams la/ /cho ga'i sgrubs pa 'di ni sbyin mi bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// //de nas dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob nas de'i 'og tu
228a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa tsam par bya ste/ dbang bskur zhing ? ?  pas dus mtshams gsum las ? byin gyis brlab ? ?dbang bskur nas dngos grub dang/ rdo rje blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su bcad pa dkyil
228a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par/ mngon sum bzhin ltas la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ji srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du tshig gzhan mi sma? bar bklag? par bya'o/ /de nas dpyid zlar ba'i zla ba nyid la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
228a3(rgyud 'grel): las bshad la'i cho gas dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs te/ cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad lo/ /skyil mo krung ma bshig par ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rje btsun 'jam dpa' las 'od zer rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor
228a4(rgyud 'grel): snang bar byas te/ sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nub par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i skra zlum par 'khyil ba/ lus la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa lha'i rgyan thams cad
228a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bzhugs pa/ rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te zag med pas de grub par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas nas/ de bzhin du sgrub pa la zhugs na/ de ltar 'jug par 'gyur ro/
228a6(rgyud 'grel): der yang ma grub na ston zla tha chung gi zla ba nya nga la de bzhin du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /sgrub pa bdun pa la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
228a7(rgyud 'grel): pas gsungs so/ /dngos grub mchog ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o/ /dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o
228b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pos mtshan yang? ?? sngon pa klog cing de'i sgrub pa'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub tha ma ni/ gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ rgyas pa'i
228b2(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod dang/ rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te/ de dag kyang de dang de la mos pas bklags ni 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang ?tha
228b3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub 'bring bsgrub pa? zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur gyi/ tha ma la bsgrub par zhugs pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no/ /de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bar bar
228b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gzhan dag sgrub na mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bya ste/ de bas ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de?
228b5(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid kyi sgo nas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i lha thams cad kyi bdag nyin can gyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yin/
228b6(rgyud 'grel): de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don rtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha rnams rnam par dgod
228b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyad par gyi nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi ?  bzod ba rtags? pa lta bur shes so/ /zhe na 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/ thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi rang bzod byas pa ni ma yin te
229a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 'gyed ba'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal bar mngon yang/ dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo
229a2(rgyud 'grel): gros kyi mig ma tshad bas gal te rtsod du zin kyang de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste/ sngags mchod mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /gsang sngags
229a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po don chen byed/ /gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas ni/ gtsug tor brgyad bshad pa yin no/ /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug sta/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ /zhes bya ba ni byang
229a4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no/ /'jig
229a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po rdo rje zhags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /zhes bya bas ni sgo srungs rnams kyang gsungs pa yin no/ /che ba'i sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang/ /zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa bzhi bshad pa yin no/ /gzungs kyi
229a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor du yang/ /mgon po sa bcu dbang phyug ste/ /sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/ zhes bya bas ni sa rnams bshad pa yin no/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ zhes bya bas ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so/ /rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /zhes
229a7(rgyud 'grel): bya bas ni dbang rnams so/ /de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang zhes bya bas ni don? ? gsungs dang tshig gi gzungs dang/ mngon bar rtogs pa'i gzungs dang/ sngags kyi gzungs te dran bzhin bya ba 'di gzungs la bya'o/ /dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston
229b1(rgyud 'grel): chen dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /zhes bya bas ni dga' ba'i mchod pa ste/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang bshad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rim pa gsum pa las kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang/ /sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ zhes
229b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bshad pa yin no/ /sgor ni gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya ba la
229b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs bas ni/ gshin rje mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams de bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /mtshams rnams su/ rdo rje hUM te hUM zhes sgrogs zhes bya bas ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba mig ni zad/ /ces
229b4(rgyud 'grel): bya bas ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya bas ni rdo rje khrag 'thung ngo/ /hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya ba ni rta mchog go /bdug ba ma la sogs pa rnams kyang/ /sems can kun yid tshim par byed
229b5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par spros nas sbyar zhing bshad zin pas 'dir zhib tu ma smos so/ /phyi rol du rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang tshangs pa dang drag po dang/ sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams
229b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa yin pas/ 'khor nyid du bstan pa yin no/ /ji ltar na nang du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas mnan la phyi rol du gzhag ce na/ 'di la brtsad par mi bya ste/ dregs pa gsal bar mdzad nas sprul pa'i gzugs kyis
229b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag pa yin pas mi mthun pa'i 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no/ /gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rnams ci phyir gzhag ces zer na/ gsang sngags thams cad bskyed pa po/ /zhes gsungs
230a1(rgyud 'grel): pas na/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dgos pa'i khyad par nyid yongs su shes pas na thams cad rjes su mthun par sbyar ba yin no/ /gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/ gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/ /zhes gsungs
230a2(rgyud 'grel): pas na/ dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ dngos grub sgrub pa la sogs pa las rab 'byams thams cad rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi sbyor bas thams cad nas thams cad du sbyor bar bya'o/ /de bas na
230a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags kyi sbyor ba la yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te/ don dam par de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi
230a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang/ las kyi phyag rgya las pha dad pa'i phyag rgya med pas 'di nyid du thams cad bstan pa yin te/ ji ltar bdag gis sbyar ba de bzhin du sngags dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas kyis nges par brtag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi
230a5(rgyud 'grel): dus dang/ sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya dgos te/ gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la/ /sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mi 'byin/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab grub phyir/ /sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg med par
230a6(rgyud 'grel): las rnams la/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bas sbyin sreg las rnams la/ /sngags pas 'bad pa chen po bya/ /de la sbyin sreg gi thab khung ni/ sems can gyi dbye bas ni mdza' yas so/ /rigs kyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa
230a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga 'am bzhir thab khud? rnam par dpe? ste/ 'di ni thab khung gtan la dbab pa'o/ /rgya cher rdo rje khro bo snyoms par 'jug pa'i gsar ba'i rgyud las thab khung gi rnam pa brgya rtsa bcur gsungs so/ /las kyi dbye bas 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang rgyas
230b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ bskrad pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ bsad pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ tshe 'phel ba dang/ nor dang 'bru dgug pa dang/ 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid dang/ mi snang ba dang/ bka' bzhin
230b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ sdig pa rab tu gzhig pa dang/ rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba dang/ nam mkhar 'gro dang/ rig sngags gzi bskyed pa dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'o/ /de la zhi ba la kun nas zlum po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni zur bzhi'o/ /mngon spyod la
230b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gru gsum mo/ dgug pa ni lcags kyu'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /nor dang 'bru dgug pa la ni rin po che lta bu'o/ /'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mi snang bar bya ba ni mda' gzhu lta bu'o/ /bka' bzhin byed pa'i ral gri lta bu'o/ /sdig
230b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu gzhig pa'i ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i rtsig pa 'am 'obs lta bu'o/ /rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba ni rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya lta bu'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi bskyod pa la ni rab tu
230b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba lta bu'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa ni 'khor lo lta bu ji lta ba nyid dam/ de'i dkyil 'khor rnams lta bu yin no/ /de bzhin du thun mong gi brko ba'i cho ga las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga thams cad la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhi pa dang
230b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi par thig btab la shar phyogs su rdo rjes spras pa dang/ lhor rin po ches spras pa dang/ nub tu pad+mas spras pa dang/ byang du pad+ma rdo rjes spras par byas la/ der shar phyogs su pad+ma dang/ nags kyi lcug ma dang/ bgrang phreng dang/ ril ba spyi
230b7(rgyud 'grel): phrags dang/ ri dags kyi pags pa ste/ phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /lho phyogs su mdud rtse gsum pa dang/ zla ba kham pa dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ thor tshugs dang mig ste/ phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /nub phyogs su 'khor lo dang/ dung dang/ be con dang/ ral gri dang/ phub
231a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /byang phyogs su mdud thung dang/ dril bu dang ba dan dang/ rma bya dang/ ra skyes te phyag rgya lnga bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab khung brkos la thab kyi nang du 'jig rten las 'das
231a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya 'am/ dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'i sbyor bas dgod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du bsrung ba la sogs pa thams cad byas nas/ sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyis khyab
231a3(rgyud 'grel): par gyi las dang rjes su mthun par tshim par byas la/ rang nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhi ba la oM sarbba du kho ba sha mi ne swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang yungs kar la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rgyas pa
231a4(rgyud 'grel): la oM badzra puSh+Ta ya swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ 'bras la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+Na pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn bi byA rA dza mA ra ya hUM phaT ces bya ba dang/ mi rus
231a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phye ma la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sdig pa rab tu gzhig pa la/ oM sarbba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ til la sogs pa'i bya'o/ /nor dang 'bru la sogs pa dgug pa la ni/ oM sarba A kar Sha ya/ d+ha na d+ha na/ di kaM badzra
231a6(rgyud 'grel): puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ 'bras la sogs pa'o/ /bsrung ba'i don du ni/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzra yi swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ ku sha'i myu gu til mar la btags pa'o/ /tshe 'phel ba la ni/ oM badzra A yu(rgyud 'grel): She swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ dur
231a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i myu gu la sogs pa'i'o/ /dgug pa la ni/ oM badzra A kar Sha ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ kub tsa ka'i tsher ma la sogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bcing ba la ni hUM badzra band+ha ya baM zhes bya ba dang/ lcags kyi phye ma la sogs pa'i'o/ /gsang ba la
231b1(rgyud 'grel): ni oM badzra mA ra ya hUM zhes bya ba dang/ dur khrod kyi thal ba la sogs pa'i'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni/ oM badzra ba shaM ku ru ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ me tog dmar po la sogs pa'i'o/ /'dod pa'i gzugs la ni oM badzra kA ma rU pe ne aM
231b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ shing dregs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'o/ /chags par bya ba la ni oM badzra A rA ga Na ya ho/ /zhes bya ba dang/ me skyur po la sogs pa'o/ /nam mkha' 'gro ba la ni/ oM kha tsa ni Ni ha ha ha zhes bya ba dang/ man da ra'i me tog
231b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i'o/ /bka' bzhin bsgrub pa la ni/ hUM badzra A dz+nyA pa ya ti hUM zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje can gyi me tog la sogs pa'i 'o/ /mi snang bar bya ba la ni/ oM badzra A dar sha na yA aM zhes bya ba dang/ 'bras bu mi snang ba la sogs pa'i 'o
231b4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags gzi brjid bskyed pa la/ oM sarba artha sid+d+ha ye swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ mar la sogs pa'i'o/ /don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga la ni/ oM sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ye swAhA/ yungs kar la sogs pa'i'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa la
231b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ oM maN+Dal a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ oM maN+Da la sid+d+ha ye swAhA/ oM b+h+ra swAhA/ oM b+hu b+ha swAhA/ oM swa swAhA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM swa sti swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ swasti ka'i me tog la sogs pa'i'o/ /sbyin sreg bya ste/ shin tu rgya cher phye
231b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni ma yin no/ /mdor bsdus na ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha rnam pa bcu gnyis su bstan te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ ye shes me nyid dang po ste/ /de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags/ /kha dog ser po'i mdog can la/ /mdog dang rgyas dang
231b7(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ster/ /'bar ba'i phreng chen ting 'dzin gnas/ /ye shes rdzogs byed shes par bya/ /gnyis pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po gon/ /bgrang phreng dang ni gun De thogs/ /gsum pa rlung
232a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ste /kha dog nag po rtsub pa'o/ /bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste/ /nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar dag? 'dra/ /lnga pa mi 'da' zhes bya ba/ /spun la kha dog kham pa ste/ /mgrin pa ring la gzi brjid che//
232a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la ni phan 'dogs pa'o/ /drug pa khro bo zhes bya ste/ /mig g.yon dung pa'i kha dog can/ /gyen du skra rjes sgra chen 'byin/ /mche ba bzhi pa stobs po che/ /bdun pa lto ba zhes bya ste/ /rnal kha dog kun dang ldan/ /brgyad
232a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zad byed ces bya ste/ /glog 'gyur ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /dgu pa yid las skyes zhes bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che/ /bcu pa 'jig rten 'byin pa ste/ /sha za'i me ni de las gzhan/ /bcu gcig par ni shes par bya/
232a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod med dbang gi las can no/ /rmugs byed ces pa bcu gnyis pa/ /sems can rmongs par byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las skyes/ /las kyi rjes mthun gsang sngags dang/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor bar ldan pa yi/ /kun kyang
232a5(rgyud 'grel): las don sgrub byed pa'o/ /de nas shin tu bsdus pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhi ru yongs bsgrags pa/ /sems can mos pa'i dbang gis ni/ /cho ga 'di ni bsdus ba yin/ /thab dang lha yi grangs dang ni/ /mdor bsdus 'bring dang rgyas
232a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin/ /de las shin tu bsdus pa zlum po la sogs pa bshad par bya ste zlum po dang zur bzhi dang/ gru gsum dang/ zla ba phyed pa lta bu la/ ??
232a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ khru ngo ba dang/ khru bzhi pa dang/ khru drug pa dang/ khru brgyad pa dang/ khru bcu pa dang/ sor bcu drug pa dang/ mtho gang tsam ste/ las dang rdzas dang rjes su mthun par thab kyi tshad byas pa yin no/ /'dir thab khung rnam pa
232b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir rdzas dang las kyi dbye ba las so sor nges pa yin gyi/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung ni mi snang ngo/ /ci lta zhe na/ zhi ba la ni zlum po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o/ /dbang la ni gru gsum mo/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum zla ba phyed
232b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de la gdon dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang/ rims dang bgegs kyis zin pa zhe bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ thar pa bsgrub pa dang nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byad pas na/ zhi ba'i las zhes
232b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ gter chen po dang/ rgyal srid dang/ bcud kyis len dang/ gser sgyur rtsi la sogs pa grub pa ni rgyas pa'o/ /lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang
232b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa dang/ rgyal po bran g.yog dang bcas pa dbang du byed pas na dbang ngo/ /gsang ba dang bskrad pa dang/ dbye ba dang gnon pa dang/ rmongs par byas pa dang/ yan lag gcad pa ni mngon spyang ngo/ /las kyi tshogs
232b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag nges par shes par byas la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung du thams cad bya'o/ /de nas yang rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ 'khor los dbus su mtshan pas na/ las thams cad pa zhes zer mod kyi/ de ni
232b6(rgyud 'grel): mi rigs te/ phyag rgya gang yin pa lha yin la/ lha gang yin pa de nyid phyag rgya yin bas na/ rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa dang/ mA ma kI'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ rin chen sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do/ /pad+ma ni 'od dpag tu med
232b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gos dkar mo'i ngo bo nyid do/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ni don yod grub pa'i dang/ sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do/ /'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad dang/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi ngo bo nyid de/ rigs pa 'dis na las thams cad pa nyid da/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs nyid las las thams cad pa 'di ci zhig rigs zhes la la dag zer ro/ /de yang rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud las ni/ thab gru bzhi pa de nyid las thams cad pa'i thab khung yin par bshad do/ /de nyid
233a2(rgyud 'grel): dpung? bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las bkag ste/ rdzing bu'i dbyibs lta bur klu dang gsang ba rnams kyi lus breg pa dang/ yan lag gzhig pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur/ yang thab khung gru bzhi pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan
233a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pas rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o zhes gsungs de/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na zur bzhi pa la khru gang tsam/ thabs? su de'i byed ce ma brkos te/ thab khung gi steng du song bzhi tsam dor bar dpangs dang/ rgyang sor
233a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i kun tu mnyam pa'i kha khyer la/ phyogs rnams su lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrag dang/ dril bu dang/ mtshams su zla ba kham pa dang/ rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan la thab kyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa thab bas
233a5(rgyud 'grel): cung zad dma' ba 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje brgyad lte ba'i ge sar la rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyed nub phyed bgreng? ba ste/ 'di dag ni rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o/ /thab khung de nyid rje btsun rnams snang mdzad kyi rnam bar snang mdzad mngon bar byang chub pa'i
233a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud chen po dang/ dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i rgyud chen po dang/ kun nas dbang bskur bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang/ phyag na rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa ni/ rdo rje brgyad dang ldan pa la/ dbus su
233a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag ces gsungs pas/ thab khung de nyid las thams cad pa yin par bshad do/ /dpung bzangs
233b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhus pa las ni pad+ma lta bu'i dbyibs can gyi thab khung las thams cad pa yin par bshad do/ /bud med dang rgyal po'i bu mo dang/ grong dang grong khyer thob pa dang/ don thams cad ni pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so
233b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal phyag na padmos kyang/ pad+ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang/ rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu'i thob khung de nyid las thams cad pa yin par gsungs te/ thab khung 'di ni zlum po la khor ra
233b3(rgyud 'grel): khor yug khru gang tsam la 'og tu khru phyed par brkos pa dbus kyi 'dab ma la pad+ma brgyad kyis bskor ba/ thab kyi steng du sor bzhi dor bar dpangs? dang rgyar sor bzhi pa thab khung nas byung ba'i pad+ma kha bye ba lta bu'i kha khyad la/ kha khyer gyi rgyal
233b4(rgyud 'grel): du pad+ma'i phreng ba bskor ba/ thab kyi dbus kyi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams la rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma la mig gnyis dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ pad+ma dang utpa la dgod do//
233b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi pad+ma la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dgod do/ /thab khung gi nang gi tha mar rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'i thab khung ni las thams cad ba'i thab bo/ /gzhan dag gis las thams cad pa'i thab khung gzhan dag tu yang 'chad de/ /rje btsun
233b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni don thams cad rdzogs pa yin par bshad de/ zhal bzhi pa dang/ phyag brgyad pa dang/ sku mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs
233b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rten pa 'ang/ brten pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /de la shar phyogs kyi zhal ni me long lta bu'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems rdo rje sems dpa' i ngo bo nyid de dkar po zhi ba mdzad pa'o/ /lho'i zhal ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ rin chen 'byung
234a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi ngo bo nyid de/ ser po rgyas pa 'phal bar mdzad ba'o/ /nub kyi zhal ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ dmar po 'gro ba rnams dbang du mdzad pa'o/ /byang gi
234a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ nag po nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams dang/ bdud kyi dgra bo thams cad zad par mdzad pa ste mngon spyod do/ /de ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod kyi
234a3(rgyud 'grel): las rnams rdzogs par byed pas na/ thab gcig la las thams cad pa'i thab khung du bshad do/ /de lta na ni thab kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba la don med de/ thab gcig tu las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhe na/ don med pa ma yin te/
234a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis las byed pas na/ dkyil 'khor tham cad zhi ba'i las la bskul zhing ka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod bya ste/ de bas na mtshan nyid tha dad
234a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'am/ dgongs pa'i dbang gis nye bar gzung? ba yin no/ /thab khung so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ de la zhi ba ni sa gzhi dkar po la rgyar khru gang tsam brkos la thabs? su sor bcu gnyis pa de'i dbus su pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga
234a6(rgyud 'grel): ba sor brgyad pa thab kyi steng bar du sor bzhi dor ba dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba la mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa/ thab des gzhi dkar po dang ba'i lci bas byugs la/ yang de gnyis ka dri dkar
234a7(rgyud 'grel): pos nye bar byug cing me tog dkar pos gtor ba dus gsum du bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la rgyar khru po? thabs?  su khru gang zur bzhi pa'am/ rin po che zur brgyad pa dang/ 'dra bar brkos la de'i steng du sor brgyad ba'i kha khyer dbyibs
234b1(rgyud 'grel): de dang 'dra bar bskor la khung bur 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba la rdo rje rin po che sor drug pas mtshan pa/ sa ser po dang dri ser pos thab dang sa gzhi de byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs pas gter bar bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni rtsub cing gis
234b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ shin tu gnag pa'i sa gzhi la gru gsum ba zla gam gnyis kyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa sor nyi shu pa zabs? su sor bcug pa/ thab kyi bgo byang du blta ba/ 'og tu rtse gsum pa'i steng du khro bo'i rdo rje sor brgyad pos mtshan pa/ de'i steng
234b3(rgyud 'grel): du sor gsum dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor gsum dor ba/ kha phyir bltas pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ sa nag po dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang/ bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug? pa la sogs pa ci snyed pas phyugs la/ dri mi zhim pa'i dri dang
234b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog sngon po 'am/ dmar po'am/ phub mas gtor to/ /dbang la ni sa gzhi dmar po la thab kyi dbyibs b+ha ga lta bu rdo rje dang pad+mas mtshan pa'o/ /dgug pa la ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la dbus su rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa'o/ /de dang 'dra
234b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor bas dmar po dang dri dmar pos byugs pa/ me tog dmar pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o/ /'di nyid kyis thabs? dang rgya'i tshan la sogs pa ni zhi ba'i thab khung dang 'dra'o/ /las thams cad pa'i thab khung
234b6(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin te 'on kyang kha khyer ni pad+ma kha bye ba lta bu la rdo rje phreng bar bskor ba/ dbus su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su 'khor lo dang ldan pas mtshan pa'o zhes bya/ la la dag brjod do/ /dkyil 'khro ram lha 'khod pa'i
234b7(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thab khung/ lhor rgyas pa/ nub du dbang du bya ba dang/ dbug pa /byan du mngon spyod kyi thab khung bya zhing/ tshon rtsi rnams kyang las dang rjes su mthun par brtag par bya ste/ thab kyi mtshan nyid do// //de nas thab khung gi gnas rab tu
235a1(rgyud 'grel): shis pa'i chu shing lo ma'am/ mtshan dang ldan zhing shin du sar pa'i gos dang/ sA lu 'am/ pad+ma'i 'dab mas thab kyi mthar thug par g.yog par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha dgram par bya ste/ rtsa ba nas
235a2(rgyud 'grel): bton zhing ma nyams pa 'bus ma zos pa shin tu gsar zhing sngo ba'i ku shas g.yo par bya'o/ /dang po shar du rtse bstan gzhag/ gnyis pa lho phyogs kha bltas ba'o/ /gsum pa'i rtse mo nub du ste/ bzhi pa rtsa mo byang du'o/ /don
235a3(rgyud 'grel): kun bsgrub pa'i ku sha yis/ /thab? kyi shar nas dang por g.yog/ 'dir ku sha blang ba'i sngags ni ? yin te/ i daM ku shA ku d+ha b+hi b+hya bU tA prahpra? bi da bren? bud+d+ha/ d+hurmma? saM g+ha ti/ pri thwi? san dza ta gand+ha? bigyAn? ma ma shAn+ti kurb+han+tu? swAhA/ gsang sngags
235a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ku sha la lan bdun bzlas pa ltar bshad pa'i chags dgram par bya'o/ /'dab ma dang ku sha'i tshogs dgram pa'i cho ga'o// //zhi? ba yin pa la lag? dang u dam par dang/ a mra dang/ oM shar? tha dang/ pAk+She dang/ ka? tya? dang/ sha
235a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dang/ n+ya gro ta la sogs pa'i shing 'o ma can las byung ba 'dab ma dang bcas pa mnyam bor bcad ba/ rtse mo'i cha las byung ba'i mtho gang tsam gyi yam shing la sgrar rtsi dang mar la rtse mo gnyis brtags la/ dri dkar po'i spos? chus
235a6(rgyud 'grel): bkrus pa ? mo 'dab ma gnyis dang bcas pa ste/ rtse gcig pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rnying pa dang lo la med pa dang/ khong stong dang /chag pa dang/ shun lpags med pa dang/ thung ngu dang yon? po dang/ rtse mo gas ba dang/ ha cang dra ba dang/ ha??
235a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ? po dang/ 'bus zos pa dang/ srog chags dang/ bcas pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni nas dang 'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsis dang mar dang zho dang 'bras dang/ 'bras yos dang/ ku sha sngon po dang/ dur ba sngon po dang/ a mra'i lo
235b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ can dan dang/ pri yang ku'i me tog dang/ sA lu'i chan dang/ me tog dkar po dang/ ge sar dang thad? chu dri zhim pa las ci snyed pa las sprin sreg bya'o/ /rgyas ba la ni/ yam shing de rnams nyid las sboms su chag gang la
235b2(rgyud 'grel): srid du khru gang tsam 'o ma dang zho dang/ mar la bzhags te dri zhim po'i spos chu la sbyangs la/ mngar gsum la btags pa'i 'bras chang bzab po'i bshes dang/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsres pa'i til nag po dang zho dang
235b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras chen mar dang bcas pa dang/ sha ta puShpa? dang/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang/ 'bras sha li dang/ nag ge sar dang/ kar Ni ka'i me tog dang/ 'bru rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang/ song ldeng dang/ ko bi da ra dang/ ba la ta ka
235b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang? ma da na 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i shing kha? ba dang/ tsher na can dang/ ro bsregs pa'i thal ba can dang/ mgal dum gyi yam shing rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba gas pa sor bcu'i tshad tsam/ dug dang khrag dang yungs? mar la btags pa'i rtse mo
235b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyi ga rno ba dang/ yungs nag dang/ yungs mar dang/ khrag dang/ lan tsha dang/ skye tshe dang ni ma pa'i lo ma dang/ ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang/ rkang rjes kyi sa dang/ bong bu dang/ snga mo la sogs pa'i rtul? pa dang/ khyim bya'i zhag dang khyad rog
235b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i shog pa dang/ gcig? dang/ rtug? pa dang/ tsher ma dang/ me rus kyi phye ma dang/ sprang rtsi la sogs pa dang/ ci rnyed pa 'am/ rdzas re re zhing dug dang/ khrag dang lam? tshwa dang skye tshe dang/ da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba la btags pa'i rdzas
235b7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams thal ba dang/ sol ba 'am phub ma las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dbang gi las la ni/ tsam pa ka dang/ a sho da dang/ ba ku la dang/ bri yang ku dang/ la ku tsa la so ba'i yaM shing sor lnga ba
236a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dab ma dang bcas po dang ga'i? dris bu dang/ me tog sgyur? po rnams dang/ gzhan yang rang gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni de nyid dang cher ma lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyin sreg
236a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ u dum pa ra pa la sha/ plak+Sha? dang n+ya kro to/ /sang ldeng dang ni a na ka dang/ /a mra be ta ka ta dang/ a ma dya dang sha mi dang/ a da marka las byung dang/ a shad tha dang bcas pa ni/ /yam bsreg shing ni bcu gnyis bstan/ /gsor? zhing drang
236a3(rgyud 'grel): la mtho gang tsam/ /rtse gnyis dri zhim legs par btags/ /am shing dag na rtse gcig tu/ /las rnams kun la bsreg par bya/ /zhi ba'i bsreg bya gang cung zad/ /gang yang rgyas pa'i bsreg bya dang/ /bdag gi zas te de dag kun/ /nyin re
236a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA mthar bcas dbul/ /mar la btags pa'i gu gul dang/ /sA la'i thang chu la sogs pa/ /gsang sngags lha yi bye brag gis/ /sbyor srog la ni dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa/ /las thun rang sngags ji bzhin bzla
236a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams kyi mtshan nyid do// //zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi shing srog chags med pa rnams la thab khung las cung zad dpa' ba 'am/ dgon pa'i pa? lang gi lci ba'i bung shing bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i pa lang gi lci ba ma
236a6(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa ji skad du bshad ba'i bud shing rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni kha ba dang/ che ba dang /dri mi zhim pa'i bud shing dang dur khrod kyi shing dam/ bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtul pa 'am/ shing shin tu skams ba'o 
236a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya ba la ni ni ma pa dang/ a mra'i shing dang gzhan yang me tog dang bcas pa'i shing ngo/ /dgug pa la ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'o/ /las thams cad pa la ni las dang rjes su mthun pa'i bud shing gis bya'o/ /bud shing gi mtshan nyid do//
236b1(rgyud 'grel): gser ram dngul lam rdo 'am shing dam sa'i dngul las byas pa 'am/ dung chos sam/ nya phyis sam/ shel las byas pa'i snod legs par bkrus pa dri zhim po'i spos kyis legs par gdugs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod du
236b2(rgyud 'grel): chu bo 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ chu mig gam/ khron pa 'am/ g.ya' chu 'am/ dgod mo la sogs pa'i chu ngogs gtsang ma skye bo mang pos bsten pa ma yin pa/ rgyal po dang nye ba ma yin pa/ ba lang dang/ bong bu dang/ ra lug
236b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rta dang/ me he dang/ glang po che rnams kyis sems par ma byas pa'i chu dogs las/ chu shin tu dang ba/ snod gzhan gyis ma reg ba/ rigs ngan dang/ sme sha can dang/ bcas pas bsten pa 'am/ ngan cing dman pa la 'jug pa dang/ mi'u
236b4(rgyud 'grel): thung dang/ zhar ba dang/ long pa dang/ mdze can dang/ sha kra la sogs pa'i nang kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyis ma mthong zhing ma reg pa'i chus mchod yon gyi snod bkang la/ tsan dan dang/ ga bur gyis bsges shing/ dzA nyi dang me li ka
236b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ spos dri zhim pos bdug pa'i mchod yon legs par brdungs pa'i gser gyi gdu bu dang gsang byed la sogs pa btags pa'i lag pa dang/ rang gi lha'i sngags sam/ rang gi rtog pa las bshad
236b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stags lan bdun bzlas la g.yon phyogs su bzhag par bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni dri dkar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu rang gi lha'i sngags swA hA'i mdza' dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du ni rgyas pa la ni dri ser po la sogs pa
236b7(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyar ba'i chu til dang zho ru bcas pa o gyi mdza' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni dri nag po dang sbyar ba ni chu khrag dang/ kro tra pa dang bcas gcin dang bcas pa la phaT kyi mdza' dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o/ /dbar la ni dri
237a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu bo'i mdza' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni dza'i mdza' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /thams cad du yang dri la sogs pa ni las dang rjes su mthun par
237a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag bar bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid do// //de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi sngags kyis las thams cad pa'i chu'i snod dang/ mchod yon gyi snod la bzlas
237a3(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi g.yon phyogs su gzhag nas de dag nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsangs pa'i bud shing la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams rang gi g.yas phyogs su gzhag bar bya'o/ /gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa'i las
237a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni bsad pa dang/ dgod pa go bzlog ste bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gi rtse mo gnyis mche bar bya ste/ khar gzhag pa 'di ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra shi khe re ru Ta
237a5(rgyud 'grel): ma Ta/ ces bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri 'degs pa ltar bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdzas bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid do// //zhi ba la ni rang gi lha'i chos kyi yi ge las thab khung bskyed la de'i dbus su yi ge
237a6(rgyud 'grel): raM sum mdo ris mtshan dang bcas pas oM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du gnas pa'i i las byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa dung dang/ kun da lta bu'i pa pa kI me mig gsum pa ral
237a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang cod pan du ldan pa lag pa bzhi g.yas pas dbyug pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa byin pa/ g.yon na gun de dang phreng ba thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i
237b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dkar po 'phro bar bsam par bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus na rgyas pa'i me dbang chen zhes bya ba ral pa dang cod pan thogs pa mig gsum
237b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas na dbyug pa thogs pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa g.yon na phreng ba dang/ gun de thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang/ mchod phyir thogs ser por ldan pa/ 'od zer ser po gtong ba'i tshogs kyis sems can ma lus
237b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khams kyi stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ dpal rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi me bsam par bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng kha dog dmar zhing nyi ma 'char ka lta bur 'od
237b4(rgyud 'grel): zer dmar po rab tu 'gyed pa/ lag pa bzhi pa g.yas na dbyug pa dang/ lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang 'gun de thogs pa/ rgyan dang gos dang phreng ba dang/ dri dang byug pa dang/ mchod phyir thogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa mig gsum
237b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ral pa'i tshogs dang/ cod pan dang ldan pa'i dbang gi las la bsgom par bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM las byung ba'i mig gsum pa/ lag pa bzhi pa du ba'i
237b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog can mig g.yo ba/ g.yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang 'gun de thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba shas cher khro zhing mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ khros shing shas cher/
237b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba rgyan dang gos dang/ mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa nag po dang ldan pa/ 'od zer nag po'i phreng ba rnams kyis srid pa gsum khyab par byed pa'i rlung zhes bya ba'i me gsad pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o
238a1(rgyud 'grel): de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me 'am rgyun zhag gi me 'am/ bram ze tha mal pa'i mis bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rgyal po 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i me 'am/ dgon pa'i me 'am
238a2(rgyud 'grel): nags mched pa'i mes bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni dur khrod kyi me 'am/ rus pa 'am rdo las byung ba'i me 'am/ gdol ba'i khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /dbang la ni smad 'tshong ma 'am/ rje'u rigs kyi khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o
238a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang rol mo pa 'am/ lam du pus pa'i mes bya'o/ /me'i mtshan nyid da// //dgang gzar ni gser ram dngul gyi rgyu las byas pa 'am/ mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i
238a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs lta bu de'i u ba skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i mthe bo sor sum cu rtsa bzhi rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pas gzung du rung ba/ de'i rtse mo'i char sor bzhi pa/ kha zur sor bzhi pa/ zabs su sor gnyis pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan
238a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ khu ba byung ba'i bu gsor gcig tsam de'i mchu sor bzhi pa la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che sor drug pa bya'o/ /blugs gzar ni yu ba khru gang tsam pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu la kha'i rgyar sor gnyis pa/
238a6(rgyud 'grel): zabs su sor gcig pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa/ yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che bya'o/ /dgang gzar med na sor mo lnga gzhibs nas dgang blugs byas la/ srin lag dang gung mo dang mthe bo gzhibs pas ni sreg blugs
238a7(rgyud 'grel): cig shos bya'o/ /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do// //de nas legs par khrus shing yan lag dris bsgos la ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyan dang/ gos la sogs pa dang ldan pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang
238b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbye ba dang/ bskrad pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg gi las bya ba dang ldan zhing rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pa med par sems can thams cad la phan
238b2(rgyud 'grel): par brtson pas ji skad du gsungs pa thams cad bya'o/ /de la zhi ba la ni gos dang cod pan dang/ rgyan dkar po dang ldan zhing gsang byed dang bcas pa gdu bu dang bcas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod bya zhing byams pa
238b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang ldan pas mi smra bar 'jam zhing bde ba'i stan nang tshangs can la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug nas/ lag pa'i pad+ma gnyis kyi gru mo'i mthar thug gi bar du dri zhim pos legs par byugs la/ phyi dro'i dus su shar du bltas te/ blos
238b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ ji srid bdag gam gzhan zhi bar mngon par 'dod pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid du zhi ba'i las bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du phreng ba dang byug pa dang gos ser po dang
238b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang yid rab tu dga' bas zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ phyi ma'i nya'i bar du ji srid mngon par 'dod pa rgyas par gyur pa de srid du byang du kha bltas te/ dga' ba dang ldan pas snga dro'i dus su
238b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i las bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni khros shing rgyan dang gos sngon po 'am/ khrag gis spags pa'i gos bgos la stan sra ba la lho phyogs su kha bltas te/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan pa 'am/ stan mad par rkang bas
238b7(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa mnan zhing/ sos so 'cha' ba dang/ mig mi 'gul ba dang/ gdeng gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang/ snying rje chen pos dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa'i bdud dang dgra rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ zla ba mar ngo'i nyin zhag gang yang khu
239a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la khro bo nyin tshad mar bya ste/ nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la mngon spyod kyi las bya'o/ /dbang la ni khro ba med pa dang/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par sems can ma lus pa gdon pa la chags pas gos
239a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dmar po dang ldan pas stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ kha nub bam byang du bltas la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi sprul pa'i me lha las la bod
239a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs la de bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos blangs pas skor phyogs su lan gsum bsangs la gtsang zhing skam pa'i rtswa dang bcas pa'i bud shing bcug la rlung yab kyi rlung dang/
239a4(rgyud 'grel): oM dzwa la hUM/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis spar la/ dam tshig sems dpa' thab kyi dbus su bsams nas/ phyag rgya 'di sngags dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs
239a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ mthe bo'i rtse mo srin lag gi tshigs kyi rtsa bar bzhag la dgug pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang du bskyod la mngon par 'dod pa'i me'i sngags 'don zhing spyan drang bar bya'o/ /e hye hi mahA b+hu ta de ba ri Shi/ dri dza satwa ma gri
