239a6(rgyud 'grel): hi twa a hU ti mahA ra smin man ni hi ho b+ha ba/ oM pa po ka agna ye swAhA/ zhi ba la'o/ /rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du/ oM ma hen+d+ra agna ye swAhA/ dbang la ni/ oM ka ma agna ye swAhA/ mngon spyod la ni/ oM kro d+ha agna ye dza hi trau tra
239a7(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM che ge mo mA pa ya hUM phaT/ me lha 'ongs pa dang/ sngar bshad pa'i bsang gtor gyi cho gas bsangs la mchod yon dbul lo/ /i yaM argam ma yi dad taM grih+Na sid+d+hi ci me pra yats+tsha swAhA/ zhes brjod la lag pa gnyis kyis mdun
239b1(rgyud 'grel): du mchod yon phul lo/ /zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o/ //de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i dang mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du gyur pas/
239b2(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi snying po lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis nye bar gsal bar sbar la/ de'i lce dang dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi kha la de nyid kyi sa bon rnam par bkod de/ brla dang pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag pa bcug la dang por blugs gzar
239b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa'i las la zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo/ /mngon spyod la shin du gdangs par dug dang bcas pa'i yungs mar dbul lo/ /gnas skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis
239b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa/ la la ni spyan gnyis la dbul bar bya ste/ bltas pa tsam nyid kyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i phyir rol la ni dpral bar ro/ /la la ni mgo la'o/ /la la ni thugs kar ro/ /la la ni lte ba'i gnas
239b5(rgyud 'grel): su'o/ /la la ni mdun du dbul bar bya'o/ /zhes sna tshogs par rtog par byed pa'i gnas rab tu dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po la gnas kyi nges pa
239b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa yin te/ de las gsungs pa/ zas ni rdzas par gyur pa yis/ /yid dga' ba la sogs par 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad pa chen po yis/ /sbyin sreg las ni nges par bya zhes gsungs te/ de bas na zas kyi bya ba byed par bsam par bya'o/ /
239b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar 'khor lo sgyur ba gling bzhi'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni rin po che bdun gyi rgyu las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams dang ldan pa phan zhing bde bar rnam par 'du ba'i zas la spyod par byed do/ /de bzhin
240a1(rgyud 'grel): du gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po yang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i gling
240a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhir gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mdzad pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che'i snod du gsang sngags kyi yi ge thams cad dang ldan pa dri nga ba thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa/ zhi ba
240a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ drag po la sogs pa'i ro thams cad dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar rnam par smin pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /snod rnams ni las dang rjes su mthun par bya ste/ de la snod kyi nges pa'i rim
240a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di yin no/ /zhi ba la ni dngul gyi snod do/ /rgyas pa la ni gser gyi snod do/ /dbang la ni zangs kyi snod do/ /mngon spyod la ni 'khar ba'i snod dam lcags kyi snod phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga la brtag par bya'o/ /nang gi sbyin sreg gi rim
240a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'di yin no/ /'di ltar phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la las dang rjes su mthun par snod rnams bsams la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang/ mthe'u chung lcags sgrog du spral bas/ blugs gzar bzung la sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du
240a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhag la/ shin tu sbyangs shing legs par bzhu ba'i mar gyi dgang blugs phul la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma brtag par bya'o/ /dbyibs dang/ mdog dang dri dag las/ dge dang mi dge yongs brtags la/ /dang po byas nas shes byas
240a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mtshan ma ngan pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /zhi ba yis ni cho ga yis/ /mnyam par gzhag la sbyin sreg bya/ /nyes pa'i dgos pa las 'das nas/ /phyi nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /dbyibs ni glang po che dang/ rta dang khyu mchog dang/ rdo rje dang/ dung dang
240b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ nya dang/ dpal be'u dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ buM pa dang/ g.yung drung dang/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar lta bu bsngags so/ /mdog ni 'thon ka dang/ dkar po dang/ byu ru bcag pa lta bu dang/ lham bu chu gsher dang leb rgan
240b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang/ baiDUrya dang gser zhun ma lta bu dang/ nyi ma 'bar ba dang/ g.yas su 'khyil cing shin tu snum pa sngags so/ /sgra ni char sprin gyi 'brug sgra dang/ rgya mtsho dang dung pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ rdza rnga dang rnga bo che dang/ rnga rings dang khyu mchog dang/
240b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba dang/ ka la bing ka dang/ ngang pa dang rma bya la sogs pa lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsngags so/ /dri ni pad+ma dang/ utpal dang/ ku mu ta dang/ dri bzangs dang tsam pa ka dang/ ba ku la dang/ ma la ti dang/ ba la ya dang/ gur gum dang/ gla
240b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dri bsngags so/ /de dag las bzlog pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te/ dbyibs su ni mdud rtse lta bu dang/ zhi ba lta bu dang/ ba lang gi mdog lta bu la sogs pa ni mi shis shing smad par bya ba yin no/ /mdog ni kha dog ngan
240b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ldang ba dang/ sngon po dang/ nag po dang/ dung kha dang/ til mar dang/ rtsub pa dang/ pa la sha la sogs pa'i mdog ni mi shis so/ /dri ni mi ro'i dri dang/ dri ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i smad pa'i rdul dang/ byi la dang/ ma he dang/ khyi dang/ sbrul
240b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nya'i zhag la sogs pa'i dri ni smad pa yin no/ /sbra ni bong bu dang/ khyi dang ce spyad la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing 'ur 'ur po dang/ sim sim zer ba'i sgra ni mi shis pa yin no/ /du ba mang ba dang/ rnam par 'phro ba dang/ rim gyis ldang ba dang/ cung
240b7(rgyud 'grel): zad cung zad 'bar ba dang/ me lce 'chad pa dang/ gzi brjid med pa dang/ rtsub cing gnag pa sprin dang/ pa la sha'i mdog can ni smad par bya ba yin no/ /de ltar bgegs dang bcas par shes nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas bsad
241a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing rnam par sbyangs la/ yang dag par gsungs te/ mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang rang gis sngags kyis bsangs la/ dang por blugs gzar gyis dgang gzar dgang blugs gsum mam bdun
241a2(rgyud 'grel): me'i rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg byas la/ blugs gzar la sogs pas mar la sogs pa'i dgang blugs gsum mam/ bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /'dir rim pa ni lam shing gis me 'bar ba byas pa la mar dang/ de nas til de'i 'og tu 'bras
241a3(rgyud 'grel): can la sogs pa de nas zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du bya'o/ /yam shing dang mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /zho dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang/ 'thor 'thung dang til la sogs pa ni phyag
241a4(rgyud 'grel): du'o/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /bdug spos ni 'od 'bar ba la'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o/ /mchod yon dang mar me mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes la la dag zer ro/ /de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor la sogs
241a5(rgyud 'grel): ba byas la/ me lha thab khung du 'bar ba'i rnam pa 'am/ rang gi gzugs kyis me'i phyogs su bzhag par bya'o/ /'di la log par bsgrub pa dag yod de/ la la ni thab kyi phyi rol du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do/ /la la ni gshegs su
241a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol bdag byed do/ /la la ni thab khung de nyid kyi nang du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do/ /de las thab kyi phyi rol du 'jog pa dang/ gshegs su gsol ba ni mi rigs te/ lha rnams zhal ni me yin te/ /sbyin sreg de nyid me la gnas//
241a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas/ /bgyis bas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas mes stang par sbyin sreg byed pa ni mi ro'i khar zan stob pa dang 'dra bar don med par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me yi gnas ni
241b1(rgyud 'grel): mi shes par/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg las byed pa/ /de ni sbyin sreg las byas min/ /las kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ma yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /thab khung gi phyogs gcig tu bkod pa dang/ 'bar ba'i rnam par yongs su gyur par byas ba la yang 'jig
241b2(rgyud 'grel): rten las 'das pa'i lha mi snang bar 'gyur bas mi rigs/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi me lce yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las ma
241b3(rgyud 'grel): lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me yi thugs ka'i zla ba dang/ pad+ma'i steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang kha dog la sogs pa bsams la/ yang dag
241b4(rgyud 'grel): par mchod cing 'thor 'thung sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /mchod yon dbul ba dang/ me gnas kyi mtshan nyid do// //de la zhi ba la ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg gi yo byad rnams bsangs
241b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ me thab kyi dbus su sku mdog dkar zhing zhi ba/ na bza' dkar po bsnams pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs par oM badzra b+hA tu swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi
241b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcas pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /rgyas pa la de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dgyes shing mgu ba/ na bza' ser po bsnams shing pad+ma ser po la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /mngon sbyod la ni de bzhin
241b7(rgyud 'grel): du gshin rje gshed du 'dug pa rgyan dang/ na bza' nag po dang ldan zhing khros pa yi ge hUM las byung ba sngar bshad pa'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /dbang la ni yi ge ho las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pa rgyan dang na bza' dmar po
242a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni de bzhin du yi ge dza las rdo rje rgyal po bsam par bya'o/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid zhi ba la sogs
242a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang rkang mgyogs dang/ tshangs pa'i skud pa dang/ gser sgyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len
242a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir cho ga 'dis gsang sngags tshim par bya ba dang/ gzi bskyed pa dang/ yang dag par 'bar bar byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi dgos gnyis
242a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis las rang gi lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la pad+ma'i spubs kyi nang du bcug ste tshon gyis byugs nas pad+ma'i skud pas dkris la/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bkang ste/ a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ pad+ma'i ge sar phye mar btags pas gtor
242a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ ga bur dang bdug pas bdugs te zhag gcig smyung bar gnas la de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsang sngags 'di dang dri dkar po dang sbyar ba'i chu rgyun phra bas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM sarba de ba ta a tsid tya a mri ta d+ha ro swAhA/
242a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM phaT ni swAhA/ rims kyis thams cad zhugs par gyur pa dang/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la/ bskyon te bskur bar bya'o/ /de ltar gsang sngags kyi lha tshim par byas na/ dngos grub myur du stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid bskyed pa
242a7(rgyud 'grel): dang tshim par bya ba ni gsang sngags ma 'dis blugs gzar dang mar gyi sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /oM h+ri khaM swAhA/ de ltar sbyin sreg dang chu la gshegs su gsol ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro
242b1(rgyud 'grel): de la sreg par bya ba ni mar dang til dang/ 'bras dang zho dang/ 'bras chan la sogs pa'o/ /gshegs su gsol pa'i rdzas ni pad+ma dang/ utpa la dang/ tsa ba ka dang/ ma li ka dang/ dzA ti'i me tog gi rigs rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /me tog de
242b2(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid kyis mchod pa dang sreg blugs kyang bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gis grangs rdzogs pa dang/ tha mar oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos mar gyi sreg blugs lan gsum
242b3(rgyud 'grel): mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gzi bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i mthar dgang blugs phul la/ mchod yon dang/ zhal bsil dang/ 'thor 'thung gsol te/ yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos
242b4(rgyud 'grel): grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol te de nas sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod nas gyen du dkrol te/ oM kri to ba sarbba satwA rtha? sid+d+hi ma da t+twa ya thA nu ga /gats+tsha d+hA ma bi Sha yaM bud d+ha pu na ra ga na
242b5(rgyud 'grel): na tu/ zhes brjod la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol nas/ sprul pa'i me thab kyi dbus su bsams la yang dag par mchod de/ bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa sbyin la sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams sbyin sreg bya ste/ mthar
242b6(rgyud 'grel): dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung yang byin nas bsang gtor yang byas la mchod nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la/ me lha sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid bcings la/ mthe bong bsgreng ste/ ya hi ya hi
242b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ gshegs su gsal lo/ /de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas bsrung ba dang bdag bsrung ba byas la/ yi ge brgya pa len bdun bzlas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la
243a1(rgyud 'grel): legs par ldang bar bya'o/ /dngos grub ma lus 'byung gnyis mtshor gyur cing/ dpag med bde bskyed sbyin sreg de nyid ni/ /'jam bcas mi gnas grags pa zhes bya ba/ /sems can phan phyir yang dag bshad pa yi
243a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dam par bshad pa'i kun stong bdag nyid thab khung ni/ /rnam pa kun tu thog mdza' med pa'i pad+ma rdo rje ldan/ /nam mkha' i des ltar yangs la btags pa tsam gyis sa bon la/ /blo ngan bsregs nas shin tu 'bar la nyon mongs zhi rab zhi//
243a3(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs sras bcas sngags kyis 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'gro bas 'khyud/ /srid pa gsum gyis thab du? 'dus byas dngos po thams cad bsreg /blo gros ngan pa shin tu bsregs pas kun rtog kun las grol/ /nyon mongs gdung ba zhi
243a4(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa'i zhi ba'i gdugs su bgyis/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu rnam par rtog dra ba rnams/ /bsreg par bya zhes thub pa'i zla ba dag gis gsungs/ /bgegs dang dngos grub rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam/ /gnyid med de nyid dun rnam par
243a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'ang stong pa yin/ /phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'dir bshad pa/ /sbyin sreg cho ga shes pa la/ /rnam pa kun duAng dga' phyir ro/ /nam mkha' i dbyings dang mnyam par rjes 'gro rab gnas chos/ /de bzhin gshegs
243a6(rgyud 'grel): pas glegs baM rdo rje dril bu dag /'jig rten don dam mi shes 'di na'ang mgon po yis/ /'jig rten phan par bzhed pas rab gnas mdzad pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya dang sngags dang/ stang stabs dang bzlas brjod
243a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sbyin sreg dang mchod pa dang/ las la sbyar ba dang/ slang bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la de kho na bcu yin par gsungs/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shig mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga
243b1(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /las rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/ /lha khang mchod rten sku gzugs dang/ /dam chos glegs baM ras ris dag /zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang/ /bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyes pa/ /shes nas mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ /rab tu
243b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa byed par 'os/ /bsod nams 'bel bar bya ba'i phyir?/ /gtsug lag khang sogs khyad 'phags bya/ /steng g.yogs mchod rten gnas rnams dang/ /khyim dang lha yi khang par yang/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas pa/ /cho ga las
243b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs bzhin du bya/ /cho ga nyams par mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag tu smod pa dang/ /tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang/ /'jig rten gzhan duAng 'jigs chen 'byung/ /de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyi ni ci nus dang/ /de bzhin cho ga
243b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs tshul gyis/ /kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya/ /de ltar byas na bsod nams che/ /mthong dang ma mthong skye 'gyur la/ /sngags pa bzang pos sku gzugs ni/ /dgos par gyur pa de las byung/ /gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni/ /yun ring
243b5(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang ma mchod na/ /ji srid mchod gnas ma gyur par/ /de las mi shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar skyes bu la la zhing/ /rigs dang mtshan nyid med pa dag /'jig rten kun gyis bkur ni bskyed/ /sku gzugs dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur/ /sku gzugs
243b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas ma byas bar/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod 'gyur ba/ /sngags dang bral bas thal bar ni/ /sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bres bu med/ /de bzhin 'dir ni sngags med gnas/ /chos ? mchod par byed ba gang/ /las de yi ni rnam smin
243b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /skye ba kun tu mchod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir rab tu gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la rgyal bas rab tu gnas par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas
244a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu gnas gyur kyang/ /de ni gang la'ang gnas pa med/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du/ /gnas par thams cad rab tu brtag /'jig rten kun rdzob la gnas nas/ /rab tu gnas par yongs brtags
244a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /don dam tshul du gang zhig la/ /gang gis gang du rab gnas bya/ /bzod nas zhi zhing skye med la/ /'di lta'i rab gnas ji ltar bya/ /sems can dang po'i las can gyi/ /rgyud rnams yang dag sbyang phyir byas/ /de la dang por re zhig
244a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rtags pa'i gnas nye bar sbyangs par/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bla re dang/ ba dan rnams bsgreng la/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang/ mchog tu gsol bas gsol ba btab pa'i slob dpon gyis nyi ma shis pa
244a4(rgyud 'grel): dang skar ma bzang po la slob dpon shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ spyan 'byed kyi nang du song ste/ rigs lngar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la phyag byas te/ de dang 'bral ba'i
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du sa yongs su gzung ba dang/ thig gdab cing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa dang/ tshon gyi las la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de
244a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon phul la sa ma ya stwaM sa ma ya stwaM/ a haM zhes bya ba sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums 'jug pa/ /de bzhin gzugs 'dir
244a7(rgyud 'grel): khyed bzhugs mdzod/ /'dir bzhugs rtag tu mgon por ni/ /gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir/ /che ge mo'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /sku gzugs lhag par gnas byas la/ /de nas dbang bskur brtsam
244b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /slob ma smyung bar gnas pa yis/ /bya ba 'di dag thams cad sbyod/ /sngags pa gang dag ci sgom dang/ /cho ga mchod la sogs pa bya/ /g.yo med pa yis byas gyur na/ /mchod sbyin chen po'i 'bras bu thob/ /spyan drangs gdan la
244b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs gsol dang/ /de bzhin mchod yon me tog dang/ /spos dang mar me lha bshos te/ /mchod pa sngags dang ldan par dbul/ /sku gzugs shar du zhal bstan la/ /ras ni ser pos g.yog par bya/ /sbyangs pas legs par bsal
244b3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /de nas sngags 'dis yungs kar ni/ /chu 'am yang na me nang du/ /lan cig yongs su gtor bar bya/ /oM sarbba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i skur bsams la dbu la yi ge
244b4(rgyud 'grel): oM/ zhal la yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): /thugs kar yi ge hUM dgod do/ /yang na gang dang gang gi sa bon gang yin pa de/ de'i thugs kar dgod par bya'o/ /de nas der ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bsal bsgrub po/
244b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas til mar dri can gyis bskus la dur ba'i bir gyis sbyang zhing bkru'o/ /til mar gyi sngags ni oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bum pa lnga pa 'am brgyad rin po che lnga dang/ 'bru lnga sman lnga dang ldan zhing dri zhim po'i spos chus
244b6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gang ba/ mgul ba ras bzang po bcings la/ a mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa dbang bskur ba'i don du sngags mngon par bzla bar bya'o/ /oM bi shud+d+ha badzro da ka hUM/ oM dzi na dzik swAhA/ oM A ro lik swAhA/ oM badzra d+h+rik swAhA
244b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes rigs kyi dbye bas mngon par bzla bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang/ de bzhin rig pa spyad dang ni/ /bkra shis zhes grags yid 'ong ba'i/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi khrus gsol
245a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ spyan gyi sngags ni/ oM ru ru sphu ru tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne/ sarbba aM rtha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ lugs ma
245a2(rgyud 'grel): khrus ni bya bar gsungs/ /ri me me long dag la bkru/ /ras ris chu ni med bya 'am/ /lag pas slar yang bsang gtor bya/ /ga bur gur gum bcas pa yis/ /zas dkar zung gis dga' bar bya/ /oM badzra b+ha ba se swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he swAhA/ oM
245a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra a b+hi r+Na bi b+hu Sha Ne swAhA/ dkyil 'khor dbus su bcug nas ni/ /de nas rang gi dam tshig bsgrags/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bskul bas/ /ci rigs par ni dbang bskur bya/ /oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a:/ de bzhin du ni cod pan dang dar dpyangs
245a4(rgyud 'grel): bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de yang 'og tu shin du dud pa dang/ de ni mi yo drang por ni/ /sku gzugs yang dag gzhag bya ste/ /de ltar min na nyes bskyed 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /de bzhin mar me na bza' ste/ /de
245a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gsang sngags ldan bar ni/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra puShpe hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra gand+he hUM/ sngags kyis bsang byas bshos bsdogs te/ /gser las byas pa'i thur ma yis/ /spyan ni dbye ba byas nas ni/ /zhal
245a6(rgyud 'grel): zas de na mkhas pas bstab/ /oM badzra tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu baM sho d+ha ne swAhA/ oM di bya an na saM mA d+hi d+hya na pra Na ne swAhA/ de ltar byas nas de nas yang/ /shes rab can gyi slob ma gzhug /khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i/ /sku gzugs
245a7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni khyad par du/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa/ /de ni ngas bcas byed du bcug /khyed kyis de ni kun rdzogs pas/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis/ /de bas dbang bskur zhing dam tshig la gnas par byas nas/ /sbyin blugs stong pa?
245b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyed dam de'i phyed phyed kyi mngar gsum dang bsres pa'i 'bru thams cad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bdag nyid dang ni slob ma kun/ /zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bya'i phyir/ /thab khung zur ni bzhi pa la/ /'o ma can shing bud shing byas/ /de yi yam shing
245b2(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma mar/ /bshos kyi lhag ma dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra A yu(rgyud 'grel): She swAhA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga las gsungs pa bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang
245b3(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par yid kyis sngags 'dis bskyed par bya'o/ /oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): de nas lhag par gnas pa dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa
245b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma byin te/ yang mchod pa byas nas rab tu gnas pa bya'o/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+huM khaM badzrI b+ha ba driDha tiSh+Tha b+huM khaM/ zhes bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
245b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing/ legs par rab tu gnas pa bsams la buM pa lnga 'am/ brgyad dam bcu drug spos chus yongs su gang zhing/ mngon par bsngags pas gtsug lag
245b6(rgyud 'grel): khang ma lus par bsang gtor bya'o/ /de'i sngags mi oM badzro da ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas gtsug lag khang skyod du nag po chen po dgug pa dang/ gzhug
245b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba byas la rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste/ ji srid gtsug lag khang 'di gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs
246a1(rgyud 'grel): shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten yang lhag par gnas par dang/ mchod yon dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa dang por byas la/ yi ge bruM las rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo rje dbyings
246a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig pa'i
246a3(rgyud 'grel): lha thams cad la spyan drangs te/ bcug la mchod rten du bzhag ste/ mnyes par byas la/ khrus khang mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ oM sarbe ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/
246a4(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ruM traM tra tiSh+Tha zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams par bya'o/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs
246a5(rgyud 'grel): bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang/ ras ris dang glegs bam dag ni me long nyid la bkru'o/ /lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
246a6(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam pa yongs su gyur nas/ kun rdzob dang don dam par ston par bsams la/ oM pradz+nye sh+ru ti smri ti ma hi bi dza ye swAhA/ zhes pa dang/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): thaM zhes bya bas kyang rab tu gnas pa dang/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sngags
246a7(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'i glegs bam ni rdo rje chos yi ge'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi gzugs kyi skus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'chang thams cad
246b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa ni sku gzugs spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas sil snyan dang/ rol mo byas la gshegs su gsol lo/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha
246b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /de sras tshangs? sogs lha tshogs kun/ /gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni/ /nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs/ /sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang/ /bde legs chen po kun mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slar
246b3(rgyud 'grel): yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /gang 'di sku gzugs bskal pa 'am/ /bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing/ /sa dang me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang/ /bu dang che ba rnams
246b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs te/ /rab dga' yid bder gyur nas ni/ /rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhud/ /shes rab ye shes dri med pa'i/ /mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang/ /bye brag rnams ni bshad par bya/ /gser sogs las
246b5(rgyud 'grel): byas rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga 'od zer bcas pa la/ /chad? zungs cha gsum mdzes pa dang/ /rab dang rtse mo'i bye brag can/ /tshad ni sor ni bzhi dang ni/ /brgyad dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dang/ /bcu drug de bzhin nyi shu ste/ /de las nyungs dang lhag par min/ /rdo rje
246b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po nges pa yi/ /tshad yin par ni bshad pa yin/ /mdzes shing mtshan sa 'jam pa dang/ /brtan zhing ma gas sra bar 'gyur/ /sor bzhi pa yi tshad dag ni/ /de las nyis 'gyur tha ma yin/ /sum gyur rdo rje bar? ma ste/ /bzhi 'gyur dag ni mchog yin
246b7(rgyud 'grel): chur ni gsum du byas pa yi/ /dbus ma'i cha ni zlum por bya/ /dkyil ma brgyad chas mtho bar bya/ /zlum po rwa ni rtse gsum la/ /cha gcig dbus su gnas par bya/ /khro gnyer sna tshogs ldan pa dang/ /rin chen 'dab ma myu gu dang/ /pad+ma de bzhin gnyis su bya
247a1(rgyud 'grel): rwa? ni cha gsum gnas pa las/ /cha gcig dag ni dkyil du bzhag /sor gcig brgyad char bya ba ni/ /dbus ma'i rwa yi bar zhes bya/ /gzhan rnams cho ga ji bzhin bya/ /zur bzhi shin tu rno ba dang/ /dkyil sbom rtse mo
247a2(rgyud 'grel): phra ba la/ /'og bag gsum dang ldan zhing rdzogs/ /dbus ma lhag bcas mdzes par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs kyi char bzhag pa'i/ /rwa gzhan dag ni yan lag bzhi/ /zhing dbus su gug pa dang/ /dbus ma rwa la 'dud pa ste/ /rgya ni dbus
247a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rwa yi phyed/ /nas 'bru tsam gyis ma reg pa'o/ /chu srin mche ba gtsigs 'dra ba'i/ /chu srin kha nas 'byung bar bya/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid rwa/ /pad+ma 'khor lo la gnas pa/ /rno dang mi rno gyes pa dang/ /zhi ba dag dang rnam pa bzhi//

247a6(rgyud 'grel): dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las/ /sgrub pa pos ni nges par 'chang ba yi/ /rdo rje gang yin de ni 'dir bshad bya/ /sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang/ /mchog gi tshad ni sor yang nyi shu'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni//

247b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi/ /gnod sbyin sde 'joms pa la lcags kyi'o/ /don gzhan la ni seng ldeng dpal dar tshe/ /nad med nor rdzas pa ni bil? ba'o/ /gnod sbyin ma bsgrub pa la ma d+hu'i shing/ /chos kyi don du a shwa las byas shing/ /gsal zhing rtse mo? ?

249a6(rgyud 'grel): pas de bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /gzhan du slob dpon slob ma dag /nges par nyams par 'byung 'gyur zhing/ 'jig rten gsum gyis dbyas? pa dang/ /don grub 'bras buAng ring bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs
249a7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi mchog /dam tshig shes rab can gyis bsrung/ /srog gi phyir yang dor mi bya/ /mkhas pas legs par 'thas pa'am/ /legs par bris pa nyid rung gi /bar ma dor gyur dngos pos ni/ /don med par ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /de la slob dpon la
249b1(rgyud 'grel): slob mas gang gi tshe/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gsol ba btab na/ /de'i tshe bdag gis sems can gyi khams 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i gnas la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /zhes lhag pa'i bsam
249b2(rgyud 'grel): pa skyed la/ khyed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad tshogs par gyur tam/ 'on te ma yin zhes slob ma la dri bar bya'o/ /gal te cung zad ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de'i tshe de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi
249b3(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyis snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge kaM las byung ba'i sdig pa mdog gnag cing mi sdug pa sha za lta bur sna'i rtse mor phyung ba dang/ yi ge hUM de yang snying gar yin te/ khro bo'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku g.yon brkyang pas gnas pa/
249b4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs pa gsus pa 'phyang ba sku mdog gnag pa/ thugs kar mche ba dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ston pa/ phyag g.yas na mche ba bsnams pa bsams la phyung ste/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da/ sarbba pA paM a sya hUM phaT ces bya
249b5(rgyud 'grel): bas de'i sdig pa thams cad zos nas/ slob ma de yang yi ge saM las kun tu bzang po'i skur rnam par bsams la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis tshul gyis de'i sems kyi bgegs phur bus btab la/ de'i 'od zer 'jigs pa stong
249b6(rgyud 'grel): phrag gis gdug pa thams cad yang dag par bsregs la/ slob pa'i sems mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ yi ge a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje yang der gnas par bsam
249b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyi phyir 'bad par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar/ /yang dag brtag par su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor rtag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas
250a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba bya bar bshad do/ /de la dang por re zhig bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas la/ mal nas langs te gdong grub pa
250a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad byas nas/ snga dro'i dus su g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang/ hUM phaT ces bya bas bgegs rnams bskrad la/ lha'i khang par zhugs te/ stan nang tshangs can la sogs par 'dug la/ yi ge a dang hUM
250a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis las zla ba dang/ rdo rje rims bzhin lag pa gnyis su bsams la/ gung mo dang 'dzub mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chud dang mthe bo rnams su/ oM hUM traM A khaM zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga rims bzhin du bkod la rdo rje thal mo bcings te/
250a4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sha na sI dA/ sarbba satwa nam sarbba sid+d+ha ya saM pa da dyan+taM/ sarbba ta thA ga ta shtsa/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha na tam/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA pa shud+d+ho nyahaM/ zhes bzhag la rang gi mgon dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyis bgegs
250a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsam par bya ste/ gang 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos pa la bgegs rnams 'byung ba 'di ni gnas med cing skabs med de/ bgegs la sogs pa ni tha mal pa'i rnam
250a6(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te de lta na yang yid mgu bar ma gyur na de'i tshe skad cig gis dpal rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams la/ yi ge hUM las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor bgegs ma lus pa
250a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ 'bar ba stong phrag gis 'jigs su rung ba/ lte ba man chad rtse gcig pa lta bu la sku stong khro bo'i rtsibs can la 'og nas bshad pa'i mdog dang/ phyag mtshan dang ldan par bsams la/ lha'i khang pa'i dbus su
250b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis gdab par bya'o/ /oM g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha:/ b+hA ta ya b+hA ta ya/ sarbba duSh+Ta na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarbba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rAdz+nyA pa ya ta kI ya/ bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la a hUM phaT/ 'og tu sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi bar
250b2(rgyud 'grel): du bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun tu phur bus btab la/ der gtogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kun nas sreg par byed pa'i phur bus bgegs rnams bskrad nas/ de'i steng du yi ge aM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa'i me ltar
250b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i 'od can nyi ma bya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bsams la/ shar dang nub dang byang dang/ lho'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su sngar bshad pa'i phur bu rnam par bsams nas/ dbus ma'i phur bu'i nyi ma'i gzugs las 'od byung nas
250b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos kyi phur bu rnams la de dag phan tshun du 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'dres par gyur pas bla re bzhin du sdug? por gyur/ 'og tu yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /yang na de bzhin du dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas la
250b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM las dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad mdun du 'dug ste/ bka' nod pa sprul? la/ oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi bka' bsgo ba dang/ de las lha la sogs pa'i bgegs ma lus par bkug par gyur nas/ rang gi phyogs su gnas par
250b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsams la/ yi ge hUM las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag na tho ba bsnams nas/ oM g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha:/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo zhing khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i khro bo'i phur bu'i spyi bo nas brdungs pa dang/ shar phyogs su
250b7(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug dang brgya byin zhes bya ba 'khor lo dang rdo rje thogs pa/ mdog sngon po dang/ ser po nam mkha' lding dang/ sa srungs la zhon pa'i lha gnyis g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa phur bus btab par bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi
251a1(rgyud 'grel): thab sbyor phyag na rdo rje'i thob bsnams pa dang/ 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi lhar gshin rje lag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ kha dog gnag pa ma he la zhon pa 'khor dang bcas pa phur bus btab pa dang/ stobs
251a2(rgyud 'grel): po che nub tu chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa zla ba lta bu'i mdog can sprul la zhon pa'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal pos me'i phyogs su me 'gun de dang/ bgrang phreng thogs pa kha dog dmar por skyes la zhon pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bskor
251a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /khro bo pad+ma mthar byed kyis bden bral gyi phyogs su bden bral mdog char sprin ltar nag po/ ral gri thogs pa yi dags la zhon la/ srin po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /khro bo chen po dbyug sngon gyis rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha du pa'i
251a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog can rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ ri dags sngo bsangs la zhon pa'o/ /khro bo mi g.yo pas dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dbang ldan mdog dkar po mdud rtse gsum pa thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa/ zla ba kham pas dbu rgyan byas pa'o/ khro
251a5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi steng du tshangs pa dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa mdog ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ spyi'u blugs dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da thogs pa'o/ /khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gis sa'i 'og tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po
251a6(rgyud 'grel): thag bzangs ris mdog ljang gu lag na ral gri thogs pa shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /khro bo chen po bgegs mthar byed rang nyid kyi byang du lus dan? po dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po mdog dkar po dang/ ser po bil ba dang la du lag na thogs pa mi
251a7(rgyud 'grel): dang byil la zhon pa/ gnod sbyin dang/ bgegs ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pa/ phur bus btab pa rab tu bsams par bya'o/ /khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang lte ba man chad sku smad kyi cha rdo rje'i rtse mo lta bu sku stong khro bo'i dbyibs can la/
251b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pas khyab 'jug la sogs pa bu dang chung ma dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa phur bus btab cing khro bo'i 'od zer rnams kyis lus rnam par bcom par yang bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ger
251b2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas phyogs bcing ba dang/ yi ge laM las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser pos phyogs kyi nang du mtshams bcing ba dang/ yi ge hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar snang ba gtams pas/
251b3(rgyud 'grel): phur bu'i nang du kun nas rab bya ba dang yi ge rim? las byung ba'i rdo rje dra ba rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang zhing 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun tu 'khrug pa ra ba'i nang du bsam par bya'o/ /de ltar mdor bsdus pa dang/ bar ma dang rgya chen po ste/
251b4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams las gang du mngon par 'dod pa de nyid bya'o/ /de nas yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las lkog mar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam la/ lce'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas
251b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba bsams te/ badzra dzi hwa zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas ras ris la sogs par bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems
251b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad du dmigs la mchog tu gus pas snying gar thal mo sbyar ba bzhag ste/ pus mo'i lta ngas la bzhag nas/ phyi'i mchod pa ci 'byor ba rnams dang/ oM sarbba bi tbU ra pU ra/ A barta ya A barta ya ho/ /zhes bya ba dang
251b7(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs las kyang yang dag par mchod la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
252a1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po dag /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par
252a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sdam pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don ni byed pa gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med
252a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /dad nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/
252a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung/ /las kyi
252a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir
252a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung/ ya bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni grol par bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /bdag ni dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas
252a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni rtogs gyur nas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mdza' med las/ /'gro ba thams cad gdon par bgyi/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rang gi sngags dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rang gi lha'i rang bzhin 'od kyi tshogs dpag tu
252b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa rnam par 'phro ba bkod la/ de nyid yid la zlos shing sems rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /chos rnams med ? chos can med/ /nam mkha' lta bur dmigs med de/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa'o/ /zhes kyang brjod
252b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i don la lhag par mos pas thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi byin ci log gi rtog pa'i bdag chags kyi sa bon bsal la/ 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus pa dang/ rang gi lus dang rtul pa rab tu rnam par bshig la/ /rdul phra rab rnams kyang/
252b3(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa las 'das pas dngos po med pas rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmmA(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ thal mo lan gsum brdabs te/ rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos la/ rang gi sems
252b4(rgyud 'grel): gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ phung po dang khams dang/ skye mched la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba/ de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid rang gi sngags tsam la yi ge ho dang sprel bar bsams la/ oM las byung ba'i bcom ldan
252b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus na bzhugs pa rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ ma lus pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i nang du tshul? ma shud? bzhugs par bsams pas/ oM tsit+ta pra te
252b6(rgyud 'grel): thA d+haM gA rom zhes brjod do/ /'di de byang chub bde mchog ste/ /'di las gzhan pa'i bde mchog med/ /de thob pa'i ni 'dod bzhin du/ /da nas dri za'i sems can 'dra/ /nye bar len pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /sro ba'i sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin bzhin/ /rang bdag zhal nas rgya pad+mar
252b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i dus su blo yis zhugs/ /'dod chags chen po'i me gzugs su/ /ra ni chu skyes su legs sam/ /de yi 'od kyi mthu yis ni/ /skad cig de las mar bum bzhin/ /byang chub sems du nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas rgyan bcas pa yis gzigs/ /shin tu mnyam? bzhag 
253a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can bzhin/ /rang gi bdag nyid dbyer med de/ /sdug pa'i snying po dge ba che/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /gnas ngan len ni kun las grol/ /rnam par rtog pa sel ba'i mchog /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad
253a2(rgyud 'grel): dag zla ba lta bur sems tsam pa/ /sems tsam gyur pa'i sems can dang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /de'i 'od? lcags kyus bkug pa yis/ /rang gi sems kyis gcig tu bya/ /'dir sangs rgyas kun yon tan dang/ /sa dang pha rol
253a3(rgyud 'grel): phyin la sogs/ /a sogs dbyangs yig lta bu ni/ /mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya/ /rgyun ltar rang phyogs nas 'ongs te/ /dkar pa'i tshul gyis rnam par zhugs/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis nus pa nyid/ /sems can du ni rnam par bsam
253a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar snying rjes bskul ba ni/ /sa 'og par du bsam par bya/ /kye ma sems can 'khor ba la/ /dga' bas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid bral/ /yun ring dus su yang yang 'khor/ /de rnams rdzogs par byang chub
253a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /'jam gsung rang nyid gyur par bya/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta u d+hA da yA mi/ /de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs las/ /ka sogs yi ge rgyas pa yis/ /rim gyis nye bar 'phel ba'i sems/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin byed cing/ /snying rje rjes chags las byung ba
253a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi zla dkyil 'khor/ /bde ba'i chos kyis yid dag rdzogs/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges 'dzems yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur sogs/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i/ /kun tu bzang po'i bdag nyid du/ /mthong nas
253a7(rgyud 'grel): ra? la yig gsum dgod/ /spyi bor 'khor lo la gnas pa'i/ /yi ge oM ni kha dog ser/ /khar ni pad+ma'i lte ba yi/ /dbus nas a ni kha dog dkar/ /snying ga'i rdo rje de yi ni/ /lte ba la gnas yi ge hUM/ /sngon po 'od zer tshogs rnams ni/ /rnam par 'gro
253b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dgod par bya/ /rdo rje'i yi ge de rnams las/ /'od kyi sprin rnams spros nas ni/ /sems can khams kun sbyang la sogs/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul bstan/ /oM las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'i/ /sprin las sku yi rdo rje ni/ /paM byung pad+ma la
253b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ /dag pa'i shel ltar dri ma med/ /ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa 'joms/ /zhal gsum rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan/ /a las byung ba'i gsung rdo rje/ /sprin las gsung gi rdo rje'i lcer/ /hUM las byung ba'i thugs kyi rdo rjes/ /sprin las thugs kyi
253b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ni/ /ting 'dzin byin brlabs snying ga yi/ /zla bar rnam par bsam par bya/ /de ltar yig gsum byin brlabs lus/ /snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ /der ni ye shes tshogs kyi ni/ /'di 'bar muM ni rnam par dgod/ /de las byung ba'i utpal
253b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /in+d+ra ni la'i 'od 'dra bsam/ /de dbus ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /dgyes bskyed bya ba las bzhugs pa/ /de las byung ba'i 'od sprin las/ /sangs rgyas sprin las sngags pas spro/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /bde ba che las nges sbyar
253b5(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /'jig rten ma lus legs sbyangs te/ /de bsdus nas ni bzhugs par bya/ /de kun yongs su gyur pa las/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od po che/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /srid pa sgyu ma ltar mkhyen
253b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /gzhon nu'i sku mdog gur gum 'dra/ /zhal gyi pad+ma na thang 'dzum/ /sgeg dang bcas pa'i nyams kyis rgyas/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs rin chen 'dab ma bzang/ /pad+ma'i rgyal
253b7(rgyud 'grel): po gdan du bya/ /sngo dang ser dang dkar po che/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /dpa' bo spyan gsum phyag drug pa/ /mchog tu dga' bas shin tu mdzes/ /mchog sbyin ral gri mda' rnams ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /g.yon
254a1(rgyud 'grel): na shes rab pha rol phyin/ /utpal sngo dang gzhu nyid do/ /sangs rgyas sprin chen spros pa yis/ /nam mkha' i gtos kun khyab par mdzad/ /sna tshogs me tog gis cher mdzes/ /zur phud gsum gyis rnam par
254a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /thog pa dbus dang mdza' las grol/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes/ /byams dang thugs rje sogs rgyu 'thun/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /de ltar mkhas pas bdag nyid bsgom/ /de nas mahA
254a3(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya satwo haM/ /zhes bya ba dang/ nga rgyal bskyed la/ rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang/ nam mkha' rnams la spyan ma dang/ mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma dang nam mkha' rdo rje laM maM baM taM aM/ zhes bya ba'i sa
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bon rnams las rims bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ don yod par grub
254a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mi bskyod pa b+h+ruM aM dzri khaM hUM/ zhes bya bas so/ /mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi skye mched rnams la/ k+ShaM dzraM khaM gaM Sh+kaM saM/ zhes bya ba las sa'i snying po dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'jig rten
254a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po'o/ /gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ baM raM zhes bya bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo rnams
254a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs sha dang rkang dang khrag dang rus pa dang/ rtsa rgyus rnams la/ oM hUM traM A(rgyud 'grel): khaM zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgod do/ /de nas spyi bor gnas pa'i oM las byung ba'i sku rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas rnam par rmongs par bsams
254b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ lus thams cad nas yang dag par spros te/ mdun du phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sras dang bcas par rnam par bsams la/ oM las spyan spros te/ de'i phyag gi zhags pas drangs la rang
254b2(rgyud 'grel): gi gus la bcug ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhu bar gyur pa dang/ de'i bdag nyid can du rang gi lus la sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsams la/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM dzi na dzi ga a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis ?
254b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ spyi bor bzhag pa ni sku byin gyis rlab par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis bdag nyid rnam par brgyan par lhag par mos par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lkog mar gnas pa'i yi ge
254b4(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje bsams la/ gos dkar mo yang dag par sgos te snga ma bzhin du de zhugs pas rang gi lce gsung rdo rje'i nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM A ro lig a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste/ g.yas
254b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgreng ba ni gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas zla ba khaM ba lta bu chos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur par dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi lcer mos par bya'o/ /de bzhin du snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge hUM las byung ba'i
254b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rjer bsams la/ de bzhin du mA ma kI spro ba sngon du 'gro bas bcug la/ rang gi sems thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+h+rig a ti tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nyid la mthe bo g.yas pa nang du bcug la/ g.yon pa bsgreng ba ni thugs byin gyis
254b7(rgyud 'grel): brlab ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas hUM las byung ba'i snying gi pad+ma'i zla ba chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun tu 'phro bar bsams par bya'o/ /de nas sa ma yo haM zhes bya ba dang/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snga ma bzhin du snying ga la
255a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs par rdo rje la sogs pa rnam par bsams te/ de dang sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes bya ba dang byin gyis brlabs la rang gi sngags brjod nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes kyang 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom
255a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing/ many+dzu badzro haM zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la/ sa ma ya a(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ mdun du paM las byung ba'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM mu(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba las utpal rnam par
255a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ chos bdag med pa'i dam tshig gi nang du zhugs te/ man+tu? badzro haM zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal sngon du 'gro ba dang/ 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug
255a4(rgyud 'grel): cing bcug la bcings te dbang du bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa ni/ mthe chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/ /zhes bya ba dang/ oM badzra
255a5(rgyud 'grel): aM ku sha hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pA sha hUM hUM/ oM badzra spho Ta hUM baM/ oM badzra A be sha hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da li big+h+nAn ta ka hUM(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i phyag rgya ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi skur bsams la/ lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo'i rtse mo gsum pa
255a6(rgyud 'grel): lha bur brkyang la/ dpung ba'i ltar khros pas bzhag na/ mtshams bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa yang bya ste/ spel? ba'i sbyor bas ? bcing ba dang Sha ba dang dra ba la sogs pa yang bya ste/ sprul pa'i sbyor ba de bcing ba dang/ Sha ba dang dra ba la sogs pa yang bsrung ba'i don
255a7(rgyud 'grel): du bsams par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan/ oM ka ma la hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags dang stabs la/ thal mo kha phye ba dang/ rang gi sngags kyi mchod yon phul te/ oM pra ba ra sat kA raM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i
255b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang/ mdzub mo sbyar bas me tog blangs la zhabs bsil dbul te/ sor mo lhag ma rnams zlum po'i rnam pas brkyang pas phyag rgyas kyang zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig bstan par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig
255b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di yin te/ thal mo khong steng du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ utpa la kha phye ba lta bur bzhag la/ mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bskul bar bya zhing 'di bcings la/ rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /oM mu dri sh+ya
255b3(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ yang dag par bskul la de nyid la dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba byas la sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod de/ rgyab tu zla ba bsams la dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
255b4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ oM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod de/ ye shes sems dpa' dang/ lhan cig gcig tu bsgoms la/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen pos gnas la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya a zhes bya ba dang/
255b5(rgyud 'grel): ci rigs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi lus la rnam par bkod la/ rang gi snying pos spyi gtsug gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ snying gar mi bskyod pa/ dpral bar rin chen 'byung ldan/ lkog mar 'od dpag
255b6(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa/ spyi bor don yod grub pa/ mig gnyis su spyan/ mi bskyod pa'i g.yon logs su mA ma kI 'od dpag tu med pa'i g.yon logs su gos dkar mo/ /don yod par grub pa'i g.yon legs su sgrol ma/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i g.yas legs su/ rdo rje sems
255b7(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i rgyab tu skul byed ma/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g.yon logs su rin chen sgrol ma/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i rgyab tu khro gnyer can/ don yod par grub pa'i rgyab du rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ lte bar gshin rje gshed/ smin mtshams su gzhas
256a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi thub pa/ /bar rta mgrin/ gsang bar bdud rtsi thab sbyor/ dpral ba'i steng du 'phags pa mi g.yo ba mi bskyod pa'i mdun du 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /dpung pa gnyis la dbyig sngon/ rkang pa gnyis la stobs po che/ rnam par
256a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad kyi mdun du gnod mdzes rgyal po/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad la byams pa la sogs pa/ spyi gtsug gi steng du 'khor lo sgyur ba/ bruM las byung ba rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa pad+ma dang/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
256a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ zhal dang/ sku mdog dang/ phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba 'od zer lnga pa'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i phreng ba can/ rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba/ spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rin po
256a4(rgyud 'grel): che dang/ mtshan rtags dang/ rdo rje dang/ utpal rim pa bzhin du bsnams pa gnyis gnyis kyis logs gnyis su mdzes par byas par rang gi snying po nyid kyis bsam bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ lag ngar gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags
256a5(rgyud 'grel): kyur byas la/ mthe bo dang/ gung mo gnyis kyis se gol brdebs shing/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ rang gi lus la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par yid kyis rnam par bsams pa/ legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bkug nas bcug ste/
256a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings la/ dbang du byas nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum rnam par bkod pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs la/ yi ge brgya ba brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba su ho
256a7(rgyud 'grel): sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+ta me b+ha ba su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsam tsit+taM sh+ri ya ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho:/ b+ha ga bAn sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra mA mi mun tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying ga dang/ skog ma dang/ spyi bo rnams su rdo rje sems
256b1(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa las gus mo gnyis sbyar la/ oM satwa badzri a b+hi tiSh+Tha swa yAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dbus ma bcag pa ni rin po che ste/ oM ratna badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar
256b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM d+harmma badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo bcag pa ni ral gri'o/ /oM karmma badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ gnas 'di dag tu rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri nang du chud pa'i rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams
256b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ rdo rje can gyis 'gro skyab phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur ba/ /yon tan 'byung nas ji ltar stsal/ /de bzhin deng ni bdag la stsol/ /de nas nam mkha' i khong ?
256b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun tu gang ba'i rig pa'i lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa thogs shing mchod pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa rnams byon nas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi sbyor bas rtse bran gyi rtsa bar gzhag
256b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dbang bskur zhing 'di skad du gsung bar bsam par bya'o/ /dbang bskur pa yi rdo rje che/ /khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gyi gnas las byung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur ba de phyag rgya 'di dag gi brtan par bya'o//
256b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i thal mo las/ mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni/ /gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/ badzri ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ oM badzra badzra di hUM/ gung mo
256b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /oM ratna badzri Ni hUM/ pad+ma srin lag mthe'u chung gung/ /oM d+harmma badzri Ni hUM/ lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang/ /oM karmma badzri Ni hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag kyang/ spyi bo dang dpral ba dang rna ba g.yas
257a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ltag tu/ mgo'i rgyab dang/ rna ba g.yon pa'i ltag gi gnas rnams su rim pa bzhin du sbyar te/ dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems dam pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin
257a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa nyid cod pan du bsam par bya'o/ /la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbang bskur bar 'dod do/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdun du mdud pa lta bus bcing bar bya zhing rgyab tu yang de bzhin du mdud

257a4(rgyud 'grel): bya bas go bgos te/ rdo rje khu tshur snying gar mdud pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la/ mgrin pa dang rgyab dang/ yang de bzhin du snying gar ro/ /de nas nu ma'i bar dang yang snying gar ro/ /yang mgrin pa dang/ ltag pa dang/ mgro bor de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba

257a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po ni snying gar dgod par bya'o/ /nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni snying ga'i gong du'o/ /spyi bor bsam pa ni mgo bor ro/ /spyi gtsug la sogs par bsams pa ni spyi gtsug tu'o/ /go cha la sogs par bsam pas ni nu ma'i bar du'o/ /mtshon

257b1(rgyud 'grel): du'o/ /mtshon cha thams cad du bsam pa ni lus thams cad du dgod par bya'o/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang/ ming gi dbang bskur ba dang/ dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul
257b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs rnams de'i sngags nyid kyis blang bar bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag gi slob dpon du gyur nas/ thams cad mdzad do zhes lhag par mos par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /deng khyod bdag ni bskur bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sangs
257b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rje la'o/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ de nas rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par spyi bor bzhag la/ ming gi dbang gi dbang bskur te/ oM badzra satwa twaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal
257b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha
257b5(rgyud 'grel): hwa/ d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hI(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes bya ba dang/ blang bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig gsum sbyin pa bya ste/ hUM las rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la/ de kho na nyid kyis
257b6(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya ste/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /dang po'i mchog gi skyes bu ni/ /bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyis ni rdo rje'o/ /'di ni sangs
257b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas de kun gyi/ /shes rab sgra yis rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces bya ba dang/ a(rgyud 'grel): yi/ sa bon las byung ba dril bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs kyi bdag nyid can shes rab

258a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur
258a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes su mnyes/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu
258b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang? po'i kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
258b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po bcings la/ oM swa b+hA pa shud+d+hohaM/ oM sarbba sa mo haM zhes bya ba dang/ nga rgyal bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje utpa la'i dbus su rang gi sngags rnam par bsams la/ de nyid yid la zlos shing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du phyag
258b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen pos gnas la g.yon pa'i mig tu Ta las zla ba bya/ g.yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyod/ hUM gi mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bur/ /yid kyis nam mkha' i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'og tu yi ge hUM de las byung ba'i
258b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge baM dbus su bkod pa rdo rje me'i 'od dang mnyam pas dus mdza' i rlung gis sbar ba'i bskal pa sreg pa'i gzugs can lta bu'i rdo rje des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i phyogs su stong gsum
258b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge kho gnas pa de las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas kun tu 'khyud pa byung bas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis kun tu bsreg pa'i sangs
258b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing bkrus nas/ rba rlabs 'khrug pa 'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur kun tu bkang nas gnas so/ /de nas de'i dbus su yi ge rang rang gi 'od kyis 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskol ba dang/ pad+ma chen po'i gzugs la pad+ma mdza' yas pas yongs su bskor bar bsams
258b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ de'i lte bar gser gyi mdog can gyi ra ba bsams la/ der yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha' i phyogs nas byon te bzhugs so/ /de nas hUM suM hUM/ zhes bya ba ste/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi pa rin po che
259a1(rgyud 'grel): sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ gling dang gling phran dang/ rol mtsho dang/ gser gyi ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor bar bsams la/ oM badzra dri Dho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje brdam pa brkyang ste/ sa la
259a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pas byin gyis brlabs la/ de lta bu gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gnas rnam pa kun tu rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nges par bsten pa/ der yang yi ge bruM las gzhal yas khang zur bzhi pa la/ sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni
259a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyan/ /dril bu dar dang ba dan sogs/ /sgo khyud kyis ni nye bar mdzes/ /grwa dang mtshams rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras/ /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma sogs kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs pa'i rla re bres/ /gos dang
259a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/ /mtshams su zla phyed rin chen mchog /rdo rje mdzes pas rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi yongs su btab pa dang/ /kha khyer gyi ni yongs su bskor/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo gzhan/ /de bzhin de yi dbus suAng gzhan/ /rdo rje phreng bas
259a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bskor cing/ /rdo rje ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan/ /rtsig pa rin chen sna lnga 'bar/ /ye shes kyis sprul gzhal yas khang/ /nam mkha' grangs med ltar rgya che/ /'khor lo yongs rdzogs 'di lta bu/ /kha ba can gyi ri ltar dkar/ /mchod rten chen po'i nang? du chud
259a6(rgyud 'grel): thub dbang 'od ni rnam 'phro bas/ /phyogs kyi tshogs rnams khyab gyur pa/ /yid kyi rang bzhin mchod chen 'di/ /khyad par 'phags pa rnams kyis brgyan/ /de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang/ /chos kyi dbyings
259a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang/ mig mor tsam gyi khang pa brtseg ma rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i dbus su yang hUM siM hUM/ zhes bya ba las seng+ge'i gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa/ der babs nas 'dug ste/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
259b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byed par 'dod pas rang gi snying ga las rang gi bdag po rang gi sngags kyis bton la/ dgug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas/ zung du gnas pa'i sbyor ba 'am/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas
259b2(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul gyis bzlas brjod dang/ gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/ 'di ni rim pa bar ma'o/ /mdor bsdus pa rim pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis spro ba dang/ bsdu ba byas pa las rnam pa'i mchog rnams
259b3(rgyud 'grel): kun ldan par/ /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ rdzogs pa'i rnam 'byor zhes bshad do/ zhes bya ba yin no/ /yang na rnal 'byor rgya chen po byed par 'dod na/ de'i tshe lha thams cad kyi gnas su yang paM las sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la/ a dang aM las zla ba dang
259b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ci rigs par rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du dbus ma'i seng+ge'i gdan la dus yun ring po nas goms par byas pa'i thugs rje chen po mngon du bsgoms la/ 'gro ba ma lus pa 'di dag thabs dang/ shes rab dang bral bas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs
259b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la blta ste/ thabs 'dis de rnams kyi don bya'o/ /zhes bsams la/ rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa ji srid mdun du spros la/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba at+makonyahaM/ zhes bya bas rjes su mnyes par byas la/ oM
259b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra koSha gu hya hUM zhes bya bas bskul ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa de nyid kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed par dga' bas mchog tu dga' ba thob par bdag nyid shes nas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang
259b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid du zhu bar gyur cing/ nang du chud par byas la/ lha'i 'khor lo dbyung bar bya'o/ /yi ge oM las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
260a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba ?? dang/ thor tshugs ? pa/ rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ sngo ba dang ser ba dang/ dkar po chen po ste/ zhal gsum gyis mdzes pa/ sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa/ phyag dang po gnyis
260a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas na bgrang phreng dang mngal bsnams pa/ g.yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma dang/ rdo rje'i gzhu bsnams pa/ lha rnams 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad pas zhabs kyis pad+ma la phyag 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin chen po
260a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba/ oM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par spros la/ nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor ma lus par khyab ste/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad nas/ sngags 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid la gzhug pa dang brtan par bya'o/ /hUM las mi bskyod pa sku mdog in+d+ra nI lI
260a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang mnyam pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa cung zad bzhad cing sgeg pa/ zhal g.yon pa dmar pa/ zhal g.yas pa dkar ba/ zhal dbus ma sku dang 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag brgyad pa g.yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i gung mo'i dbus su
260a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs kar 'degs par brtson pa/ g.yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten pas dril bu bsnams pa/ yang g.yas na ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mda' bsdams pa/ g.yon lha mo'i nu ma dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa/ dpal rdo rje sems
260a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par gyur pa'i mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can rol pa'i stangs stabs kyis legs par bzhugs pa/ oM hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spros la/ snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba'i don byas nas slar byon te/ rang gi sngags nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi re'u cha la dgod par bya
260a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing brtan par bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ rang rang gi sngags kyis yang dag par spros te/ rang rang gi sngags nyid kyis rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya zhing brtan par bya'o/ /zhal gsum gyis dbus ma ni sku dang 'dra bar blta
260b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /taM las rin chen 'byung ldan spyan gsum pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dmar po zhal g.yas ?/ g.yon dkar ba phyag dang po gnyis kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon na rin po
260b2(rgyud 'grel): che bsnams pa snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la dgod do/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku rnam par byung ba/ rol pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba/ zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pas dbu rgyan byas pa/ spyan gsum pa ston ka'i
260b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i mdog can/ zhal g.yas sngon po/ /g.yon dmar po/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzung nas dkur brten pa/ g.yas pas rang gi thugs kar pad+ma rnam par 'byed pa/ yang g.yas gnyis na bgrang phreng dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na nu ma dang/ ril
260b4(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ lha mo bzhi dang/ gdan gcig pa nub kyi re'u cha'o/ /khaM las byung ba'i don yod grub pa mar bta? kyi mdog can/ zhal g.yas sngon po/ g.yon dkar po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcas pa/ yang g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis
260b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can byed du'o/ /'di dag ni sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba'o/ /oM trAM oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM khaM/ zhes bya bas ni rims bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no/ /lAM mAM pAM tAM/ hUM trAM h+rAM(rgyud 'grel): khaM tsuM raM b+h+ra hUM/ zhes
260b6(rgyud 'grel): bya bas sa bon gyi yi ge 'di rnams las spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo rnams rim bzhin du bskyed la/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su lha mo spyan sku mdog ser pa/ phyag g.yas na mchog sbyin dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang/ rdo rje
260b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa dang/ rin po che'i snye ma dang/ bgrang phreng dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /me'i phyogs su mA ma kI utpa la sngon po'i mdog can khro ba dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs
261a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon ni sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su gos dkar can/ zla ba'i mdog chen g.yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang/ mangs brgyan
261a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yon na pad+ma dang/ bgrang phreng dang/ gzhu bsnams pa/ rol ba'i stengs stabs can no/ /rlung gi phyogs su sgrol ma mar gang kyi mdog can g.yas na mi 'jigs pa dang/ rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdig mdzub dang/ utpa la dang/
261a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gsum po 'di dag ni sems pa'i skyil mo krung can no/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rdo rje sems ma dang/ rin chen sems ma dang/ chos kyi sems ma dang/ las kyi sems ma rim
261a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa 'dra ba yin mod kyi/ gzhan du na g.yon pa'i gnyis pas nu ma bsnams pa med pa'i phyir/ ci rigs par sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa shes
261a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /byang shar mtshams su lha mo skul byed ma/ zla ba'i mdog can phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'og nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas thugs ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas rnams na mi 'jigs pa dang/ ral gri dang/ rin po che'i chun
261a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byang dang/ bi dza bU ra dang mda' dang/ dgra sta dang/ dbyug pa dang/ tho ba dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje dang/ ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang/ bgrang phreng bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ pad+ma dang/ spyi'u blugs dang/ zhags pa
261a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzhu dang/ mdung thug dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dung dang/ sdigs mdzub dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ phag mdud dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs baM bsnams pa'o/ /shin tu dang pa'i dang la'i zhed chung ngu'i stod g.yogs legs par bgos pa/ rgyan
261b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la bab cing bskal pa bzang ba/ sgeg pa dang/ dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung ba dang/ drag po dang rgod pa dang/ rngam pa dang/ snying rje dang/ rmad du byung ba dang/ zhi ba zhes bya ba'i nyams dgu dang ldan pas spyi bo dang dpral ba dang/
261b2(rgyud 'grel): lkog ma dang/ dpung mgo g.yas dang/ g.yon dang/ thugs ka dang/ lte ba dang/ pus mo'i lha nge dang/ zhabs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ don yod zhags pa dang
261b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gzugs dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ ral pa gcig ma dang/ rdo rje sen mo can gyis gnas su byas pa/ 'di'i zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa/ sku'i mdog can zhal g.yas pa gdangs pa/ utpa la sngon po'i mdog can/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas rnam
261b4(rgyud 'grel): par brgyan pa/ ljags bskyod pa/ zhal g.yon pa ser po choms kyis spros gnon po'o/ /shar lho mtshams su rin chen sgrol ma sku mdog ser po/ /phyag dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che'i thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa/ yang g.yas kyi gnyis kyis ni/
261b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang/ spyi blugs dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams su khro gnyer can zla ba'i mdog can g.yas na rdo rje dang/ dbyug pa dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub
261b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spyi blugs dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /nub byang mtshams su rdo rje lu gu rgyud sku mdog ljang gu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang lcags sgrog dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa/ zhal cung zad bzhad pa/ bdug pa thams
261b7(rgyud 'grel): cad nges par 'dul ba ste/ 'di dag ni rol ba'i stang stabs dang ldan pa yin no/ /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di dag thams cad ni zla ba'i gdan dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po dang/ spyan gsum dang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba'i zhal gsum dang/
262a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi bdag po rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa/ gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa mda' ba yin no/ /oM ga ga na lo tsa ne swAhA/ oM ki ri gi ri mA ma kI hUM/ oM ga Te be ka Te ni ka Te ka Tad ka Te ka ro Ta bidye swAhA/ oM tA re tut+ta
262a2(rgyud 'grel): re tu re swAhA/ oM satwa badzri hUM/ oM ratna badzri hUM/ oM d+harm+b+ha badzra hUM/ oM karmma badzri hUM/ oM tsa la tsu le tsu na de swAhA/ oM ratno la ke ratna dzra li ni swAhA/ oM b+hI ku Te b+h+ri nga/ oM badzra sh+ri kha la hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di dag ni ci rigs par 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no//
262a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor gsum par rim pa bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su byams pa la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba dgod par bya'o/ /de la shar phyogs su yi ge meM las byung ba'i byams pa gser gyi mdog can/ phyag
262a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgyar byas pa/ yang g.yas kyis mchog sbyin g.yon gyis me tog dang bcas pa'i na gser gyi snyem bsnams pa'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ni sngar ji skad bstan pa'i rang bzhin can no/ /gaM las
262a5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i spos kyi glang po ni mdog ljang gu g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa/ g.yas kyis glang po che'i mchu 'dzin pa'o/ /dzam las byung ba'i ye shes tog sku mdog ser po g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /oM me/ oM mu/
262a6(rgyud 'grel): oM gand+ha ha sti ne hUM/ oM dz+nyA na ke tu dz+nyA na ba ti oM/ 'di dag ni rim pa bzhin du 'di rnams kyi spro ba la sogs pa'i sngags yin no/ /yang lho phyogs su b+ha las byung ba'i bzang spyod sku mdog dmar po phyag zhal mo sbyar ba'o/ /sa las byung ba'i rgya mtsho'i blo
262a7(rgyud 'grel): gros kyang/ dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba/ phyag gnyis brkyang ba'i sor mo thams cad kyis brlabs ltar mdzad pa'o/ /a las byung ba'i blo gros mi zad pa ni gser gyi mdog can khu tshur yod pa/ thugs kar 'jog pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin no/ /pra
262b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i spobs brtsegs pa ni sku mdog ljang gu g.yon gyi khu tshur yang bar 'jog pa/ g.yas kyi khu tshur me go la rdebs pa'o/ /oM b+ha dra bA ti b+ha dra pA le swA hA/ oM swa ga re mahA sA ga re hUM/ oM ak+Sha la phu phu/ ak+Sha ya karmmA A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni
262b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM pra ti b+hA ne pra te b+hA na kU Te hUM/ 'di dag ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no/ /nub phyogs su ma las byung ba'i mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po g.yon pas pad+ma cung zad kha phye ba bsnams pa'o/ /sa las byung ba'i ngan song kun 'dren
262b3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa 'thor ba ltar mdzad pa'o/ /sa nyid las byung ba'i mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gser gyi mdog can/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'phyang ba'i tshul mdzad pa'o/ /ja las byung ba'i
262b4(rgyud 'grel): dra ba can gyi 'ong sku mdog dkar po/ g.yon na utpa la la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /oM s+thA me s+thA me mahA s+thA me ba ti swAhA/ oM sarba A pA ya dza he sarbba A ba dza ye sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ oM sarbba shot+ta mo ni rga ta na
262b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ti hUM/ oM dza laM ni mahA dza 'di ni hUM/ zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi sngags so/ /byang phyogs su tsa las byung ba'i zla ba'i 'od/ zla ba'i mdog can g.yon utpal la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /a las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog
262b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /ga las byung ba'i nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ g.yon gyi rdo rje'i khu tshur bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis rked par 'jog pa/ g.yas pa nam mkhar yongs
262b7(rgyud 'grel): su bskor ba'o/ /skam las byung ba'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog sngon po dam dkar po/ g.yon la la reg pa/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bo dang/ mdzub mo sbyar nas 'dri ba'i tshul du 'jog pa'o/ /oM tsan+d+re su tsan+d+ra bya ba lo gi ti swAhA/
263a1(rgyud 'grel): oM a sri prab+he a mi ta pa ti hUM/ oM ga ga na pa ro lo ca ne hUM/ oM sarbba ni pa ra Na'i skam pi ni hUM zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyi spro pa la sogs pa'i sngags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i gdan can zla ba'i
263a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od mnga' ba sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa zhal gsum rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba mnga' zhing de'i cod pan can/ rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs 'chang ba/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings
263a3(rgyud 'grel): pa khyad par gyi tshig tu smos pa ma gtogs pa g.yas na mchog sbyin dang mda' gzhu ba bsnams pa/ shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi ngos gnyis gnyis kyi snam bu la gnyis gnyis bdag po la mngon par phyogs nas bzhugs par rim pa
263a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsam par bya'o/ /de nas hUM las 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dus mdza' i sprin lta bu/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba/ zhags pa dang/ bcas pas bsdigs par mdzad pa/
263a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi gnyis pas pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i lha mos g.yas kyi 'khyud pa la brtson pa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyi nu ma 'dzin pa/ gsum pa ni gzhu brdungs bsnams pa/ g.yas logs su lha mo mang gat ltar ljang ba/ lag pa g.yas na
263a6(rgyud 'grel): utpal la sngon po thogs shing/ lag pa g.yon pas mgul nas 'khyud pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ zhabs drug pa/ gsum khyim che gzhal drug pa/ zhal dang pos ha ha zhes rnam par bzhad pa/ gnyis pas 'jigs pa bskyed pa/ gsum
