284b3(rgyud 'grel): bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yan rung/ /phyir byung nas du zhugs byad ni/ /dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin du ngas tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de yid kyis kha sbyar phye la/ nam mkha' la bzhug
284b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang cig tu byas nas/ rang gi snying po brjod de dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i re'u cha la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan
284b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni spyan la sogs pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'o/ /byang shar la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni sku la byed ma la sogs pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i
284b6(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la ni byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /sh+ra la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su mi g.yo ba la sogs pa ste/ de dag sngar bshad pa'i sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan
284b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /phyi'i mtshams dang sgo'i ya phubs rnams la ni/ rdo rje rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir ni rta babs rin po che la sogs pa las byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ dri bu la sogs pas brgyan par yi ge hUM zlos shing bya'o/ /shar la sogs
285a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sdong po bkod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo klag par bya'o/ /ga pur dang a ka
285a2(rgyud 'grel): ru dang tu rus ka la sogs pa'i spos snod phyogs mtshams brgyad du rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM bzlas pa 'am/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' kun tu byugs la/ dri
285a3(rgyud 'grel): zhim po'i me tog gi sil ma gtor nas/ de nyid bzlas pa'i spos chu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs la/ dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs bar bya ba'i phyir/ yi ge brgya pa lan mang du bzla bar bya'o/ /khro bo brgyad gsungs pas rdo rjes 'og la
285a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dgod pa ni/ 'dir med pa kho na ste/ 'og dang steng du dgod par bya ba chus pa yang ma yin no/ /de 'ba' zhig brko ba dang/ yu ba la sbyangs te bya'o zhe na/ de yang rigs pa ma yin te/ mchan ma tsam nyid yid kyis dgod par bya'i 'di
285a5(rgyud 'grel): bris bas ci zhig bya ste/ bri ba'i cho ga 'di yang yid kyis ma yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab la bdag cag rnams 'jug pa ni 'bras bu dang 'dra ba yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bri ba'i cho ga ni brgyad po nyid dgod par
285a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa yin la/ spro ba ni yid kyi yin pas bcu po spro bar rigs pa de bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'i/ nye bar tshon par bshad pa'i lhag par dgod pas ci zhig dgos/ dkyil 'khor dag ni bri ba'i tshe/ /gal te bgegs ni
285a7(rgyud 'grel): byung gyur na/ /de la gtor ma sbyin la sogs/ /'og nas bshad pas bzlog par bya/ /bgegs ni gzhom par ma nus na/ /mchod yon phul te gshegs gsol la/ /nyi ma gzhan la yo byad rnams/ /legs par bsangs te dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas
285b1(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas shing lus dris bsgos pa dang/ kha dri zhim bos bsgos la/ me tog gi phreng ba btags shing gos gtsang zhing dri zhim pas stod g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs dang gtsug tor byas brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khams gsum
285b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs te/ hUM bzhi pa'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dril bu dkrol zhing bskor ba lan gsum byas la lhag pa dang ma tshang
285b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor bltas la phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ slar yang de gar gyis sbyor bas blangs la/ rang gi mgo la hUM bzhis bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i nga rgyal du dmigs la/
285b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas shing/ srad bus mgul ba bcings la/ phyi rol du ri mo bris pa rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa me tog dkar po dang dri dkar po'i chus yongs su gang ba me tog gi phreng bas
285b5(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa la snga ma bzhin du bdag po'i sngags dang/ yi ge hUM brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug ma'i rdo rje dang bcas pas brjod ka hUM zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing lha thams cad
285b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sngags bdun bdun bzlas pa dang/ gnyis pa las thams cad pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang yi ge hUM brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi mtshan mas mtshan pa dang 'jug pa'i sgor bltas par gzhag la/ chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma 'jug
285b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe/ dbang bskur ba phyag rgya bcing ba dang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i bum pa bzhi la spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi phreng bas so sor bzlas shing/ de'i mtshan mas
286a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan par bya'o/ /de yang de las gzhan pa'i bzhi la lha thams cad kyi mtshan ma des mtshan par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa nyid dang/ yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas lha thams cad kyi
286a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi nang du chud par byas la/ de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas til dang nas dang ku sha dang/ dri dkar po dang me tog dri zhim po dang/ tsan dan gyi chu dung chos kyi nang du bcug nas bdag po'i sngags lan bdun bzla ba dang/ dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa
286a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa lnga rang gi sngags sam yi ge hUM yongs su bzla bar bya'o/ de yi dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag ste/ /rdo rje'i sgo ni bzhi po dag /yid kyis rnam par dbye bar bya/ /oM badzrod g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM zhes bya ba ni sgo dbye ba'i sngags
286a4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la/ rtse sprad de bzlog nas gnyis su bya ste/ bzlas brjod dang por byas la mtshan thog thag bsgrubs nas 'di dang badzro ta tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gdeg par bstan par bya'o/ /gnas skabs
286a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir dkyil 'khor gdeg pa'i phyag rgya bshad de/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi mkhrig ma phan tshun bzung la bteg na mkhrig ma bteg par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams ni nub la sogs par 'dug
286a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin du g.yas brkyang pa la sogs pa'i gnas pas rim gyis blos dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang/ bsang gtor gyi bum pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag cing de las gzhan pa'i bum pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
286a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su rims bzhin du gzhag go /de'i phyi rol tu bum pa gang ba gzhag la/ yi ge hUM zlos pa 'am so so'i rang gi sngags dang cig car ram/ rim gyis dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa phyung nas gnas ji lta
286b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i gzugs su bcug la/ ye shes kyi sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu la sogs pas snga ma bzhin du spyan drangs la/ lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bgegs bsal
286b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang phur bu dang/ ra ba la sogs pa byas pas gnas bsrung ba byas la/ pad+ma'i gdan dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul nas sku byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/ rang gi dam tshig
286b3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la rang gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ lag pa gnyis kyis khu tshur byas la mdzub mo brkyang ste/ mdud pa bya ba ni rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te/ 'di dang badzra muSh+Ta paM zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis kyang dkyil 'khor ba'i lha
286b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams bcings nas rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi las la zhugs pa la sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ yang dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la ras zung 'bum mam stong ngam brgya'am re re zhing zung re 'am/ thams cad la ras re re 'aM
286b5(rgyud 'grel): bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ ba dan sna tshogs pa'i yi ge hUM dang/ bdag po'i sngags bzlas pa dang/ badzra spha ra Na khaM zhes bya ba 'dis dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du oM sarbba ta thA ga te gand+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i
286b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis sngar sbyar ba'i ga pur dang/ a ka ru dang/ du rus ka la sogs pa'i dri tsan dan la sogs pa dang bsres pa dbul lo/ de bzhin du oM sarbba ta thA ga ta puShpe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang/ me tog gi shing brgya 'am/ shing
286b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'am me tog thams cad dbul lo/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang/ spos snod stong ngam brgya dbul bar bya ste/ bcu las nyung bar ni mi bya'o/ /a kha ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ swa sti ka la
287a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs par bya ba'i bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang ba dang/ bzhib pa dang/ btung ba'i bshos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa grangs stong rnyed dbul lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dI pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
287a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang mar gyi mar me la sogs pa 'bum phrag brgya dang mar me chen po'i snod brgya 'am/ mar me chen po bzhi dbul lo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams dang/ yi ge hUM 'don cing rol mo brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa dang
287a3(rgyud 'grel): sil snyan stong ngam brgya 'am pi wang dang/ gling bu la sogs dbul ba dang/ gar mkhan dang zlos gar mkhan gyi gar dang/ gdu bu dang rna rgyan dang/ cod pan la sogs pa dang/ rta dang glang po che dang/ ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams/
287a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya ba dang/ rta babs gos bzang po dang/ dril bu dang bcas shing rnga yab dang bcas pa dang/ rgyal mtshan dkar po dang/ le brgan dang nag po dang/ dud ka dang dmar po dang/ khra bo dang/ ser po dang ljang gu ste/ brgyad po shar la sogs
287a5(rgyud 'grel): par rim pa bzhin phyi rol tu bsgreng bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' i gtos thams cad khyab pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la thal mo sbyar te byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa lan gsum
287a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas rdo rje glu rnams kyis yang dag par bstod de/ phyag byas la bzod pa gsol nas dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzod kyis? ces gsol ba btab la sgrub pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste/ phyi rol
287a7(rgyud 'grel): du byung la gtor ma byin nas nye reg bya de/ dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa bkan te gung mo dang srin lag cung zad bkug la mngon du phyogs ? gzhag ste/ 'di dag mi smra zhing tsog pur 'dug la/ pus mo gnyis kyi bar
287b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sor mo'i rtsas kha la mang du reg par byas la/ rna ba'i bug dang mig dang/ sna bug dang/ kha dang/ dpung mgo dang/ lte ba'i phyogs dang spyi bor lan gnyis sam gsum reg par bya ba ni nye reg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas bdag po la ni brgya rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor
287b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan rnams la ni bdun bdun 'og nas bshad pa rgyas pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thob kyi dbus su bsams la/ de'i zhal du sbyin sreg byas pas lha thams cad kyi
287b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal du 'bab par bsam par bya ste/ de lta bus ni thams cad tshim par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs la mngon sum bzhin du bsams te/ mchod la 'og nas bshad pa'i slob ma 'jug pa'i tshogs 'jug pa la sogs pa dang tshigs su bcad
287b4(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang/ gzengs bstod pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ sngags bzung ba'i mthar thug gi bar du bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/ bdag nyid kyis kyang slar phyag 'tshal te/ blangs par byung
287b5(rgyud 'grel): bar rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsgrag par bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las?
287b6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthongs shog /dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang mchod pa byas la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab
287b7(rgyud 'grel): cing/ sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/ /'dod mchog dam tshig mchog gyur ba'o/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyed kyi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs shog /
288a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rab tu btud de/ mnyam par bzhag pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug
288a2(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /de la re zhig slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob mas slob dpon gyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub
288a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol/ /yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba la sogs

292a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur bar byed/ /rdo rje bde mchog rol pa dang/ /gsang sngags rnams ni mnyes par gyis/ /he badzra pa sh+ya/ dkyil 'khor gdog pa'i phyag rgya dang/
292a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags su bcas pas dkyil 'khor bteg la/ dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ bsod nams dang byin gyis brlabs ji lta ba la dkyil 'khor bteg pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gshin rje gshed las brtsams te/

296b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bzung lags kyi/ /bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes rims bzhin du slob dpon dang slob ma dag gis sngags bskul la smra bas byin la/ dkyil 'khor du bzlas la lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi yang bslabs la/ khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgya la mi mkhas
296b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang la yang phyag rgya rnams ston bar ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de rnams ni dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar phyag rgya bcing ba la rab tu sbyor ba las/ 'bras bu ma thob ba dang sum nyir gyur nas yang ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal bar 'gro
296b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu des na khyod kyang dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas//
296b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig ba kun las nges grol zhing/ /khyed rnams deng nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen rdeg pa 'di las ni/ /slar 'chi ba ni yod min te/ /mi shigs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jogs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal sa khyod bton/ /srid pa shin tu
296b7(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa mchog tu gyur ba yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ byang chub sems kyang gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje 
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa'o/ /de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/ /srog dang rus ba la bab kyang/ /dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/ /slob dpon dag kyang brnyas mi bya/ gdug la byams dang chags bral bar/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /de ltar
297a2(rgyud 'grel): byas na sangs rgyas kyis/ /khyod ni dmyal ba'i me nang 'dor/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis kyang ma gdungs shig /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su ma dor zhing
297a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad bas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang dbyin dug nad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis
297a4(rgyud 'grel): gcos pa dang/ /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /gsang nas sems can dmyal ltung 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi sbyos pa/ /nam yang smad bar mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes 'thun khyod kyis
297a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /des na rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min khu dang chung ma dang/ /rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na/ /longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir bskal pa bye bar ni/ /grangs med par
297a6(rgyud 'grel): rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /
297a7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung/ /skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no/ /yon tan bzung pas dngos grub cing/ /skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams
297b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi grib ma 'gom pa ni/ /mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i gsang ba pa/ /dam pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ /slob dpon smod par byed pa dag /rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/ /slob dpon smad pa gang yin te/ /bgegs dang log
297b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dren rnams kyis gzung/ /gtum po'i las byed ngan pa'i bdag /mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i/ /dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa/ /der ni slob dpon smad byed pa/ /gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de phyir kun gyis rab
297b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrims te/ bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin byed pa/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi/ /sems can dad pas de mchod cig/ gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/ /deng khyod gyur par the tshom med//
297b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /der ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng 'dir thob
297b5(rgyud 'grel): par the tshom med/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste/ /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde bskyed bsten par gyis
297b6(rgyud 'grel): deng ni bkrol myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtags par 'gyur/ /slob ma rab dang mnyam gshin pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin bdag ni bgyid ces brjod/ /de ltar na mdor bsdus
297b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bar ma dang rgya che ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dbye pa ni 'dir ma thos te/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga gcig pu nyid thos pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar na yang mkhan po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'i rim pa'i
298a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brangs nas gsum du bya bar 'dod par bya'o/ /spyi'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /gzhan yang slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob ma la/ de bzhin du khrus dang gos dang rgyan la sogs pas brgyan la dam tshig gsum
298a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i thar thug pa'i cho ga byas la/ dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag la/ slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid dang/ slob dpon gyi las rnams bshad par bya ste/ de nyid de'i slob dpon gyi
298a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i gnas yin no/ /'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba yin bar gsungs so/ /de nas tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnad ba byan la/ gzengs bstod pas lung bstan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni 'di yin te/ mi mnyam
298a4(rgyud 'grel): med pas zur bzhi mnyam/ /dran dang dbang pos sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya/ /khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje mchog /gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang/ /bsam
298a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ gdul bas bskyed pa sna tshogs mchog /dam chos sgra ni kun 'gro ga /rlung gi bskyod pa'i sna tshogs mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin/ /me long ye shes btag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng/ /?dra ba me long
298a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag me tog /me tog chun 'phyang rgyan gyis bskor/ /kun grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes bshad de/ /da yi nang gi 'khor lo de/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra ba ni/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ byang chub sems ni
298a7(rgyud 'grel): theg pa che/ /mdo sde 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /rdo rje'i theg gis yongs bskor ba'i/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yin par bshad/ /'gro la ye shes kyis chags pas/ /tshon ni rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga yin/ /dbang po'i don ni rnam dag pa/ /rang gi mtshan nyid rab dbye
298b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ shes rab ye shes bdud rtsi 'thung/ /rdo rje can gyi bum pa de/ /tshogs rdzogs pa yi rgyu 'thun zhing/ /thugs rje'i rlan ldan bum pa gang/ /dkyil 'khor gang du me tog spos/ /mar me che dang drin bshad pa/ /byang chub yin lag yid? rab tshim/ /che?
298b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang grags tshogs bsdus yin/ /chos kyi zas ni lha bshos te/ /ngo tsha khrel yod pa yang gos/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo mchog /bde ba chen po'i 'phel byed yin/ /grong khyer thar pa'i grong khyer bas/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin/ /de ltar sbros?
298b3(rgyud 'grel): pas mdzes pa ni/ /pha rol phyin sogs 'bras bu yin/ /lha'i kho na nyid kyang dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni shes rab kyi ye shes snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /slob dpon gyi las rnams kyang/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dam tshig mchog
298b4(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya ni/ /chog bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang/ /spho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi/ /de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di lags so/ /a(rgyud 'grel): bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs/ /ji lta bar ni bka' mnod do/ /de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming
298b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /de nas rdo rjes sgrub par bgyi/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdab bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad 'di/ /rdo rje sems la sogs bcas/ /dkyil
298b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thams cad gangs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgom byed cing/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan cig bar du brjod par bgyi/ /de nas 'dus pa bgyes pas na/ /da
298b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa/ /grags po nyid du nye bar gnas/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas/ /las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yas/ /dam
299a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi/ /dam tshig mchog ga phyag rgya dang/ /sems dpa' i rdo rje la sogs pas/ /de ltar sems dpa' chen po sgrub/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing/ de nas
299a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu zhugs/ /bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa mnyes bgyis la/ /
299a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /slob ma gzhan dag ni ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ dkyil 'khor bstan pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs
299a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kyang rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen pos sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste/ spos la sogs pas mchod yon byin te/ dang po kho
299a5(rgyud 'grel): nar chu/ de nas phyag rgya cod pan dar dbyangs dang/ rdo rje dang bdag po dang/ ming gi dbang bskur bas kyang dbang bskur la/ sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod de/ sngags byin la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi snga
299a6(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhin bstan nas/ slob ma re re nas gzung ste/ blugs gzar gyis de rnams kyi spyi bo nas bskor zhing phab ste/ dgang blugs bdun phul la bsang zhing bya bas la lag par gdu bu gdags par bya'o/ /'di ni thun mong gi
299a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dril bu la sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang dkyil 'khor pa rnams yang dag par mchod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces slob ma rnams la bsgo la/
299b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byed du bcug nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams la yang bza' ba dang btung ba spyod pa la sogs pa thams cad dang/ mgon po la phul ba rnams kyis kun tu tshim par byas nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /zhes bya ba la
299b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byin la/ de rnams dang lhan cig mtshan mo nyal bar sgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la/ yang su la yang smra bar ma byed cig thams cad la bsgo la/ bla mas yon blang bar bya'o/ /de nas chung ma sdug pa dang/
299b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gser ni 'bad ba dang/ nor bu mu tig byu ru dang/ /lus kyang sbyin par bya ba yin/ /slob mas bla ma la gus pas/ /ce nas 'di ltar bya ba ste/ /ji ltar bla ma mgu bar bya/ /bla ma mgu bas dngos grub kyi/ /gzhan du min zhes thub bas
299b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /de nas bzhin bzangs longs la/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ci rigs pa rdzogs par gyis la/ gang gis ring po mi thogs pa kho nar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig ces snying la 'bab
299b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig brjod la slob ma btad par bya'o/ /de nas me thab kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsams la/ rgyas pa'i chogs mar gyi dgad blugs brgya phul la/ zhi ba'i cho gas kyang mar
299b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis dgang blugs brgya phul te/ yang dag par bstod la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyogs kyi gtor ma byin la phyag byas te/ mchod yon phul la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos te/ snga ma bzhin du phyag rgya dkrol ba
299b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya bcings la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol la/ ji ltar sprul pa'i cho gas kyang rang gi lus kyi
300a1(rgyud 'grel): nang du chud par byas la/ a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harmma NAM/ A dya nutpan na dwAt ces brjod la/ de'i don la lhag par mos shing yi ge hUM dang dkyil 'khor 'phyag par bya'o/ /bsad bas tshon rtsi bsam?
300a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ chu chen dag tu dor bar bya/ /dor nas kyang ni sa gzhi de/ /ba yi lha bas byug bar bya/ /de nas oM badzra kI yo ta kI la ya sarbba kI lAM/ bud+d+ha sad+d+hya na badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA ya hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phur bu'i sngags kyis bsam gtan yang?
300a3(rgyud 'grel): byung pa'i phur bu byung la seng ldeng las byung ba'i phur bu zhi ba'i rig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o ma'am spos chus bkrus na sa bu ga? yang dgad par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs mdzub mo gnyis zlum por byas te/ /lag par brkyang?
300a4(rgyud 'grel): la skam ba lta bur bya ba ni/ /phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid dang/ slob ma dang sa'i bdag po dang/ /sems can thams cad la dmigs te/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad rnams/
300a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad slob dpon dbang bar bshad/ /slob mas cung zad bkur mi bya/ /gal te khyer na dam tshig nyams/ /slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par/ /bdag nyid 'dod pas spyad pa bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal sgyu?
300a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul du? bas gsungs so/ /thams cad du yang dkyil 'khor dang/ sbyin sreg la sogs pa brtsom pa na/ gang gi tshe slob dpon phyi rol tu 'gro na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gshin rje gshed sngar bshad pa'i
300a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bor rang gi snying ga nas/ rang gi sa bon las nges par byung ba/ gdug pa'i bgegs ma lus pa 'dul ba la 'jug pa/ lha dang mi ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa/ dad pa rnams slar yang 'phel bar
300b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ste/ mdor na de ni sems can thams cad kyi mngon par mi 'dod pa bzlog par mdzad cing/ mngon par 'dod rdzogs par mdzad pa/ mtshad pa'i nyes pa rnams sel bar mdzad pa/ khro bo mdza' 
300b2(rgyud 'grel): yas pas kun tu bskor ba/ hA hA zhes bzhad pas ri bo chen po dang/ /rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor 'khrugs bar mdzad pas/ nam mkha' i gtos thams cad khyab par bsam par bya'o/ /de lta bu ni gang gi cho slob dpon nang na
300b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa de'i tshe phyi rol na bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ /snga ma bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba 'di nyid dang ldan pas sa yongs su gzung ba'i chog la sogs pa thams cad nas dbang bskur
300b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ slob ma slar btang ba dang/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi bar du yid kyis byas te/ yid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgya cher bya'o/ /yang na de bzhin du bdag po'i rnal 'byor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
300b5(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa sngon du 'gro ba dang/ /gzhal las khang bskyed la/ de'i nang du zla ba dang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan ci rigs par pad+ma la/ /gnas par bsams la/ slob ma me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ra'i
300b6(rgyud 'grel): mes thal bar byas la/ /rang gi sngags kyi bdag nyid can du sna bug g.yas pa nas bcug ste/ rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las bskyed pa/ sna bug cig shos nas phyung ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus mal bzhag ste
300b7(rgyud 'grel): sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ /bdag po'i sbyor bas rang gi phyag rgya'i rig ba dang/ gnyis su med par gyur pa/ rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje ste ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa dang/ dkyil 'khor
301a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus par rnam par bsams la mthar rang gi phyag rgya'i bde ba chen po'i mer yang dag par zhugs pas/ de nyid zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs kyi byung la/ gnas ji lta ba na
301a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i lha ma lus pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bas gnas pa la snga ma bzhin du yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ hUM las byung ba'i lha mo bzhi bde ba chen pos byin gyis
301a3(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa snying po dang/ yon blang ba sngon du 'gro bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du nam mkha' i nges kun tu bkang nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams nang du zhugs pas bde ba chen po'i dong? nyid de bzhin
301a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi gus pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing/ dbang bskur ba na rdo rje che/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ snying po brjod cing dbang bskur
301a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis nyes pa thams cad dang bral zhing/ gos la sogs pas brgyan pa'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba'i glu rnams kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas la/ snga ma bzhin du dam tshig sbyin pa la
301a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs par rdzogs par bya'o/ /'di ni re zhig gzhan gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /bdag nyid kyang bdag po'i sbyor bas rang gi rig pa dang/ gnyis su med par gyur pas 'di lta bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid blang bar bya ste/ 'di yang gsang
301a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang bskur ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags pa dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi mchog /dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin no/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das mngon par bzhengs
301b1(rgyud 'grel): pa kho na ste/ ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i bcom ldan 'das slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub
301b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs pa 'di lta bu yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i 'dus pas 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi
301b3(rgyud 'grel): bsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i yin kyi nyid yin te/ /so so'i skye bo rnams kyis phyi'i med pa dang/ de'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de bas na 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi le'u las/ til gyi gang bu ltar kun tu gang ba'i rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chu dang
301b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar mdzad par bsams par bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ 'dra'o/ /zhes ji skad du gsungs pa dang/ de bzhin du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las kyang/ rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs
301b5(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag rgya gcig pu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shing/ de nyid ras dang rtsig pa dang/ nam mkha' i phyogs su yang bsams par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas de yang dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa thams cad du dbang bskur ba yid kyi nyid rjes su gnang
301b6(rgyud 'grel): ba kho na yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bshad pa la khyad par med pa dang/ bstan pa des khyad par ci zhig yod de/ gal te phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin gyi/ dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir phyag rgya
301b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor yid kyi yin gyi/ dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma yin no/ /zhes la la zer ba de ni mi rigs so/ /bdag cag gi slob dpon rnams kyis kyang gal te 'dul ba'i dbang gis gzhan dag la 'di skad du gsungs kyi/ yang dag
302a1(rgyud 'grel): par ma yin te/ ji ltar dbang bskur ba 'di ni mi sems kyis rjes su 'brang ba yin pa de bzhin du/ cho ga gzhan dag kyang ci'i phyir mi 'dod de/ khyad par med pa yin no/ /yid mngon par 'dus byas
302a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir rtsom pa 'di dag thams cad de bri ba'i cho ga yang/ ji srid yid kyi cho ga rjes su ma spyad pa de srid 'bras bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na yid kyi cho ga 'di stobs can yin pa'i phyir mchog
302a3(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi phyi'i ni ma yin no/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de ltar gnyi gas kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med
302a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod par bshad pa/ nam mkha' dri med pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum la bde phan bsgrub par brtson pa yis/ /bdag gis cho ga
302a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di bshad dge thob gang yin pa/ /des ni 'gro ba kun dang bdag gis 'di nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mngon sum gyur pa myur thob shog /sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i
302a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// bkra shis//
302a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa kho na lhar bcas 'gro ba yi/ /bde legs kun gyi rtsa bar yid ches nas/ /lus srog yal bar gyur kyang mi gtong ba'i/ /snying
302a8(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen pos dam chos 'dzin gyur cig /
